bshad kyis/ lag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i bdag po 'khor sna tshogs pas rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par 'phrul pa rgyas par bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig /de la bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te

thal mo sbyar ba btud pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min/ /dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /bla ma las kyang bla
ma ni/ /mngon par brjod pa'i phyi ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /gsang ba mchog gis dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' bde ba'i mchog /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin/ /thog ma med pa'i tshul chen 'di/ /b+ha gar sid sgra gzugs skyes gnas/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/ /

thog mar dbus mtha' dri ma med/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /bsrub dang bsrub par yang dag sbyor/ /gang la de la ji ltar bzhin/ /rang bzhin dag pa 'od gsal ba/ /gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba yin/ /

rtag tu nyes bral zhi ba ste/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa/ /spro dang bsdu pa byed pa yin/ /rang bzhin dag pa rang byung ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba ster/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan ldan pa dang / /sbyor nyid cho

ga'i ye shes kyi/ /de dag rgyud las gsungs pa dag /gsang ba'i bdag po rab tu nyon/ /dbugs 'byin bar ma mchog dag dang / /dri yi chu dang bcas pa dag /mkhas pas ri lur byas nas ni/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor

dag la mchod/ /'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad par la/ /pho nyas lhan cig skyes pa 'grub/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste/ /mthar thug dngos grub thams cad 'byung / /dga' ba yid la 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /

rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /rang dang gzhan yang mchod par bya/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /thos pa dang ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun
las grol 'gyur te/ /de ltar 'di la the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog /dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan dag pas kyang / /skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur/ /mngon

par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig la 'jug pa'i gsang ba sbas pa bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba khro bo
chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dngos grub thams cad kyi gsang ba gsungs pa/ chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ dpa' bo chen po gzugs rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po tshor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du shes rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du byed

rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po rnam par shes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po gti mug rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po

rna ba rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po sna rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po phrag dog rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po sa rdo rje

dang / dpa' bo chen po chu rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po me rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rlung rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po mkha' dbyings rdo rje dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa

mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phro ba'i gsang ba'i snying po 'byung bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'dus pa gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje thod pa'i dum bu dang /

dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lha dgra dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpag med dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'od dang / dpa'

bo chen po rdo rje lus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje myu gu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rab bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje

bzang po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mig mi bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje stobs po che dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rin chen dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / dpa' bo chen

po rdo rje nam mkha'i snying po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpal he ru ka chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / 'di lta bu la

sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnyis su med pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi gsang ba'i dam tshig gsang ba'i b+ha ga las 'byung ba rnal 'byor ma dang / dpa' bo'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po gsungs pa 'di lta ste/

rnal 'byor ma chen mo/ ltung byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo/ gsod byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'gugs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gar gyi dbang

phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo pad ma'i dra ba mo zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje lA ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang /

mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje gzugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab gtum ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gtum mig ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo

sna chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dpa' ba'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo mi'u thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo lang ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo shing grib ma zhes bya

ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sa srungs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jigs byed chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'thung ma zhes bya ba dang /

rnal 'byor ma chen mo sngo bsangs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzang ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rta rna ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo bya gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i

shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'tshong ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i go cha ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab dpa' mo

zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo stobs chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor los sgyur ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo brtson 'grus chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pas

nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ gar sna tshogs byed cing rang gi dam tshig dang mkhyud pa dang / tsum b+ha nas snying rje chen po'i ro yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis gang

bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas zhugs te/ dpa' bo'i mchog rnams kyis dam tshig rjes su dran no/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje phag mo'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung zhing shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyi rigs dang gsang ba gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rdo rje ma mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo 'ug gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /

rdo rje ma mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje bsreg ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje pho nya mo zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje mche ba ma zhes bya ba dang /

rdo rje ma mo gshin rje 'joms ma zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta bu'i ma mo'i tshogs kyi phyogs thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang ste/ rigs kyi bdag po rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye

shes 'byung ba dpal he ru ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig chen po rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig yin te/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po med/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /bdag med chos las yang dag

'byung / /'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rnal 'byor kyi

dbang phyug chen po rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje he ru ka dang / rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang / rnal 'byor kyi dbang

phyug chen po rta mchog dang / rigs drug po de ni yan lag dag tu dgod pa ste/ bsrung ba gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi mchog de ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las byung ngo / /rnal 'byor chen po'i mchog tu

gsang ba sbas pa bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo ya mi ni dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rmongs byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo g.yo byed ma dang / rdo rje

dbang phyug chen mo skrag byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo tsan Di ka ste/ 'di lta bus yang nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yang dag par bsrung ba'i sbor
ba'i thugs gsang ba chen po ste/ de lta bu sna tshogs du ma'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lag pas khrag dron mo mchog gis mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ mos pa mchog gis spyi bos gtugs so/ /

de nas dam tshig chen po rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas sems dpa' sna tshogs spros te phyung nas gdul ba du ma la thabs sna tshogs

pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang bar byas te/ sna tshogs pas mdun gyi nam mkha' yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sna tshogs pa'i snying rje chen po'i khro bo'i cha

lugs 'dzin cing sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i ro dga' ba sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed dang mnyam pa bstan te/ khams gsum gyi bdag pos gsungs pa/ chu dang / me dang rlung dang / dbang chen gyi

steng du sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab sna tshogs pa rin po che sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa/ de'i steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpas chos kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po phyung nas spros te/ rdo rje chen po'i gzhal

yas khang dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal por sprul pa la kun du bzang po chen po byung ste/ rdo rje 'khor dang lhan cig byung nas brten par bzhugs so/ /phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud

pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa/ dril bu dang / rnga yab dang / rgyal mtshan dang / g.yer ka'i dra bas mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rdo rje dam tshig gi srad bu chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/

sna tshogs pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang / rjed byed dang / grib gnon dang / ma rungs pa dang / shin tu gdug pa dang / ro langs dang / ro dang /

ro bsreg pa dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dang / lce spyang mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i sgra pheM dang / a la la'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dril bu dang cang te'u'i sgra sgrogs pa/ mgo gcad pa gar byed

pas nye bar brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pa can/ dge ba'i las kyis sgrol ba sems can thams cad la snying rje'i ros phan 'dogs pa/ rnam par 'khor bas bskor ba pad ma'i gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo sbyor

ba/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa lag pa'i thal mo sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i dum bu'i chos kyi mchog zab mo'i tshul dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod pa ston pa/ sku lus chen po 'dzin pa/ zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/

rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma chen mo nye bar 'byung ba/ mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i dra ba can/ chos sna tshogs pa'i rjes su bstan pa ston pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa

sna tshogs kyi bde ba ster zhing ston par byed pa sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las zhu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ snying kar zla ba bsgoms nas ni/ /rdo rje phra mo'i rnam 'phrul ba/ /bde gshegs thams cad gsang ba ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i

sdom/ /der ni gsang ba byin brlabs pa/ /snying po mchog ni legs par nyon/ /bla ma yi yang bla ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma

ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM badzra shud d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA badzra shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM yo ga shud d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM dz+nyA na shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA dz+nyA na shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM sa ma ya shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA sa ma ya shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shUn+ya tA

a nu ra ga ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra kr-i ta su bi shud d+hA d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM man tra shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA man tra shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM kro d+ha shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHkro d+ha shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM tsit+ta shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA t+ta shud d+ho\u0f85 haM/

oM bAka shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA bAka shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM kA ya shud d+hAH sarba d+harmAH kA ya shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM dz+nyA na a mr-i ta shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA dz+nyA na a mr-i ta shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM nA nA sa ma ya shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA nA nA sa ma ya shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM tsAr+ya nA

ya shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA tsar+ya nA ya shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM tri yo ga pa ri shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA tri yo ga pa ri shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM a b+hi She ka shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA a b+hi She ka shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM pU dza shud d+hAH sarba d+harmAH pU dza shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a twa ya pU dza

badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM maN+Da la shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA maN+Da la shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM a d+hi pa ti shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA a d+hi pa ti shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM b-I ra shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA bI ra shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM yo g-i nI shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA yo gi nI shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/

oM ta twa shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA ta twa shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ he i ti he twa pa ga taH sarba d+harmA he twa pa ga to\u0f85ha~M/ ru i ti ru kA rA pa ga taH sarba d+harmA ru kA rA pa ga to\u0f85ha~M/ ka i ti na s+k+wa tsid s+thi taH sarba d+harmA na s+k+wa tsita s+thi to\u0f85ha~M/ oM dz+ha Ti ta ka ra shud d+hAH

sarba d+harmA dz+ha Ti ta ka ra shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM b+ha ba shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA b+ha ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM dza pa shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA dza pa shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM A hA ra shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA A hA ra shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM b+hak+Sha shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA b+hak+Sha shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/

oM a sa ma hi ta shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA a sa ma hi ta shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM swa sam be d+ha na shud d+hAH sarba d+harmAH swa sam be d+ha na shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM de sha shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA de sha shud d+ho\u0f85 haM~M/ oM mo ha shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA mo ha shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM

rA ga shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA rA ga shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM mA na shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA mA na shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM IR+Sha shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA IR+Sha shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM kha badzra shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA kha badzra shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM tri tsakra pa ri shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA tri tsakra pa ri shud

d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM DA ki nI shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA DA ki nI shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM shang+ku la shud d+hAH sarba d+harmAH shang+ku la shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM mA tri shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA mA tri shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM piTha shud d+hAH sarba d+harmAH piTha shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ /'di ltar ji srid nye ba'i dur khrod kyi bar thams

cad rnam par dag par shes par bya'o/ /pu dza au a go rA de mA ka la o tri ko ka la ka hi pre gri sau su na si ma ku/ sa bcu rnam par dag pa'i bdag /pha rol phyin bcu'ang de bzhin te/ /shes pa bcu yang rnam dag bdag /bcu po de dag

rnam par bsgom/ /'khor lo gsum yang yongs dag phyir/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid dge/ /dus dang tshod rnams rnam grol bas/ /rnal 'byor ma yi yid dga' ba/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam dag don/ /mngon mtho he ru ka las

byung / /mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla/ /gsang chen mchog gi dam pa'o/ /g.yon dang g.yas su bskor ba yis/ /dgod cing mchod dang bskor bar bya/ /gang gis de nyid shes pa yis/ /brda ni lnga po bstan par bya/ /

gang yang dbang bskur med pa la/ /gzhan du de nyid ma bstan cig /mngon brjod rgyud la bla ma yis/ /dbang bskur slob ma dag la sbyin/ /gzhan du slob ma smyo ba dang / /brgyal dang rmongs pa dag tu 'gro/ /mnar med 'jigs

pa chen po dang / /ngan pa der ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /glegs bam bshes min la ster ba/ /ngan pa de ma thag tu 'chi/ /phol mig rims dang dug dang nad/ /mkha' 'gro gdon gyis gtses par 'gyur/ /mi srun bgegs dang tshogs bdag

gis/ /gsod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/ /ji srid 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /bla ma slob mas rim bzhin du/ /de nyid rtag tu sbas nas ni/ /myur du sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /bla mas thams cad rim bzhin du/ /

mngon brjod rgyud kyi rim pa bzhin/ /lha yi rnal 'byor la sbyor ba/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'gyur/ /de ma thag tu byang chub ste/ /mchog ni nges par rnyed par 'gyur/ /mi yi bu mo 'di 'dra spang / /bdag gi dam tshig

mi shes shing / /drag cing log lta rang bzhin ngan/ /mi srun snying rje med pa dang / /brkam chags ser snar ldan pa dang / /spyang zhing ngan la phrag dog can/ /skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang / /rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang / /
'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spang bar bya/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring ba yin/ /puk+ka sI ni mdzes sdug blang / /gzugs sdug gzhon pas rnam par brgyan/ /sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sems/ /brtul zhugs

brtan zhing dam tshig shes/ /dpa' zhing chags bral ngo tsha med/ /nga rgyal med cing ser sna med/ /sngags pa rang gi spyod pa ste/ /rig ma brtul zhugs khyod kyi long / /phyag rgya lnga ni rtag tu 'chang / /mgo la thod pa'i rgyan yang

byas/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /thal ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs/ /rtag tu ma hA mAM sa bza'/ /thams cad btung bas myos pa dang / /ro yi gdan la 'dug pa dang / /lpags pa chen po gos su gyon/ /rjes su

'thun pa'i bza' ba za/ /zhag dang khrag gis tshim pa dang / /grong ngam dgon pa dag tu yang / /gang zhig yul du 'gro ba na/ /rtag tu chags pas mi gnas shing / /rtag tu dur khrod spyod byed la/ /yang na tshong 'dus gnas pa
dang / /nyan thos 'jig rten skal med pa'i/ /mi shes gti mug gis khyab pa/ /nyan thos yongs su longs spyod pa'i/ /gtsug lag khang du gnas mi bya/ /ji ltar skyes bu dbul po bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa'

de bzhin gnas/ /rdo rje gar gyis rnam par rol/ /rtag tu dur khrod la gnas shing / /dri chen sha chen zas su bza'/ /myos byed btung bar ldan pa yi/ /dpa' ba'i gtso bos rtse gcig pa'i/ /sems kyis rab tu bsgom

par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po ma rnyed na/ /g.yeng ba thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/ /de ni ye shes 'byung gnas te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin las byung / /gzung dang 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i/ /gnyis su med pa nyid la gnas/ /

rtse gcig sems ni byas nas kyang / /bsgom pa'i spyod pa la gnas na/ /bde la dga' ba'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga'i rim/ /phyag rgya che dang nges par rol/ /bsgom pa mngon du gyur pa yis/ /

rnam grol sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur/ /g.yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste/ /g.yas pa de bzhin thabs yin no/ /bsgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni/ /sum bcu'i dbang phyug la dbang

byed/ /rnal 'byor ma ni dngos grub dang / /gnod sbyin klu yi bu mo dang / /gzhan yang sna tshogs dri za mo/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod dag la spyod/ /de nyid gsang ba'i mchog gyur pa/ /A li kA li rtag tu bsgom/ /rang gi lha yi

sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad de bzhin rnam par brtag /dpa' bos brda rnams bstan pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi lag g.yon gyis/ /brda rnams la ni 'jug par bya/ /dpa' bo'i gnas su gyur pa 'di/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig

rten gsum/ /'gro kun g.yon las byung ba yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bos nyid/ /'dzub mor rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs/ /gung mor pad ma gar dbang gnas/ /srin lag dpa' bo dngos grub can/ /tha ma la ni mi

zad sku/ /sen mo'i ngos la rta mgrin gnas/ /g.yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni/ /dpa' bo thams cad yin par bshad/ /lag mthil pho nya 'dus pa'i mchog /rgyab tu shin du nges byas te/ /brda ni lnga po bstan par bya/ /

sgrub pa po yis shes par bya/ /sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad/ /chu khams mA ma kI ru bshad/ /me ni gos dkar mo ru bshad/ /rlung ni sgrol ma dag tu grags/ /'o byed ma ni stong pa ste/ /de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin/ /

dbus kyi dpa' bo thams cad ni/ /mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol/ /gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan zhing / /rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya/ /de ltar brda yis dpa' bo rnams/ /de dang lhan cig bza' ba bza'/ /dpa' bos
thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin/ /phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs brda ni bshad par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid dang / /pho nya rnams kyi mtshan

nyid dag /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /de dag thams cad bshad par bya/ /ras ris dang ni sku gzugs dag /'dri na de bzhin dam tshig dang / /sku mdog gi ni khyad par gyis/ /gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa/ /sna

tshogs sngags kyis mdzes pa yi/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /lha yi dam tshig yid 'ong ba/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs mchog /dpa' bo sna tshogs yid 'ong ba'i/ /rnal 'byor ma ni yang dag 'dus/ /mkha'

'gro ma yang yang dag 'dus/ /rang rigs sna tshogs mchog dam pa/ /bla ma brgyud pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /bdag po'i las la shin tu mkhas/ /sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs/ /

gzhan yang cho ga'i rim pa dang / /mngon brjod bla ma'i las la mkhas/ /phyugs kyi mtshan nyid sngags pas rtog /sna tshogs rigs kyi khyad par dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi spyod pa dang / /mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin te/ /phyi rol ma

mo'i phyag rgya dag /phag mo yi ni rigs las byung / /dpa' bo kun gyi spyod pa dang / /'khor lo'i spyod pa shin du bslabs/ /phyi yi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ /mtshan nyid spyod pa dag la mkhas/ /he ru ka dpal rigs las byung / /

dge ba'i spyod pa dag la bslabs/ /yul gyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang / /slob dpon spyod pa dag la mkhas/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud spyod dang / /rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgya che ba/ /bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbye ba'i rim/ /thams cad rgyud rnams

rnam par shes/ /'grub pa'i lung dang bstan bcos dang / /mdo sde skyes rabs de bzhin te/ /bla na med pa'i spyod pa dag /shes rab pha rol phyin las byung / /phyi rol bstan bcos yongs la mkhas/ /phun sum tshogs pa

slob dpon mchog /sbyor ba'i bsgom par ldan pa dang / /yid gnyis med pa nyid kyi ni/ /bza' ba thams cad bza' bar bya/ /yi ge brgya pas thams cad du/ /gsang sngags brtan par bsgoms nas su/ /rang gi ming dang ldan par

ni/ /gcig tu spel nas bzlas par bya/ /rtag tu phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzla/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /gsang sngags btus pas go cha dang / /snying po dang ni nye

snying dang / /gsang sngags btus pa rjes su bsrung / /dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes pa la/ /yi ge'i dkyil 'khor legs bkod nas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bskyed/ /'di ni gsang sngags thams cad do/ /ma mo rnams
kyi dam pa mchog /gsang ba dga' ba sbas pa ste/ /gsang sngags thams cad bsdus pa yin/ /gsang sngags kun gyi gnas yin no/ /'gro ba 'byung ba'ang ma mos khyab/ /de nyid 'di ni mi bstan te/ /dngos grub

'joms par 'gyur ba yin/ /bsgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med/ /skye 'gros 'di ni bsgoms tsam gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed/ /byams pa'i go cha bgos pa ste/ /snying rje chos kyi go

cha yin/ /shes rab mtshon char ldan pa yin/ /nyon mongs bdud ni rnam par spangs/ /phyir bzlog chen mos bsrung ba dang / /rdo rje zhal bzhis rnam par mtshan/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /kha sbyar gsum gyi rdo rjes

mtshan/ /thams cad mchog gi bsrung ba che/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /bka' yi 'khor lo bsrung ba che/ /phur bus bgegs med dngos grub 'gyur/ /bsrung ba mchog ni 'di dag gi/ /sgrub pa po la byang chub stsol/ /

rdo rje phur bus ra ba dang / /rdo rje'i sa dang dra ba dang / /steng gi gur dang bla res yis/ /gdug pa'i bdud ni bkrad byas nas/ /mi gsod gsod pa med pa yin/ /gang gis rang sems thul ba yis/ /bdag gi sems ni bcings pa yin/ /

gang la gang gis gsod pa yod/ /mnyam pa'i sems ni dri yin te/ /gru bzhi pa ni byug pa yin/ /tsan dan dkar po lus yin te/ /mnyam par gnas pa nyid yin no/ /me tog bzod pa rnal 'byor pa/ /'bad pas gtor ba yin par bshad/ /rang bzhin dag pa 'dug pa ste/ /mnyam pa'i

bsgom pa bdug pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen po las de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gros de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba gsungs

pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla/ /bla ma brgyud pas bshad pa bzhin/ /phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog dam pa/ /rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med/ /'jigs pa thams

cad rnam par spangs/ /tshes grangs med cing skar ma med/ /bslab pa'i cho ga'ang yod ma yin/ /gtsang sbra med cing mi gtsang med/ /dag pa'i bya ba'ang yod ma yin/ /dus dang tshod las rnam par grol/ /dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs/ /

rang gi sngags rgyud sbyor ba shes/ /sems can kun gyi don yang byed/ /ri sul dang ni ri rtse dang / /chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag dang / /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang / /shing gcig dang ni dge ba'i gnas/ /ma mo'i khyim mam dur khrod dam/ /sna

tshogs dam pa'i ldum ra dang / /lha khang dang ni mchod rten nam/ /khyim 'am bzhi mdo dag tu ni/ /sgrub pa po yis sbyor bsgrubs na/ /'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster/ /gnas ni brtag pa byas nas kyang / /yid ni gang du dga' ba der/ /

sna tshogs bde mchog dam pa ni/ /de ru bsgrubs na dngos grub 'gyur/ /sems sbyor med pa nyid las ni/ /du mar dbye ba'i bsgoms pa yis/ /ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis ni/ /sa ni byug pa byas nas kyang / /bzod pa'i

pha rol phyin pa yi/ /me tog 'bad pas dgram par bya/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong gdan/ /mnyam par bzhag pas rgya cher bya/ /rtse gcig pa yi sems kyi ni/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa bsgrub/ /tshangs pa'i gnas

bzhi la gnas te/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po bya/ /dge ba bcu yang dmigs nas ni/ /sems can kun gyi don yang bya/ /phyi dang nang du bltas na ni/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa yin/ /byang chub tshogs kyi

mchog dam pa/ /sems tsam la ni rab tu gnas/ /rang gi snying ka mkha' dkyil du/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas par bsgom/ /de steng de nyid mchog gyur pa/ /ye shes lnga po zhi ba yin/ /sna tshogs 'od zer gsol ba yi/ /

rnam par 'phro bas kun tu khyab/ /sngon grub pa rnams bskul nas ni/ /byin gyis brlab pa'ang byed pa yin/ /nam mkha'i khams ni bsgom dga' bas/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba yin/ /til gyi gang bu lta bu yi/ /lha dang

khro bos khyab par mthong / /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /byang chub sems dang bla ma'i gtso/ /lha mo sna tshogs mthong nas ni/ /bdag gis mchod cing rjed par bya/ /sangs rgyas spros te sprul pa'i tshogs/ /khro bo'i rgyal po

rnal 'byor mas/ /'gro ba ris drug sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas gnas su dgod par byed/ /nam mkha'i dkyil ni kun khyab pa'i/ /mchog de mthong nas bsdus nas su/ /thams cad gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /byang chub

mthar thug bar du ni/ /sems can ma lus gyur pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang de la bzhag /de la sgrub pa pos gsol gdab/ /dge ba'i las las byung ba la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /rmongs pa'i gzugs can nga rgyal

dang / /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnam shes de bzhin no/ /oM bru~M a~M hrI~M ho hU~M/ de ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / /rdo rje nyi ma gar dbang phyug /rdo rje rgyal pos khyab pa yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog de

bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /he ru ka dpal rdo rje'o/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ /lce dang reg pa yid de bzhin/ /oM hUM trA~M A~M kha~M ha~M/ gti mug dang ni zhe sdang dang / /de bzhin phrag dog 'dod chags dang / /ser sna dang ni rmongs pa nyid/ /

skye mched dag ni thams cad la/ /dbang phyug rdo rje nyid yin no/ /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag go/ // ltung byed ma dang gsod ma dang / /'gugs byed dang ni gar dbang dang / /

pad ma'i dra ba mo lha'o/ /mkha' mnyam nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /de ltar phung po khams dang ni/ /skye mched rnams ni rnal 'byor pas/ /tha mal dngos po'i rang bzhin ni/ /yongs su dag par shes par bya/ /tha mal

chos kun yongs dag ste/ /bdag kyang yongs su dag pa yin/ /de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ /sngags kyi sku ru 'gyur ba yis/ /he ru ka dpal bdag gyur nas/ /sems can kun gyi don yang byed/ /he ru ka yi go 'phang mchog /

thob nas sems can ma lus pa/ /'di la 'jog cing 'god par shog /swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAH swa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ /lan gsum bar du bzla bar bya/ /dngos med mdun sogs phyogs bcu ru/ /snying po'i phreng ba

spro bar bya/ /des na snying po de mthong nas/ /dra ba ra ba de bzhin te/ /rdo rje sa sogs byin gyis brlab/ /bla re mda' yi dra ba dang / /rdo rje me ni 'bar bar bskor/ /phyi rol ring nas dgod par bya/ /oM me di nI badzrI b+hA ba

badzra ban d+ha hU~M/ oM badzra prA kA ra hU~M ba~M hU~M/ oM badzra pany+tsa hU~M ba~M hU~M/ oM badzra bi tA na hU~M kha~M hU~M/ oM badzra sha ra dzA la hU~M Sha hU~M/ oM badzra dz+wa lA na lArka hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he ru ka yi bka' 'khor lo/ /gtso bo brgyad po
'bar ba dag /de mthong nas ni legs pa ru/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /dag pa'i shel dang zla mdog 'dra/ /phyag
rgya che dang mnyam par ldan/ /shes rab skyil dkrung legs par bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng 'dra ldan pa'i dbu/ /mi bskyod pa ni dbu rgyan bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /thams cad
mtshan mas mtshan pa yin/ /dpe byad kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing / /rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin mdzad cing / /dpa'

chen bde ba'i go 'phang bzhugs/ /dkar zhing ser la ljang khu ste/ /zhal gdong gnyis po rnam par 'gyur/ /lugs su 'byung dang bzlog tshul gyis/ /de yis khro bos brgyad dang spro/ /rdo rje drag po na larkaM/ /rdo rje gtsug

tor de bzhin de/ /thab sbyor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / /rdo rje nag po stobs po che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba/ /khro bo 'di dag rnam par dgod/ /sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar/ /ljang khu du ba'i mdog can te/ /dkar

zhing nag la gur gum mdog /rab 'jigs thod pa'i dbu rgyan cing / /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /thams cad na ra'i rus pa yi/ /rgyan gyis skad pa rab tu 'bar/ /g.yas brkyang pa'i zhabs kyis ni/ /sna tshogs

pad ma'i nang bzhugs shing / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po dag /zhabs kyis mnan par rnam par bsam/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'chang / /
thams cad dril bu cang te'u/ /shes rab bde bas legs par 'khyud/ /dmar ser dbu skra dag gis brgyan/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can/ /stag gi lpags pa gos su mnabs/ /
'jigs pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te/ /des ni bdag nyid brgyan du byas/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad rnam par bsgom/ /khro zhing 'bar la g.yo ba dang / /drag cing 'jigs la rnam par 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams
kun gyis legs par brgyan/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /lcags kyu zhags pa kha T+wA~M 'chang / /dril bu rdo rje thod pa 'dzin/ /mgo yi do shal sku la 'chang / /
thod pa'i phreng ba'i ska rags can/ /gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og mnan/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam par ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom par bya/ /

khro bo gnyis po rnam par bsgom/ /steng du gtsug tor 'khor sgyur te/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par sgom/ /'og tu rdo rje sa 'og go/ /dkar la sngo ba'i mdog can yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /'khor lo

dang ni mdung 'dzin cing / /zhags pa lcags kyu dril rdo rje/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /phur bu khro bor byas nas su/ /de ni phyogs bcur rnam par spro/ /de la bka' lung bsgo ba ni/ /bgegs ni myur du med

par gyis/ /gsang sngags rjes su dran nas su/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu mnyam par gzugs/ /mthe bong sdigs 'dzub sbyor ba yis/ /phyogs bcu dag tu se gol brdab/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ shar du'o/ /

oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ byang du'o/ /oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ nub tu'o/ /oM A na ya hoH b+ha ga ban badzra hU~M hU~M phaT/ lho phyogs su'o/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /bgegs kun gyi ni klad pa la/ /

rdo rje phur bus dgod cing mnan/ /lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yin/ /oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba du big+hA nan hU~M phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA pa~M hU~M phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ro dz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya

bA ka tsi t+ta badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ phur pa rdo rje khro bo ru/ /bltas nas yongasu brtag par bya/ /lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis/ /dngos grub rdo rjes brdung bar bya/ /oM badzra hU~M mung+ga ra badzra kI la A ko

Ta ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ mkhas pas rdo rje khro bo'i tshig /gsang sngags tshig ni drag tu bzla/ /oM kha badzra d+h+ri ka badzra hU~M kA ra badzra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra tsaN+Da badzra hU~M phaT/ oM badzrA na lArka badzra hU~M phaT/ oM badzro Sh+NI Sha badzra

hU~M phaT/ oM kuN+Da li badzra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha badzra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ka rA la ha~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ma hA ba la badzra hU~M phaT/ oM bi sha na badzra hU~M phaT/ oM uSh+NI Sha tsakra brti badzra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra pA tA la badzra hU~M phaT/ bka' 'di

dag ni bsgrub pa yis/ /de ma thag tu bgegs med 'gyur/ /mA~M sa rkang dang zhag kha chu/ /shu kra rag+ta lhan cig sbyar/ /rnal 'byor pa yis ri lur byas/ /zos na dngos grub nges par 'gyur/ /sngo zhing ser la ljang khu ni/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad rang

byas te/ /ser zhing gnag la ljang khu dang / /dud kha ser la ser skya dang / /dkar zhing ser la ljang khu dang / /dmar zhing ser la ljang ba dag /de ltar bzhi ni bdag po bzhin/ /mi bskyod dbu rgyan dam tshig can/ /bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin pa dgyes/ /

'di ltar khro bo thams cad kyang / /dam tshig las ni 'gal ma byed/ /'di ltar sna tshogs du ma yi/ /gtso bo'i bka' ni blang bar gyis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gar gnas pa/ /bgegs rnams thams cad med par mthong / /gcer bu'am yang na

mi gcer ba'am/ /skra grol thal bas yan lag byugs/ /'di ltar ji srid ma ngal bar/ /'khor lo dag gi bzlas pa bya/ /stong pa'i ye shes rdo rje ni/ /dad pas dran zhing mnyam par bzhag /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma

ko\u0f85 haM/ /oM a ni mit+ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM a pra Ni ha ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ smig rgyu tsam gyi ye shes ni/ /sems tsam du ni rnam par brtag /'di ni mkha' dang mnyam pa yin/ /chos med chos min pa yang

med/ /nam mkha' gos pa med pa ltar/ /dngos po med cing dmigs su med/ /gang gi snying gi kha sbyar dbus gnas gsal/ /phra bar lta ba rang byung myong ba'i sems 'jug pa/ /khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba/ /

gsal ba chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dngos po'i g.yo ba rta kun nang du nges sbyor ba'i/ /ye shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur pa/ /khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba'i/ /

mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra bar dri med dpal du gyur/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor kyis/ /chos ni rjes su dran pa sgom/ /chos rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos kyi sku ni rang 'byung 'gyur/ /dbus na gsal byed
rnam par shes/ /ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyis/ /shin du bsgoms pa'i goms pa las/ /'bar ba 'di ni the tshom med/ /rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi/ /thig le gcig pu yi ge med/ /skyes bus de ni
bsgoms gyur na/ /ye shes skye bar gyur pa mchog /sems dpa' rjes dran rnal 'byor kyis/ /sems dpa' rjesu dran par bsgom/ /sems dpa' rjes dran chos kyis ni/ /chos kyi sems dpa' khyad par 'byung / /bdag

ni snying rjes phan 'dogs pa/ /smon lam dbang gis mthong ba dang / /mthong nas ji srid 'og tu ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' kun mkhyen dag /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /sngon po yi ni zhal

dang bzhi/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam/ /yi ge yaM las yang dag 'byung / /sngo ba'i mdog can gzhu lta bu'o/ /rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan par bsgom/ /dud pa'i phreng ba khyab par dmigs/ /de yi steng du yi ge raM/ /me yi

dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa/ /gru gsum pa la dmar ba'i mdog /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bar bas khyab/ /nyi ma bye ba 'od mtha' yas/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya/ /de yi steng du chu nyid de/ /yi ge ba~M mchog las byung ba/ /

du sha ra yi mdog 'dra ba/ /zlum la 'od zer phreng ba can/ /de yi steng du sa dkyil 'khor/ /la~M las byung ba ser po ste/ /zur bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan/ /'od zer ser po khyab par 'khrigs/ /rnal 'byor de steng bsgom pa ni/ /ri rab lhun

po mchog gyur pa/ /zur bzhi pa la rin chen bzhi/ /rtse mo brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes/ /yi ge su~M las legs par byung / /'od zer gzi brjid mchog dam pa'o/ /de yi steng du bsam pa ni/ /bruM ni dkar po las byung ba/ /de steng

'khor lor bcas pa dag /khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bsam/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis mdzes shing / /ba dan phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang / /

sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing / /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /de yi nang du 'khor lo ni/ /brgyad po dkar po'i mdog can la/ /de yi dbus su pad ma che/ /sna tshogs 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ /

lte ba ge sar gyis khyab pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rig mar bcas/ /dkar po ser po de bzhin te/ /dmar dang ljang khu zhal bzhi pa/ /zhi zhing rgod dang khro ba dang / /rnam par 'gyur ba shin du 'jigs/ /rdo rje dril

bus mnyam par ldan/ /mdung dang dgra sta cang te'u dang / /gri gug thod pa kha T+wA~M ga /tshangs pa'i lpags pa gos su mnabs/ /zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dag /phyag ni bcu gnyis de bzhin te/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung du bzhugs/ /

dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan can/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dpe byad mtshan dang yang dag ldan/ /thugs kyi ye shes dam tshig can/ /cod pan rdo rje 'dzin pa yin/ /ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab de/ /phyag rgya lnga po

byin gyis brlabs/ /rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mchog /bde ba chen po'i thabs sbyor bas/ /sku ni gnyis su med par thim/ /mnyam pa nyid las byung ba'i sku/ /mkha' 'gro'i 'khor ni dpa' bo

dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang bcas par byung / /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs/ /dkar sngo ser dmar zhal mdog ste/ /'khor lo dril bus mkhyud pa'i phyag /sngar gyi rdo rje sems sogs pa'i/ /phyag mtshan

rim pa 'dzin pa yin/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ni/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba rlon pas spud/ /zla ba phyed pa rab 'dzin pa/ /zhal bzhi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /spyan gsum pa phyag bcu gnyis pa/ /tshangs pa la

sogs pa'i lha zhabs kyis gnon pa nA ra'i rus pa'i rgyan can/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can/ phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa/ stag gi lpags pa bgos pa/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro mas pang du 'khyud pa/ sku la thod pa

dang gdug pa la sdigs 'dzub kyis 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril ba/ bde ba dang dgyes pas myos pa/ khams dang phung po dang / skye mched rnams byin gyis brlabs te sa'i khams ni laM

ste ltung byed ma'o/ /chu'i khams ni maM ste gsod par byed ma'o/ /me'i khams ni raM ste 'gugs byed ma'o/ /rlung gi khams ni yaM ste gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kha~M ste pad ma'i dra ba ma'o/ /ser ba dang / sngo ba dang /

dmar ba dang / dud kha dang / sngo ba'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad/ oM mdog dkar po/ tshor ba'i phung po rdo rje rin chen te a~M gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu/ 'du shes hri ste pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po/ 'du byed rdo rje

rgyal po ste ho ljang khu/ rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa' ste hU~M dkar po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni dpal he ru ka ste hi mdog nag po/ mig bru~M ste gti mug rdo rje dkar po/ rna ba hU~M ste zhe sdang rdo rje nag po'o/ /sna ni kha~M

phrag dog rdo rje ste ser po'o/ /ngag chags pa rdo rje ste a dmar po'o/ /reg pa ni ser sna rdo rje ste ha~M ljang khu'o/ /skye mched thams cad dbang phyug rdo rje ste ha~M dkar po'o/ /lus ni hU~M ste dkar po'o/ /ngag ni AHste dmar po'o/ /yid ni oM ste sngon

po'o/ /de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi bar byin gyis brlab cing dmigs so/ /de la shar gyi mdab ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog sngon po'o/ /lho phyogs kyi mdab ma la lA ma ni ljang khu ste/ sngo sangs so/ /nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma
la dum skyes ma dmar mo/ byang gis mdab ma la gzugs can ma gser gyi mdog ser skya zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ phyogs kyi gos 'chang ba/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/

'jigs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ thod pa dang / kha T+wA~M ga dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug 'dzin pa/ zhal gdong rjes su chags pas gnas pa/ dgyes pa'i chags pas lta zhing reg pa'o/ /mtshams

bzhir bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa'i steng du byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i snod bzhi gzhag go/ /shar du pre ta pu rir stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma nag po/ byang du gri ha de ba tA rar rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma ser po/

nub tu sau rASh+Tar rta mgrin dang / chang 'tshong ma dmar po'o/ /lhor su bar na dwA bar nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ljang khu'o/ /mer nA ga rar dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo dmar po'o/ /bden bral du sin+d+hu rar pad ma gar gyi dbang

phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste zla ba dang / ser skya'o/ /rlung phyogs na ma rur rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma dud kha'i mdog can/ dbang ldan du ku la tAr rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo dkar po

'o/ /stobs po che la sog pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ phyag gnyis la 'khor lo dang / dril bus mkhyud pa/ phyag gzhan la kha T+wA~M ga dang cang te'u 'dzin pa/ phyag rgya lngas
brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o/ /'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sog pa'i lha mo ni gdong gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ thod pa dang / sdigs 'dzub 'khor lo 'dzin pas mkhyud pa/

spyan gsum pa/ drag po'i gzugs can/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu gnyis su med par sbyor bar mnyam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi gos can ma mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang tshangs pa'i

skud pa dang / mgul rgyan dang / mgo'i phreng ba dang / g.yer khas 'og bag byas pa/ shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i sgor khwa gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong
ma rnams so/ /me dang / bden bral dang / rlung dang dbang ldan du ni gshin rje bsreg ma dang / gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma rnams so/ /
ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma bzhin khwa gdong ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba yang de bzhin no/ /mtshams kyi lha mo gzugs gnyis pa/ yid 'phrog pa'i tshul can/ yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ drag po

chen po thugs rjes sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang dpral bar 'khor lo'i phreng ba can no/ /'di dag ni sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og na gnas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor la bzhugs te/

dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa chags pa'i mig gis lta zhing / sna tshogs ro bcud bde ba ste/ /chags pa'i bde ba chen po ni/ /de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed/ /a la la ho dgyes pa chen/ /bde ba chen po

de nyid yin/ /bde gshegs lha ni shin tu mdzes/ /glu 'di blangs ba tsam gyis ni/ /dga' bas srid pa dag las grol/ /bde bar gshegs pa dag pa che/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par brtag /mngal skyes glu yi dbang gyur
par/ /rnal 'byor kha cig 'dod pa yin/ /mngal skyes sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bltas nas ni/ /mchod dang bstod pa byas nas gzhug /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yin/ /dngos dang dngos med

rnam par bsgom/ /rnal 'byor pa yis ma nor bar/ /bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum du bzla/ /skye ba can gyi lus grub ste/ /mkha' la spyod par the tshom med/ /oM shrI ka la/ da ka ru ru lu~M bru~M hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la

sam ba ra swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM b+hU~M ha~M ho b+hU~M hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM bud d+ha DA ki nI bai ro tsa nI ye b+h+rU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM b+h+rU~M sadwa bud d+ha DA ki nI ye/ hU~M bru~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ / oM k+Sh+ma~M ma hA

hUM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra be ge hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ha rat+na badzra hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM khaN Da ro hi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ha ya grI ba hrI hu~M hUM phaT/ oM shauN Di nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M A kA sha gar+b+ha hUM hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM tsakra warmi NI ye hUM phaT/ oM ki

khi shrI he ru ka ki li hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM su bI re hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM si li pad ma nar dwe shwa ra si li hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA ba le hu~M~M hUM phaT/ oM hi li bai ro tsa na hi li hu~M hUM phaT/ oM tsakra warti nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM d+hi li badzra sa twa d+hi li hu~M hUM phaT/

oM ma hA bIr+ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM u lU kA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM shwa nA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hi huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+Ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma ma thA ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM DA ki

ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM lA me hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM rU pi NI hu~M hU~M phaT/ mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma sogs la/ /thog ma pad ma la gnas nas/ /mchod pa bya zhing sngags kyang bzla/ /rtag tu bdag nyid lnga po

dag /'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /zhi ba dang ni dbang nyid dang / /rmongs par bya dang gnon pa dag /sku yi mkha' 'gros byed pa ste/ /dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig can dag langs dus su/ /

yan lag drug tu bsgom bya ba/ /rnam dag ye shes mig gis ni/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams blta/ / oM haH snying ka la/ na maHhi mgo bo la/ swA hA hU~M spyi gtsug la/ oM bau Sha Ta he go cha'o/ /hU~M hU~M ho mig

la'o/ /phaT ha~M yan lag kun gyi mtshon cha'o/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar ba dang / /sngo dang ljang khu dud kha dang / /yid kyis mdog drug rnam par bsgom/ /oM ba~M sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ste lte ba la'o/ /ha~M ya~M ya mi

ni ste snying ka'i la'o/ /hriM moM rmongs byed ma ste kha la'o/ /hriM hrIM g.yo byed ma ste mgo bo la'o/ /hU~M hU~M skrag byed ma ste spyi gtsug la'o/ /phaT na maHtsaN Di ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma

thams cad/ /mkha' 'gro rnams ni bzhugs nas kyang / /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad 'di yis rnam par brtag /'chi med ye shes lnga bza' zhing / /ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya/ /rdo rje dam tshig can
mchod nas/ /dus bzhi dag tu bsnyen pa bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sku'i sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnams

bsgoms te/ /sngar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /rtsi brgyad dmar po'i mdog can la/ /nang gi 'dab ma snga ma bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yongs gyur pa'i/ /gsung gi mkha' 'gro

rnam par bsgom/ /zhal bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /pad ma'i mkha' 'gro mas 'khyud cing / /rtag tu bde ba che la bzhugs/ /pad ma'i dril bus yang dag 'khyud/ /dbang phyug

chen po'i mgo bsnams shing / /dbang phyug chen po'i lpags pa ni/ /bshus pa phyag gnyis kyis brkyang 'dzin/ /lhag ma ni snga ma'i rim pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor rnams ni/ /zhabs kyis gnon

par lta bar bya/ /dmar dang sngo dang de bzhin ser/ /g.yon pa dkar ba spyan gsum pa/ /ral pa'i dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la mdzes/ /zla ba phyed pa 'chang ba dang / /cod pan sna tshogs
pad mar ldan/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / /'jigs pa'i zhal ni rnam 'gyur zhing / /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /stag gi lpags pa gos su mnabs/ /mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba can/ /

mgul rgyan gdub bu rna cha dang / /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags/ /de dag pha rol phyin drug ste/ /phyag rgya drug gi rgyas btab pa'o/ /de yi pang gnas

bcom ldan yum/ /pad ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rang mdog /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba ste/ /dum bus brgyan pa'i ska rags can/ /gdug pa'i bdud kyi khrag ldan pa'i/ /thod pa phyag
g.yon bsnams pas 'khyud/ /pad mar ldan pas phyogs kun tu/ /gdug pa kun la bsdigs 'dzub mdzad/ /bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar/ /khrag 'dzag pa la rtag tu dgyes/ /byin pa gnyis kyis rnam par
'khyud/ /bde ba chen po'i thugs rje'i bdag /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs sngar bshad rnams/ /pad ma'i phyogs kyi gnas su dgod/ /sngar bshad dbyibs dang kha dog ste/ /'on

kyang mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo/ /dum skyes ma ni de bzhin nag /lha mo gnyis po mdog de bzhin/ /phyag g.yon kha T+wA~M thod pa dang / /g.yas na cang te'u gri gug 'dzin/ /mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang / /bum pa'i nang du 'chi med

lnga/ /byang chub sems kyi snod kyang gzhag /gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar du kA ma rU par myu gu can dang sa srung ma dkar po/ byang du o drer rdo rje rol pa can dang / /'jigs byed chen mo dmar po/ nub tu tri sha ku nir dpa' bo

chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma nag po/ lho ru ko sa lar rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs/ me'i phyogs su ka ling kar rab tu bzang po dang sngo bsangs ma ser skya/ bden bral du lam pA kar

rdo rje bzang po dang rab bzang ma dkar mo/ rlung gi phyogs su kany+tsIr 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma ljang ku dbang ldan ste/ hi ma lar mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs so/ /gsung gi 'khor lo sa la

spyod pa'o/ /myu gu can la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa ral pa'i cod pan dang / dar dpyangs dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis na pad ma dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag na kha T+wA~M ga g.yas

na cang te'u phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa'o/ /e ra ba ti la sogs pa/ lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa zhal gcig pa thod pa dang ldan pas 'khyud cing pad ma dang ldan pas bsdigs 'dzub byed pa/

mgul rgyan dang gdu bu dang dpung rgyan dang rna rgyan dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang ldan pa'o/ /thod pa'i phreng bas mgul brgyan cing / /g.yer ka sgra sgrog sku rags ldan/ /khwa gdong la sogs dbye ba yis/ /sngar bshad sgo bsrungs la sogs bzhin/ /gshin rje

bsreg sogs lha mo rnams/ /mtshams bzhi 'di ltar shes par bya/ /dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang / /dpral bar pad ma'i phreng ba can/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams kun/ /sku gsung thugs su rnam par brtag /sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin/ /yi ge

rnams ni dgod cing bsgom/ /thugs ni AHste dmar po yin/ /gsung ni oM ste dkar por bshad/ /rdo rje sku ni hU~M yin te/ /nam mkha' zla ba lta bu'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang / /thams cad sbyor zhing bsgoms nas su/ /ye shes

'khor lo de mthong nas/ /dbang bskur bas ni gzhug par bya/ /thams cad byung ste thim nas su/ /thams cad sgom zhing bsam par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yis/ /spro bsdu dag gi sbyor bar bya/ /oM shrI bAg a A ro lig hU~M phaT/ ha~M DA ki nI dzA la sa~M

ba ra swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM a ro lig hrIHhU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ / oM pad ma DA ki nI hrIH hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM sarba pad ma DA ki nI ye a hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ / oM DA ki nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM lA me hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M

phaT/ oM rU pi ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM phaT ang+ku ri ka hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ai ra ba ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM da ha badzra dza Ta li da ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA bai ra ba hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM pa tsa ma hA bI ra ba tsa hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM bA yu be ge hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha badzra hU~M kA ra b+hak+Sha ba sa

ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba lam bi ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM su ra b+hak+Sha ye hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+na su b+ha dra gr-ih+na sap+ta pA ta la g+ha ta b+hu dzang+ga sarba ma bA/ tardza ya tardza ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM sh+yA ma de bi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM a kaDa D+h+ya badzra badzra b+ha dra A kaD+h+ya hu~M hU~M phaT/

oM su b+ha dre hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM hrI ma hA b+hai ra ba hrIM hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ha ya kar+Ne hUM hU~M phaT/ oM dz+nyauM ya bi ru pA k+Sha dz+nyo+oM hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM kha khA na ne hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM shwA nA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM su kA rA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hi hu~M hU~M phaT/

oM ya ma dU ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma da~MSh+Ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ rdo rje dam tshig gis mchod nas/ /bzlas pa'i cho ga rab tu bya/ /dgug pa dang ni rgyas pa nyid/ /sna tshogs las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /chos can yid 'ong gyur ba ste/ /ngag gi

dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchog dang bar ma thams cad dang / /tha ma thams cad mthar gnas la/ /de la thams cad gnas pa ste/ /sna tshogs gdul ba'i mchog dam pa/ /'dod pa'i chags pas rjes su chags/ /'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa dag /

bdag nyid chen po sgrub pa po/ /de yi dbang du gnas pa yin/ /sna tshogs pad ma mdzes gnas nas/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod/ /b+hur b+hUH'dod chags chos kyi bdag /bde ba che la rnam par bzhugs/ /langs pa'i dus su dam tshig ni/ /dri chen rdo rje chu

bza' zhing / /chos kyi phung po rdzogs gyur nas/ /rig pa'i rgyal po la sogs 'grub/ /oM haHsnying ka la/ na maHhi mgo la/ swA hA hU~M A ro lig spyi gtsug la/ /bau Sha Ta he go cha/ hU~M hU~M ho mig la'o/ /phaT ha~M mtshon cha'o/ /chos kyi rdo rje dang / rnam par

snang mdzad dang / pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang rdo rje nyi ma dang rta mchog ste/ dmar ba dang ser ba dang dkar ba dang sngo ba dang dmar ba dang gur gum gyi mdog dang / ljang khu ste bye brag go/ /oM ba~M pad ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ lte ba la'o/ /

ha~M yoM pad ma ya mi ni dang / hrA+oM moM pad ma rmongs byed ma dang / hrA+oM pad+ma g.yo byed ma dang hU~M hU~M pad ma skrag ma byed/ phaT ha~M pad+ma tsaN+Di ka ste/ snying ka dang mgo dang spyi gtsug dang mig dang chos kyi mtshon cha rnams so/ /dmar ba dang sngo ba dang dkar ba dang

ser ba dang ljang khu dang / dud pa'i mdog can no/ /bzlas pa'i dus su dgod pa ste/ /ji ltar bde bar spyad par bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /go 'phang gnas ni bzhugs pa yin/ /mnyam par bzhag pas drod 'byung ba/ /rtse gcig

dmigs pas blang bya ste/ /gsung gi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /chos rnams thams cad rab tu brtag /rdo rje chu dang rnam snang dang / /sbrang rtsi mar dkar lhan cig sbyar/ /lce yi dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /snying po'i ye shes de

nyid do/ /bdag po dbu rgyan la bsgoms la/ /ci bde bar ni bza' ba bza'/ /lha yi gzugs su gyur nas su/ /'dod pa'i lha yi bdag por skye/ /bza' ba 'o ma'i btung ba yis/ /nad dang rga ba rnam par spangs/ /

sems can rjes su chags pa yi/ /lha mo glu 'dis bskul ba yis/ /byang chub chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /sems can don ni bla med mdzad/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yis/ /thugs rje bskyed cing bstan par mdzad/ /gsang

ba'i chos ni bstan nas kyang / /ngag gi dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji lta bar ni bstan pas grol/ /de nyid rnal 'byor mas bskul nas/ /sna tshogs du ma mang po yi/ /dam tshig mchod pa

ngo mtshar rmad/ /mig phye nas ni bstod pa ni/ /A ba ra ta ru su ra ta su khwA bA hA su kha me twa so khya ma ya/ sa ma ya ra ma ra ma ho/ su ra ta so khya ya tre sa ma tsa ri ta~M/ su ga ta sAn ta ma ya pra bi kur ba bi kur ba/ su ra ta di ya pad ma dza le/

pra bi dzim ba dzim ba/ su ra tod su kha pad ma dza le/ pra bi nan ta na ra ta su kha sa da na pad ma dza le/ pra bi marda marda su ra ta ma bi sa bi shwa dza le ho ha hU~M ha ha ho/ dza ya ma hA su kha su kha te dze ma ya ra ma ra ma ho/ /su ra ki tu su kha ba hU~M bi

ti d+he dza mu kra dza ya te dza ra/ han ta ho ba ra ha/ sa su kha ho/ hU~M ho ho su ra to twa rA ga su kha ra ti rI dzi na pa ra ma shri ra ti ho/ pa ra ma he tu ma hA su kha ho/ su kha ma nu yo na ra pa ra me shwa ra ho/ ho b+ha ga bAn ma hA su kha~M hU~M ho/ ba hU~M bi ti bi ti

bi shwa dz+wa la ra ti bi shwa ma ho/ su ra ti su kha~M ga tsang tra pa ra ma ma hA su kha ho/ su kha ma nu gri h+dz+ya ho/ su ra to ud ta ma san di su kha~M a A ro lika a ma hA su kha grI h+dz+ya ho/ glu 'di dag ni blangs tsam gyis/ /dga' zhing bde
ba yang dag 'dus/ /bde ba chen po yid 'dod pa/ /dngos grub kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /'khor tshogs chen po byin brlabs nas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dgyes pa che/ /pad ma dra ba'i sdom pa yin/ /
nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gsung gi sdom pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /gzhal yas

brtseg ma'i dbus dag tu/ /'khor lo mchog ni dgod par bya/ /sngon po'i mdog can gzig brjid che/ /gsang ba las byung rtsibs brgyad pa/ /de yi dbus su pad ma ni/ /sna tshogs pad ma ge sar can/ /mdab ma brgyad

du bshad pa ste/ /rnam dag gdan du byas pa yin/ /de yi dbus su zla ba bsgom/ /der ni zla ba khyab par ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /lha mchog grol zhing bzhengs par gyur/ /oM hU~M a ma hA su kha a la la ho/

ma hA su ra ta s+t+wa~M/ su ra ta su kha bi yo ka su ra ta~M ud ta ma bo d+hi su kha~M/ su kha ma nu sid d+ha ho/ su ra ta ba ya so khya ma ya AHhUM ho/ b+ha ga bAM ma hA su kha~M ud ta ra ud ta ra/ sarba ud ma so khya ma ya hU~M a la la ho/ ma hA

su kha s+t+wa~M/ pa ra ma su khA ma lai du bi bi ud ta ma dza la su kha~M a la la ho/ su ra to so khya ma ya/ bcom ldan bde ba chen po ni/ /'khor dang bcas pa mnyam par bzhengs/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo zhal bzhi pa/ /phyag bcu gnyis pa

g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang ser ba dang dmar ba'i zhal/ rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ khyab 'jug gi mgo bo phyag na

bsnams pa/ khyab 'jug gi lpags pa rlon pa brkyang nas phyag gzhan gnyis na bsnams pa'o/ /lhag ma sku'i mkha' 'gro dang mtshungaso/ /thod pa'i phreng ba can/ mgo'i phreng ba 'chang ba/ mgo'i phreng bas
sku rags bcings pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba phyed pa'i rgyan yang 'chang / /sna tshogs rdo rje cod pan gnon/ /stag gi lpags pa gos su mnabs/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /
mdun gyi mkha' 'gro ma ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu dum bus brgyan pa/ ska rags can/ phyag g.yon pa thod pa thogs pas 'khyud pa/ g.yas pa rdo rje sdigs

'dzub can/ /ska rags g.yer ka'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /chos kyi sgra ni yid 'ong ba/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba bye ba snyed/ /chos kyi dbyings te stong pa yin/ /mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog /bya byed pa yang de bzhin bsgom/ /

sbyor ba mchog gi dam pa ste/ /rnam dag legs par brtags nas su/ /mnyam nyid chos kyi ro gcig byas/ /'khor lo la ni rnam par blta/ /shar gyi mdab mar mkha' 'gro dang / /lho phyogs lA ma de bzhin te/ /nub

phyogs dum skyes ma dang ni/ /byang phyogs gzugs can ma de bzhin/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang khu'i mdog can mchog dam pa/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /cang te'u gri gug de bzhin te/ /spyan gsum

pa la bzhin rnams bsgyur/ /gcer bu skra grol 'jigs pa can/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /'dod pa'i chags pas legs par myos/ /cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur dang / /nu ma rab rgyas dga' ba 'dzin/ /

zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rgya yang gdab/ /mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag /ye shes bdud rtsi gang ba dgod/ /de steng byang chub sems kyis ni/ /yongs su gang bar gzhag par bya/ /thugs kyi

'khor lo'i shar phyogs su/ /pu li ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste dkar po'o/ /byang du dzA la d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste ser po'o/ /nub tu o D+Di yA na na keng rus can dang / 'od

ldan ma ste dmar po'o/ /lho phyogs su ar bu de na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste ljang khu'o/ /me'i phyogs na go da ba ri na lha dgra dang / dpa' bo blo gros ma nam mkha'i mdog can ma'o/ /bden bral du

rA mi shwa ra na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma ste dkar skya'o/ /rlung gi phyogs na de bi koT+Ta na rdo rje'i 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste ljang khu dang / mu tig lta bu'o/ /dbang ldan na mA la be na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste pad ma dang ser

skya'o/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo nam mkha' la spyod pa'o/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni gdong gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i cod pan can thugs rjes khro zhing 'jigs pa rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa/

g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis la kha T+wA~M ga dang / cang te'u 'chang ba/ phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o/ /rab gtum ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa sdigs 'dzub kyi

thod pa 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ser skya'i gzugs can no/ /skra grol ba/ gzugs gnyis pa gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan pa/ phyogs kyi gos can rnam par rol ba/ mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan

dang / rna cha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgul rgyan dang mgo bo'i phreng ba dang g.yer ka'i sku rags can/ sgo dang zur gyi lha mo rnams/ /khwa gdong gshin rje sreg la sogs/ /ji ltar mkha' 'gro'i mdog bzhin du/ /khwa gdong

la sogs de bzhin no/ /mtshams rnams lha mo de bzhin te/ /gzugs gnyis 'dzin zhing yid 'phrog pa'o/ /phyag sogs de ltar bsgom nas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /

mchod dang bstod dang dbang yang bskur/ /bsgom pa brtse gcig byas na ni/ /bdag med ma'i go 'phang gnas/ /snying po ye shes dam tshig ni/ /sgrub pos 'dod pa kun gyi phyir/ /sku gsung thugs la rnams bkod nas/ /sangs rgyas

mchog ni rnam par spro/ /rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing / /ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chu/ /dam tshig mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya/ /oM shrI tsid DA ka d+h-i ka a kha~M huM hU~M phaT/ DA ki ni dzA la sa~M ba ra huM

hU~M phaT/ snying po'o/ /oM hrIHha ha huM hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra DA ki nI hu~M hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM sarba DA ki nI ye badzra bar+N+Na nI ye huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM DA ki nI ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM lA me huM hU~M phaT/ oM khaN Da

ro he huM hU~M phaT/ oM ru pi ni huM hU~M phaT/ oM ka ra khaN+Da ka pA li na ka ra huM hU~M phaT/ oM pra tsaN+Da huM hU~M phaT/ oM ku ru ma hA kang kA la ku ru huM hU~M phaT/ oM tsaN+DAk+Shi ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM baMd+ha kang kA la ban d+ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM pra b+ha ba ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM trA sa ya bi ka Ta

daM~MSh+Ti Na tra sa ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA nA se hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM k+Sho b+ha ya su ra be ri Na k+Sho b+ha ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM b-I ra ma ti hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM hrauM a mi tA b+hA hrauM hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM kharba ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM hraHbadzra pra b+ha hraH hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM lang ke shwa ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM pheM badzra de

ha hi pheM hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM dru mats+tshA ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM shwa nA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma du ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma da~MSh+Ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha ni hu~M hU~M phaT/

bzlas pa bsgom par ldan byas nas/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis/ /sngags pa myur du 'grub pa ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig dam tshig mchog /thugs kyi rnyed pas khyab pa la/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam

par spyad/ /mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob 'gyur/ /'di ni khams gsum thams cad du/ /go 'phang mchog la legs par zhugs/ /langs pa'i dus su dam tshig can/ /yan lag drug tu sbyor ba bshad/ /haHsnying ka ste/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' dkar po/ na ma hi mgo la ste rnam par snang mdzad ser po/ swA hA huM spyi gtsug la pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug ste zla ba dang ser skya'o/ /bau Sha Ta he go cha ste he ru ka nam mkha'i mdog can no/ /hU~M hU~M ho mig la ste rdo rje nyi ma gser btso ma lta bu'o/ /

phaT ha~M ni yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon ste rta mchog ljang khu ser skya'o/ /oM ba~M lte ba la ste/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro nam mkha' dang ser skya'o/ /ha~M yoM snying ka la ya mi ni dkar mo'o/ /hrI~M mo kha la ste rmongs byed ma dmar po'o/ /

hri~M hrI~M mgo la ste g.yo byed ma ser po'o/ /hU~M hU~M spyi gtsug la ste skrag byed ma sngon po'o/ /phaT phaT yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha ste tsaN+Di ka dmar ser ro/ /ji ltar bde bar cho ga bzhin du spyod cing gnas so/ /'gro ba du ma'i bsam pa la/ /

thugs kyi rdo rje tshul can 'di/ /gnyis med sbyor ba mtha' yas pa/ /srid pa kun gyi dngos por gnas/ /dri ma med cing nga rgyal med/ /yi ge med cing brjod du med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las thugs kyi sdom pa dang bla ma'i
bsnyen bkur gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog gyur pa/ /'dod pa'i gsang ba kun ster ba/ /shin tu gsang ba'i dngos

grub stsol/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /bsgrub pa'i don ni bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dbus su ni/ /pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ /sna tshogs mdog can ge sar bcas/ /'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu

ster/ /de yi dbus su yi ge hU~M/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dpe byad kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dgyes pa chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i

mchog /byang chub sems kyi rgyu las ni/ /byang chub zla ba dri med pa/ /de mthong lha mo langs nas ni/ /glu 'di yis ni bskul bar byed/ /hU~M rol cig rol cig dgyes pa ho/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni/ /bde ba chen po rol nyid las/ /'di nyid du ni

bzhengs su gsol/ /a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /khyod ni bde ba'i mchog yin te/ /khyod kyi zhal ni khums tsam gyis/ /bdag gis 'dir ni ro gcig rnyed/ /kye ma'o bcom ldan bde chen dgyes/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' legs
dgyes khyod/ /ro dang ro mchog thams cad de/ /dgyes pa chen po bde ba rnams/ /rtag par dngos grub kun la yang / /rol cig rol cig lha mo la/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad dang / /bcom ldan rdo rje
chen po ni/ /lha mo'i pad ma dgyes la rol/ /hU~M a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /bcom ldan 'dod la dgyes pa khyod/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub legs par stsol/ /pad ma mchog la dgyes par rol/ /oM a la la ho dgyes

pa che/ /tshogs kyi bde bas dus rtag tu/ /rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pa yis/ /pad ma'i zhal mchog bye ba yi/ /pad ma la ni rol par mdzod/ /ji ltar bung bas sbrang rtsi bzhin/ /lha rnams pad ma nyid la rol/ /kye ma'o

grogs po dgyes chen 'dir/ /rdo rje mchog ni bde bar sbyar/ /dus kun bde ba 'dir mdzod cig /de ring dus ni 'di nyid du/ /yang dag byang chub 'dus pa yin/ /a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /bde chen kun du dgyes mchog rol/ /
a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /glu 'di dag gis bskul nas su/ /mnyam nyid las ni bcom ldan dpal/ /sdom pa'i rdo rje bzhengs par gyur/ /'khor dang bcas par gzigs nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das ni zhal bzhi pa/ /

sngo ba dang ser ba dang dmar ba dang / ljang khu'i zhal te/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas brkyang bas 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan zhabs 'og tu mnan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pas dam tshig

rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa/ phyag gzhan gnyis po ni tshogs bdag gi lpags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa'i gsum pa na cang te'u/ bzhi pa la dgra sta/ lnga pa la gri gug /drug pa la rdo rje mdung bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa'i

gsum pa na rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga /bzhi pa la khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa/ lnga pa la rdo rje zhags pa/ drug pa la bdud bzhi'i mgo bo bsnams pa'o/ /rol pa'i cod pan rgyan cha can/ /dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /zla ba phyed pa'i dbu

la 'dzin/ /dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan/ /'jigs pa'i mche ba rnam sgyur zhal/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /stag gi lpags pa gos su banabs/ /mi yi mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin/ /mgrin nor gdub bu rna cha dang / /

mgo yi nor bus rnam par brgyan/ /tshangs pa'i skud pa thal ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags/ /de yi phang na bcom ldan ma/ /dam tshig rdo rje phag mo ni/ /sku mdog de dang 'dra bar bya/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /spyan gnyis pa la skra grol ba/ /

gcir bu ska rags 'og bag gis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pas 'khyud pa ste/ bdud kyi khrag gis yongs su gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa/ g.yas pa na bsdigs 'dzub rdo rje dang bcas pas phyogs bcur bsdigs par byed pa/ bskal ba'i me yi

gzi brjid can/ /khrag la dgyes shing zhal nas 'dzag /byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can/ /chos kun gnas ni dge ba yin/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/ /chos

dang chos min rnam par spangs/ /pad 'dab lha mo dgod pa yis/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /g.yon phyogs bskor ba'i dgod pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa la dngos

grub stsol/ /gnag cing ser la de bzhin dmar/ /ljang khu drag po'i gzugs can te/ /thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba ste/ /bdud bzhi zhabs kyis gnan pa dang / /

chags shing zhen pas myos pa dang / /thod pa dag gi dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /gnag cing sngo la ljang ba dang / /shin tu 'jigs shing sdang mig can/ /ser zhing gnag la ljang khu ste/ /snying rje'i ro ni yongs su rdzogs/ /

dmar zhing gnag la ljang ba dang / /sgeg pa la sogs nyams kyis 'khor/ /ljang zhing gnag la ser ba dang / /'jam zhing khro bas 'jigs pa dang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /g.yon pa cang te'u gri gug ste/ /mgo bo rdo rje mdung g.yas na/ /

mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang / /bum pa bdud rtsi lnga yi chus/ /yongs su gang ba'i steng du yang / /byang chub sems kyis gang snod gzhug /khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /

gnag dang sngo bsangs dmar ser skya/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can la/ /skra grol pa yis rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gcer

bu yi dgas gdan du mnan/ /'dod pa'i snying rjes rnam par myos/ /g.yon par mgo bo kha T+wA~M ga /g.yas na thod pa gri gug go/ /mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang / /gshin rje sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi

pa/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la yi dgas gdan/ /skra grol ba yang rab tu 'jigs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gcer bur sna tshogs gzugs can la/ /

dga' zhing bde bas rnam par myos/ /g.yon la thod pa kha T+wA~M ga / /g.yas la cang te'u gri gug ste/ /g.yon nas bskor zhing dgod byas na/ /mtshams kyi dngos grub stsal bar 'gyur/ /khwa gdong la sogs sgor dgod pa/ /g.yas

nas bskor zhing dgod par bya/ /khams dang skye mched phung po rnams/ /sku gsung thugs su rnam par bsgom/ /sngar bshad rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga bzhin du dgod par bya/ /dbang chen dang ni chu dang ni/ /me dang rlung gi

dkyil 'khor gyi/ /de yi dbus su bkod pa ni/ /sa sogs bzhi po dag yin no/ /ltung byed ma dang gsod ma nyid/ /'gugs byed ma dang gar ma dag /de nyid nam mkha'i khams yin te/ /pad ma'i dra ba stong pa yin/ /

gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad yin/ /tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /'du shes gar dbang rgyal po ste/ /'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /bde gshegs kun nyid he ru ka /mig ni gti mug

rdo rje ste/ /rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje yin/ /sna ni phrag dog rdo rje ste/ /lce ni chags pa rdo rje yin/ /lus ni ser sna rdo rje'o/ /skye mched kun dbang rdo rje'o/ /hU~M ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /AHzhes bya ba gsung du 'gyur/ /oM ni

sku'i rdo rje ste/ /he ni rdo rje ye shes yin/ /lus sogs rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /bde ba'i chags pa bcom ldan 'das/ /chags pa med pa'ang de bzhin te/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /

mchod dang bstod dang dbang yang bskur/ /rjes su chags pa'i sbyor ba dag /'jug pas mnyam pa'i bcud du 'gyur/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam bsgoms na/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor byas nas/ /sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchod pa yis/ /

cho ga bzhin du bzlas par bya/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru ka~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ra swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM hrIH ha ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba bud d+ha DA ki nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ phag

mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT swa hA/ oM lA me hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ru pi ni ye huM hU~M phaT swa hA oM kA kA s+ye huM hU~M phaT swa hA/ oM u lU kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shwA nA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM su ka

rA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ya ma dA D+hi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma du ti huM hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma da~MSh+Ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /'di ni rnal 'byor

ma rnams kyis/ /mchog tu gsang ba smras pa yin/ /bcu drug cha ni yongs rdzogs pa/ /sngags dang gsang sngags kun gyi gtso/ /bsgom pa'i dus las langs nas ni/ /go cha gnyis ni rnam par dgod/ /oM ha rdo rje sems

dpa' snying ka la/ /na ma hi rnam par snang mdzad mgo la/ swA hA hu pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug spyi gtsug la/ bau Sha Ta hi khrag mthung ste dpung pa la'o/ /hU~M hU~M ho rdo rje nyi ma ste mig la'o/ /phaT ha~M rta mchog ste yan lag

thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ /oM ba~M rdo rje phag mo ste lte ba la'o/ /ha~M yo~M ya mi ni ste snying ka la'o/ /hrI~M ma~M rmongs byed ma ste lce la'o/ /hriM hrI~M g.yo byed ma ste mgo bo la'o/ /hU~M hU~M skrag byed ma ste spyi gtsug la'o/ /
phaT ha~M gtum mo ste/ /yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ /'di ltar dngos dang dngos med mnyam/ /thams cad chos su ro gcig ste/ /mnyam pa nyid la rnam par bzhugs/ /mnyam pa'i ye shes lnga po 'di/ /

rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyis skyongs/ /dus bzhi 'am yang na dus gsum du/ /ci tsam nus pa bsrung bar bya/ /'di ni gsang ba'i mchog yin te/ /gang la yang ni bstan mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen po
las sdom pa'i dam tshig bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// // // de nas cho ga'i gzhung bzhin bshad/ /pad ma 'dab brgyad legs par mdzes/ /sna tshogs

'dab ma yid 'ong ba/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad ma'i rgyal po rnam par bsam/ /lte bar sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa'o/ /de la lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis mtshan pa/ /

de ste A li kA li ste/ /dbus su reg bya stong pa yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi khyab/ /bdag nyid he ru ka dpal nyid/ /zhal gdong lnga la phyag bcu gnyis/ /spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba ste/ /g.yas brkyang

ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /g.yon brkyang ba yang de bzhin bzhugs/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bri/ /stag gi lpags pa gos su banabs/ /thugs rje khro bos rnam par rol/ /

thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rol pa'i cod pan rgyan du thogs/ /zla ba phyed pa'i spyi gtsug la/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /mi mgo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste/ /thod

rlon phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mgul rgyan gdub bu rna cha dang / /thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan/ /tshangs pa'i skud pa thal ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug po rnam par bsgom/ /phyag gnyis thod pa dril bu yis/ /

phag mo la ni rnam par khyud/ /phyag gzhan gnyis po dag gis ni/ /'jigs byed chen po'i lpags rlon banabs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gsum pa la rdo rje gsor zhing ba dan gsum pa 'dzin pa/ bzhi pa la mdung rtse lnga pa/ lnga pa la

dgra sta/ drug pa la rdo rje cang te'u bsnams so/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gsum pa rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga /bzhi pa la rdo rje zhags pa/ lnga pa la gri gug /drug pa la drag po'i mgo bo/ bang na gnas pa'i phag mo ni bcom ldan 'das

kyi mdog can phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu dum bus brgyan pa'i ska rags can/ phyag g.yon pa la byang chub kyi sems kyi gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pas mkhyud pa/ phyag

g.yas pa'i bsdigs 'dzub kyis gdug pa kun la phyogs su bsdigs 'dzub byed cing gri gug 'dzin pa/ bskal pa'i me yi gzi brjid can/ /khrag la dgyes shing khrag 'dzag pa/ /byin pa gnyis kyi legs par 'khril/ /
bde ba'i mchog gi dam pa'o/ /drag po'i gzugs can rnam par 'gyur/ /thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par rol/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can/ /he ru ka dpal rnam par bsgom/ /nam mkha'i mdog can ser ba

dang / /dmar dang ljang khu ser skya ma'o/ /khro dang bzhad dang sgeg pa dang / /rngam dang zhi bar ldan pa dang / /khams dang skye mched phung po dang / /reg pa'ang de bzhin bsgom pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro lA ma de bzhin te/ /dum
skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /phyag bzhi pa la gdong gcig pa/ /spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs/ /skyil mo dkrung ni phyed par bzhugs/ /phyogs kyi gos can mchog yin no/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu

rgyan can/ /skra grol ba yis rnam par brgyan/ /lha mo phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing / /'dod pa'i rnam grol rab tu ster/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang gi phyogs su rnam par dgod/ /dkar dang ser ba de bzhin du/ /

dmar dang ljang gu chags pas myos/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug 'chang / /mtshams bzhi dag tu bum pa bzhi/ /ye shes lnga yis yongs gang ba/ /thod pa 'o mas yongs gang bas/ /bum

pa'i steng du gzhag par bya/ /g.yon nas bskor zhing bkod nas kyang / /ye shes sems dpa' bkug nas su/ /mchod dang bstod dang gzhug par bya/ /yid ngag lus la bkod nas ni/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /hU~M AH

oM ni rnam par bsgom/ /gsang sngags ji bzhin bzlas na ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru ka~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ra swA hA/ oM hrIHha ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa

nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba bud d+ha DA ki nI ye ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM lA me hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM rU pi Ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ khro bo'i sprul pa spros nas ni/ /

'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par byas/ /bsgom par bzlas par ldan pa yis/ /bdag gis spro dang bsdu bar bya/ /khams gsum ma lus kun du yang / /lus ngag yid gsum ci bder spyad/ /dam tshig can bsgoms langs nas ni/ /go cha gnyis po

bgo bar bya/ /oM haHrdo rje sems dpa' ste snying ka la'o/ /na ma hi rnam par snang mdzad de mgo bo la'o/ /swA hA hu pad ma gar dbang ste spyi gtsug la'o/ /bau Sha Ta he dpal khrag 'thung ste dpung pa gnyis la'o/ /hU~M hU~M ho rdo rje nyi ma ste mig la'o/ /

phaT ha~M rta mchog ste yan lag thams cad kyi go cha'o/ /oM ba~M rdo rje phag mo ste lte ba la'o/ /ha~M yoM ya mi ni ste snying ka la'o/ /hrI~M moM rmongs byed ma ste kha la'o/ /hrA+eM hrIM g.yo byed ma ste mgo bo la'o/ /hU~M hU~M skrag byed ma ste spyi gtsug la'o/ /

phaT phaT ni tsaN+Di ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ /'di ni dam tshig ngo bo ste/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin no/ /sngags dbyibs chos bdag rnal 'byor ni/ /bdag nyid chos su sbyor ba yis/ /ji ltar bde bar spyod par bya/ /mngon par

brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gnas kyi rim pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dpa' bo gcig pu'i cho ga ni/ /sngags pas lte bar rnam bsams pa/ /rlung dang me yi dbus su ni/ /de'i steng du sna tshogs

pad ma/ /de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du thod pa ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis gang ba/ de'i dbus su A li kA li lugs su 'byung ba dang / lugs las bzlog pa'i tshul du nyis ldab tu byas la/ hU~M byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje

sems dpa'i sbyor ba dga' zhing dgyes pa las byung ba ni dpal thugs rje'i bdag nyid he ru ka chags pas rnam par 'khor bar bsgom mo/ /de yang zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ zhabs g.yas pa brkyang bas bzhugs pa/

mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ dpa' bo'i phyag rgya drug gis sku lus phyag rgyas btab pa/ 'jigs byed chen po dang / dus mtshan gnyis kyi mgo dang nu ma mnan pa/

stag gi lpags pa mnabs pa/ snying rje'i ros 'khor ba/ rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis la/ rdo rje rtse dgu pa dang / rdo rje dril bu/ phyag gzhan gnyis la tshogs kyi bdag po'i lpags pa'i stobs 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa'i phyag

gsum pa la rdo rje mdung bzhi pa la lcags kyu/ lnga pa la rdo rje gri gug /drug pa la rdo rje cang te'u/ phyag g.yon pa'i gsum pa na thod pa rkang gis yongs su gang ba/ rnal 'byor gyi mchod phyir thogs dang / rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga /

steng du rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'phyang ba/ sna tshogs ba dan rab tu spyangs pa/ dbus su sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa/ 'og nas rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ bzhi pa la rdo rje zhags pa/ lnga pa la

tshangs pa'i mgo bo/ /drug pa la dgra sta bsnams pa zhal mdog sngo ba dang / ser ba dang dmar ba dang ljang gu rab tu 'jigs su rung ba/ sgeg pa dang / dgod pa dang / 'gying bag can du bzhugs pa'o/ /de'i mdun du A li
kA li las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo 'khyud nas bzhugs te/ sku mdog dmar po/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra grol ba/ gcer bu dum bu'i ska rags can/
