'khor lo bkug nas ni/ /ji ltar rim pas mchod dbang bskur/ /gcig tu bsdus te bstims nas su/ /ji lta'i rim pa bsgoms nas su/ /ye shes bzlas pa dag kyang bya/ /spro bsdu srog dang rtsol ba yis/ /'thor 'thung

rim pas byas pa yi/ /slob dpon gyis ni bzlas pa bya/ /oM AHhU~M hU~M/ 'di lta bu yi rim pa yis/ /grangs med par ni byas nas su/ /ji srid skyo bar ma gyur par/ /gong gi dam tshig 'khor lo ni/ /mnyam par bzhag

ste bzlas pa bya/ /dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni/ /sdom pa mchog gi bzlas pa bya/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru ka~M hU~M hU~M phaT DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ra~M swA hA/ oM badzra bA rA hi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM DA ki ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM lA me hu~M hU~M phaT/

oM khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM rU pi Ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM gau rI hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM tsau rI hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM pra mo he hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM bet+tA li hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM puk+ka sI hUM phaT/ oM tsaN DA lI hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM g+ha sa ma rI hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM he ru ka

san ni b+he hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra bI na hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ba~M she hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra mr-i da~M ge hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra murdze hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra hA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra lA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra gI te hu~M hU~M phaT/

oM badzra nr-i t+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra puSh+pe hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra dI pe hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra dI pe hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra gan d+he hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM rU pa badzri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ra sa badzri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM spar sha badzri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM d+harma d+hA tu

badzri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ang ku sha dzaH hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra pA shi hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra s+pho Ta ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra a be sha hoH ha~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hi hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma du ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma da~M Sh+Ti hu~M hU~M phaT/

oM ya ma ma tha ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ dam tshig can gyis tshig dag pas/ /mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tu bzla/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can/ /rang gi thabs dang rigs pa'i lus/ /gnyis su med

par mnyam pa'i bdag /khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pas/ /'gro ba gsum po bcas par ni/ /he ru kar ni byas nas kyang / /sa rnams gsum po ma lus par/ /thams cad der ni bsdus nas kyang / /sku gsung thugs

la rnam par gnas/ /'di ni rnal 'byor cho ga ste/ /'khor lo bsgom pa'i bzlas pa'o/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba na/ /dam tshig can nyid langs dus su/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /

dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /mkha' 'gro dang ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun gyis gsol ba gdab par bya/ /khro bo bde ba'i dgyes pa yi/ /longs spyod las ni byung ba yi/ /rab rmongs ma yis bsnyen byas nas/ /bde ba'i sbyor ba

la zhugs te/ /ra ma he nad Ta na su ra A ma hA su hu ba ra dzo i ni kA ma la su hu/ a la la hoH/ su ra a uta ta ma ma hU~M/ ma hA sidz+dza u ma dzo i ni dza la ma ho/ A I/ a A ra ho/ a ru he byi nu su ba ya nA ha/

su ra a su hu de hi ba ra TA i ni/ dzA la su hu bi sa pha na ta ro Na Na pa de hi ma hA su hU madz+dza mu hU mo k+Shu pa la k+kha u/ tu tu sa hU Na i su hU/ badz+dzi u mo khu su hU/ i na i du/ khe la tha i mo khu su hU/ ba sa i pa~M

ka u madz+dza ta nu na ba rA/ a pa da tra~M/ b+hu dza ta nu muny+ca ma hA su hU/ i la da ra pa ya/ u ma hU/ a ri bI a gi a pa~M u ra su/ 'di yis mgon po bskul nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges pa ste/ /snyan cing

'jam pa'i mgrin pa'i dbyangs/ /dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu blangs pas/ /mkha' 'gro'i dra ba dri med rnams/ /gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yin/ /rdo rje pad ma yid 'ong ba/ /sbyor bas dngos grub thams cad 'grub/ /

dgyes pa 'di yis bskul na ni/ /bde ba chen po stsol ba yin/ /sbyor ba yi ni dus dag tu/ /rdo rje can gyis rab tu sbyar/ /thog ma dbus dang mthar thug par/ /yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags bzla/ /'khor lo dag ni brtan

byas te/ /dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te/ /khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /thams cad snying gar brtan byas te/ /bsgoms pas thams cad brtan par 'gyur/ /gal te bdag nyid

dngos grub 'dod/ /dngos grub thams cad gnas pa yin/ /oM badzra he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ badzra he ru ka /twe no pa tiSh+Tha D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rag+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid d+ha~M me

pa yats+tsha/ sarba karma su ts+tsha me/ tsit+ta~M shri ya~M ku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha hoH b+ha ga bAn badzra he ru ka /mA me muny+tsa he ru ka badzri b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH'dis ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing / /yi ge brgya pa mchog

gyur pa/ /he ru ka mchog rang nyid yin/ /phyir bzlog pa ni gang yin pa/ /bcu drug 'dab ma la bkod cing / /rjes su bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun/ /bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /ji ltar

bde bar gnas par bya/ /rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni/ /khams gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te/ /bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshan nyid de/ /de ltar srid pa'ang stong pa yin/ /bsgoms pas bdag nyid yang dag gnas/ /

'dir ni bka' thub bshad pa med/ /phreng ba med cing sngags kyang med/ /gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang / /cho ga'i rim pa'i gzhi yang med/ /rnal 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi rim pa'ang med/ /rdo rje chen

po dngos 'dzin pa/ /rang byung dngos grub kun mdzad pa/ /'gog pa nyid kyang mdzad pa med/ /bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsgom/ /yi ge gnas kyi mchog gyur pa/ /

lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa ni/ /de yi dbus su rnam par bsam/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'dus pa can/ /de yi lus las 'das gyur te/ /sems kyi dngos kyang btsal du med/ /chags pa med cing chags bral med/ /chags bral dang

ni ldan gyur pa/ /snying gi pad ma'i dbus su ni/ /brtags pas legs par rnyed pa ni/ /yid kyis ngal bsos byas pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ma kun bud med yin/ /phyag rgya mchog tu bshad pa'o/ /zla ba'i steng du brgya phyed brgyan/ /ye

shes sems ni bsam pa ni/ /mchog ste spyad par bya ba med/ /bla ma'i man ngag lam dang ni/ /sems ni mchog tu 'bed pa yis/ /'di ltar zhi ba'i gnas de ni/ /'jig rten du mas ma rtogs te/ /sbyor dang sbyor ba bral byas nas/ /

go 'phang gcig pus khyab pa yin/ /'di ltar byang chub 'bras bu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ /dang por dbyangs kyi yi ge las byung gzhan du yang / /stegs ngan gzhung lugs log pa'i blo gros de nyid ni/ /ma ning shes rab long ba gzugs bzhin

'bras bu med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sku gsung thugs kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba/ /thod pa sangs rgyas mchog dam pa/ /de nyid sbyor ba kun gyi mchog /dngos grub

thams cad rab stsol ba/ /gsang ba legs par sba bya zhing / /gang gis su la'ang mi bstan no/ /de nyid mchog gi bsgom bzung ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi snying la gnas/ /gsang ba brtan par sba bya zhing / /bla ma'i ngag ni bsgom par bya/ /dur khrod

gnas ni yid 'ong ba/ /sgrub pa po yis nges brtan pa/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sa dang gnas kyi rim pa dag /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /yi ge hU~M ni bsgom par bya/ /de yis khyad par bdag nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog /

gnas med zhi zhing dag pa ste/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs yin/ /A li ka li las rang byung / /gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba ste/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /'dzam bu'i mdog can mnyam pas

khyab/ /'od zer phreng bas kun du 'khrigs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhad pa'i zhal/ /sems dpa' kun gyi bsgom pa ste/ /gnyis med chos ni bla na med/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /nA ra'i

pags pa steng du brkyang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi phyag g.yon thod pa ni/ /rkang gis rab tu gang ba dang / /sems

can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /ye shes 'chi med lngas bsregs pa/ /kha TA~M ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor/ /thod pa dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs dag pa ste/ /'jigs pa ma lus mi 'jigs grol/ /gdug cing 'jigs pa ma lus

kun/ /'dir ni zhabs kyis gnon par mdzad/ /gdug pas 'jigs pa thams cad spong / /zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan/ /rdo rje phreng bas dpral ba mdzes/ /rkang rgyan yid 'ong rgyan cha can/ /

sna tshogs pad ma 'dab brgyad kyi/ /lte ba'i dbus nas bzhengs pa ni/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /chags pa zhe sdang zhabs kyis gnon/ /ye shes sems dpa' de gzugs can/ /yi ge bru~M las byung bar bsgom/ /

thugs kyi 'khor lo'i snying ga ru/ /he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom/ /gsung gi 'khor lo kha la bsgom/ /sku yi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin/ /sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba dang / /phyag drug pa la zhal gsum pa/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /spyan

gsum pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'chang / /rang rig lus dang yang dag 'dus/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus dag tu/ /yi ge gsum sogs las byung ba/ /thod pa'i

phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rang gi mtshan ma'i mchog dang ldan/ /gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba/ /sdom pa gsum gyi mchog dam pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /pad ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod/ /

thod pa bzhi po mchog yin te/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni kha dog ser/ /lA ma pa la sha yi mdog /dum skyes ma ni sngon po ste/ /gzugs can ma ni dmar la 'bar/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs mchog yin te/ /

sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi/ /khwa gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu'i drag po'i gzugs can no/ /mtshams su gshin rje sreg la sogs/ /rab 'jigs shin du 'jigs pa ste/ /thod pa

dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bzhin te/ /cang te'u dang ni gri gug nyid/ /bdud ni bzhi po'i steng na bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan

can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /me long ro dang dri dang ni/ /reg gi mchod pa bzhi po ste/ /sa bcu dag gi rim pa dang / /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun/ /byang chub phyogs kyi rnam par

dag /ka la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi/ /mgo la bin dus mnan pa ste/ /gsal byed hU~M gnyis dang yang sbyar/ /mthar ni phaT dang rab tu sbyar/ /dpa' bo kun gyi gsang sngags ni/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster/ /gsal byed

mkha' 'gro ma yi ming / /mthar ni hU~M hU~M phaT yin te/ /'di ltar rab gtum mkha' 'gro ma/ /sngags kyi de nyid bde ba ster/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /hU~M AHoM/ 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ /pad ma'i 'dab la

mkha' 'gro ma/ /gsal byed ma ning dang bcas pa/ /hU~M ni gnyis pa nyid yin te/ /mkhas pas mthar ni phaT dang sbyar/ /khwa gdong la sogs gsang sngags ni/ /ya ra la wa/ /gsal byed dang ni bcas pa ste/ /mthar ni hU~M dang

phaT dang sbyar/ /gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa/ /sha Sha sa ha/ gsal byed dang ni hU~M gnyis dang / /phaT kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /dbus su sangs rgyas thod pa yi/ /gsang sngags de bzhin rjes su dran/ /oM a~M A~M/ i~M

I~M/ u~M U~M/ e ai/ a~M aH/ Sha swA hA/ khams dang phung po skye mched la/ /go cha rnams ni sbyar bar bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo dam tshig dag /mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par bya/ /mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags rnams/ /rang ming

gsal byed hU~M byas te/ /'di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar/ /sangs rgyas thod pa las byung ba/ /rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste/ /thams cad rim pa bzhin du sbyar/ /'thor 'thung du ni rab sbyar bas/ /gsang ba bzhi po bzla bar bya/ /spro dang

bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa dag /'dir ni cho ga'i sbyor ba yis/ /dus bzhi dag tu sbyar nas su/ /dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya/ /dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /dam tshig can gyi gsang sngags kun/ /

sangs rgyas thod pa mchog yin te/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag /dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bya zhing / /ye shes 'chi med lnga yi mchog /yang na rang ming bzlas pa bya/ /sngags kyi de nyid

bzlas par bya/ /oM shrI bud d+ha kA pA li bru~M AHhU~M DA ki nI dzA la sa~M ba ra~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di ni yid 'ong sbyor ba'i mchog /rnal 'byor ma yi ye shes mchog /gang du dam tshig nyams pa la/ /sbyor ba 'di ni sbyin par bya/ /

zhi bar gyur nas bla med pa/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dbang yang bskur/ /dus bzhi dag tu rim pa yis/ /phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya/ /yang na dam tshig sdom pa blang / /bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab/ /bdag ni mi shes rmongs

pa ste/ /dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams/ /bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod cig /gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can/ /'gro ba'i gtso la skyabs su mchi/ /des ni the tsom med byas nas/ /nges par

dngos grub can du 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig las ldang ba sangs rgyas thod pa bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed dka' ba/ /gsang

sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang / /'gro ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog yin/ /mi zad gnyis med rnam par dag /thog mar dbus mthar dri ma med/ /a a'i ye

shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams/ /phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan/ /rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med/ /ral pa zla phyed dbu la brgyan/ /sna

tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /ral gri

lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /rin chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog /ye shes sems dpa' snying ga ru/ /'khor lo

gsum gyi mchog kyang bsgom/ /hU~M las thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan sngon po dang / /AHlas gsung gi 'khor lo ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan dmar po'o/ /oM las sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin/ /

dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mnyam sbyor/ /sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med/ /ra~M las phyag rgya chen po ste/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam/ /i las b+ha ga pad ma ste/ /byang chub zla ba dri ma med/ /u ni snying gar bsam pa ste/ /e ni mgo la

rnam par dgod/ /ai ni spyi gtsug dag tu dgod/ /o ni mig tu dgod pa ste/ /a~M ni go char byas nas su/ /a ni mdun gyi mtshon cha'o/ /li las lha mo spyan yin te/ /ri las dam tshig sgrol ma yin/ /l-I las lha mo gos dkar

mo/ /r-I las rin chen yang dag 'byung / /rin chen sgron dang ye shes sgron/ /dkar zhing p+la k+Sha sha yi mdog /dmar zhing 'dzam bu chu bo'i mdog /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum dgyes pas rnam par myos/ /thams cad

phyogs kyi gos can te/ /rang gi thabs dang mnyam par ldan/ /'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /pad ma dmar po rin chen dang / /rdo rje dril bu lhan cig sbyar/ /'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ral gri mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ /

gzhu ni 'gugs par 'dzin pa ste/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /thod pa yi ni cod pan can/ /sna tshogs pad ma'i dbus su ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung tu bzhugs/ /de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste/ /dbus

su gtso bo'i zla ba'i gdan/ /zur la mchod pa rnam pa bzhi/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /me long dang ni pi wa~M dang / /dril dang dud dang bcud kyis
len/ /chang gi btung ba lag pas mchod/ /gzhan du ji ltar bdag po bzhin/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /skyil krung phyed par legs par bzhugs/ /lag pa snyim pa'i thal mo yis/ /mchod pa

lag tu thogs nas ni/ /'di lta'i cho gas thams cad mkhyen/ /A li de nyid dri ma med/ /gsang ba mchog ni rnyad dka' ba/ /rdo rje sems dpas bshad pa yin/ /sngags kyi de nyid cho ga dag /sku gsung thugs su yang dag sbyar/ /

oM shrI ma hA su kha badzra sa twa AH /A hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ra~M swA hA/ oM sid d+ha lo tsa ni l-i AHhU~M swA hA/ oM sa ma ya tA re tut+ta re r-i AHhU~M swA hA/ oM pad ma b+ha be pAN+Da ra bA si ni l-I AHhU~M swA hA/

oM rat+na dzA li ni r-I AHhU~M swA hA/ oM rU pa badzri b+h+rU~M/ oM shab+da badzri hUM oM gan d+ha badzri kha~M/ oM ra sa badzri hrIH/ /thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog /b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas par bsgom/ /A li rdo rje gsang

ba che/ /sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /gang gis dngos po kun gsang ba/ /de yi gsang ba bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis dus bzhi ru/ /bzlas dang bsgom par ldan par bya/ /som nyi thams cad spangs nas ni/ /
sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan/ /ye shes 'khor lo mthong nas ni/ /dam tshig can gyis mchod dbang bskur/ /de dag gcig tu bstims nas su/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /khams gsum dag ni
ma lus pa/ /thams cad rdo rje 'dzin lta bu/ /'das pa dang ni da ltar dang / /ma 'ongs pa yi dus gsum po/ /de ltar sems can gsum po la/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas/ /lhan cig
skyes dga' dag pa'i bdag /thog ma med pa'i mchog yin no/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rdo rje sems dpa' skyed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //

de nas mchog gi cho ga bshad/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i bsgrub pa ni/ /ma~M gi ye shes las byung ba'i/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje bde ba che/ /zhal drug phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /sku mdog dkar po dri ma med/ /spyan gsum

rdo rje skyil dkrung can/ /phyag rgya drug ni 'bar bas brgyan/ /mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs bcings pa ste/ /

dkar dang sngo dang ngur smrig nyid/ /ser dang ljang khu de bzhin te/ /steng gi zhal ni zhi ba ste/ /lha yi dngos grub 'bras bu stsol/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /ral gril po ti 'dzin pa ste/ /ut+pa la
dang lcags kyu nyid/ /ye shes lus can rnam par bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ni/ /'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par bsgom/ /sngar bshad gnas kyi sbyor ba yis/ /ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' ltar/ /

gsang sngags 'di ni rjes su dran/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i gsang ba ni/ /gsang gsum ye shes dam tshig can/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'o/ /oM shrI ma hA su kha many+ca badzra a mra~M hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ra swA hA/

rang gis dbang bskur byas nas ni/ /brtul zhugs chen po gsang sngags bzla/ /gsang gsum 'khor lo spros nas ni/ /khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya/ /'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /gang gis su la'ang bstan mi bya/ /

mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /yi ge dgu pa bsgrub pa ste/ /k+Sha yi ye shes las byung ba/ /gdug pa thams cad

za byed pa/ /za byed mkha' 'gro za byed cing / /rnam rtog zos shing zad par byed/ /mkha' mnyam stong pa las byung ba/ /nam mkha'i longs spyod za byed cing / /zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /spyan gsum pa
la zhal rnam sgyur/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /gdug pa'i bdud ni za byed cing / /'jigs byed dang ni 'jigs byed mo'o/ /kha sbub zhabs kyis mnan par bzhugs/ /stag gi lpags
pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba phyed las nye bar mdzes/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa mnan/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan/ /

zhal gyi mche ba rnam par btsigs/ /'jigs byed rab tu cher 'jigs shing / /sngo dang dud kha ljang khu dang / /dmar dang lnga pa ser po'o/ /drug pa dag ni bong bu'i mgo/ /steng gi zhal gdong rab tu 'jigs/ /

thal ba sprin gyi mdog can la/ /gdug pa thams cad rab 'joms ma/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /dgyes pa'i longs spyod longs spyod cing / /pang du rdo rje phag mo ni/ /de mdog steng zhal phag mgo ste/ /gnyis su med par

mnyam par ldan/ /skra grol ba dang phyogs gos can/ /byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril/ /thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing / /tshangs pa'i lpags pa mnabs pa ste/ /rdo rje mdung dang

cang te'u dang / /gri gug zhags pa mgo bo dang / /phyag tu ral gri 'phyar ba ste/ /drag po gdug pa kun 'joms pa/ /snying kar ye shes mkha' 'gro ni/ /khwa gdong la sogs yongs kyis khyab/ /'khor lo 'dab brgyad dbus

dag tu/ /g.yon nas g.yas su bskor nas ni/ /dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod/ /mkha' 'gro ma mchog dgod par bya/ /ya~M ra~M la~M wa~M/ sha~M Sha~M sa~M ha~M/ ye shes 'khor lo mkha' 'gro dgod/ /zhag bdun bar du bsgoms nas ni/ /

gang yang thun ni bzhi yi rim/ /chu 'gram dang ni dur khrod du/ /bsgoms pas dngos grub nges par rnyed/ /'phrog pa dang ni gsod byed cing / /gang du las ni ci 'dod pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los 'grub/ /las 'dir yid gnyis

dpyod pa med/ /sngo dang pa la sha yi mdog /dmar dang bzhi pa ser po ste/ /gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni/ /sna tshogs mdog can mdzes pa'i zhal/ /dmar dang sngo dang dud kha ste/ /zhal mdog dkar po mchog tu
mdzes/ /thams cad spyan gsum pa yi zhal/ /skra grol ba la phyogs gos can/ /khwa gdong g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal/ /'ug gdong zhal yang de bzhin te/ /gsum pa khyi yi zhal gdong yin/ /bzhi pa phag

gi zhal gdong ste/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gdong ni/ /drag mo'i gzugs can cho ga bzhin/ /gshin rje sreg sogs zhal gdong ni/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa gnyis de bzhin/ /thug ra rnga mo rta dang ni/ /seng ge ra dang glang

ma he/ /gzhan yang dom gyi zhal yin te/ /thams cad kyang ni mnyam par bya/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga

lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /yi dgas gdan la gar gyis bzhugs/ /mi'u thung la skye gnas ring / /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /thugs rje'i ro yis rnam par myos/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni/ /sgom zhing rab tu

bsgom par bya/ /hU~M AHoM/ 'di ni gsang bar bshad pa ste/ /rdo rje pad ma 'khor lo dbus/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro snying ka ru/ /mkha' 'gro'i yi ge'i 'khor lo ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /mchod cing thim par

rnam par bsgom/ /mnyam par bzhag nas yi ge rnams/ /srog dang rtsol bas gsang sngags bzla/ /rang gi 'thor 'thung byas nas su/ /gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes spro/ /oM shrI k+Sha DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ra hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ /

thog mar gsal byed ming dang hU~M/ /mthar ni phaT dang rnam par sbyar/ /mkha' 'gro zla bas bshad pa yi/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol/ /mchog 'di dag ni gsang ba ste/ /su la yang ni sbyin mi bya/ /zhag bdun

gyis ni dbang 'gyur te/ /rtse gcig pa yis bsgoms na ni/ /'khor lo gsum gsang mkha' 'gro mA/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las k+Sha'i mkha' 'gro bsgrub pa'i le'u

ste rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba/ /A li mkha' 'gro bsgrub pa ste/ /A li ye shes las byung ba/ /A li mkha' 'gro mchog dam pa/ /zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug /spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab
'jigs pa/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching / /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi gtsug mnan/ /

dpral ba la ni rdo rje phreng / /stag gi lpags pa gos su mnabs/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid/ /sred dang phrag dog dus mtshan nyid/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad/ /gdul
dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / /bgegs kyi mgo bo'i phreng ba can/ /sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes/ /dkar ba'i mdog can rked pa phra/ /lha yi gzi brjid 'bar ba can/ /sngo zhing
ser la dud kha dang / /g.yas pa'i zhal yang de bzhin te/ /ljang khu dmar dang ser skya ste/ /g.yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs mdzes/ /steng gi thal ka sprin mdog zhi/ /chags shing rjes su chags pas
blta/ /thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs/ /sku lus ldem zhing 'jo bag can/ /A li mkha' 'gro ma yi sku/ /phyag gnyis pa la gcer bu'i lus/ /thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan/ /skra grol ba
yis rnam par myos/ /spyan gsum nag po 'jigs pa can/ /de yi mdog can sku rags can/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /gnyis med sbyor bas yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje dril bu yang
dag ldan/ /lha mo'i ku tsa 'tshir ba'o/ /ji ltar mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya ltar/ /mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin sbyar/ /phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang ba la/ /khyab 'jug lpags pa mnabs pa yin/ /thod pa dang

ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /ral gri dang ni thod pa 'chang / /mdung rtse gsum pa cang te'u nyid/ /dgra sta lcags kyu de bzhin te/ /zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid/ /snying kar
rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa'i/ /'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /de mdog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang / /phyag dang

phyag rgya de bzhin te/ /shar du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi ge a'i rigs las byung ba'o/ /byang phyogs su sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge I las byung ste bzhugs
pa'o/ /nub phyogs su nam mkha'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge e dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /lho phyogs su gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge ai las yang dag par bzhugs pa'o/ /

me'i phyogs la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su/ mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po dgod par bya ste/ thog ma che ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ yi ge u dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /bden bral du drag po mchog ces bya ba'i

mkha' 'gro ma yi ge U dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su dpa' bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge o dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /dbang ldan du khro bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge au dang sbyar
bar bya'o/ /de bzhin 'dir ni mtshams bzhi ru/ dbang ldan la sogs phyogs dgod pa/ yi ge rI las dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge li las dur khrod kyi mchog ces bya
ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge rI las rnal 'byor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge lI las gtum pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma ni de kun gyi yan lag
bcu gnyis rnam par dag /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /thams cad spyan gsum rnam sgyur la/ /sku lus dkar po thams cad zhal/ /sngo dang ljang khu gnyis med bde/ /g.yon dang g.yas

pa'i zhal gnyis ni/ /mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya/ /phyogs kyi gos can gar dang bcas/ /skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /cang te'u dang ni gri gug mchog /mdung dang

mgo bo thams cad kun/ /sna tshogs mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams/ /ro yi mgo yi steng bzhugs shing / /thugs rje'i ro ni yongs su rdzogs/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste/ /thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /mgo bo'i phreng

ba 'dzin pa ste/ /thams cad a la la yi sgra/ /oM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /a ni gsung du 'gyur ba yin/ /a ni sku yi rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje pad ma 'khor lo'i dbus/ /'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba
mchog /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa ste/ /rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /'khor la sogs pa thams cad dgod/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /gcig pu chos kyi

ro yang bsgom/ /ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi sngags kyi 'thor 'thung bya/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /'khor lo mchog gi tshogs dang spro/ /mchog de mthong na slar yang bsdu/ /yan lag bcu

gnyis mchog dam pa/ /sa ni bcu gnyis dag nyid de/ /rdo rje sa ni bcu gsum pa/ /rab tu dga' dang dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro ba/ /sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur/ /ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i

blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /gzugs med pa dang ye shes ldan/ /de ltar sa ni bcu gnyis po/ /'khor lo'i lha mo rnam par dgod/ /dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sa dbus su'o/ /'khor la

sogs pa kun gyi sngags/ /ming dang gsal byed hU~M byas te/ /de dag mthar ni phaT dang sbyar/ /sngags kyi gtso bos gsang sngags ni/ /rang snying rang gi sa bon dgod/ /sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar/ /ye shes

'khor lo 'di mthong nas/ /gcig tu bsdus te mchod par bya/ /bdag gis phyi dang nang du yang / /mnyam par bzhag ste mi smra bzla/ /rang gi 'thor mthung byas nas ni/ /blo ldan srog rtsol bzlas pa bya/ /oM shrI a li DA

ki a a a~M hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ srid pa ma lus thams cad kun/ /dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ /sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid/ /sbyor ba yi ni bdag nyid rnams/ /sems can khams ni

cha gnas pas/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid sbyor zhing mchod par bya/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sems kyis ni/ /sgom zhing rab tu bsgoms byas te/ /sngags dang dbyibs dang chos nyid de/ /chos gcig ro ni stong

pa yin/ /chos ni bdag med nyid yin te/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni/ /rjes su brtag par bya ba yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba chen po'i gsang ba A li'i mkha' 'gro bsgrub pa ste le'u sum

bcu pa'o// // de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba/ /sna tshogs gar gyi dbang phyug mchog /thams cad mchog ste rnal 'byor che/ /dngos grub chen po legs stsol la/ /bskyed ba'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgom zhing

rab tu bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /si~M oM dwa~M las rdo rje 'byung / /de nyid yongs gyur bdag nyid de/ /gsal byed mkha' 'gro mchog gyur pa/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog /thams cad

rigs kyi mchog dam pa/ /zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis/ /spyan gsum pa la g.yo ba'i sgra/ /zla ba byed pa zhi ba 'dzin/ /thod pa'i phreng bas spud pa ste/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la 'chang / /spyi gtsug ral pa
'ching ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la mtshan/ /lha yi rgyan gyis spud pa ste/ /skal ngan mu stegs can rnams ni/ /zhabs kyi pad ma'i 'og tu mnan/ /lta ba lnga yi rim pa dag /g.yas brkyang ba
yi zhabs kyis mnan/ /skyil dkrung phyed pa'i gar zhabs can/ /zhabs drug gis ni rnam par brgyan/ /khyab 'jug gi ni lpags pa mnabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste/ /rdo rje lha mos rnam par

'khyud/ /gcer bu 'og bka ska rags can/ /skra grol ba la spyan gsum can/ /mchu dang mchu ni rnam 'tshir zhing / /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'khril/ /byang chub yan lag gnas 'tshir zhing / /byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam

par 'khril/ /thugs rje chags pa'i ro yis bde/ /tshangs pa'i lpags pa'i yan lag ni/ /phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang nas 'dzin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'chang / /dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo thogs/ /mdung rtse gsum

dang ral gri dang / /cang te'u zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams/ /dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba nyid/ /ser dang dud ka ngur smig ste/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag tu/ /phi la dang ni nye phi la/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni gnyis po sbyar/ /chos kyi

mchog ces bya ba yi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni/ /yi ge dwa~M las yang dag 'byung / /g.yon gyi phyogs su dgod par bya/ /yi ge si las nges byung ba/ /rgya mtsho'i mchog ces bya ba yi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni/ /sna tshogs mdog

can sna tshogs zhal/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /skyil dkrung phyed pas gnas pa ste/ /zhabs ni gar dang bcas pa'o/ /zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa/ /spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste/ /'jigs byed dang ni

dus mtshan dag /zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bzhugs/ /mgrin pa dag na drug dang bzhi/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i sku rags can/ /rkang drug g.yer ka'i

sil sgra can/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /'khyud pa yi ni mchog dam pa/ /rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub kyis/ /gnyis su med par rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa gnyis med
rnam brgyan te/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /thod pa dang ni gri gug mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi dbu rgyan can/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dbus su/ /'khor lo

gsum gyi thabs kyang bsgom/ /oM gyi ye shes mkha' 'gro ni/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro ni/ /rang gi snying kar de dag bsgom/ /sngar bshad sbyor ba'i rim pa yis/ /gnas

la sogs pa'i rjes rim pa/ /de ru bsam zhing rnam bsgoms te/ /gsum po'i rim pa rjes su spro/ /des ni dngos grub gnyis med pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig bsgom/ /ye shes 'khor lo'i ro rnams ni/ /bsgoms

la gsang sngags bzlas par bya/ /oM shrI pra Na bod DA ka oM a oM hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sa~Mm ba ra oM swA hA/ oM hri d+harma ut+ta me/ ma hA badzra DA ki nI ya dwa~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sni a sa ga ri ut+ta me ma hA badzra DA ki nI ye sI~M hU~M phaT swA hA/

gsang gsum ye shes bzlas na ni/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma bzlas bya/ /gsal byed rang ming hU~M gnyis dang / /mthar ni phaT dang sbyar bar bya/ /gsang gsum 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni/ /gsum po bsdu zhing bsgoms nas
su/ /dam tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba yis/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /byang chub zla ba dri ma med/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo nA da gsum/ /gtso bo dag ni gsum yin te/ /mkha'
'gro ma gsum gsum mkha' 'gro/ /sdud cing bskyed par mdzad pa ste/ /b+ha gar rdo rje phag mo ni/ /gsang ba gsum du rnam par bsgom/ /de nyid bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /des na nga rgyal rnam
spangs nas/ /dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin bsgom dang bzlas pa bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing / /'o ma sna tshogs las byung ba/ /bram ze che dang sbrang rtsi mar/ /
ma hA mAng sa mnyam ldan pa/ /de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te/ /bzla' ba dag ni bza' bar bya/ /'du 'dzi med cing sred pa med/ /yongs su gzung ba'i 'khor yang med/ /longs spyod min

pas longs spyod la/ /'chi ba med pa'i zas bza' zhing / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang bsten/ /longs spyod med pa'i zas bza' zhing / /rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i skom yang btung / /gzhan du gang yang btung ba min/ /nang

gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /bcom ldan mkha' 'gro pi la ba/ /rnal 'byor ma ni nye pi la/ /thabs ni pi la bar zhes bya/ /shes rab nye ba'i pi la ba/ /grong khyer mthar ni pi la

nyid/ /grong gi mtha' ni nye pi la/ /zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /pi la dang ni nye pi yin/ /skad cig sbyor ba pi la ba/ /dga' ba nye ba'i pi la ste/ /mthu stobs du ma ldan par ni/ /skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin/ /pa shu thams cad

bza' bya yin/ /lha bshos dag kyang de bzhin bsgrub/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma 'dus nas/ /dus la 'thun pa 'dus byas nas/ /glu dang gar dang bza' ba dang / /'dus pa mchog gis mchod par bya/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs

nas/ /dam tshig gi ni spyad pa spyod/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsal byed mkha' 'gro'i bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u sum bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /

dngos grub sbyor ba'i rim pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro sbyor/ /dam tshig mchog gi sdom pa yin/ /chos rnams kun gyi sdom pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba che/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa/ /

dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog dam pa/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo che/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /dbus su nyi ma'i gdan yang mdzes/ /A li kA li mnyam par ldan/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan/ /dpe byad

bzang po brgyad bcus brgyan/ /byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas ni/ /rang gi sa bon las bskyed de/ /yi ge hi las yang dag byung / /dus mtha'i me ltar rab tu 'jigs/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /spyan

gsum ljags ni bskyod pa'i zhal/ /gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og gnon/ /khro ba dang ni bzhad pa'i zhal/ /bskal pa'i mthar yang 'khrug pa ste/ /ral pa yi ni dbu rgyan can/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /

mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /'jigs byed chen po'i pags pa yis/ /rked par sku rags bcings pa yin/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'chang / /dpral ba la ni rdo rje phreng / /khro bo mthong

nas rnam par brtag /lha rnams thams cad tshar yang gcod/ /keng rus can gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /'chi ba 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog /gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan/ /

sna tshogs rgyan gyis spud pa ste/ /phyag drug pa la zhal lnga pa/ /sna tshogs ro yi bcud mchog can/ /sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang khu dkar po zhi ba ste/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /phag mo yi ni sku lus

khyab/ /lha chen lpags pa 'dzin mdzad cing / /bla re tshul du brkyang bar mdzad/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /drug pa na ni cang te'u dang / /zhabs g.yon du ni dus mtshan mnan/ /g.yas pa yis ni 'jigs byed de/ /

zhabs kyis 'og tu mnan mdzad cing / /rmongs shing rab tu myos par mdzad/ /rdo rje phag mo de mdog can/ /skra grol ba dang gcer bu ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyis ska rags can/ /byin pa

gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /mgul nas 'khyud cing myos pa ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan phyag rgya bsnams/ /gri gug cang te'u mchog kyang 'dzin/ /drug pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo/ /'di 'drar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ /mkhas

pas re'u mig dbus su dgod/ /shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ste/ /byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro yin/ /nub tu pad ma'i mkha' 'gro ste/ /lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro yin/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba dang / /

ljang khu dang ni ser po'o/ /'khor lo dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /ljang khu ser po dmar po sngo/ /dkar po steng ltas dril bu dang / /sna tshogs rdo rje bde chen 'khyud/ /g.yas brkyang ba

yi tshul gyis bzhugs/ /dmar sngo ser dang ljang gu dang / /dkar po yang ni de bzhin no/ /pad ma dril bus snyoms 'jug cing / /lha mo'i nu ma 'tshir ba'o/ /ser po sngon po de bzhin dmar/ /ljang khu dkar po'i kha dog ste/ /

rin chen dril bus snyoms par 'jug /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yin te/ /sdoms pa lnga yang de nyid do/ /me dang bden bral rlung dang ni/ /dbang ldan de ni bzhi po ru/ /sangs rgyas mkha'

'gro las mkha' 'gro/ /pad ma'i mkha' 'gro rin chen mkha'/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis

rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos can gar mchog can/ /mgo yi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /rdo rje mda' la sogs pas brgyan/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na mdzes/ /'dod pa thams cad stsol

mdzad cing / /thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs/ /thugs rje'i 'dod pas rnam par myos/ /cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur can/ /dgyes pa stsol bas bde ba ste/ /de ltar sna tshogs du ma yis/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongs su

khyab/ /du ma'i gzugs dang gzugs sdug ma/ /rdo rje mchu dang 'od byed ma/ /rta gdong dang ni drag po'i gdong / /rdo rje drag mo snyan grags ma/ /rdo rje pho nya rdo rje sen/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma de bzhin/ /kam po tsi yang de bzhin te/ /rdo rje ro langs

ma dang ni/ /rdo rje ma mo'ang de bzhin te/ /dri can ma dang 'jigs byed zhal/ /zla ba'i spyi gtsug de bzhin te/ /khro gnyer can dang sna tshogs gzugs/ /rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang ni/ /sgyu 'phrul lha mo grags byed ma/ /

na lar ki dang ser skya ma/ /rdo rje 'bar ma thal sbyor ma/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed ma nyid de/ /dkyil 'khor 'grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni de dag kun/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam sgyur/ /gsus pa 'phyang la skra grol ba/ /thod pa'i

phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yong dag rdzogs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos can gar mchog ste/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad ro yi gdan la bzhugs/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid

'phrog pa/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing / /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /rdo rje mchog ni gsor mdzad cing / /dril bu dang ni cang te'u mchog /zhal gsum dpa' zhing sgeg pa ste/ /thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs/ /spyan ni zur gyis

gzigs mdzad cing / /dgyes pa'i rtsol bas g.yo ba ste/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad cing / /sgrub pa po kun rjes su chags/ /zla ba drug gis sgrub pa po/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'grub/ /yid gnyis med par dngos grub mchog /

mkha' 'gro thod par byed pa yin/ /dus 'dir de ma thag tu yang / /mkha' la spyod par the tshom med/ /nang gi pho brang de nyid ni/ /re'u mig dgu sogs sgo dang bcas/ /sgo ru lha mo bzhi bkod la/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub ster/ /phyi rol

dkyil 'khor lha mo bri/ /snam bu'i mtshams bzhi de ru ni/ /lha mo nyi shu dgod bya zhing / /mkha' 'gro ma sogs phyogs mtshams su/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag / /sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi/ /

'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab po/ /

de yi nang du re'u mig dgu/ /sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste/ /'di ltar mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma/ /dra ba'i sdom pa stong pa ste/ /byang chub phyogs ni sum bcu bdun/ /chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin/ /dbus su sa ni bcu

gsum ste/ /phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas/ /dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod/ /'di ltar sbyor bas rnam dag par/ /sdom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /de ni thugs kyi ye shes te/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /phung po khams

dang skye mched la/ /cho ga gnyis po sbyar bar bya/ /ye shes mchog gi sdom pa ste/ /gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod/ /phyed dang phyed du rnam par dgod/ /mkha' 'gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus/ /dam tshig rnal 'byor 'byung ba che/ /

ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni/ /zhabs bsil byas nas gzhug par bya/ /ye shes chu yis dbang bskur nas/ /gtso bo dag ni rnam par bsgom/ /bdag med chos kyi ro kun gyi/ /dam tshig mchog ni dri ma med/ /ba spu khung bu
thams cad las/ /dam tshig gsang ba gsum spros nas/ /sems can ma lus dam tshig gi/ /mkha' 'gro ru ni rab gnas bya/ /'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang / /gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya/ /ston
grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ni/ /byin brlabs gnas su dgod par bya/ /'di ni rdo rje theg chen te/ /mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs/ /sdom pa mchog ni bzlas pa yis/ /bla na med pa'i go 'phang ster/ /dus

bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par/ /skyo ba med par rtag tu bsgom/ /lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis/ /'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro/ /ba spu'i khung bu las mdun du/ /bde mchog spros nas mchod par bya/ /rdo rje

gsum ni dbang bskur nas/ /'gog pa'i khro bo rnam par bsgom/ /ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu/ /sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur bzla/ /'gro zhing 'ong ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi smra rdo rje brtul zhugs che/ /zhag bdun gyis ni

nges par yang / /mthu dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /g.yo zhing ldeg par byed pa dang / /'khrug cing g.yengs dang gzhug pa dang / /nad med pa ni nad yod byed/ /nad yod pa ni nad med byed/ /de ltar bsgom pa byas nas

ni/ /las 'dir the tshom med pa yin/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /bsgom dang bzlas la dga' ba dang / /dam tshig zas la dga' ba ni/ /thogs pa med par tshe yang brtan/ /'di ltar rang gi cho gas bzlas/ /sangs

rgyas gnas su legs par 'jug /der ni dam tshig 'khor lo ni/ /mkhas pas bsgom mchod bzlas pa bya/ /gsang sngags 'di dag bshad par bya/ /oM shrI badzra DA ka a d+hi hU~M/ DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI bud+d+ha

DA ka a b+h+ru~M hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI karma DA ka a kha~M hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI pad ma DA ka a hri hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI rat+ni DA ka a~M hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hu~M hU~M

phaT swA hA/ mkha' 'gro bzhi po de dag dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /mgrin pa mnyam par snol ba ste/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhal/ /

phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par bsgom/ /lha mo mngon du byas nas ni/ /snying po'i gsang sngags so so yin/ /oM shrI badzra bA rA hi ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI DA ki ni DA~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI lA me hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI khaN+Da

ro hi kha~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI rU pi Ni b+Tu hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di ni lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi'o/ /mtshams kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni/ oM shrI bud d+ha DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI karma DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI pad ma DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT

swA hA/ oM shrI rata na DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ sgo ru mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster/ /bzhi po sna tshogs mdog can te/ /ji bzhin rigs kyis kun la khyab/ /oM hU~M rU pe hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M su rU pe hu~M hU~M

phaT/ oM badzra dun te hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM pra b+ha ka ri hU~M hU~M phaT/ shar phyogs kyi ni snam bu la/ /lha mo bzhi po dgod pa ste/ /sku lus dkar po'i mdog can la/ /de yi gsang sngags bshad pa yin/ /oM badzra ba Da ba mu

khi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM g+ho ra mu khi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra g+ho Ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya sha sbi ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ lho phyogs kyi ni snam bu la/ /lha mo bzhi po dgod par bya/ /sku mdog dag ni ser ba ste/ /de yi sngags su bshad pa yin/ /

oM badzra d+hu ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM na khi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM kau mA ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ka~M b+ho dzi hu~M hU~M phaT/ nub phyogs kyi ni snam bu la lha mo bzhi po sku mdog dmar po can gyi sngags yin no/ /oM badzra bai t+tA li hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra

sI ka hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ga ra Da ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra bi ma ba dA ne hU~M hU~M phaT/ byang gi snam bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang gu de'i gsang sngags bshad pa yin no/ /oM tsan+d+ra she kha re hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM b+h+rI ku Ti~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM bi shwa rU pa

hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ka ta ya ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can te/ de'i sngags bshad pa/ oM badzra shr-i kha le hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra mA le hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra

ya sha ska ri hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra na lA hU~M hU~M phaT/ sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi po sna tshogs pa'i mdog can drag po'i gzugs dang ldan pa ste/ de'i sngags su bshad pa/ shar du oM shrI badzra ping+ga le dzaH hU~M hU~M phaT/ lho ru badzra

dz+wa la ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ nub tu badzra guN+Da li ba~M ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ byang du oM badzra b+hai ra ba ho hu~M hU~M phaT/ thams cad gsal byed mtha' ru ni/ /shrI ni sbyar zhing mchog rims bzhin/ /sngags pas de ltar bzlas na ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma

ni dra ba yi/ /sdom pa'i dngos grub thob pa ste/ /zla ba drug gis bde dbang 'gyur/ /gcig tu byas te bsdus na ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po gzi byin can/ /dra ba'i mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags 'di dag thams

cad ni/ /khri'am 'bum du bzlas na ni/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub pa yin/ /snying po dag ni bzlas pa yis/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma grub cing / /rang nyid ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi lus su zhugs 'gro zhing / /mi

snang ba dag thob nas ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig gi sdom pa 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum

bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i cho ga'i rim/ /sngar bshad sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yi/ /lung la sogs pa'i rim pa bya/ /rnal 'byor lung ni mi shes pa/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs

stegs can yin te/ /rtag tu lung ni spang mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su 'gro/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dmigs na/ /rnal 'byor gyi ni dngos grub 'grub/ /

cig car 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gi lus ni rnam par bsam/ /sngo zhing drag la bzhin rnam bsgyur/ /gtum zhing 'jigs la 'jigs par mdzad/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /ral pa zla phyed spyi gtsug

'ching / /sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pas gnon/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /ba~M hU~M badzra las byung sku lus can/ /phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan/ /stag gi pags
pa gos su mnabs/ /skyil krung phyed pas legs par gnas/ /spyan gsum drag po'i sku lus can/ /mgrin pa bzhi la zhal bzhi pa/ /bcu gnyis phyag dang yang dag ldan/ /stong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog /
gdug pa kun gyi thod pa'i phreng / /dus mtha' las byung do shal can/ /gdug pa kun ni zhabs 'og gnon/ /nyon mongs 'jigs byed mgo bo dang / /srid pa gti mug phrag dog ste/ /dus mtshan mo ni kha bub

la/ /gdug pa'i bgegs ni 'jigs pa can/ /thams cad zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon/ /nam mkha' dang ni skye ba dang / /dkar ba dang ni dmar ba dang / /ljang gu steng du bltas pa'i zhal/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa/ /

phag mo dag dang bde bar 'khyud/ /kun tu gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /chos rnams kun gyi ro gcig tu/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba/ /dpal gyi bde ba chen po ni/ /rdo rje he ru ka nyid yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /chos

kyi 'khor lo khar sil dang / /lhung bzed mdung dang zhags pa dang / /lcags kyu mgo bo cang te'u dang / /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis/ /na ra'i pags pa brkyang nas mnabs/ /shar du ma tang gi dang Do m+bi kA/ /ra dza ki dang

puk+ka sI/ /kha Ta ki dang sha ba ri/ /dzi bA ri dang sa ma ri/ /lha mo brgyad po de dag ni/ /ji bzhin rim pas rjes su dgod/ /ser dang sngo dang de bzhin dmar/ /dud pa yi ni mdog cen te/ /dmar dang ljang dang dud kha'i mdog /brgyad pa dkar po

nyid yin no/ /sgo rnams su ni dgod bya ba/ /khrag 'thung rdo rje gtum mo dang / /rdo rje sring mchog ma dang ni/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed drag mo ste/ /gdul dka' thams cad gsol mdzad cing / /thal ba sprin mdog ljang gu dang / /dmar dang sngo dang

lhag par 'jigs/ /brgyad pa'i dbus su chos khar gsil/ /thod pa cang te'u gri gug ste/ /phrag pa'i steng du gos 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M mi 'jigs pa/ /chos kyi khar gsil cang te'u/ /

zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /yi dgas gdan gyi steng du ni/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum/ /phyis mi len dang cog pu pa/ /gzhi ci bzhin dang stan gcig pa/ /

bla gab med dang shing drung ba/ /dgon pa pa dang dur khrod dang / /khrod pa dang ni phying pa pa'o/ /'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnam dag bsgom/ /ye shes mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog /ro gcig tu

ni rnam par bsgom/ /oM shrI ma hA su kha badzra he he ru ru ka~M a hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ma~M ma tA~M gi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM Da~M badzra DoM be hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ra~M rA dza gi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM bu~M puk+ka sI hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM kha~M kha Ta ki hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM sha~M sha ba

ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM dzi dzi ba ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM sa~M sa ma ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ha~M he ru ki hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ba~M badzra tsaN+Da DI hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M badzra rAk+Sha si hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM b+hai~M badzra b+hai ra bI hU~M hU~M phaT/ de kun gcer bu skra grol ba/ /spyan gsum

pa la zhi ba ste/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs lce bskyod cing / /phyag rgya lnga yis sku lus brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /bzhad dang zhi dang snying rje dang / /sgeg pa dang ni rngam pa dang / /drag cing khro ba'i nyams can te/ /bzlas dang

bsgom pa spro zhing bsdu/ /lus ngag yid la bde bar gnas/ /sems can myos pa sna tshogs pa/ /gdul ba'i thabs kyis bde ba yi/ /yul la yongs su spyod pa na/ /bla med ye shes 'bras bu 'thob/ /sems can thams cad 'di yis

bde/ /'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis/ /ye shes 'bras bu rnyed pa yin/ /'di ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /mchog gi go 'phang thob pa'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i le'u ste sum

bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /char dbab cho ga'i rim pa ni/ /pad ma 'dab ma brgyad mchog gi/ /lte ba ge sar bcas pa la/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje che/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can/ /

phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum 'jigs pa'ang rab tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje mtshon ni gsor mdzad cing / /bsdigs mdzub zhags par ldan pa dang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /lcags kyu dang ni mdung bsnams

shing / /dpa' bo'i pags pa mnabs shing 'dzin/ /cang te'u dang ni brgyad par bshad/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni/ /chu lha 'jigs pa myos pa gnon/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching / /sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par

brgyan/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /thod pa'i phreng bas cod pan mchog /mchus gnon zhal gdong rnam bsgyur zhing / /khro bar blta zhing 'jigs

par gzigs/ /'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad bri/ /mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang / /'jog po pad ma pad ma che/ /dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu/ /dga' bo dang ni brgyad yin te/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang / /
ser dang dud pa'i mdog can te/ /ljang gu dang ni ser po ste/ /thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs pa/ /'jig pas bka' drin slong bar byed/ /skrag pas blta zhing gnas pa'o/ /

bcom ldan sku lus sngon po can/ /'jigs shing shin tu 'jigs par mdzad/ /g.yas pa dud kha dmar po ste/ /g.yon pa ljang gu dud kha'o/ /steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding gdong / /zhal rnam bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa'o/ /

nyi ma dmar po'i gzi brjid can/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis nyi mnyam 'od/ /phag mo dag gis mgul 'khyud cing / /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /bde chen mchog ni bcu gnyis pa/ /

gri gug tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan/ /lha mo'i mchu ni rnam par 'tshir/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang / /spyan gsum pa la sku rags can/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo mchog gi sku/ /gnyis su med par

sbyor bar gnas/ /klu ni rang gi chung mar bcas/ /chu lha 'ang chung mar bcas pa dag /chu lha'i lus ni dkar po can/ /bka' drin dag ni slong bar byed/ /snying gar ye shes 'khor lo dag /de mdog phyag dang zhal yang bskyed/ /

de yi snying ga hU~M na~M hU~M dgod cing / /lus ngag yid kyang de bzhin te/ /klu yi rang snying de nyid la/ /hU~M nA~M hU~M ni rnam par dgod/ /gsang sngags rgyal po'i cho ga ni/ /khro bo'i tshig ltar bzlas brjod bya/ /chu bo'i 'gram mam rgya mtsho

'am/ /khron pa'am klu yi mtsho dang ni/ /rdzing bu lteng ka rnams su ni/ /blo can khro bo'i bzlas pa bya/ /yang na klu yi gnas su ni/ /bsgom pa bzlas pa dag la 'jug /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru ka~M hU~M nA~M nA ga b+ha ri sha pa ya hU~M DA ki

nI dzA la sam+ba ra phaT swA hA/ 'di dag bsgoms te khri tsam bzla/ /dus bzhi dag tu stong du'o/ /zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang / /sa rnams kun tu char 'bab 'gyur/ /dam tshig sbyin sreg mchod dus su/ /glu dang

gar ni nyer ldan pas/ /'o ma dag ni bza' zhing btung / /rnal 'byor pas ni klu brgyad bzla/ /'o ma'i khrus kyi cho ga yis/ /'o mas sbyin sreg bsregs blugs bya/ /'o ma'i shing gi bud shing bya/ /'o ma'i shing gi yam shing

dang / /'o mar bcas pas sbyin sreg bya/ /bum pa 'o mas yongs su dgang / /me sogs mtshams dang phyogs rnams su/ /'o mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /oM a~M a nan+tA ya hU~M na~M hU~M swA hA/ oM ba~M bA su kai hU~M na~M hU~M

swA hA/ oM ta~M Nak+Sha ka hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ oM ba~M pad ma hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ oM ma~M ma hA pad ma hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ oM shA~M sha~M kha pA la hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ oM ka~M karko Ta hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ oM a~M a na ba tap+ta hU~M hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ oM hU~M ba ba ru NA

ya nA gA d+hi pa ga baR+Sha pA ta ya hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ 'di bzlas khro ba dang bcas pas/ /kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsam bya/ /'o ma 'bras rnying zas su bza'/ /dbang po thul cing yongs mi smra/ /bri gzugs spangs pa'i mngon sum

du/ /khri tsam bzlas na mngon du 'gyur/ /mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing / /smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te/ /'di la the tshom ma byed cig /dngul gyi snod kyi nang du ni/ /yungs kar dang ni chu blugs la/ /de la nyi shu rtsa

gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la dri chu dang 'o ma bsres pas khrus byas te/ chu 'gram gyi sa sbrus pa las klu'i gzugs byas la nub tu mgo bstan te/ mgo bo dgu la chus dbang
bskur te/ de nas chu bo'i nang du gzhug go/ /de ma thag tu lhas char 'bebs shing / 'dzam bu'i gling du char 'bebs 'gyur/ /sa rnams 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhing / /nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar
byed/ /sems can thams cad bde reg gnas/ /phan tshun khro bo'i gzugs can ni/ /bdag bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /rang gi snying ga kho nar ni/ /he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yis/ /char pa yang ni 'bab

par 'gyur/ /ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongs su bzlas na ser ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ /cang te'u la yongs su bzlas na me mched pa'i me rengs par 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa la yongs su bzlas na 'gugs
par byed do/ /thod pa la yongs su bzlas na khrag 'gugs par byed do/ /dgra sta la yongs su bzlas na gsod par byed do/ /kha T+wA~M ga la yongs su bzlas na zhi bar byed do/ /gri gug la yongs su bzlas na

'jig rten gsum du rgyu ba gsod par byed do/ /mgo bo la yongs su bzlas na 'chi ba slong bar byed do/ /rdo rje gsor zhing yongs su bzlas na sa 'og gi dngos grub du 'gyur ro/ /dril bu la yongs su bzlas na mi dga' ba

longs su 'gugs par byed do/ /glang po che'i pags pa la yongs su bzlas te bting na bar snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar ldog go/ /phyag rgya drug la yongs su bzlas na pha

rol gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sa steng du ni kun spyod cing / /ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las char dbab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba mchog ni mdor bsdus nas/ /skad cig gis ni bdag bsgom pa/ /he ru ka dpal gzugs su bya/ /sngo zhing drag po rnam sgyur ba/ /drag po spyan gsum zhal drug mchog /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'dzin/ /

sna tshogs rdo rje dbu mchog la/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sku la mgo bo'i do shal can/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /phag mo yis

ni sku la brgyan/ /zhabs gcig pa ni bzhengs pa ste/ /g.yas pa ser la dud pa'i mdog /g.yon pa dmar la ljang gu'o/ /steng gi zhal ni rta gdong ste/ /dkar zhing sprin mdog drag cing 'jigs/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam

par ldan/ /lha mo mchu ni 'tshir ba ste/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs 'dzin cing / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /rdo rje mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag
na bsnams/ /cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin/ /gri gug zhags pa de bzhin te/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu bshad/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang / /zhabs gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom/ /glang po'i gdong

dang bye'u'i gdong / /seng ge'i gdong yang de bzhin te/ /dang po khyi yi gdong yin te/ /gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin/ /gsum pa phag gi gdong yin te/ /bzhi pa khwa yi gdong can no/ /gnas kyi dbyibs kyi chos
bdag nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni chen po 'dzin/ /mtha' yas rnam rgyal grags pa ste/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad pa/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang / /de bzhin bsgom zhing rnam bsgom ste/ /
sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin/ /bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //
de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phag mo'i mchog ni bsgrub pa ste/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom/ /sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi/ /sku lus sin dur
'dra mi g.yo/ /me tog ban+du ka lta bu/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan

can/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /dbu skra mdzes pas 'khril ba ste/ /thabs kyi zhal mchu rnam 'tshir zhing / /mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa ste/ /rna ba'i mthar thug 'gengs par byed/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /

lcags kyu mchog gis 'gugs pa ste/ /pad ma dmar po'i dbus bzhugs shing / /'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol/ /yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /zhal drug lha mo'i sku lus 'byung / /steng gi zhal ni phag rgod

gdong / /drag po'i gzi brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi/ /shar gyi 'dab la rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog /g.yon pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dam tshig mchog /nub kyi phyogs su rdo rje gzi brjid mchog /lho yi phyogs su rdo rje rin

chen mchog /me yi phyogs su rdo rje ye shes mchog /bden bral phyogs su rdo rje rig mchog ma/ /rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje grub mchog ma/ /dbang ldan phyogs su rdo rje thal mchog ma/ /sgo la rdo rje 'bar mchog ma/ /

rdo rje gzi brjid mchog ma ste/ /rdo rje khro bo mchog ma dang / /rdo rje mche ba mchog ma'o/ /lha mo de dag thams cad kyang / /dmar ba'i mdog can zhal gsum pa/ /phyag drug pa la spyan gsum pa/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo

dkrung du bzhugs/ /dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste/ /thams cad rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing / /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /rang gi lus kyi thabs la 'khril/ /zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu dang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /

grwa bzhi dag tu mda' gzhu dag /yongs su 'gengs pa gnas par gzhag /sgo ru g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /gcer bu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal/ /thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs/ /rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs

mdzub dang / /zhags pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ /gzhan yang phan tshun dag tu yang / /ji ltar 'khor la sogs phyag 'tshal/ /de snying ye shes lha mo ni/ /sku gsung thugs dang bcas par bsgom/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /

chos kyi ro ni mnyam par thim/ /ye shes bzlas pa spros nas ni/ /cho ga'i rim pas yang dag bsdu/ /dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis/ /zla ba'i de nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM shrI badzra bA rA hi A ba~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/

oM shrI badzra gu h+ya ud ta ud ta me hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badzra sa ma ya ud ta me hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badzra he dze ud ta me hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badzra rad na ud ta me hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badzra dz+nyA na ud ta me hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badzra bid+yA ud ta

me hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badzra sid+d+h+yo hA ud ta me hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badzra b+ha sme ud ta me hU~M phaT/ oM shrI badzra dz+wa la ud ta me dzaH hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM shrI badzra a mri te ud ta me hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM shrI badzra kro d+ha ud ta me ba~M hU~M phaT/ oM

oM shrI badzra da~MSh+Ta ud ta me ho hU~M phaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /bsgom pa dang ni bzlas pa bya/ /bsdu dang spro ba byas nas ni/ /chos rnams kun dang chos can ni/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor bas dag /sems can thams cad rab

tu brtag /rnal 'byor gnas ni chos yin te/ /gsang ba gsum la rab tu gzhug /gsang gsum gnas ni chos yin te/ /chos kyang de bzhin de lta bu/ /bdag med chos ni chos yin te/ /chos las chos ni yod ma yin/ /

mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma drug cho ga'i rim/ /pad ma 'dab
lnga bris nas ni/ /lte ba ge sar khyab par ni/ /de yi dbus su phag mo ni/ /dmar zhing sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug mdzes/ /spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste/ /thod pa'i phring

ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /skyil dkrung phyed pa gar dang bcas/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku brgyan cing / /mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste/ /gdug pa'i bdud ni thams cad dang / /dus

mtshan khas sbub byas pa la/ /zhabs kyis kyang ni mnan par bzhugs/ /dmar dang sngo dang ljang ba ste/ /sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /

mgo bo dang ni gri gug 'dzin/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /snying kar ye shes dam tshig ni/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor las byung / /shar phyogs lha mo ya mi ni/ /g.yon du bskor nas rnam par dgod/ /rmongs

byed ma dang skyod byed ma/ /skrag byed ma dang tsaN Di ka /spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang / /ljang khu dud pa'i mdog can te/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /

dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos can gar gyi mchog /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mi bskyod pa yi cod pan 'chang / /thugs

rje'i nyams kyi bde ba ste/ /gnyis med sbyor bas mnyam par ldan/ /rdo rje sems sogs mchog de nyid/ /phag mo dang ni rdo rje sems/ /ya mi ni dang rnam snang mdzad/ /rmongs byed ma dang pad ma'i gar/ /skyod byed

ma dang khrag 'thung ste/ /skrag byed rdo rje nyi ma dang / /tsaN Di ka dang rta mchog ste/ /rdo rje sems sku dkar po ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad ser po yin/ /pad ma gar dbang dmar po ste/ /he ru ka dpal sngon po yin/ /
rdo rje nyi ma dmar po ste/ /rta mchog dag ni ljang ku'o/ /yang na so sor bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum pa/ /phyag drug spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan/ /

rdo rje dril bu thod kha T+wA~M/ /ral gri cang te'u mgo bo 'chang / /nA ra'i lpags mnabs gar dang bcas/ /rnam snang la sogs dpa' bo kun/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M dang / /cang te'u

dril bus mtshan pa'i mchog /yang na thams cad phyag bcu gnyis/ /zhal gdong drug par bsgom par bya/ /de dag gsang sngags 'di yin te/ /oM shrI oM bA~M bA~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI ha~M yA+e hA~M ya~M ya~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hrI~M

ma~M ma~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hre~M hri~M sa~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hU~M hU~M sa~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI phaT phaT tsa~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ de dag ni rnal 'byor ma drug gi gsang sngags so/ /oM haHba~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM b+h+ru~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM swA hA~M hu~M hri hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM bo She

ta ha te he~M phaT swA hA/ oM hU~M hU~M ho tra~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM phaT ha~M ha~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di ni dpa' bo drug gi sngags/ /bzlas pa dang ni bsgoms tsam gyis/ /'khor lo drug ni mchog grub cing / /'khor los sgyur ba thob pa ste/ /'khor

lo bsgyur drug rgyal por 'gyur/ /mi pham rgyal ba yang dag rdzogs/ /stobs chen rtsal mchog rnyed pa yin/ /phyag mtshan drug la rtag mchod cing / /cho ga bzhin du mngon bsngags na/ /de ni myur du grub nas ni/ /rnal 'byor rgyal

po'i mchog kyang thob/ /mi snang la sogs grub nas ni/ /khams gsum dag tu rnam par spyod/ /'gro ba drug gi sems can grol/ /bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs/ /yang na 'khor lo zur drug la/ /bde ba chen po rnam

snang mdzad/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ /'khor los sgyur ba bdag po ni/ /gur kum gyi ni mdog lta bu/ /gzi mdangs 'bar ba'i 'od can te/ /phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang ngo bo/ /

rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'khyud/ /ral gri po ti kha T+wA~M ga /thod pa lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /ut+pal dang cang te'u/ /gur kum mdog dang sngo ba dang / /dmar dang ljang gu
steng zhal dkar/ /chos kyi dbyings ni dag pa che/ /sems can khams ni rab grel byed/ /shar sogs g.yon bskor dgod pa ni/ /rta mchog tsa ba'i ka dang bcas/ /de dag de ru dgod byas pas/ /'jam pa'i rdo

rje rang nyid 'grub/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /sngo dang dmar dang dkar sngo ljang / /yan lag drug tu dpa' bo dag /mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig bcas/ /rdo rje sems dang phag mo dang / /rnam snang mdzad dang ya mi ni/ /pad ma gar

dbang rmongs byed bcas/ /khrag 'thung dang ni skyod byed ma/ /rdo rje nyi ma skrag byed ma/ /ljang dang dud pa'i mdog can te/ /de lta'i sku mdog rnam par bsgom/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa'o/ /lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o/ /

thod pa dang ni gri gug 'dzin/ /dpa' bo thod pa kha T+wA~M ga /rang gi phyag mtshan gnyis med sbyor/ /dril bu lhan cig yang dag ldan/ /cang te'u ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /stag gi pags pa'i

shams thabs can/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /mgo bo'i do shal 'dzin pa ste/ /thams cad yi dgas steng du bzhugs/ /dbus su 'jigs byed dus mtshan gnon/ /lha mos byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril/ /skra grol

ba la phyogs gos can/ /snying kar ye shes dam tshig ni/ /sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar/ /go cha gnyis pa yang dag sbyar/ /gnas kyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgod/ /gsang ba

gsum ni snying kar gnas/ /khwa gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyi rol sgo ru rnam par dgod/ /zur du gshin rje sreg la sogs/ /thams cad gcer bu rnam par bsgom/ /sngar bshad mdog dang phyag mtshan te/ /yi

dgas gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis gnas/ /drag po skra ni grol ba ste/ /thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /rang gi phyi dang nang du yang / /pha rol phyin drug rnam par dag /bsgom zhing rab tu

bsgom par bya/ /spro zhing bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzlas pa bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzlas na/ /bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs spros nas/ /'gro ba gsum po

rdzogs par byas/ /nang gi bdag nyid bsgoms pa yis/ /'khor lo gsum gsang bsgoms nas bzla/ /de nyid gsum dang sngags lhan cig /dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /hu~M hU~M phaT ni mtha' ru ste/ /'khor lo gsum

gyi bzlas pa bya/ /rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni/ /dam tshig can gyis de bzlas bya/ /oM shrI many+dzu badzra a hU~M ma~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM haHbadzra sa twa hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ba~M bA rA hi hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM na ma hi bai ro tsa na hu~M hU~M phaT

swA hA/ oM ha~M yo~M ya ma ni hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM swA hA hU~M pad ma naR+te shwa ra hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM hrI~M moM mo ha ra ti hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM bau Sha Ta he he ru ka hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM hrA+e~M hrA+e~M sa~M tsa la ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM hU~M hU~M ho badzra sUr+ya hu~M

hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM hU~M hU~M sa trA sa ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM phaT ha~M pa ra mA shwa hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM kA kA s+yai hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM u lU kA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM shwA nA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/

oM ya ma dA Di hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma dU ti hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma da~MSh+Ti Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ g.yon dang g.yas kyi lag gnyis su/ /go cha gnyis po bkod nas ni/ /gang zhig ji ltar 'dod pa ru/ /

las rnams thams cad byed pa yin/ /the tshom med par las byas na/ /nges par dngos grub gzhan du min/ /yang na mgon po sa bcu'i dbang / /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /

bsam gtan shes rab drug pa ste/ /thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang / /ye shes sgo skyong rnam dag pa'o/ /rab tu dga' dang dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can/ /sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur/ /ring du song dang
mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /'di yis rnam par dag pa bsgom/ /gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni/ /'phags pa'i bden par rnam par bsgom/ /sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang / /

'gog pa dang ni lam rnams te/ /bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje dpal/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam dag ste/ /ye shes rang gi ngo bo yin/ /'di ltar rnam par dag pa bsgom/ /gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i lam/ /gsang zhing mchog

tu gsang ba ste/ /rnal 'byor stobs kyis gsang ba mchog /bsgrub pas rjes su bstan pa dang / /ji bzhin bdag po'i dbye ba dang / /bla ma'i rim pa legs par bslabs/ /'di ltar cho ga gnyis med par/ /sbyor ba'i dam tshig

mchog yin te/ /dngos grub kun gyi thabs kyi rgyu/ /rnal 'byor ma thugs gsang ba che/ /las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu ste/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gnyis su med pa'i go cha'i sbyor ba bskyed pa'i bsgom pa'i

le'u ste sum bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /brda ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /brda ni yongs su mi shes par/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub mi 'grub ste/ /'di ni nges par shes pa na/ /dngos

grub 'grub par the tshom med/ /dwa zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad/ /di zhes bya ba bud med yin/ /bu zhes bya ba gnon pa yin/ /su zhes bya ba za ba nyid/ /ma zhes bya ba ma ru bshad/ /ya zhes bya ba chung ma nyid/ /

b+hi zhes bya ba sring mo yin/ /b+hi zhes bya ba mdza' mor bshad/ /lu zhes bya ba bu mo yin/ /sri zhes bya ba khrag tu bshad/ /so ni zhi ba'i btung ba yin/ /pe zhes bya ba thug pa ste/ /pi zhes bya ba de bzhin sha /

ba zhes bya ba za ba yin/ /b+hu zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin/ /pi zhes bya ba dur khrod yin/ /du zhes bya ba ro yin no/ /TI zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma/ /gA zhes bya ba lA ma yin/ /tri zhes bya ba gzugs can ma/ /ku zhes

bya ba mkha' 'gro ma/ /ha ni khaN+Da ro nyid ma/ /dza zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis/ /ba zhes bya ba gsong por smra/ /swa zhes bya ba legs 'ongs yin/ /mi zhes bya ba nya yin la/ /byo zhes bya ba bza' ba min/ /phyo zhes bya ba

btung ba min/ /ga ni bgrod dang bgrod min yin/ /ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin/ /sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro/ /ra zhes bya ba khyo med mo/ /du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo/ /su zhes bya ba skal bzangs mo/ /na zhes bya ba

skal ngan ma/ /sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can/ /a zhes bya ba dam tshig med/ /I zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin/ /na zhes bya ba ma 'ongs yin/ /so zhes bya ba chags pa yin/ /'di dag yi ge'i brda yin te/ /dbang bskur

dus su rnal 'byor pas/ /bza' dang bza' med sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni mchog yin te/ /dam tshig mchog ni shes pa dang / /dam tshig can gyi dam tshig dus/ /dam tshig 'khor lo 'dus pa dang / /dad pa rnams la sbyin
par bya/ /ma dad pa la sbyin mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las brda'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni/ /

gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob/ /bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar zhing / /pad ma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mig /rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'/ /tsan dan sar pa'i dri dang ldan/ /
bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'/ /de rigs las byung shes par bya/ /bud gang btso ma'i gser 'dra zhing / /dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'/ /dzA ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan/ /de yang bzang po'i rjes
'gror 'gyur/ /thams cad ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs/ /dri dang gos ni sngo la dga'/ /ut+pal sngon po'i dri yod pa/ /de ni dpa' bo bzang rjes 'gro/ /bud med pad dkar 'dra mdog gang / /rtag tu

pad ma'i rtsa ba dri/ /de yang de bzhin dpa' mo'i blo/ /dmar zhing ser skya'i bud med gang / /gzugs bzang gos ni dmar ba dang / /ma la ki dang ut+pal dri/ /de ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin/ /ser zhing ljang

ba'i bud med gang / /gos ni dkar la dga' ba dang / /mgo la me tog dri dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs rigs rjes 'gro yin/ /bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar/ /de'i mdog can gos 'chang zhing / /rtag tu ga bur dri dang

ldan/ /rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro zhing / /rnal 'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni/ /de ltar bdun po ngas bshad pa/ /g.yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'/ /rang gi mdog gis rigs drug ldan/ /rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge yang / /

kha dog drug tu 'gyur ba yin/ /rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang / /rang rig las byung tshig tu smra/ /g.yon las 'gro ba'i bud med gang / /rnal 'byor pa la g.yon la rtag /lag pa g.yon gyis mtshon pa dang / /g.yon nas

lta bas rnam par blta/ /lha mo rnams dang gang smra ba/ /de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad/ /bud med gang byas de nyan cing / /rigs kyi sa bon rab tu smra/ /rigs kyi bya ba mi spong ste/ /rang gis bstan bshad mi

'dor la/ /rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos/ /de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad/ /phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba/ /g.yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu 'dud/ /lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba/ /de ni nges par bde bar 'gro/ /

mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni/ /rkang pas ri mo 'dri byed cing / /mgo ni 'phrug par byed pa dang / /zur gyis lta zhing lag pa ston/ /bsgrub pa po la khyad par du/ /de yis rang rig dran pa dang / /'khur ba'am kos ko dag
dang ni/ /sna dag tu ni thal mo ston/ /zur gyis lta zhing lan cig bstags/ /zlos shing rigs la rnam par blta/ /bden par 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /nges par dam tshig can yin na/ /de nas rnyed dka' rnal
'byor ma/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang dag 'byung / /ya mi ni dang skrag byed ma/ /'dod ldan phag mo 'jigs gzugs ma/ /kun tu spyod pa ba su ra/ /rnal 'byor
ma ni rnam pa bdun/ /mdor bsdus rang mtshan bshad pa yin/ /gzugs can ma dang tsum pi ka /lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo/ /mi ldog e hi ka lha mo/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni mdun du bshad/ /mngon par
zhen pas blta ba dang / /smin ma 'degs par gar byed cing / /sngon bzhin gzugs ni sdud byed la/ /phyis ni 'jigs par byed pa dag /gzugs can ma ni yin par bshad/ /gnyis med dpa' bos bsnyen par bya/ /

sdug pa'am yang na mi sdug pa/ /byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pa na/ /de ni tsum pa gir shes bya/ /mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid yin/ /zas mi lta bar zur du blta/ /khro gnyer dang ni gdong dag dang / /smin ma sgyur zhing

sdigs mdzub dang / /'di ni gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin/ /'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa/ /de ni lA ma yin par bstan/ /phag dang dred dang byi la dang / /lce spyang rigs dang stag dag dang / /thams cad der ni
'jigs byed pa/ /yongs su gyur par de bshad do/ /shin tu dga' bas rgod pa dang / /song nas slar yang mi ldog la/ /rjes su chags pas gsal bar rgod/ /dum skyes mar ni de bshad do/ /yid ni kun tu skyo ba

dang / /rkang pa lag pas bong ba'am/ /gos mtha' 'am yang na shing dag gis/ /des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /mi ldog par ni shes bya ste/ /bsgrub min par ni de bshad do/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs phyag rgya/ /

dpa' bos bsnyen cing mtshan ma blta/ /thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang / /ral gri kun tu skrag byed yin/ /rdo rje dang ni dung nyid dang / /rigs kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las
rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan ma'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /gang zhig yang dag shes pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro'i dam

tshig la gnas pa'o/ /dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang / /pad ma'i dri ni rnam par gtong / /lta stangs rang bzhin zhi ba dang / /zhen pas lta ba'i rjes 'gro ba/ /bud med gang gi sen mo dmar/ /mig ni kun tu zhen pa dang / /

khyim du pad ma 'dri ba ni/ /pad ma gar dbang rigs 'byung yin/ /smin ma'i dbus na rtse gsum yod/ /lus ni sngo bsangs skya ba dang / /rtag tu rdo rje rigs bsgom pa/ /gang gi khyim du rdo rje 'dri/ /rtag tu mchod pa

byed pa yi/ /mkha' 'gro ma de dpal ldan ni/ /he ru ka yi rigs byung yin/ /gang gi dpral bar rtse gsum ni/ /mdung thung dag ni snang 'gyur zhing / /mig dmar mdog ni dmar ser dang / /de bzhin rkang pa lag pa

dmar/ /ra skyes khyim bya dag la yang / /rtag tu yid ni dgar 'gyur zhing / /de yi khyim du rdo rje mtshan/ /rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed pa/ /shrI he ru ka'i rigs byung ba/ /mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi za/ /'khor

lo gang gi dpral ba'am/ /lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba/ /sprin sngon dag dang 'dra ba ni/ /rtag tu dpral bar 'chang byed pa/ /skal ba chen po kun tshogs shing / /mchog tu bden pa gang yin dang / /khyim du

'khor lo 'dri byed cing / /rtag tu de la mchod byed pa/ /rdo rje phag mo rigs 'byung ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni stobs kyis dregs/ /gang zhig mig sman gnag 'dra zhing / /so ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang / /rtag tu

gdug par gyur pa dang / /sems stobs ldan par gyur pa dang / /rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang / /mang du smra bar mi byed cing / /khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba dang / /rtag tu dge bas mchod byed pa/ /rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba/ /stong phrag bcu dang

lnga pa yin/ /ser zhing gser gyi mdog 'drar snang / /mig mi g.yo zhing kha spu ser/ /rdo rje gang gi dpral ba'am/ /lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba/ /rtag tu rgyal srid dag la gnas/ /snyems shing bden par smra ba dang / /

ma li ka yi dri 'byung zhing / /gang gi khyim du rdo rje ni/ /rtag tu 'dri zhing cher mchod pa/ /dum skyes ma yi rigs las byung / /rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyug mchog /gang zhig rtag par sha la dga'/ /skem zhing mig sman

gnag pa'i mdog /dpral ba mdung rtse lta bu yod/ /gang zhig gdug pa'i las la dga'/ /rtag tu dur khrod dag tu 'gro/ /'jigs pa med cing brtse med de/ /gang gis dpral bar thig le dang / /khyim du thod pa 'dri zhing

mchod/ /dpal ldan he ru ka de yi/ /mkha' 'gro 'i rigs las byung ba yin/ /sprin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang / /so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing / /rtag tu gdug pa'i las la dga'/ /g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs

pa dang / /de yi khyim du dgra sta ni/ /'dri zhing rtag tu mchod byed pa/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro mar ni the tshom med/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag /shrI he ru ka'i rigs las byung / /
sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /mtshan nyid yang dag bshad pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sgrub pa po yis lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid kyi ni khyad par dang / /yan lag tshogs ni shes bya ba'o/ /gang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun tu zlum por snang 'gyur zhing / /kha yi

sma ra rtag tu yod/ /spu dang smin ma ring ba dang / /gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba dang / /mi 'khrugs bden par smra ba dang / /rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'/ /dpa' bo sring mor de shes bya/ /pad ma'i

phyag rgyar sbyin bya ba/ /yang na ru sbal phyag rgya bya/ /pags pa bum pa lce blugs nyid/ /phyag rgya'i lan du shes par bya/ /de ni tshes bcu'i res dag la/ /khyim du pad ma 'dri bar 'gyur/ /lA ma yi ni

bud med kyi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /gsus pa rlo zhing mig dkyus ring / /mig ni dmar zhing ser skyar gnas/ /phyug cing skal bzang dpal yon can/ /ser zhing tsam pa lta bur snang / /shin tu ring min
thung ba'ang men/ /sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'/ /dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing / /mtshams kyi gyen du bltas pa nas/ /rgod cing dga' ba nyid dag dang / /lam ni rnam par gnon cing gnas/ /g.yul du 'chi

ba rnams kyi ni/ /gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'/ /de lta'i rab dregs mthong na ni/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa yis/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bstan par bya/ /g.yon pa dag ni yongs
bzlog pa/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi dang ni tshes brgyad ni/ /de ni dus tshigs yin par bshad/ /khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang / /bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod/ /'jig rten dbang

phyug lA ma y-i/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /gang gi mkhur tshos dag tu ni/ /khung bur snang ba gnas gyur cing / /de bzhin rtag tu dmar zhing ser/ /mig ni ljang ser dag tu snang / /skra ni de bzhin 'khyil ba

dang / /mgo dang dpral bar dar bcings snang / /ri mo gcig pa rab tu gnas/ /de bzhin mgrin pa ring ba dang / /rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing / /rgod cing glu ni len pa nyid/ /lan 'ga' zhig ni khro ba dang / /sems ni

rnam par g.yo ba dang / /rtsod pa la ni dga' ba ste/ /'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong na ni/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis/ /dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon gyi

phyogs su ldog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lam ni yin par bshad/ /thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang / /rtag tu gos ser la dga' zhing / /phrag pa dag na gos kyang 'chang / /de 'dra'i bud med mthong na ni/ /rdo rje'i
