phyag rgya bstan bya zhing / /'bed pa yis ni gnyis pa yang / /dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi de yi dus yin te/ /de yi
khyim du rdo rje 'dri/ /shrI he ru ka lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /lus kun la ni ba spu yod/ /mig ni gnag cing ser ba dang / /sbum zhing rnam bsgyur mi bzad pa/ /bzhin 'phel che zhing

kha che la/ /ma mchu rlon zhing kha dog nag /mig zlum sna ni nyams pa dang / /rtag tu glu ni mkhas pa dang / /sprin gyi mdog can yid 'phrog pa/ /'di 'dra'i rab grags mthong na ni/ /glu yi phyag rgya bstan
par bya/ /gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /tshes grangs bcu gcig de yi dus/ /
khyim du mche ba 'dri bar byed/ /rdo rje phag mo lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla las lA ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //
de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi brda rnams te/ /gang zhig spun dang sring mo ru/ /yang dag shes par 'gyur ba'o/ /gang zhig lag g.yon ston pa ni/ /
gsong por smra ba ston pa yin/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni/ /gsong por smra ba lan 'gyur yin/ /gang zhig lto ba rdebs pa ni/ /bdag ni bkres par ston pa yin/ /gang zhig
dpral ba ston pa ni/ /nam mkha' las ni 'ongs zhes pa'o/ /gang zhig khar ni sor mo 'dzud/ /zos zin zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig lce ni bskyod pa dag /za'o zhes ni smra ba yin/ /

gang zhig pus mo la reg pa/ /ngal lo zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig sor mo'i rtse la reg /ngal sos zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig so ni 'cha' byed pa/ /sha za'o zhes ni smra ba yin/ /lag pa g.yas pa ston

pa ni/ /'di ltar gyis shes ston pa yin/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa ni/ /bcings so zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig mkha' lding ston pa ni/ /grol lo zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig khu tshur ston pa ni/ /

de la pa ti ta bstan bya/ /gang zhig skra ni ston pa la/ /rnam par 'gyur ba bltas nas ni/ /kha T+wA~M ga ni de la bstan/ /gang zhig yan lag bskyod pa dang / /de la mche ba bstan par bya/ /gang zhig lag pas lag pa

ston/ /gtor ma za zhes smra ba yin/ /gang zhig lag pa g.yas pa ston/ /de ltar gyis shig smra ba yin/ /gang zhig rna ba la reg pa/ /gnas par bya zhes ston pa yin/ /gang zhig sen mos sen mo reg /shi yis khyer zhes

bya ba yin/ /gang zhig sa 'dri dkyil 'khor du/ /de ring 'jug ces smra ba yin/ /gang zhig nu ma la reg pa/ /bdag gi bu ni srungs zhes bya/ /gang zhig mthe g.yon sa la 'dri/ /gnyen dag srungs shig pa ru bshad/ /

gang zhig mig ni rnam 'dzums pa/ /de ltar bya zhes smra ba yin/ /gang zhig tshigs la reg byed pa/ /bde bar nyal zhes smra ba yin/ /pho nya ma ni gang yang rung / /de dag kun gyis yang dag spyad/ /mngon par brjod pa'i

rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las brda'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas yan lag phyag rgya yi/ /mtshan nyid nga yis bshad par bya/ /bud gang spyi gtsug reg byed pa/ /mgo bo de la bstan par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston pa

ni/ /de la khur tshos bstan par bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston pa la/ /de la lce ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mchu ni ston byed pa/ /de la dbung pa bstan par bya/ /gang zhig rked rgyab ston byed pa/ /de la sa ni bstan par bya/ /

gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa/ /de la kos ko bstan par bya/ /gang zhig lto ba ston byed pa/ /de la lte ba bstan par bya/ /gang zhig gsang ba ston byed pa/ /de la ling ka bstan par bya/ /gang zhig brla ni ston byed pa/ /de

la 'og ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig pus mo ston byed pa/ /de la byin pa bstan par bya/ /gang zhig rkang pa ston byed pa/ /de la rkang mthil bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sor tshigs ston byed pa/ /de la sen mo

bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa/ /de la nam mkha' bstan par bya/ /gang zhig nam mkha' ston byed pa/ /de la nyi ma bstan par bya/ /gang zhig chu bo ston byed pa/ /de la rgya mtsho bstan par bya/ /

mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /yan lag ji bzhin phyag rgya'i mchog /gang zhig shes pas spun
nam ni/ /sring mor the tshom med 'gyur ro/ /sor mo gcig ni ston pa yis/ /legs par 'ongs zhes smra ba yin/ /sor mo gnyis ni bstan pa yis/ /legs 'ongs lan ni smra ba yin/ /'di ni
rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /yan lag phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ /mdzub mor gnyis bkug mig gi rgya/ /sngags pas gang la de bstan de/ /de mod ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar/ /dbang du 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /

gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa/ /de la mdzub mo bstan par bya/ /gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa/ /de la lce ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig ba ni sa ston pa/ /de la mdun ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig spyi bo ston byed pa/ /

de la mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa/ /de la mkha' ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa/ /de la mtshams ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston byed pa/ /de la mchu

ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa/ /de la kha ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa/ /de la lte ba bstan par bya/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /rim bzhin yan lag phyag rgya yin/ /'di dag rtag bstan

gsang ba pa/ /yang dag lta bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' 'gro ma'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi

mtshan nyid do/ /gang gis ring nas dpa' bo dang / /dpa' mo sring mor shes 'gyur ba'o/ /dam tshig can gang rjes chags pa/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod sa gzhi yin/ /gzhir ni sa gzhi byas nas su/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sdom pa

mchod/ /go bzlog pa yis lta ba ni/ /bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur ba nyid/ /rtag tu bzhin gyi smin ma g.yo/ /sna tshogs myur du shes bya ba/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro las byung ba'o/ /rnam sgyur 'khyil par shes bya ste/ /ri mo gsum pa yongs su

zlum/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams nges 'gro ba'i/ /de yi mtshan ma shes par bya/ /gal te ldog par gyur na ni/ /sngar bshad don ni btang bar 'gyur/ /de yi dngos ni 'jig gyur pa/ /rdo rje lta bur gsal ba yin/ /sgra ni khu byug skad

lta bur/ /gsal ba de ni rtag tu gyur/ /'di ni mtshan ma'i khyim du ni/ /rdo rje lta bu me long bcas/ /ral gri 'dra ba'i me long bcas/ /phyag mtshan mdung 'drar rtag tu 'byung / /de gsal me long yin zhes bya/ /mtshan mar byas pa'i

gzugs dag ni/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa/ /'di ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /mchog yin par ni shes par bya/ /po ta~M gi zhes bya ba ni/ /gsong por smra ba'o/ /pra ti po tang gi zhes bya ba ni/ gsong por smra ba'i lan no/ /ga mu zhes bya

ba ni 'gro'o zhes bya ba yin no/ /lu~M ba~M zhes bya ba ni 'ong ngo zhes bya ba yin no/ /de hi zhes bya ba ni zas shes bya ba yin no/ /gri ha na zhes bya ba ni bram ze zhes bya ba yin no/ /pi ra Na~M zhes bya ba ni snying nyid do/ /ma ra Na zhes bya ba ni sgra

ngan no/ /gAn d+ha zhes bya ba ni kar ni ka'o/ /shi ro ni brdzun no/ /ka ra ni lto ba'o/ /ba ra ni sgra'o/ /shra ra ma No ni rna ba'o/ /a mri ta swA ni bsrubs pa'o/ /sa ma ga ma ni mi'o/ /ta li ka ni mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /na ra ka ni dkyil 'khor

ro/ /a mo ka ni dur khrod do/ /ka li ka ni sgo'o/ /shwa sa ni bram ze'i rigs so/ /pa ri d+hi ni rgyal rigs so/ /bi ra ti ni rje'u rigs so/ /kru ra ni dmangs rigs so/ /an ta s+tha ni sme sha can no/ /pa shu li ka ni khyim mo/ /TA ka ni sring

mo'o/ /me la pa ka ni chu'o/ /gri ha ra Na ni rdo rje chu gtong ba'o/ /lce so la rig pa ni ltogs par ston pa'o/ /tri sh+na ni dris bsgo ba'o/ /ku ta ni gnas che ge mo nas 'ongs so zhes bya ba'o/ /ki ra na ni me tog go/ /tu mu li ni rgod

pa'o/ /tan ta ni char dbab pa bzlog pa'o/ /trib ta ni zhu ba'o/ /d+hu r+yo ni shes pa'o/ /nri ha ni sprin no/ /d+hu pa ni bdug pa'o/ /sa ru ni ri bo'o/ /sa ri ta ni chu bo'o/ /a gu li ni yan lag go/ /ba da na ni gdong ngo / /

dzA ti ka ni lce'o/ /a na ta na ni so'o/ /pak+Shi ni rgyal mtshan no/ /tshan do ni phreng ba'o/ /tsa la ni rlung ngo pa shu ni ri dgas so/ /yan ta ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /sha na ma ni bzhi mdo'o/ /pha la ku sha~M ni skye bo'o/ /ma hA

k+Sha ra ba ni phyugs chen po'o/ /ga ni ra skyes so/ /na ni mi'o/ /go ni khyu mchog go/ /ma ni ma he'o/ /b+ha ni bza' ba'o/ /ha ni rnam grangs so/ /ad+h+ya ni rgyal po'o/ /kha la reg pa ni zos so zhes pa'o/ /lce la reg pa ni

ngoms so zhes pa'o/ /na sti ni snying po'o/ /hri ni ngo tsha 'o/ /mi thu na gyis shig pa'o/ /brla la reg pa ni stong pa'o/ /steng du gcig go/ /'og tu med pa'o/ /phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan no/ /dpa' bo'i gsung

gi gsang ba'i brda'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni/ /rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad/ /skyes pa'am bud med

g.yon nas 'gro/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ /khyim dang zhing du rnam gnas pa/ /shin tu ring yang shes par 'gyur/ /he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med/ /slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid ni/ /rgyud 'di ru ni sgrub pa po/ /legs par gyur pa

nyid yin te/ /brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya/ /nus pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /pho nya mo brgyad 'di dag ni/ /mos dang dad pa 'phel byed pa/ /rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu/ /dam tshig rnams kyang skyong ba'o/ /lha mo gzhan dag kun sbyor ba'i/ /

'dod la rmongs par gyur pa dang / /gnyis su med dang thogs med dang / /dam tshig spyad par spyad pa dang / /bud med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor/ /tshangs pa spyod pa de bzhin gzhi/ /khro med rgyun gyi kun tu spyod/ /'di brgyad dam tshig kun spyod yin/ /

sgrub pa la ni gnas pa yi/ /sgrub pa po yis rtag shes bya/ /rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste/ /rgyu med pa ni gzhom mi bya/ /dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi/ /mig dang lag pas ma yin no/ /gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing / /rab tu 'bad te sba bar bya/ /

blo ldan mthe chung bskyod par ni/ /pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas/ /dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste/ /bsgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas/ /mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang / /gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi'o/ /yul yul du ni dka' thub can/ /

pho nya'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma rtag /pho nya ral gri so 'dra zhing / /dag byed bsod nams 'phel byed yin/ /de bzhin pho nya legs 'dres pas/ /sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob/ /bzlas mchod bsam gtan med par yang / /

myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa pos/ /mchod pa nyid la rab tu 'jug /'di las gzhan pa'i mchod med de/ /de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin/ /pho nya'i lam la dga' ba dang / /bsgrub pa po

ni dngos grub brtson/ /rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /zas la rtag tu spyad par bya/ /sgrub pa po ni legs pa ru/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i rigs rnams ni/ /kun la nye bar spyad bya zhing / /bza' min par ni mi rtag go/ /

'di nyid du ni de dbyer med/ /pho nya mo yi bsgrub pa nyid/ /dngos grub cho ga la spyod tshe/ /pho nya gcig pu kho na yin/ /byang chub phyogs kyi dngos grub ni/ /bsgrub pa dag dang nye ba dang / /bla ma rgyud rim gyis thob pa'i/ /dbang bskur

bas ni sngags legs ldan/ /pho nya rnams su yang dag bshad/ /phyag rgya legs sbyor ngang tshul dang / /chags med gtong dang tshul khrims dang / /ye shes rgyu skyes yang dag rdzogs/ /sems kyi bdag nyid nang bar langs/ /

lus kyi bya ba kun byas te/ /lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni/ /lus la gnas par kun tu spyad/ /dag byed byas pa'i lus kyis ni/ /rtag tu sngags ni brjod par bya/ /rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan cing / /mtshon cha

rnams ni bgom mi bya/ /dam tshig can la khro mi bya/ /mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya/ /de dang lhan cig bde bar bya/ /bdag gi don dang gzhan don du/ /dam tshig spyod pa nyid du bya/ /'di la lhan cig longs spyod bya/ /mtshan ma rtag par
nam mkha'i gos/ /nag dang dmar bar rtag 'gyur bya/ /srog chags yan lag las byung gyon/ /bde ba 'dod pas bde thob 'gyur/ /mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spang gtsang / /shrI he ru kas byin brlabs pas/ /

phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /dus kun tu ni yang dag ldan/ /rigs dang rigs min ngor mi lta/ /spyi gtsug la sogs bcing ba spang / /pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin/ /gnyis pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod/ /zas gcig tu ni za

ba nyid/ /gtsang sbra gsum pa yin par bshad/ /gtsang sbra 'di dag rab sbyangs pas/ /gtsang ma'i dag pa'i rim thob na/ /dngos grub gang las 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de nyid bsdus las gang gsungs dang / /de bzhin bde
mchog las gang gsungs/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las yang dag bshad/ /de bzhin dpal mchog dang po dang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid las gsungs/ /bzlas dang brtul zhugs sogs pa 'grub/ /de 'dir bsam gtan tsam

gyis ni/ /sngags pas skad cig gis 'grub 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor lam la dga' bas kyang / /gtsang sbra 'di ni yang dag spyad/ /bsod nams gtsang sbra las byung gang / /bsgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po/ /stong phrag gcig pa'i

zhal min par/ /kha cig gis ni brjod mi nus/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che/ /rnam dag mtshan nyid kun bsgrub pa/ /bde ba'i bsod nams chu 'thung ba/ /dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed yin/ /reg pa dang ni smras pas kyang / /sdig pa

kun las rnam grol zhing / /lus ngag skyon ni med pa yi/ /gang zhig spyod pa byed pa yi/ /mi mchog sdig pa thams cad ni/ /rnam dag bdag nyid bder gshegs kyi/ /sa rnams kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /skye zhing skye bar de bzhin gshegs/ /

rigs 'gyur chos ldan rgyal por 'gyur/ /de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas/ /dad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas mchod pa rnam dag pas/ /mya ngan 'das las byung dpa' bo/ /de bzhin bdag nyid mchod pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun tshogs

sras bcas dang / /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma/ /brtan pa dag dang g.yo ba dang / /spun gyi mchod pa'i dus 'dzin pa/ /zla ba'i dus la gnas pa yi/ /spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu/ /bde dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba/ /

sngags dang de bzhin phyag rgya dang / /ye shes der ni bstan mi bya/ /dag byed zas la spyod pa ni/ /rtag tu dam tshig spyod byas 'gyur/ /gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya/ /man ngag rnam par nyams mi bya/ /dam tshig gnas

la ci rigs par/ /man ngag rnams kyang sbyin par bya/ /pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la/ /'dod pa rmongs pas 'gro mi byed/ /rtag tu pho nya chags bral ba/ /mi 'da' ba yis longs spyod bya/ /skye gnas dman la mi gnas pa/ /

bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min/ /ma dang srin mo bu mo dang / /chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas/ /'khor lo'am de bzhin grub pa la/ /dka' ba nges par zad par 'gyur/ /mchog dang tha ma lhan cig 'gugs/ /de ltar rdzas ni
rnam nges yin/ /rnal 'byor ba rtag g.yon nas spyod/ /rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du 'dor/ /lag pa g.yon pa yongs su bsgyur/ /g.yon gyi phyed ni rab mchod byed/ /lus ni g.yon ni rnam par gnon/ /g.yon pa

yis ni tshim dang za/ /brtul zhugs ma nyams brtul zhugs rdzogs/ /bsgrub pa po ni dam tshig brtson/ /dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang / /lhan cig zas la spyod par byed/ /rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa'i/ /rigs ni rnam pa bzhi

ru bsgrags/ /rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa'i/ /rnal 'byor bsgrub la rab tu mchod/ /ba lang sha dang rta sha dang / /khyi sha dag dang sna tshogs pas/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /

de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyi zas/ /sngags pas phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /shrI he ru ka'i sprul pa yi/ /nyer spyod bstan bcos kun la brtag /rtag tu de dag gzung zhing bsrung / /las rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /bgegs

med ji bzhin 'grub 'gyur bar/ /'dir ni gzhan dag 'gyur ma yin/ /'di ni pho nya mchog bzang po/ /brtson zhing lhan cig ldan par yin/ /ma chags dga' ba'i longs spyod rdzogs/ /rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam dbye nyid/ /

bla ma'i man ngag la dga' zhing / /de yi don ni mchog mtshungs pa'o/ /spun dang yang na pha dang ni/ /bdag po nyid du skad cig mthong / /lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la/ /rtsub cing spu ni dmar ser yin/ /dngos grub kun gyi

thun mong du/ /bzlas dang brtul zhugs la rtag dga'/ /dran pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ /pho nya la sogs gnas dang bcas/ /mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub

byed pa'i/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /rnal 'byor 'bras bu rab ster ba/ /gsang sngags 'di las byung ba yin/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya dang bral gsang

sngags ni/ /lus can rnams la byin mi rlob/ /ji srid 'gro ba'i bya ba dag /shin tu sbyor bas rtogs par bya/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa/ /rnal 'byor pa la gang zhig sdang / /khyi yi skye gnas brgyar skye ste/ /sme sha can

du skye bar 'gyur/ /dper na la la mar 'dod pas/ /'bad pas chu ni bsrubs gyur kyang / /mar sar 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad/ /'dzin cing mchod par byed pa ni/ /'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur

pa'i/ /rnal 'byor gzhan la sten pa ni/ /gzhan du de bzhin don med 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor che mchog dpa' bo ni/ /yul phyogs gang na gnas gyur pa/ /rigs ngan kla klo yin na yang / /yul de yongs su brtags pa yin/ /sems can rjes

su bzung ba'i rgyur/ /da rung nga ni rtag tu gnas/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las pho nya'i grangs kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po mchog /dpa' bo

rnams kyi khyad par ni/ /gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten gsum po g.yo byed cing / /rjes su dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /yang dag dngos grub rim gyis ster/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+N+Na nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/

gsang sngags 'di ni gsang sngags che/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog /sngags chen bklags pas grub pa ste/ /'dod pa thams cad 'grub pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dum skyes ma dang lA ma

'ang de/ /oM hrIHha ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni gsang sngags che/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog /'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub/ /gsang sngags kun gyi gsang sngags gtso/ /thod pa'i dum

bu la sogs pa/ /dpa' bo kun gyi snying po mchog /gsang sngags de dag mchog dam pa/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/ /dpa' bo'i sdom pa mchog yin no/ /'di ni kun gyi gsang
sngags te/ /'di ni sngags su grags pa yin/ /sa 'og dang ni mtho ris dang / /ji ltar mtshams kyang de bzhin te/ /gang yang ji bzhin las rnams kyis/ /'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin/ /de yis thams cad
grub nas ni/ /gsang sngags mchog ni bla med pas/ /'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin/ /gang gis bla na med pa dag /sgrub pa pos ni thams cad 'grub/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo kun/ /mdor bsdus rgyas

par ma yin no/ /ri mo mdzes par bris nas ni/ /sna tshogs me tog 'bras bur ldan/ /de yi steng du dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang dum skyes ma/ /dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo nyid/ /

ha ha he he zhes bzhad pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' bo'i rigs/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /sngar bshad dpa' bo dpa' ba'i mchog /dpa' bo'i mchog ni thams cad nyid/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' bo rnams/ /de yis

'gro ba grangs med khyab/ /dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang de bzhin te/ /'khor lo'i gnas su rnam par blta/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub byed cing / /'khor lor

bzhugs la rtag tu mchod/ /legs par mnyam bzhag 'dod pa 'grub/ /sngar bshad cho ga bzhin bzlas shing / /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /bsams pas 'khor lo chen po yi/ /dngos grub kyang ni thams cad 'grub/ /

sangs rgyas bye bas gsungs pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni re re la/ /'khor gyi grangs kyang bye ba snyed/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma ni khyad par du/ /dngos grub thams cad byed pa dge/ /mngon par brjod pa'i

rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo'i las kyi rim pa bsgrub pa rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sku

gzugs ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni/ /dung chen dag ni kho na las/ /mkhas pas gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /yan lag dang ni nying lag mchog /mos pa'i yid ni sngon 'gro ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pas

ni gzung zhing bsgrub/ /dri chen chu dang rak+ta dang / /shu krar bcas pas mchod par bya/ /nA ra dpal chen bdug spos ni/ /dpa' bo'i las kyi sgrub pa ste/ /bla ma yi ni go 'phang 'grub/ /de nas bdag nyid mchod byas
te/ /'dod pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing / /rgyal po'i bud med rnyed par 'gyur/ /ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /lag pa'i mchod pa rab tu bya/ /pags chen ri mo bris nas ni/ /sgrub pa po
yis mnyam bzhag na/ /zhag bdun gyis ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /the tshom med par rnam par spyod/ /rnal 'byor ma dang bla ma mchod/ /mkha' 'gro'i gnas su de bzhin skye/ /des ni bde ba rnyed nas kyang / /

las ni rtag tu byed par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bla ma mchod nas ni/ /de yi dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni bsgrub pa yis/ /glang po'i pags la sku gzugs bri/ /rnal 'byor ma yi bsgrub pa yis/ /ba lang pags la ri mo bri/ /mkha' spyod dag ni bsgrub pa yis/ /
rta yi lpags la ri mo bri/ /sa la spyod pa'i sgrub pa yis/ /ma he'i pags la ri mo bri/ /sa 'og spyod pa'i bsgrub pa yis/ /phag gi pags la ri mo bri/ /gnod sbyin mo ni bsgrub pa yis/ /
shing spang leb la sku gzugs bri/ /lha yi bu mo bsgrub pa yis/ /tsam pa'i spang leb sku gzugs bri/ /klu mo bsgrub pa dag gis ni/ /klu shing spang leb ri mo bri/ /me ni bsgrub par

'dod pa yis/ /dur khrod gos la sku gzugs bri/ /pha rol blta ba'i bsgrub pa dag /bong bu'i pags la sku gzugs bri/ /nor rnams bsgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /byi ba'i pags la sku gzugs bri/ /chang ni 'gugs par 'dod

pa yis/ /spre'u'i pags la sku gzugs bri/ /khrag ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /thod pa la ni sku gzugs bri/ /sa bon 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /phug ron lpags la sku gzugs bri/ /lha ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /

thang shing spang leb sku gzugs bri/ /grong khyer 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /lce spyang lpags la sku gzugs bri/ /zhi ba'i las la bram ze mo/ /zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri/ /des na zhi bar gyur pa yin/ /rgyas pa rgyal

rigs mo yi ni/ /zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri/ /dbang la rje'u rigs mo yi ni/ /zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri/ /mngon spyod la ni dmangs rigs kyi/ /zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri/ /brgyal bar bya ba dag la ni/ /

rgyal mtshan gos la ri mo bri/ /rengs par bya ba rdo leb ste/ /dgar ba la ni rnga mo'i pags/ /dgug pa la ni seng ge'i'o/ /las kun la ni bya yi pags/ /yang na lcags ni kho na'o/ /gzhan du sna tshogs las
rnams ni/ /dran pa tsam gyis nges par 'grub/ /bgegs rnams med par bya ba'i phyir/ /ri bong lpags pa dag la bri/ /bgegs ni ldang bar byed pa la/ /shi ba'i pags pa rnams la bri/ /gser dang dngul la

sogs pa la/ /zangs dang shel dang thang shing dang / /rdo rje las ni bya ba ste/ /dngos grub mchog ni khyad par yin/ /tsan dan dang ni thang shing dang / /tsan dan dmar po tsam pa ka /a sho ka ni grub pa'o/ /shrI br-i
k+Sha ni nor sbyin 'gyur/ /a ga ru dang sta rga shir/ /'o ma shing gi bye brag dang / /stag pa'i shing la sogs pa rnams/ /grub pa yi ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /sbal pa'i rus pa las byas dang / /klu shing
dag gi bye brag dang / /ru sbal rus pa glang po'i so/ /khyad par du ni char yang 'bebs/ /bram ze'i rus pa zhi ba ste/ /glang po'i rus pa rgyas par yin/ /dbang la rta yi rus pa ste/ /gsad pa la ni

ma he'i rus/ /dgar ba la ni rnga mo'i rus/ /sdang la rta dang ma he'o/ /rengs par bya la khyi yi rus/ /dgug pa la ni seng ge'i rus/ /sa yi 'og tu 'gro ba la/ /phag gi rus pa dag la bya/ /sa dkar dag las byas pa ni/ /

rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyas pa la ni ser ba'i sa/ /dbang la dmar po'i sa yin la/ /gsod pa la ni sa nag ste/ /'di ni mdor bsdus cho ga'o/ /dri chen chu dang zhag dang khrag /mig sman chen po de bzhin te/ /

mi yi rus pa brdar ba yis/ /mdog tu lhan cig sbyar nas kyang / /rang byung me tog sa bon dang / /rigs ngan dang ni bram ze dang / /gdol ba mo dang g.yung mo dang / /khrus mkhan ma dang gar mkhan ma/ /ma'am yang na

sring mo 'am/ /bu mo yi ni bye brag gi/ /'di dag drung du blangs nas su/ /shu kra rak+ta'i khyad par dag /sna tshogs 'di dag bsres nas kyang / /cho ga bzhin du sku gzugs bri/ /grog 'khar gyi ni sa dag la/ /shi ba'i skra dang
rus pa yis/ /pir gyis dam pa bri bar bya/ /thig skud shi ba'i skud pa yis/ /sku gzugs thig skud mchog yin no/ /yi dgas phreng sogs bsnyan nas ni/ /ba nas kyang ni mar me bya/ /dpa' bo chen po'i bdug

spos dang / /rkang gis lha bshos bya ba ste/ /dri chen rdo rje chu yi dri/ /thod pa dag gi bum pa ste/ /ar+g+ha 'i snod ni thod pa'o/ /ar+g+ha rus pa'i tsUr+N+Na ste/ /'bad pas skyes bu dbul 'byin no/ /ji ltar nus pa dag tu

spyad/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par ni/ /sku gzugs yang ni ri mo 'am/ /gzhan yang mkhas pas cho ga bya/ /ji lta'i las kyi rjes mthun par/ /de lta'i gos kyi rjes 'chang

zhing / /gcer bu skra ni grol ba dang / /gzugs mdog dag ni bsgyur nas kyang / /gtso bo dang ni rnal 'byor pa/ /slob dpon yang ni de bzhin te/ /phyag rgya'i rigs par gnas nas su/ /dri chen chu dang dpa' bo bzang / /mnyam

par bzhag nas bzlas pa bya/ /rnam pa du ma bye brag gi/ /glu dang gar ni rnam pa dang / /bza' btung mchog ni spyad par bya/ /de dag rdzogs kyi bar bya ste/ /de 'di cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /rab tu gnas pa'i dus dag tu/ /nyis 'gyur

tshogs kyis spel ba ste/ /gdu bu dang ni kang ka dang / /dpung rgyan gos kyi bye brag dang / /sor gdub dang ni mchod phyir thog / /rkang rgyan dang ni thod pa dang / /gdugs dang rnga yab de bzhin te/ /sna tshogs skyes bu sbyin

zhing dbul/ /sna tshogs dpa' bo mchog dam pa/ /myos byed btung ba'i bye brag rnams/ /dam tshig cho ga'i mchog rnams dang / /sna tshogs ro dang bcud rnams dang / /sna tshogs me tog mchog rnams dang / /lha mo mchog gi lus

lus rnams dang / /rol mo sna tshogs sgra rnams dang / /slob dpon phyag rgyar sbyor ba dang / /slob ma'i tshogs kyi khyad par rnams/ /bza' ba'i mchod ba dag gis mchod/ /bdug pa'i dri mchog rnams dang ni/ /sna tshogs rgyal ba'i

bdug pa dang / /khyad par du ni mar me'i phreng / /gdugs dang bla re de bzhin te/ /me long dang ni rnga yab dang / /dra ba dang ni dra phyed dang / /chun po dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /bum pa ras dang ldan pa dag /ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba/ /rin chen lnga dang

sman dang ni/ /dr-i yi bye brag dag gis ni/ /ar+g+ha'i snod ni khyad par du/ /cu ta pa la ba lnga dang / /a~M bu dza~M bu ka dam+ba/ /bil ba bI dza pu ras dgang / /ba la mo ta kri tany+dzaH /ke dri ka ri kar ldan ba/ /e ka byi ra sa ha de/ /sman rnams kun shes bya ba la/ /
lnga po de dag shes bya ste/ /mkhas pas bum par gzhug par bya/ /gser dang dzA ti pha la dang / /gla gor shwa sha de bzhin no/ /gser gyi mchod phyir thogs dang ni/ /

phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /bsgrub pa po kun gcer bu yis/ /bkra shis glu yis glu lan cing / /rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dad pa'i blo ni sngon 'gro bas/ /dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du/ /sna tshogs

rgya che'i mchod par bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las ras ris la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor

dam pa ste/ /mngon mtho he ru ka zhes bya/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa yin/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag sgrub pa pos/ /dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya/ /dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du/ /dbang bskur dngos

grub 'thob mi 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi mtshal dang ga pur bcas/ /dmar dang tsan dan sbyar ba ni/ /tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa ni/ /thams cad bcud kyis len du gnas/ /thams cad rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'dzin/ /sbom po mtha'

ltag rtse sbyar bas/ /rnal 'byor rim pas rtag tu spyad/ /zhi ba'i btung bas bzhin myangs na/ /dngos grub rtag tu thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni mi 'chi bcu phyed 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad 'jug pa yin/ /mchod

bzhi de bzhin dpa' bo ni/ /dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i de nyid 'dzin/ /sngon du bsnyen par bya ba ni/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzla/ /'khor lo'i gsang sngags 'bum bzlas shing / /

rang gi lha'i yang 'bum du bzla/ /gzhan ni khri ru bzla bar bya/ /bka' bzhin 'khor lo bri bya zhing / /mdangs ldan mi mchog dag gi ni/ /dkyil 'khor bri zhing dgod par bya/ /sngar bshad gnas ni gang yin pa/ /der ni dkyil

'khor bri bar bya/ /sa ni yongs su sbyang bar bya/ /brdung zhing legs par brdung nas su/ /mnyam zhing zug rngu rnam par spang / /sa la ma lhung lci ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug /dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang / /mi 'chi bcu phyed

bcas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nyer byugs te/ /der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag brtsam/ /dur khrod du ni kun spyod cing / /ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang / /dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa yis/ /slob dpon legs par mnyam

bzhag ste/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan/ /mtshan ma ngan pa kun spangs shing / /yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes/ /khro med gtsang zhing mkhas

pa dang / /sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro/ /thod pas spyi bor brgyan byas shing / /yan lag thal bas byugs pa dang / /gug skyed dag gis lus brgyan cing / /rus phreng rus par yang dag gnas/ /dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang / /rus pa'i

phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /kha T+wA~M ga ni lag na gnas/ /bdag nyid shrI he ru kar ni/ /byas nas de yi 'og tu ni/ /dpal ldan he ru ka dran bya/ /'khor lo 'di yi snying gar dgod/ /de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas/ /ra ba rnams ni phyogs su

dgod/ /'og tu'ang mtshon cha dgod par bya/ /'khor lo'i bdag nyid bkod nas ni/ /steng du mda' yi dra ba dang / /bdag nyid mtshon cha'i dra ba byas/ /de ltar go bgos sum bcu ni/ /rtsa gsum pas kyang gzhig mi nus/ /de ltar bdag nyid

rab bsrungs shing / /sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas sems med srad bu la/ /ru d+hi ra na chen pos brlan/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung grong

mchog gi/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya/ /gru bzhi pa la khru brgyad pa/ /sgo bzhi kun nas zur bzhi pa/ /sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam spyod cing / /mkha' 'gro dra ba bde mchog bzlas/ /de yi dbus su bzhag pa ni/ /'dab chags

lte ba 'bar dang bcas/ /ge sar yang dag ldan pa yi/ /sna tshogs pad ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /lte bar bkod bya dpa' bo ni/ /'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs can la/ /mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar/ /ha ha zhes byar sgra cher bzhad/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /bzang po spyan gsum

zhal bzhi mnga'/ /glang po'i pags pa rnam par bgos/ /smin ma bzang po rdo rje 'byes/ /phyag na kha T+wA~M ga bsnams shing / /brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni/ /rdo rje phag mo

zhes bya ba/ /rab 'jigs 'jigs byed che la phyogs/ /spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can bya/ /ka pA li ni an+t+ras bkang / /kha nas ru d+hi ra 'dzag c-ing / /lha dang lha min mir bcas dang / /phyogs kun tu ni sdigs

mdzub byed/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /phag mo yi ni rigs las byung / /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams ni/ /'khor lo'i lte bar mchod par bya/ /de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' bo yang / /'khor lor yang dag

gnas pa mchod/ /sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod/ /gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya/ /de nas bum pa bya ba n-i/ /rtsa ba nag po la sogs med/ /mu tig gser dang rin chen dang / /byi ru dngul dang zangs ma ste/ /bza'
ba kun gyis legs bkang ba'i/ /snod ni steng du gzhag par bya/ /mgrin pa srad bus dkri ba dang / /kha ni 'dab mas brgyan par bya/ /gos zung gis ni legs dkyis pa/ /brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod/ /gos
zung gis ni dkris pa yi/ /bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhag /gser ram dngul lam rin chen nam/ /mu tig rnams ni mdzes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen dang / /gser rnams kyis ni mdzes par spyad/ /

grong mchog yid 'ong mchod nas ni/ /grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /bdag nyid kyi ni gdong lus kun/ /dri yi chu yis legs par bsang / /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /mar me brgya ni dbul bar bya/ /nam mkha'i
mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /yid kyis thams cad steng du dgod/ /sa stengs mkha' 'gro ma gang yin/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu dgod par bya/ /gang yang sa 'og rnams su dgod/ /ma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni/ /

phyogs mtshams rnams su dgod par bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dri dang me tog bdug spos dang / /mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing / /dpal ldan khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor gnas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mchod bya/ /rgyal mtshan

dmar dang de bzhin ser/ /dkar dang gnag dang ser skya dang / /de bzhin gos ni sna tshogs dang / /me tog phreng ba du ma dang / /bla re dag dang dar bcas pa'i/ /mda' ni shin tu mdzes pa dang / /de bzhin bza' bca' gtung ba yis/ /rab mnyam bzhag

ste mchod par bya/ /de nas sgrub pos dngos grub kyi/ /dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya/ /grub 'dod shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /ci nus par ni bla ma mchod/ /dril dbyangs me tog spos kyis brgyan/ /shin tu sgra snyan dril bu dkrol/ /

sgrub pa po yis rnga brdungs zhing / /ha ha zhes ni brjod par bya/ /de ltar cho ga bzhin dkyil 'khor/ /'dod pa kun ldan mchod nas ni/ /de yi bu sdug gdong la ni/ /dar gyis legs par bkab nas su/ /me tog gis bkang thal mo dag /pad mas

gtor nas bskor ba ni/ /g.yon phyogs bskor nas phyag byas te/ /hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra yang brjod/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis/ /dngos grub sras po gzhag par bya/ /thal mo me tog gtor nas ni/ /gang du 'babs pa'i bsam pa ni/ /

skor ba dag kyang byas nas su/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /sgrub pa po yis byas nas gzhug /de nas yon thogs grong khyer du/ /g.yas pa'i phyogs su brten nas ni/ /snyim pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor dor/ /dkyil

'khor gang du me tog babs/ /de yi rigs ni bstan par bya/ /de nas slob dpon legs par ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag ste phyag rgya mchod/ /de nas slob ma gnyis pa la/ /mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis/ /de la thig le bya

ba yin/ /de nas slob ma'i gdong phye la/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya/ /gang gi lha yi gnas gang yin/ /der de yang dag bstan par bya/ /slob dpon dang ni lhan cig tu/ /rab tu btud pa byas nas ni/ /g.yon nas brtsams

pa'i rim pa yis/ /de nas skor ba rab tu bya/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la/ /ji bzhin cho gas phyag bya'o/ /de nas bla ma dag la yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pas dbul/ /gser ni brgya stong dbul ba

dang / /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang / /glang po rta 'am yul 'khor ram/ /rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang / /mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang / /gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs/ /chung ma bzang

dang bu mo nyid/ /bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams/ /phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya/ /deng nas brtsams te bran du ni/ /khyed la bdag ni 'bul lags zhes/ /blo ldan kun nas dang ba yis/ /bdag nyid kyang ni dbul

bar bya/ /de ltar nges par bya ba ni/ /sgrub pa po yis rab nges byas/ /de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /

sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig /de dang rnam spyod 'gro ba kun/ /sgrub pa po ni de dag gi/ /ci bgyi byed par the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni grub 'gyur na/ /'jig rten gsum du mi zlogs shing / /mi snang
phug dang gnas mkha' rgyu/ /rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len/ /sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis/ /rtag par rgyun du skyed par 'gyur/ /gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang / /nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /

mkha' 'gro la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi khyed par du/ / des gnon 'gro ba thams cad kyang / /lan gcig bltas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /skad cig gis ni sbyor nyid skyed/ /sngags pas dkyi 'khor ma

mthong bar/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod/ /mkha' la khu tshur gyis rdeg dang / /smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thung dang mtshungs/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang / /sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin/ /gang zhig rtag tu 'dod

gyur pa/ /de ni lha mi zil gnon 'gro/ /de nyid bsdus par gyur pa'am/ /gsang ba'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bshad dang ma bshed gang yang rung / /de kun dpal

ldan khrag 'thung gnas/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sbyor ba'i mtshams dang yang dag ldan/ /chu med pa ni mtshams

yin te/ /gos pa med cing chags spangs pa/ /mtshams ni 'byung po thams cad pa/ /de ni sems can thams cad de/ /mtshams ni srid pa dag pa ste/ /dbyangs skyong he ru ka nyid yin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgoms shing bzla/ /cig

car 'byung bar snang ba ste/ /dung dang kun da'i mdog kyang 'dzin/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa ste/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /spyin gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams/ /skra

grol dpral bar thod pa ste/ /spyi gtsug tu ni zla ba'o/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag ldan/ /mtshams rnams grub pa'i mchog dam pa/ /thun bzhi ru ni bya ba'o/ /dga' ba bzhi po dga' ba dang / /lte ba'i snying pad nu ma'i dbus/ /lce yi rtsa

dang mgo steng du/ /dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid/ /dam par dga' dang lhan cig skyes/ /dang po 'dab ma drug bcu bzhi/ /gnyis pa brgyad pa mchog yin te/ /gsum pa 'dab ma bcu drug pa/ /bzhi pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis

'dab/ /phag mo'i lte ba'i rtsar gnas pa/ /lhan cig skyes dga' khrag 'thung mchog /sbyor ba'i dus kyi mtshams su ni/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi bsgom par bya/ /sdug bsngal sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /kun 'byung chos

kyi 'khor lo yin/ /'gog pa longs spyod 'khor lo ste/ /lam ni bde ba chen po yin/ /de ltar mtshams su byin brlabs nas/ /rnal 'byor nges pa byas pa ste/ /dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba dang / /spyan gsum thugs rje stong pa'i nyams/ /

rnam thar gsum dang sku gsum gyis/ /yongs su dag par rim par sbyor/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /mgo bo gri gug phyag na bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /zla ba yi dgas pad dbus

su/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can yin/ /dgyes pa'i nyams kyis myos pa ste/ /dus rtag tu ni mtshams bsgoms na/ /sdom pa mchog ni grub pa yin/ /dri chen rdo rje chu dang ni/ /rin chen snang ba mtha' yas dang / /don yod grub pa'ang de bzhin

te/ /de dag rtag tu bsres nas su/ /rnal 'byor rtag tu mtshams la 'dud/ /gsang sngags 'di dag rtag tu yang / /he ru ka ni dbyangs skyong mchog /oM shrI he ru ka ya bid ma he bid+yA rA dza ya bid ma he ta n+no bI rA pra dzo da ya AHhU~M/ rtag tu mtshams

ni rnam bsgoms na/ /dbyangs skyong mchog gi bzlas pa bya/ /dbyangs skyong ming ni rig byed de/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ /dus min 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing / /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang yang 'grub/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /

don ni sngags pa rtag tu smra/ /dngos grub 'di ni rab tu 'grub/ /de ma thag tu grub chen bcas/ /'jig rten gsum po 'grub pa yin/ /sgrub po'i dbang pos rnam bsgoms te/ /khrag 'thung cho ga bzhin shes nas/ /zhag gsum

brtul zhugs la gnas na/ /lha yi gnas su 'gro ba yin/ /lha y+hi yi shes thob nas ni/ /lha yi lus kyi mchog kyang 'dzin/ /ngag rnams kun la dbang thob cing / /thams cad mkhyen par gyur nas su/ /rga dang 'chi ba rnam

par spangs/ /sangs rgyas lha yis bsten pa ste/ /srid par sangs rgyas rol par mdzad/ /nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du yang / /phyag rgya lhan cig 'byung ba spyad/ /mthong nas sring mo yang dag bsgrub/ /zhag gsum bar du mchod

byas nas/ /rdo rje he ru ka dpal lha/ /thams cad kyang ni 'byon par 'gyur/ /pus mo sa la brtsug nas ni/ /de yis phyag ni byas nas kyang / /sgrub pos rtag tu mchod par bya/ /sgrub po 'dod la dga' bas ni/ /mod la dpa'

bos thams cad mkhyen/ /gtso bo thams cad 'dzin pa ste/ /khams gsum kun tu rnam spyod cing / /sgrub pa po ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /'di ni dpal chen dpa' bo ste/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de ni rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sa gzhi ska

rags kyis bskor ba/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams kyang / /bsgrub pa po ni de nyid kyi/ /mod la dbang du gyur ba yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dbyangs skyong gi mtshams kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad

bya ba/ /yi ge bdun pa sgom pa ste/ /yi ge hU~M las yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba che/ /phyag drug zhal gsum spyan gsum pa/ /mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan cing / /dpe byed bzang po brgyad bcur ldan/ /A

li kA li las byung gtso/ /phag mo dang ni mnyam par ldan/ /stong zhing thugs rjes khyab pa ste/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan/ /nA ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing / /g.yas pa'i phyag na mdung

rtse gsum/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang / /zla ba phyed pa'i spyi gtsug 'chang / /phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan/ /'jigs byed chung mar

bcas pa dag /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan/ /sna tshogs pad ma nyi steng bzhugs/ /'khor lo drug gi dbus su bzhugs/ /rnal 'byor ma drug mnyam par sbyar/ /myur du dngos grub stsol ba yin/ /dang po

khrag 'thung lha mo ste/ /gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma/ /gsum pa drag gtum ma yin te/ /bzhi pa rdo rje nyi ma mo/ /lnga pa rdo rje drag mo ste/ /drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /g.yon gyi phyogs nas dgod par bya/ /

lha mo de dag cher gtum zhing / /spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa yin/ /thams cad yi dgas nyi stengs bzhugs/ /sngo zhing ser la ljang ba dang / /dmar dang dud kha de bzhin dkar/ /

cang te'u dang ni dril bu 'dzin/ /thams cad na ra'i pags pa 'dzin/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul gyis bzhugs/ /yi ge drug las yang dag byung / /lha mo gzigs pa mtshan

ma yin/ /ji ltar mgon bo'i mdog bzhin du/ /phag mo yang ni de bzhin te/ /phyag rgya phyag mtshan de bzhin no/ /sngo dang ser dang ljang ba dang / /stag gi pags pa gos su man bas/ /lha mo'i byin par mnyam par 'khril/ /

mchog tu dga' bar rnam par mos/ /oM hrIHha ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ yi ge de las mkha' 'gro ma/ /yan lag drug pa rnam par bsgom/ /bdun pa dbus su dgod pa ni/ /yi ge hU~M las he ru ka /dbus su dran pa yang dag

byang chub kyi yan lag ste bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o/ /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje he ru ka ma'o/ /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o/ /dga'

ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni drag gtum ma'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje nyi ma ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje drag mo'o/ /btang snyoms yang dag

byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste/ byang chub yan lag 'di bdun bsgom/ /ji lta'i rim pas sbyor zhing sgom/ /gsang sngags gzhal med pa bzlas shing / /khro bo kun gyi gnas mchog ste/ /bsod

nams chung ba'i sgrub pos kyang / /zla phyed nang du dngos grub ste/ /rtag tu zhag re bsgoms pa ni/ /zhag bdun gyis ni the tshom med/ /dpyid zla tha chungs nya la ni/ /ma sring bu mo tsha mo dang / /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /nyin

mtshan bzlas shing bsgoms byas pas/ /tho rangs dpal khrag 'thung mnyam 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las nye ba'i snying po bsgom pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //

gzhan yang snying po bshad bya ba/ /sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa/ /hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba/ /bde ba chen po bde las byung / /sngo zhing dkar la drag po ste/ /zhal brgyad pa la shin tu 'jigs/ /spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu drug /

mgo yi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba phyed pa'i ral pa 'chang / /sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la mnan/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la rgyan/ /'jigs byed chen po 'jigs pa ni/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs

kyis gnon/ /dus mtshan shin tu 'jigs pa yang / /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnon/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /phag mo yi ni ku tsa 'tshir/ /tshangs lpags bshus nas rgyan du 'dzin/ /mdung rtse gsum dang dgra sta dang / /

kha T+wA~M cang te'u gri gug mchog /brgyad pa la ni lcags kyu thogs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag rnams de bzhin no/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M ga /mgo bo zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /tho bas sdigs mdzub dam pa ste/ /shrI yi ye shes

yang dag rdzogs/ /pang du phag mo'i gzugs yin te/ /drag cing dmar la dkar ba yin/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /skra grol ba la spyan gsum pa/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi zhal dang phyag du

gnas/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /phyogs kyi gos can chags pas gzigs/ /rked pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya yang che/ /sngo zhing dkar la de bzhin dmar/ /ser zhing ljang la

du kha ste/ /du ba thal ba sprin gyi mdog /'di 'dra'i zhal dang gzugs su gnas/ /lha mo mda' dang gzhu 'dzin cing / /tshangs pa'i pags pa rnam par spangs/ /sna tshogs pad ma'i steng du ni/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su bzhugs/ /
khor lo brgyad pa'i dbus bzhugs par/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnam par sgom/ /pad ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /bcom ldan 'das ni nges par dgod/ /oM ni shar gyi 'dab ma la/ /gsal byed mkha' 'gro

ma yang dgod/ /ba ni byang gi 'dab la ste/ /rta gdong mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod/ /dzra ni rdo rje drag mo ste/ /mkha' 'gro nub tu dgod par bya/ /he ru lho phyogs 'dab la dgod/ /gser gyi mdog can mkha' 'gro ma/ /

ser dang sngo bsangs dkar dang dmar/ /zhal gsum rnam bsgyur drag po ste/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /ro yi steng du bzhugs pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis bdud bzhi 'joms/ /thod pa'i phreng ba drag po ste/ /pad

ma sbom po'i 'dab ma la/ /chags pa'i spyan gyis gzigs shing bzhed/ /thugs rje'i nyams kyis bde ba yin/ /mda' dang gzhu yang 'chang ba ste/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i mchog /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M bsnams/ /

cang te'u ni sgra yang sgrogs/ /ser dang ljang gu sngo ba dang / /sngo bsangs dmar dang dkar ba dang / /dkar dang ljang gu sngo ba dang / /dmar dang sngo dang ljang ba ste/ /'di ltar mdog ni khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig mchog ni bsgom par

bya/ /mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag /byang chub sems kyis gang bar bzhag /shar gyi phyogs su he yin te/ /ming ni he li ka zhes bya/ /byang gi phyogs su ru yin te/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ru tsa ki/ /nub kyi
phyogs su ru yin te/ /ru tsa ka ma li zhes bya/ /lho yi phyogs su ka yin te/ /keng rus ma zhes grags pa yin/ /me yi phyogs su hU~M mdzad ma/ /bden bral phyogs su phaT mdzad ma/ /rlung gi phyogs
su Da ma ri/ /dbang ldan ki li ki la ste/ /de brgyad lha mo chen mo ste/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ji ltar zhal dang gzugs bzhin du/ /de bzhin 'dir yang 'gyur ba yin/ /thod pa

dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos can g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /

rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag ldan/ /drag cing gtum la rab 'jigs par/ /thams cad ro yi steng bzhugs sgom/ /spyan gsum pa la chags par myos/ /dbang ldan zur la ut+pal sngon po zhes bya ba/ /rlung gi phyogs la

dra ba'i mchog ces bya ba ste/ /bden bral phyogs la gsus pa 'phyang ma zhes bya ba/ /me yi phyogs la sha ba ri zhes bya ba ste/ /ser dang sngo bsangs sngo ba dang / /dmar ser dang ni bzhi pa ste/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M

'dzin/ /gri gug cang te'u mchog yin te/ /bzhi ba rdo rje mdung yin no/ /phyogs kyi gos can chags pas rol/ /bzang mo lto ba 'phyang ma ste/ /skye gnas ring la rgya yang che/ /spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur zhing

drag /skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spud pa'o/ /shar sgor ba~M las gtum ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / lho'i sgor ra~M las rol btum

mo zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / nub kyi sgor sa las 'bar ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dgod do/ /byang gi sgor ha las phreng ba rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ sngo dang

dkar ser nyid yin te/ /lcags kyu dang ni cang te'u 'dzin/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga bsnams te/ /gri gug mgo bo bsdigs mdzub dang / /dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba dang / /zhags pa dang ni cang te'u 'dzin/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin

cing / /bsdigs mdzub gri gug mgo bo 'dzin/ /dmar dang sngo dang ljang gu ste/ /lcags sgrog cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing / /mgo bo dang ni bsdigs mdzub mchog /ljang dang dkar po

'dres pa dang / /ser dang dmar ba'i zhal mchog yin/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa dang / /mgo bo dang ni bsdigs mdzub phyag /skra grol ba la gdug pa che/ /spyan gsum rnam par

'gyur ba'i zhal/ /zhal gdangs ljags ni bskyod pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /ro dang pad ma'i nyi dbus bzhugs/ /

mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing / /mgo bo'i do shal rnams kyis brgyan/ /mi bskyod pa yi cod pan 'ching / /rnam sgyur spyan ni g.yo ba ste/ /yi ge nyi shu gnyis las byung / /snying gar mchog ni

bsgom par bya/ /'di ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis mchog /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru ka~M hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sa~M ba ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ yi gi re re dgod pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying de bzhin/ /hU~M shrI lha dang

lha mo ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba'o/ /dbus su rnam dag bcom ldan 'das/ /bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya/ /rnam par thar brgyad sgo sna tshogs/ /gzugs su lta ba stong pa ste/ /nang gzugs med par phyi

rol gzugs su blta ba'ang stong pa yin/ /sdug dang mi sdug mthong bar byed pa blta ba'ang stong pa yin/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dag tu blta ba'ang stong pa ste/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag tu blta ba'ang

stong pa yin/ /ci yang med pa'i skye mched dag tu blta ba'ang stong pa yin/ /'du shes med cing 'du shes med min skye mched rnams kyang stong pa'o/ /'du shes dang ni tshor ba'ang 'gog par lta ba stong pa yin/ /phyag bcu drug pa'ang stong pa

ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ci ltar bcom ldan

'das bzhin du/ /phag mo yang ni de bzhin te/ /gnyis med gzugs can bcom ldan 'das/ /he ru ka dpal rnam par shes/ /phag mo nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /lha mo bzhi yi rnam dag pa/ /gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni/ /don rnams so

so yang dag rig /rta gdong ma ni gang yin pa/ /chos rnams so so yang dag rig /rdo rje drag mo mkha' 'gro ma/ /nges tshig so so yang dag rig /gser mdog can gyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /spobs pa so so yang dag rig /lha mo
de dag 'dab ma'i dbus/ /rton pa rnam pa bzhi po ni/ /he le ka ni don la rton pa ste/ /ru tsa ki ni tshig 'bru rton pa yin/ /ru tsa ka mai le ni ye shes ston/ /keng rus ma ni rnam shes rton pa yin/ /

shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho phyogs kyi ni 'khor lo la/ /chos kyi mdo ni bzhi po dgod/ /hU~M ni 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o/ /phaT ni 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o/ /Da ma ri ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'o/ /

ki li kI la ni chos thams cad zhi ba'o/ /me dang bden bral rlung dang ni/ /dbang ldan 'khor lo de dag kun/ /lha mo yis ni rnam par dag /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po'i chos thams cad rtogs pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni ut+pa la

sngon po ma'o/ /chos thams cad ston pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni dran pa'i mchog go/ /nges par 'byung ba'i lam la 'jug pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni gsus pa 'phyang ma'o/ /zag pa zad pa shes pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni sa ba ri

ma'o/ /mtshams su dkyil 'khor lha mo ni/ /'di yis zur bzhi rnam par dag /sgo bzhi dag tu lha mo ni/ /gtum byed ma ste dad pa'i dbang po'o/ /rol gtum ma ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ /'bar mchog ma ni dran pa'i

dbang po'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu ni/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'o/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams ni/ /'phags pa shes rab bcom ldan 'das/ /

rdo rje phag mo nyid yin no/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi snying po bsgoms pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni rnam dag pa/ /

'byung ba kun gyi spyan yin te/ /rnam par snang mdzad thig tu grags/ /b+ha gas khyab pa'i rim pa ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig tu shes/ /dus ni sna tshogs rigs su shes/ /mchod pa sna tshogs cho ga bzhin/ /pul+lIr

ma pad ma ma'o/ /dzA laM d+ha ra thugs 'khor lo/ /u D+yin gsungs gi 'khor lo sta/ /a rbu de ni sku'i 'khor lo/ /go dA ba ri zur bzhi po/ /ra me shwa ra me phyogs so/ /de bi ko Ti bden bral yin/ /ma la ba~M ni rlung gi zur/ /dbang

ldan kA ma rU ba ste/ /grwa bzhi rnam par dag pa ni/ /'di la the tshom med pa yin/ /o tre dag ni shar gyi sgo'o/ /tri sha ku ni lho phyogs sgo/ /ko sa la ni nub kyi sgo'o/ /ka ling+ga ni byang sgo ste/ /shar gyi rta babs lam+bA ka /kA~M tsi

lho yi rta babs yin/ /hi ma la ya nub phyogs so/ /bre ta pu ri byang yin te/ /gri ha de ba lha snam bu/ /sau raSh+Ta ni rin chen sa/ /su bar dwI pa dra ba phyed/ /nA ga re ni rnga yab dang / /dril bu rgyal mtshan ba dan no/ /sin+d+hu rdo rje thig

zlum po/ /ma ru tsi ni sgo khyud do/ /ku lu tA ni rdo rje dang / /rin po che dang dkyil 'khor gyi/ /thig ni bla na med pa yin/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phred kyis brgyan zhing / /dar dang phreng

bas rnam par brgyan/ /zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan zhing / /sku yi 'khor lo'i sku nyid ni/ /don yod grub pa rnam par spyod/ /gsung gi 'khor lo 'od

dpag med/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo mi bskyod pa/ /pad ma'i dbus ni rin chen 'dzin/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul can ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsgom/ /tshor ba sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /'du shes gsung gi 'khor

yin/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo 'du byed de/ /rnam shes pad ma gdon mi za/ /ri mo lnga pa mchog gyur pa/ /de yis rnam dag rang bzhin can/ /sa dang ri mo thams cad kun/ /dpa' bos yongs su dag par bsgom/ /ri mo nyi shu rtsa
bzhi pa/ /de dag dpa' bos rnam par dag /'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma yis dag /lte bar phag mo'i sa bon k+ShaH/ /he ru ka dpal mchog yin no/ /'dab ma mkha' 'gro ma yis dag /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog

dag ni/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam par dag /dkyil 'khor snying po mdor bsdus na/ /dkyil 'khor dang po yi ge ste/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa phyag mtshan yin/ /gsum pa lag pa'i phyag rgyar bshad/ /bzhi pa gzugs su gyur

pa ste/ /lnga pa me tog mchod pa yin/ /drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /dbus ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /pad ma'i lte ba dang bcas pa/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo dri ma med/ /gsung gi 'khor lo 'od byed pa/ /sku yi 'khor lo 'od dro ba/ /

zur bzhi pa ni sbyang dka' ba/ /ring du song ba sgo bzhi yin/ /zur gyi cha ni mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros rdo rje'i thig /chos kyi sprin ni rta babs yin/ /'di lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /rtag tu bsgom zhing mchod par bya/ /dngos
grub rgya chen 'thob par 'gyur/ /sdom pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi de nyid ni/ /he ru ka dpal ye shes mchog /b+ha ga'i pad ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /phag mo'i sku lus mchog gyur pa/ /

de ni dkyil 'khor 'dus pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor bde chen mchog yin no/ /dkyil 'khor dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med kha sbyor dkyil 'khor yin/ /bdag gi de nyid ting 'dzin yin/ /lha yi de nyid de bzhin te/ /

sngags kyi de nyid phyag rgya yin/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog /yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing / /rtog dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs/ /phyi mo'i thig le las 'das shing / /de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /
chos rnams thams cad brtag tu med/ /chos dang chos min rnam par spyod/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni/ /rnam dag nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ /chags dang chags med chags par mnyam/ /pad ma rA
ga chu mnyam byung / /rang sems chags pa dmar po'i mchog /de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te/ /yid ni khams rnams thams cad de/ /gzugs dang gzugs med dri ma med/ /bskul zhing sad pa yid yin te/ /

sems ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin/ /dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor b+ha ga yin par bshad/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub sems yin te/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba/ /sa 'og sa stengs sa blar khyab/ /mngon par

brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dkyil 'khor gyi bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /sems can kun la phan stsol pa/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /

chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer mchog /dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa/ /dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje che/ /zhal bzhi pa la rnam par 'gyur/ /de la lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs 'khor lo lte bar bcas/ /

thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad pa ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus dag tu/ /sna tshogs pad ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam 'dres pa/ /lha yi bzhugs gnas nyi shu pa/ /lte ba'i dbus

su bstan pa ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /hU~M las he ru kar byas te/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /spyan gsum sku lus dkar po ste/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /phag mo yi ni ku tsa'ang 'tshir/ /stag gi pags

pa gos su mnabs/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /gdug pa kun gyi glad pa la/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /brgyal zhing rnam par myos pa yi/ /klad pa la ni zhabs kyis mnan/ /

gcer bu 'o dod 'bod pa mnan/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste/ /lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin pa dang / /gzhan yang cang te'u de bzhin te/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga yang 'dzin/ /gzhan du yang ni mgo bo 'chang / /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la

mnan/ /zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'chang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /mi bskyod pa yis spyi gtsug brgyan/ /tshangs pa'i do shal 'dzin pa ste/ /bdag gi khro bo bdun spros nas/ /ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin du/ /phag mo

mchog dang de bzhin te/ /sku lus nag po dmar ba'i mdangs/ /gzi byin mdangs kyis mdzes pa ste/ /gri gug thod pa kha T+wA~M ga /dril bu cang te'u mdung dang ni/ /lcags kyu zhags pa de bzhin no/ /lha mo phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ /

dkar zhing sngo la ljang ba'o/ /steng gi zhal ni dmar po mdzes/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni/ /ser zhing ljang ba'i gzugs can te/ /gzhan du bdag po ji bzhin du/ /phag mo yang ni de bzhin gyur/ /gcer bu skra ni

grol ba ste/ /ma nyams dum bu'i ska rags can/ /pad ma bzhi la mkha' 'gro ma/ /zur la bum pa thod pa ste/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo sngar bshad pa'o/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ /gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo gnyis/ /

shar dang byang nub lho ru'o/ /sgo rnams su ni sgo srungs ste/ /khwa gdong la sogs thams cad do/ /zur la gshin rje sreg la sogs/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i khyad par ni/ /rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste/ /kha cig rnal 'byor ma ru 'dod/ /

bla ma'i gnas kyi rjes rim pa/ /sngar bshad sna tshogs rigs rnams ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pas bsgom par bya/ /gzhan yang zhal dang mdog rnams ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mdog bzhin dang / /phyag mtshan phyag rgyar sngar
bshad bzhin/ /gnas sogs rim pa de ltar dgod/ /sngar bshad pa y-i cho ga bzhin/ /gsang sngags ji bzhin rim par dgod/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam dag don/ /bsgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /
A li kA li'i nang byung ba/ /bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya/ /chos dbyings grong khyer rnam dag par/ /sems can khams ni rab tu 'jug /rnal 'byor 'di ni gsang ba ste/ /su la yang ni bstan mi bya/ /

mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer bsgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /b+ha ga pad ma sgom pa ni/ /rdo rje snying pos zhus pa las/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /yang dag gsang ba nges gsang ba/ /A li kA li zur gsum gnas/ /pad ma 'dab gsum rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje phag mo he ru ka /lte ba la ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro lA

ma dang / /gsum pa dum skyes ma nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das ni dmar la sngo/ /phag mo yang ni dmar sngo ste/ /mkha' 'gro sngo la ser ba dang / /lA ma ljang la ser ba ste/ /dum skyes ma ni dmar la ser/ /zhal gcig pa la

phyag bzhi pa/ /bcom ldan mgon po zhal bzhi pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /dril bu rdo rjes legs par mtshon/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa ste/ /zhi ba

zla ba phyed pa 'chang / /mi 'khrugs pa ni spyi gtsug 'ching / /rtag par gsang ba'i gos mnabs shing / /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /phag mo'i zhal mtshan de yin te/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud cing / /
gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la/ /spyan gsum pa la legs chags 'khril/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnyis/ /zhabs kyis rnam par gnon pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /sku lus phyag rgya

drug 'dzin zhing / /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / /thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos/ /g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon ljang gu/ /steng ni sngo skya sku lus dkar/ /gzugs can ma ni b+ha gar brtag /A li kA
li b+ha ga'i mchog /gzhan yang zur gsum dbus dag tu/ /pad ma'i 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs pad ma dag tu brtag /dbus su he ru ka phag mo/ /'dab mar mkha'

'gro ma sogs dgod/ /zur du thod pa dkar po dag /thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' la spyod/ /shar gyi zur la sku 'khor lo/ /rlung gi zur gyi 'khor lo la/ /khwa gdong la sogs rnam brgyad do/ /gsung gi 'khor lo bden bral

zur/ /'khor lo bzhi po zur gsum la/ /shar ni sku yi mkha' 'gro ste/ /rlung phyogs gshin rje'i mkha' 'gro'o/ /bden bral gsung gi mkha' 'gro ste/ /dbus su rdo rje he ru ka /sngo zhing dkar po dud ka dang / /sngo zhing

dmar ba bzhi po yin/ /rang gi phyag mtshan mnyam par ldan/ /gzhan du rang bdag mdog bzhin du/ /dpa' bo 'khor lo mdog de bzhin/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dmar ba'i mdog can rnam par bsam/ /

dpa' bo'i mdog ne nag po la/ /gnyis med 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dag /sku lus dkar po rnam par bsam/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog /dpa' bo gnyis ni rab tu sbyor/ /khwa gdong gshin

rje brtan la sogs/ /gzugs gnyis phyed ni bud med de/ /rang gi thabs dang lhan cig tu/ /dgyes shing chags pas rnam par myos/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ljang gu'o/ /sngar bshad

rim pa'i mtshan ma rnams/ /de yang rigs kyi dbye bas so/ /thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing / /phyag rgya drug gi bdag po dgod/ /
thams cad rang rigs cod pan can/ /ji lta ba'i rim pas bsgom/ /mkha' 'gro'i dus kyi sbyor ba yis/ /ji lta'i rjes su rnam bsgoms nas/ /go cha'i gsang sngags dgod par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rim
rim pa dag /sngar bshad cho ga'i sbyor ba yis/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag rim pa bsgom/ /gsang zhing sba ba'i zhi gnas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i bde 'khor lo/ /rtag tu mnyam par bzhag nas su/ /sbyor ba'i mchog ni

rtag tu bsgom/ /'di ni su la'ang mi bstan te/ /de nyid su la'ang brjod mi bya/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba dag /rtag tu bsgoms na dngos grub 'gyur/ /dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bya zhing / /bza' dang bca' ba'ang spyad par bya/ /'gro zhing

'gro zhing dus kun tu/ /'char nub dag tu rnam par sbyang / /gang zhig ye shes 'di nyan pa/ /sngags pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba sbyor ba'i bsgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga

pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i ye shes mchog gyur pa/ /rigs lnga gsang sngags rgya che ba'i/ /bsgom pa bdag gis bshad pa yin/ /log pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /gang la'ang khyod kyis bshad

mi bya/ /bla ma'i rim las ji ltar bstan/ /gang gis myur du shes 'gyur ba/ /skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu/ /sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul zhing / /dad pa yang dag bskyed pa dang / /rnal 'byor spyod tshul gnas pa yin/ /lkug cing glen la

sdig ngan can/ /byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /sems can yongs su ma smin dang / /phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'chal ba/ /de dag kun gyis mi shes te/ /mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang / /khengs pa la ni rtag par dga'/ /nga rgyal

la sogs gdug sems can/ /de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi/ /spyod yul gsang ba mi shes so/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag 'jug /slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis/ /myur du dngos grub skyed phyed de/ /'phral du yid ches byed pa yin/ /sna

tshogs sdom pa shes pa yis/ /cho ga'i bya ba bstan par bya/ /srid pa gsum po ma lus ni/ /de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shes/ /mthong ba dang ni reg ba dang / /thos pa dang ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba/ /de ltar de ni the tshom med/ /lha rnams

bzlog ste bkod pa dang / /sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dang / /dkyil 'khor kun yang bzlog pa dang / /so so bsgom pa'ang mi bya ste/ /bzlog pa'i yi ge btus nas ni/ /bsgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa de/ /snying po thams
cad bsgrub pa yin/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yi ni/ /sems ni yongs su smin pa dag /'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi/ /dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin/ /bde
gshegs dbugs 'byin gsungs pa yin/ /dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa/ /bsod nams chung ba'i sngags pas kyang / /nga dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /de na srung med bza' ba med/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor bdag
po med/ /bzlas dang brtul zhugs sbyin sreg med/ /mdor na sems bsdus tshul can yin/ /gzung byas rnam shes ye shes ni/ /bla mas bstan las brtson las te/ /phyi rol gyi ni bstan bcos la/ /lam

de shin tu ring ba yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis ni/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la brtson pa/ /ston pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang / /dpa' bo'i de nyid bstan pa yin/ /skad cig rnam par rnal 'byor bdag /skad

cig rnam par phyag rgyar ldan/ /kun nas thams cad skad cig ste/ /skad cig gis ni gsang sngags brjod/ /pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /bdag nyid kyis ni gsol ba gdab/ /bcom ldan lha mos zhus pa ni/ /go 'phang

rgya che gnyis med pa/ /'di ni 'byung po kun la gnas/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rol/ /rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni/ /ci rigs bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /brtags pa'i yid kyis gzung bar gyis/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag

bzhugs par/ /gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid/ /dkyil 'khor lus ni yin par bshad/ /de ni sgo dgu dag tu 'gyur/ /de la lte ba'i 'khor lo che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad/ /rdo rje can ni der zhugs

pa/ /cha med cha ni rnam spangs pa/ /lus can rnams kyi nang na rol/ /lus las 'das shing gos pa med/ /la lar gzugs can dag tu bzhugs/ /la lar sna dang ngag dag dang / /la lar rna bar sgra dag dang / /la

lar dri chen rdo rje chu/ /la lar tshor bar bcas pa'i sems/ /la lar skom dang la lar bkres/ /la lar khro dang la lar zhi/ /la lar bde la rnam par gzigs/ /la lar bud med 'dod chags te/ /la lar gsod dang 'joms pa

ste/ /la lar rol mo brdung bar mdzad/ /la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas/ /la lar rol cing spyod par 'gyur/ /la lar srog tu rnam par gnas/ /la lar sa dang chu dang me/ /la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga/ /la lar rigs kyi bye

brag gis/ /bram ze dang ni gdol pa dag /la lar ma dang sring mo ru/ /la lar chung ma bu mo ru/ /la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang / /khyab 'jug dang ni nyi ma nyid/ /la lar zla ba skar mar bcas/ /la lar nyin dang mtshan mor
gyur/ /la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun/ /byed pa po dang mi zad rgyal/ /la lar zhi ba'i dbang gis zhum/ /mi gsal stong pa'i rdo rje can/ /la lar byang chub chen por gshegs/ /la lar pha

rol bdud las rgyal/ /la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa'o/ /la lar nad chen gyis zin pa/ /la lar rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /la lar sngo dang le brgan dang / /la lar dkar dang ser ba'o/ /la lar

sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ /la lar spyan dang mA ma kI/ /la lar dka' zlog zhi ba mo/ /la lar mdab chags mkha' lding dang / /nam mkha' dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid/ /la lar klu dang

sbrul chen po/ /la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang ni/ /la lar rmi lam mthong ba dang / /la lar gnyid kyis log pa nas/ /la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang / /la lar khrag dang lpags par 'gyur/ /la lar mya ngan du ba dang / /la lar

sreg pa'i me dag yin/ /la lar mtho ris skye ba ste/ /rnam par 'phrul ba 'di lta bu/ /thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs 'di la/ /lha gang cha ni rnam spangs pa'i/ /de yi sgyu ma'i sna tshogs 'di'o/ /rtag pa min pa rdo rje

can/ /gzugs med par ni b+ha ga'i nang / /lte ba'i nang na pad ma che/ /bcu drug thig gis thig gdab bar/ /yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas/ /kha sbyar bya ba byas pa yin/ /de dbus rtag tu gsang ba che/ /'byin dang sdud par byed

pa'o/ /de nyid rang nyid rdo rje can/ /gcig pu rang byung che ba'i lha/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes/ /mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba'i mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /

thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad pa'am/ /mi 'gyur ba yi lam bshad pa/ /skra yi nyag ma brgya yi cha/ /mchog gi gzugs can bsam pa ste/ /stong pa ma yin dmigs su med/ /ye ge med cing stong pa'ang med/ /gos

pa med cing sa bon med/ /gzugs med mtshan ma'ang mad pa ste/ /rnam shes rang gi dngos po ni/ /rnam shes ye shes dag tu gzung / /thams cad gsal byed sgron ma ni/ /dang po'i mtshan ma dag tu blta/ /gsal byed

klog gi cha tsam ste/ /mtshan ma gnyis pa dag tu brtag /dkar po'i 'od kyi tshul can ni/ /phyogs bcu dag tu blta byas te/ /nyon mongs 'byin pa gsungs pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag /'dod pa'i

lha yi longs spyod ni/ /bzhi pa rnam shes dag tu bstan/ /gzugs dang reg sogs lha mo ni/ /phyogs kyi ye shes lnga po yin/ /drug pa gzugs med ye shes te/ /bdun pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings/ /brgyad par rang
nyid 'dod bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu dag yin no/ /sbas pa lta dang lag pa dang / /'khyud dang gnyis gnyis la sogs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin gsungs/ /dgu pa bla ma bla ma ste/ /thams

cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin/ /rnam pa gzhan dag rtswa dang 'dra/ /de nyid srog chags rnams kyis srog /de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin/ /de nyid thams cad khyab byed de/ /lus kun la ni rnam par gnas/ /de nyid

sangs rgyas ye shes te/ /he ru ka dpal yin par bshad/ /skyes pa ma ning la sogs nyid/ /phra ba'i snying po'ang 'dzin pa yin/ /ye shes rtag tu 'byung de la/ /gang zhig sa la gnas rnams dang / /bstan bcos dag ni ma
lus dang / /rig byed grub mthar gnas pa rnams/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu/ /de med par ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rig byed grub pa'i mtha' rnams la/ /'di ni snying po rab tu bshad/ /'dug dang ldang ba

nyid dang ni/ /'jug pa rdzogs pa nyid dag dang / /byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang / /ting 'dzin mchod pa bsdus pa yin/ /de nas cho ga ming gzhan pa/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /de nyid tu ni
kun skyes pa/ /'byin dang sdud par byed pa yin/ a A/ i I/ u U/ ri rI/ li lI/ e ai/ o au/ a~M aH ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/

ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha k+ShaH 'di ni bcom ldan lha de yin/ /mchog nyid lhag par gnas pa yin/ /lha kun gyi ni skyed pa dang / /bsgrub byas de bzhin shes byas nas/ /

don dam mchog kyang de bzhin te/ /brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi theg pa ste/ /sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas na/ /des ni 'di ni nges rgyal te/ /thams cad shes rab thabs kyis 'gro/ /thog mar gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /
dge dang mi dge gang yin pa/ /de ni lha tshogs rgyan yin te/ /sku rags gnas rnams thams cad yin/ /rtag tu 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/ /chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa yin/ /A li kA li mdun bsams na/ /rnal

'byor chen po ngal bsos te/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid de/ /sems kyang brtag par mi bya'o/ /sams de nyid kyang mi bsam ste/ /des na 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis rgyud kun las gsang ba/ /khyod
la yang ni bshad pa yin/ /'di ni 'bad pas sba bya ste/ /gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i sdom/ /rnal 'byor ma sogs thams cad dang / /dpa' bo'i yan lag thams cad kyi/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bras bu 'thob/ /

srid pa'i nang nas 'byung ba yin/ /bla ma'i rgyud kyi thabs la ni/ /bsnyen bkur med pa la mi bshad/ /gal te bshad na sdug bsngal zhing / /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems kyang 'khor/ /sems ni rnam 'khor rnal

'byor pa/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi mthong ngo / /ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yid rang / /kun smra bsten pa'i gtam yang brjod par byed/ /lam yang ma bshad 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang

'dra bar bshad/ /he ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag /sku kun brtan g.yo bdag nyid can/ /gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med/ /zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya/ /nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba/ /'dun pa mngon

du gyur pa nyid/ /nye ba'i 'dun pa sbyang dka' ba/ /'dus pa ring du song ba yin/ /nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba/ /dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid/ /nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/ /shrI he ru ka'i gzhung spyod pa/ /'di ni
nang gi bdag can sa/ /pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor ma ni brda yi skad/ /mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og tu/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag /thogs med dus su gang bstan pa/ /phyi nang
bdag nyid can du gnas/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che/ /'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing / /kun tu mig dang mgo bo'i zhal/ /kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na/ /
thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba/ /bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin/ /de nas

gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste/ /dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni/ /nga yis rgyud du sbas pa yin/ /gos ni phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /shes rab yan lag phur bu 'dra/ /A li kA li zhes brjod pa/ /

rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro yin/ /'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas/ /ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid/ /bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das/ /lag pa'i mchod pas dbang bskur ba/ /go cha chen pos yang dag bsrung / /

sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa yin/ /de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin/ /mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing / /

skye dang rga bas bde gshegs kyi/ /rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur/ /de ltar cho ga ldan byas na/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /zla ba nya la sa steng du/ /'di ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/ /
de yi bsod nams gyur pa yin/ /lha klu mi la sogs pa kun/ /de yi bsod nams gang gyur des/ /bdag gzhan yang dag ye shes ldan/ /bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam/ /klog cing 'don dang bris pa
yis/ /mtho ris longs spyod 'thob 'gyur ba'am/ /yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ /dpal ldan khrag mthung sogs mkha' 'gro/ /lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs/ /
rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang / /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs glu yi ma mod pas mchod/ /'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer/ /de 'dra'i dpal

chen rnal 'byor pa/ /sa stengs du ni rnyed par dka'/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i yi ge bskyed cing bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /cho ga
'i rim bzhin sngags btu ba/ /gcig tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mkhas pas sa ni mnyams nas su/ /bshang gci yis ni byug par bya/ /ma hA rag ta byug nas kyang / /bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas/ /rigs ngan
shan pa mo blangs nas/ /me tog la sogs gdab par bya/ /dpa' bo chen po'i bdug spos dbul/ /zhag la sogs pa mar me sbar/ /cang te'u dril bu brdung bar bya/ /glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya/ /lha yi

rol mo'i bye brag dang / /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /lus ni phyag rgya drug dang ldan/ /A li kA li mnyam byas te/ /sde tshan la ni thim par bya/ /bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas la/ /thub pa'i mchog gis rgyas

par bya/ /der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya/ /don 'dod thams cad grub byed pa/ /bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /

de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ /bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang / /sum bcu pa ni yang dag blang / /nyi shu drug pa nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed dang / /

de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / /dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /dang po yi ni gsum pa nyid/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa

dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /dang po yi ni dang po dang / /de bzhin bcu gcig
pa nyid dang / /de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa/ /gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /bzhi pa'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /uSh+ma yi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /dang po'i dang po

gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo / /dang po yi ni gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /de bzhin sum bcu rtsa gcig blang / /bcwa lnga pa ni nyid dag dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa

lnga pa/ /dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang / /yi ge sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ /uSh+ma Na ni tha ma nyid/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni bzhi

pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang / /gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /an+ta s+tha yi dang po dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /an+ta s+thA yi gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin yang ni sum

bcu pa/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / uSh+ma yi ni dang po nyid/ /de bzhin yi ge d+ya nyid dang / /bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /uSh+ma'i dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ /dang po'i gnyis pa gang

yin dang / /gsum pa'i dang po nyid dag dang / /dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gang yin dang / /an da s+tha yi gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa'i yang ni lnga pa dang / /yi ge bya ni de nas blang / /

dang po yi ni bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dag /de nas brgyad pa nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /nyi shu rtsa gsum pa yang blang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa

bdun dang / /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /slar yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga yang dag blang / /sum bcu rtsa gsum nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni

lnga pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi mnyam pa blang / /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /an da s+tha yi bzhi pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig

pa/ /uSh+ma yi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /thog ma yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /thog ma yi ni dang po dang / /

mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /bzhi pa yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /

lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /bzhi pa yi ni gnas su bya/ /lnga pa yi ni thog ma la/ /steng du sbyar zhing me dang bcas/ /uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi thog ma dang / /bzhi pa yi ni thog ma la/ /gzi brjid

can gyis gdan du byas/ /bdun pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /drug pa yi yang dang po ste/ /ka dang sha yi yi ge ni/ /thog ma dag ni blangs nas su/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi dang po ste/ /de bzhin

yang ni bsdus te blang / /drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /bdun pa yi ni dang po dang / /uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa blang / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dag /rdo rje sems dpas phye ba yin/ /uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa nyid/ /nyi ma yang
ni gdan du byas/ /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /me yi 'og tu sbyar bar bya/ /gshegs su gsol dang yang dag ldan/ /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa nyid/ /drug pa yi ni gnyis de
bzhin/ /bcu gcig pa dang nyi shu gnyis/ /gsum pa'i dang po blangs nas ni/ /bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bdun pa'i bzhi pa blang

bar bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig de blangs nas/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi yang thog ma dang / /gnyis pa yi ni yi ge drug /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /k+Sha yi yi ge de bzhin no/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi

de blangs nas/ /slar yang bsdu ba bshad pa yin/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Na ni gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /nyi mas slar yang bdab par bya/ /

yi ge nyi shu btab nas ni/ /bcu drug pa yis stan du byas/ /'og tu me yi gzi brjid can/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /mthar

gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /nyi shu rtsa lnga pa yis dbye/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /gnyis pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /nyi ma'i bu yis rnam par dbye/ /uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa dang / /dang po yi ni gsum pa la/ /gzi

brjid kyis ni gdan du byas/ /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /bcwa lnga pa yis gdan gnyis bya/ /uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni thog ma la/ /bcu drug pa yis gdan du bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig de yis

blangs/ /bzhi pa yi ni thog ma dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /dang po
yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa nyid/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig de bzhin te/ /nyi ma yis ni mnyam par mnan/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /gsum pa yi ni
gsum pa la/ /gzi brjid kyis ni gsal bar bya/ /mthar gnas pa yi thog mar shes/ /der yang bcu drug pa yis gdab / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /

dang po yi ni gnyis pa dang / /thog ma yi yang dang po dang / /bzhi pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /thog ma yi yang dang po dang / /gnyis pa yi yang dang po dang / /de bzhin du ni bcu bzhi pa'o/ /bcu bzhi uSh+ma bzhi pa
dang / /nyi shu rtsa bdun gdan du byas/ /ya sogs brgyad po'i sa bon dang / /nyi ma yi ni gzi brjid can/ /gsum pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /bcwa lnga pa yis gdan du bya/ /gnyis pa yi yang gsum
