pa dang / /gsum pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /ka sha'i yi ge sa bon te/ /nyi shu lnga pa gdan du byas/ /slar yang bsdu bar bya ba ste/ /sku ni legs par btu ba ste/ /dbang chen gyis ni gdan du bya/ /uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa

dang / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /ya tshogs brgyad po'i sa bon dang / /de bzhin sum bcu gsum pa nyid/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum de bzhin te/ /lnga pa'i bdag nyid kun bsdu ba'o/ /de nas kyang ni btu bya ba/ /
gnyis pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /gnyis pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ /bdun
pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi pa ste/ /ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ban d+ha ban d+ha

trA sa ya trA sa ya/ /k+Sho b+ha ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya/ hrau hrau/ hraHhraH/ phe~M phe~M/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra/ an dra/ mA lA ba la~M wi ne/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sap+ta pA tA la ga ta/ b+hU dza~M ga sarba~M bA

tardza ya tardza ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ hrI~M hrI~M/ dz+nyo~M dz+nyo~M/ k+Sh+mA~M k+Sh+mA~M/ hA~M hA~M/ hI hI/ hU~M hU~M/ ki li ki li/ si li si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po gsang
sngags te/ /bya ba thams cad sgrub byed pa'o/ /'di las shin tu mchog gyur pa/ /'jig rten gsum na yod min te/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung sngags shes na/ /gzhan dag snying po med rtswar mtshungs/ /
rtsa ba'i sngags su bshad pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i rdo rgyus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //
gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis/ /snying po'i yig bdun nye snying po/ /ya tshogs brgyad po'i sa bon dang / /de bzhin gug skyed bcu gnyis kyis/ /yi ge bar ma dor byas pa/ /yan lag drug ni he
ru ka /dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /re'u mig drug tu bsgom pa ste/ /he ru ka yi bdag por 'gyur/ /yi ge gcig tu yang dag gnas/ /oM na maHswA hA bau Sha Ta/ /hU~M hU~M phaT dang yang dag ldan/ /

sgrub pos snying por shes par bya/ /dang po snying ka nyid du ste/ /gnyis pa spyi bor shes par bya/ /gsum pa spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar/ /bzhi pa go char gyur pa yin/ /lnga pa mig tu gyur pa ste/ /drug pa mtshon
cha zhes byar 'dod/ /de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum nyid/ /yi ge gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge drug pas brgyan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pa nyid kyang ni/ /yi
ge bdun pa nyid kyang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ /mkhas pas yi ge brgyad par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba'i/ /yi ge dgu pa brgyan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis
pa nyid/ /yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni/ /yi ge nyi shu gcig pa gzung / /mkhas pas yi ge bcu bzhi pa/ /yi ge nyi shu pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi gsum
pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge bcwa lnga pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcwa lngar yang dag ldan/ /yi ge bcu drug pa mdzes bya/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa'i/ /yi ge bcu bdun pa ru 'dod/ /dbyangs kyi
gnyis pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge bcwa brgyad bar du sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge nyi shu gcig par sbyar/ /phyi mo'i lnga pa dang yang sbyar/ /yi ge nyi shu gsum par sbyar/ /dbyangs

yig bcu gsum pa nyid ni/ /yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar/ /sde tshan dang po blangs nas ni/ /yi ge nyi shu lnga par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan par/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug 'gyur/ /yi ge nyi shu
brgyad dag ni/ /yi ge bcwa lnga pa dang sbyar/ /gsum pa'i dang por yang dag ldan/ /'og gi cha ni me dang bcas/ /de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ /yi ge sum
bcu rtsa gcig par/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /yi ge sum bcu gnyis pa yang / /dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan par bya/ /yi ge sum bcu rtsa gsum pa/ /nyi mar yang dag
ldan par bya/ /phyi mo'i bzhi pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge sum bcu bzhir ldan pa'i/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /phyi mo'i lnga pa nyid dag ni/ /sum bcu bdun par yang dag ldan/ /mkha' 'gro
ma rnams sgrub byed yin/ /sum bcu brgyad pa nyid dag ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /lha rnams thams cad bsgrub pa ni/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid
ni/ /me dang 'og tu bsgrub par bya/ /bzhi bcu gsum pa nyid dag ni/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang sbyar/ /yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa ni/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig lnga
pa nyid dag kyang / /bzhi bcu rtsa drug par ldan pa/ /dpa' bo thams cad rab mchod cing / /bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'dod/ /

de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis/ /mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /lha rnams thams cad 'grub byed
pa/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'ang / /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang sbyar/ /yi ge rnams las 'di mchog ste/ /dgra rnams nges par gsod byed yin/ /sde tshan bzhi

las bya nyid do/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs yig drug pa dag dang sbyar/ /an+ta s+thA yi bzhi pa dang / /dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin bcwa lnga pa dang sbyar/ /dngos grub thams cad
sgrub pa yin/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur/ /yi ge drug bcu rtsa gcig nyid/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /'di nyid mchog ni yin par bshad/ /de bzhin drug bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ /
dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mchog tu 'dod/ /yi ge drug bcu rtsa gsum nyid/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig dag dang ldan/ /mdzes pa'i yi ge kun mchog yin/ /
drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phye ba dag /dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /grub sbyin thar pa chen po'o/ /yi ge drug bcu rtsa lnga pa/ /me la gnas par yang dag ldan/ /
dbyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba/ /dngos grub kun sbyin bde gshegs gsungs/ /yi ge drug bcu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba/ /bya ba kun las grub sbyin par/ /de ltar de bzhin
gshegs pas gsungs/ /yi ge drug bcu rtsa bdun pa/ /yi ge gnyis pa yang dag ldan/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dgos pa kun/ /'di nyid byed par the tshom med/ /drug bcu brgyad pa nyid dag las/ /der ni
yi ge ba sbyar ba/ /'og gi char ni brtag par bya/ /yi ge bdun bcu rtsa gcig pa/ /yi ge gnyis par yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge kun la mdzes pa ni/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa nyid
ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba dag /gdod nas grub pa yin par ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs/ /yi ge bdun bcu lnga pa nyid/ /ma mo'i drug pa dang ldan pa/ /'di ni rnal
'byor mchog yin te/ /dge ba kun las dam pa yin/ /bdun bcu rtsa drug pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing / /'og tu me dang ldan pa las/ /gzhan dag mdzes pa yod ma yin/ /yig
bdun bcu rtsa bdun pa/ /der ni da dang sbyar bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzes par 'dod/ /bdun bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /rgyu yi mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /
yi ge brgyad bcu rtsa gcig pa/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' yis khyad par dbye/ /gdod nas grub byed 'di yin te/ /dngos grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o/ /yi ge brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ /de bzhin dbyangs
yig gnyis par sbyar/ /phyi mo yi ni lnga pa la/ /de bzhin yi ge brgyad bcu brgyad/ /ma mo yi ni lnga pa dang / /brgyad bcu dgu pa de bzhin te/ /ma mo lnga pa blangs byas te/ /de bzhin yi ge dgu
bcu pa/ /ma mo'i lnga pa blang byas te/ /yi ge dgu bcu gcig par sbyor/ /ma mo yi ni gnyis pa dang / /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa yi/ /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa
dgu pa/ /gdug pa thams cad skrag byed pa/ /ma mo kun gyi bde ba'i gnas/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum pa/ /yi ge gnyis pa dag dang ldan/ /ma mo bcu gsum pa nyid ni/ /
yi ge lnga pa dag dang sbyar/ /gdug pa thams cad 'khrug byed de/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba'i gnas/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa yis ni/ /yi ge brgyad pa dag dang sbyar/ /bcwa lnga pa yis
rab tu sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa nyid ni/ /yi ge dgu pa dag dang sbyar/ /steng du thig le yang dag gnas/ /yi ge dag ni bsgrub pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par yin/ /dbyangs yig
bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ /yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar/ /steng du byin dus rnam par brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig pa/ /yi ge bcu gsum pa dang sbyar/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /
'byung po kun ni skrag byed cing / /sgrub pa pos ni dga' ba yin/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pa la/ /yi ge sum bcu rtsa gnyis sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge sum bcu gsum
dang sbyar/ /ma mo gnyis pa nyid dag dang / /yi ge sum bcu rtsa bzhir sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pa dag dang ni/ /yi ge sum bcu drug dang sbyar/ /dang po yi ni gnyis pa dag /yi ge sum bcu
bdun dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa ni/ /yi ge bzhi bcu dang sbyar ba/ /ma mo bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ /yi ge bzhi bcu gcig dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni/ /
yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis par sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa dag dang ni/ /yi ge bzhi bcu bzhi dang sbyar/ /ma mo'i gnyis pa nyid dang yang / /yi ge bzhi bcu brgyad par sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge

gnyis pa dag /yi ge bzhi bcu dgu dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag /yi ge lnga bcu gnyis par sbyar/ /phyi mo'i lnga pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge lnga bcu lnga dang sbyar/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /

yi ge lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ /thig les mgo la mnan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dang / /yi ge drug bcu

drug bcu sbyar/ /phyi mo gnyis pa nyid kyang ni/ /yi ge drug bcu bdun dang sbyar/ /gdug pa'i dngos grub kun 'grub cing / /sgrub pa po la dpal yang stsol/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa dang / /yi ge bdun bcu pa dang

sbyar/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /phyi mo yi ni bzhi pa yis/ /yi ge bdun bcu gsum dang sbyar/ /bco lnga pa ni rab blangs te/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dang ni/ /yi ge bdun bcu bzhi par sbyar/ /

phyi mo'i bcu bzhi dag dang ni/ /yi ge bdun bcu gsum dang sbyar/ /de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni/ /yi ge bdun bcu bzhi dang sbyar/ /phyi mo'i yi ge gnyis pa yang / /yi ge bdun
bcu bdun dang sbyar/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa yang / /yi ge bdun bcu brgyad dang sbyar/ /thig le gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan/ /phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa yang / /yi ge

bdun bcu dgu dang sbyar/ /ma mo'i bzhi pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge brgyad bcu pa dang sbyar/ /thig les mgo la mnan par bya/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pa dag kyang ni/ /yi ge bdun bcu dgu dang sbyar/ /thig le sgra yis

bskyed pa ste/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pa dag kyang ni/ /yi ge bdun bcu dgu dang sbyar/ /theg le sgra yis bskyed ba ste/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa dag /

yi ge bcu drug pa dang sbyar/ /'og dang steng gi yi ge grangs/ /dgu bcu rtsa bdun bshad pa ste/ /'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags su/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya/ /dngos grub kyi ni gnas yin zhing / /mkha' 'gro'i

snying ni 'joms pa na/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung lha rigs rgyal/ /klags pas grub pa don yod pa/ /oM ni dang por sbyar bar bya/ /hU~M hU~M phaT ni mthar sbyar ba/ /'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te/ /grub pa thams cad grub byed yin/ /

de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dra ba yi/ /'khor lo bde mchog yin par 'dod/ /hA swA ra ba sa~M la dzA nI ki DA Tapha hU~M hU~M ka~M ru ru he he dzrab shrI oM/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ /ma byung

'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /Ta pha hU~M hU~M ha ha hrIHoM/ /yi ge ba~M dang yoM dang ni/ /yi ge ma~M dang hri~M nyid dang / /hU~M dang phaT ces bshad pa yin/ /oM ba~M badzra bA rA hi/ ha~M yoM ya mi ni/ hrI~M moM mo ha ni/ hre~M hri~M sa~M/ tsal ni/ hU~M hU~M sa~M trA sa ni/ phaT phaT

tsaN Di ka /rnal 'byor ma ni drug du bsgrags/ /re'u mig drug la rnam par bsgom/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las go cha'i snying po bsgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi/ /

snying po bla med bshad par bya/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ lha mo'i snying po'i sbyor ba ni/ /bcu gsum pa ni bdag nyid dge/ /pad ma dbus su phag mo ste/ /'dab ma la ni lha mo dgod/ /sgo bzhi dag gi phyogs su ni/ /lha mo'i

snying po rnam par bsgom/ /oM las byung ba'i rta gdong dang / /rdo rje snying po gdug pa'i sgra/ /drag po yang ni g.yo ma dang / /mi 'phrog ma dang dri med ma/ /hU~M mdzad ma dang ldan lha mo/ /bsreg blugs ma dang phaT byed ma/ /rang byung ma dang

bcu gnyis te/ /ha mdzad g.yas pa'i gtso bo yin/ /rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar ba dang / /ljang khu steng zhal dkar po ste/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /mche ba

rnam par gtsigs pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing thod phreng can/ /gsus pa rlo zhing skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos can 'dzin pa ste/ /rang gi thabs dang sbyor bas gnas/ /'jigs byed tsa muN+Di 'jigs myos/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu

gnon pas bzhugs/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M ga /mdung dang gri gug cang te'u dang / /rdo rje dril bu zhags pa dang / /lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /dgra sta dang ni sdigs mdzub dang / /na ra'i lpags pa steng du brkyang / /sku rags

dang ni dpung rgyan dang / /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /thugs rje khro gnyer 'jigs pa ste/ /'dab la lha mo thams cad dgod/ /ma mo dag ni brgyad pa ste/ /ser dang dmar dang ljang ba dang / /

lho ni sngo ba'i mdog can te/ /me phyogs dmar la dud kha ste/ /sngo ba dang ni dkar ba dang / /dbang ldan du ni dgod pa ste/ /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /skyil dkrung phyed pas legs par bzhugs/ /

thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can/ /phyogs kyi gos can bzhin rnam sgyur/ /thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs/ /thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos/ /rdo rje'i mchog ni gar mdzad cing / /thod pa rag tas bkang ba dang / /dril bu cang te'u sgra

yang sgrogs/ /lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin/ /sgo rnams su ni sgo srungs te/ /dbang po'i steng du rnam par bzhugs/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la dbu skra brdzes/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan

can/ /phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spud pa ste/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /rdo rje mgo bo phyag na bsnams/ /thams cad rnam sgyur gsus pa 'phyang / /thams cad mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan/ /sngo dang ljang dang dkar po ste/ /ser zhing

phyag bzhi mdog gnyis pa/ /gcer bu pad ma'i rgya yang che/ /rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ /thams cad rang thabs gnyis pa ste/ /bcu gsum pa ni rnam par bsgom/ /snying po mchog ni sgom pa yin/ /'dod pa thams cad rab tu

stsol/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las go cha dang lha mo'i snying po bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /shin tu rnyed dka'i dgod pa ste/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis

ni/ /myur du dngos grub 'grub pa'o/ /sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong / /tsan dan gyis ni nye bar bsku/ /dri bzang dri ldan spa la ni/ /me tog sil ma gcal bkram zhing / /spos kyi dri yis nyams dgar bya/ /bdag gi bya ba kun byas shing / /

phyogs bcing ba ni byas nas su/ /de nas rdza rnga'i bcing byas ste/ /re mig bzhi bcu dgu zlum la/ /yi ge'i phyi mo dgod par bya/ /der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed btu/ /rim bzhin 'byung dang rim min sa/ /

dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pos so/ /thub pa de lta'i grangs 'gyur las/ /re'u mig sum bcu gnyis pa blang / /lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya/ /brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye/ /re'u mig sum bcu drug pa blang / /

gsum pa yis ni khyad par dbye/ /de nas sum bcu gnyis pa blang / /lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya/ /de nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung / /nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum yang dag blang / /re'u mig bcu lnga pa

yir ldan/ /lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas/ /de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /re'u mig gi ni bcu dgu pa/ /me yi bu dang yang dag ldan/ /re'u
mig gsum par rnam par dbye/ /ya tshan brgyad po'i sa bon la/ /re'u mig sum bcu drug pa dang / /yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger 'gyur/ /slar yang yi ge de dag nyid/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /de nas

rang byung blangs nas su/ /re'u mig la ni lnga par sbyar/ /spyi bor thig le dag dang sbyar/ /de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /don kun grub byed ces bya ba'i/ /tshig ni gnyis pa yin

par bshad/ /re'u mig bcu dgu pa nyid la/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye/ /gsum pa dag dang yang dag ldan/ /sum bcu gsum pa legs blangs te/ /re'u mig ni gnyis par sbyar/ /nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan/ /mdzes pa'i

mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin/ /lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste btu/ /de nas go rim bzlog pas gzung / /re'u mig las

ni dang po nyid/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin bcwa lnga pa dang sbyar/ /de nas nyi shu gnyes pa bzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi/ /tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad/ /

re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang / /re'u mig sum bcu drug pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang / /sum bcu gsum pa yang dag blang / /re'u mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan/ /re'u mig las ni bcu pa nyid/ /go rim bzlog

pa sgrub pos blang / /re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa/ /re'u mig nyi shu gsum pa la/ /gnyis pa dag ni yang dag ldan/ /steng du thig les brgyan par bya/ /de nas chu yi sa bon gzung / /brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /me yi bu

yis khyad par dbye/ /yi ge hU~M phaT mtha' ru sbyar/ /'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya/ /sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'o/ /oM ni sku la gsal byed yin/ /hU~M dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar/ /rig rgyal 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags/ /

'di ni ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang / /bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed du/ /khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru/ /dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i don du ni/ /gdug pa kun la

khyad par du/ /'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang / /rtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sha chen dag gis thams cad kun/ /rdo rje yang ni med par bshad/ /rnal 'byor thun mong brjod pa ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras

bskyed pa'o/ /oM su~M b+ha ni sum b+ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-i h+Na pa ya g+h-i h+Na pa ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga ba~M badzra hu~M hU~M phaT/ 'di ni gdug pa thams cad du/ /'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do/ /nam

mkha'i khams kyi sa yi mchog /pad ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad rnam par bsgom/ /gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon/ /phyag ni bcu drug yang dag ldan/ /zhal brgyad pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /zhal gyi mche ba

rnam par gtsigs/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /thams cad kun gyis rnam par spud/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug /sku lus drag po thugs rje'i nyams/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi

gnas pa yis/ /dbang ldan gyi ni thod pa gnon/ /u mA mchog gi ku tsa gnon/ /khros pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/ /sku la mgo yi do shal can/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la bcings/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can/ /

'jig rten gsum rgyal de bzhin te/ /lcags kyu sdigs mdzub 'ching ba ste/ /dbral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas/ /thugs ka dpral ba phyag rgya ste/ /bgegs ni rnam par gnon pa yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /ral

gri lcags kyu 'chang ba ste/ /mdung dang mgo bo cang te'u dang / /nA ra'i lpags pa'i steng du ste/ /phyag ni bcu drug de bzhin no/ /stag gi lpags pa gos su mnabs/ /rang rig gnyis med bde ba'i sku/ /sngo dang dkar dang

ser ba dang / /dmar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes/ /dkar dang sngo dang ser ba dang / /steng gi zhal ni dmar po ste/ /spyan gsum pa la dmar ba'i spyan/ /khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa

dge/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngon/ /bskyod pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni/ /mi g.yo ba yi rdo rje ste/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang / /dud kha ngur smrig bsres pa ste/ /mche ba rnam par gcigs pa'i zhal/ /thod pa'i phreng

bas rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni/ /bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon/ /nA ra'i rus pas sku brgyan cing / /sna tshogs khro bo'i rigs kyang 'phro/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub brkyang ba ste/ /rang gi

rig dang gnyis med 'khyud/ /khro bo'i lta bas gzigs mdzad cing / /dril bu phyag mtshan yang dag ldan/ /'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba ste/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya yis/ /khro bo thams cad bcings pa yin/ /stag

gi lpags pa gos su mnabs/ /sbyin gsum mi bzad 'jigs pa ste/ /tho ba dbyug to mda' dang ni/ /ral gri dril bu de bzhin te/ /yang na rdo rje dril bu dang / /thams cad khro bo'i rigs rjes 'gro/ /'khyud pa'i phyag kyang de
bzhin te/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /thams cad spyan gsum dngos grub mchog /sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor dngos grub mchog dam pa/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam par dag /yi

ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /oM su~M b+ha ni su~M b+ha hU~M phaT/ oM gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hU~M phaT/ oM gr-i h+Na pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hU~M phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga ba~M badzra hU~M phaT/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mthong nas/ /thams cad bskyed par

rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor chen por sbyor ba ste/ /kha sbyar lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dkyil 'khor yin/ /snying po mchog gi bsgom pa yin/ /de bzhin khyi dang phag gi sha /zangs kyi gtsug pud can

de bzhin/ /mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la/ /bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya/ /ma lus lus pa med grub cing / /rgyal srid thams cad rab grub 'gyur/ /dung dang nya phyes mu tig ste/ /gsum char rgyu las byung yin na/ /

chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi/ /thod pa la ni su zhig dmod/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /zla ba phyed pas brgyan du byas/ /dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang yin par bshad/ /khrag 'thung rdo rje rnam pa'o/ /mngon par

mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bsrung ba zhal bzhi par byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rgyus kyis bris pa rdo rje hU~M mdzad skyed pa'i le'u ste drug bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad

bya ba/ /sde tshan brgyad ni rnam bsgom pa/ /mkha' dbyings pad ma'i dbus gnas par/ /khrag thung rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa/ /spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyi

bzhugs/ /zhal rnam bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa ste/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /drag po zla ba phyed pa 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /ral pa'i cod pan 'ching ba ste/ /

phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /rig pa gnyis med bde ba'i nyams/ /sku la thod pa'i do shal can/ /thugs rje'i nyams kyis khyab par myos/ /dkar dang sngo dang sprin gyi gzugs/ /

sku ni sgeg cing ldem bag can/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag ni/ /ser dang dmar dang ljang ba dang / /dud pa yi ni mdog can no/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam ldan pas/ /rang gi rigs dang yang dag 'khril/ /tshangs lpags bshus nas mnabs

par mdzad/ /rgyab tu nges par 'dzin pa yin/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing / /mdung dang cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa dag ni 'dzin pa ste/ /bcom ldan ba~M hU~M nges 'byung ba/ /'jigs byed rang gi chung mar bcas/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu

mnan par sbyar/ /shar 'dabs lha mor dgod pa ste/ /ji srid lho phyogs de bzhin te/ /me la sogs pa'ang dgod par bya/ /de srid dbang ldan sogs de bzhin/ /a yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /ka yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ /

tsa yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /Ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dag ste/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /sngo ba'i mdog can lho phyogs so/ /dmar dang dud kha ljang gu dang / /ser po dbang ldan yang dag gnas/ /ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /

pa yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ /de nas ya yi mkha' 'gro ma/ /sha yi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad pa/ /de dag kun ni spyan gsum ste/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po yi/ /rkang pa g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnon/ /rnam sgyur

mche ba rnam gtsigs zhal/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /skra grol thugs rje khro bo bzhin/ /drag po yul 'khrug byed pa ste/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /'gro ba thams cad smon byed de/ /

thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan pa/ /sde tshan mkha' 'gro bde ba ste/ /'di dag rnal 'byor ma yis bsgom/ /yang na phag mo dgod bya ste/ /bdag mo yang ni gzhag par bya/ /

rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag po ste/ /mkhas pas kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba dag /sa 'og sa steng rab tu 'khrug /oM AHa ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha hU~M hU~M phaT/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba'i bdag /ma

lus ji snyed 'di yis 'grub/ /sde tshan mkha' 'gro dam pa mchog /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /a sha kA kaM tsarma tsa Ta~M ta pa ka /ta pa sa ta tha/ pa ba na dza ya~M ma b+ha ha~M tsa/ shar b+ha tsa ta tha/ sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas

pa ni/ /rtag tu dus su 'di brgyad bza'/ /rgas dang na dang 'chi med par/ /skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur/ /chang gi btung ba dang bcas pa/ /zos pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur/ /de ma rnyed na'ang sA lus bya/ /skye ba

bdun pa'i nang gnas shing / /phyugs ni zas su rtag spyad na/ /skad cig gis ni mkha' spyod 'gyur/ /'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sde tshan gyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug
bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor mchog gis ga rda ba/ /dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor sngar bshad do/ /

mkha' 'gro ma sogs mkha' 'gro ni/ /ga rda wa yi gzugs su bya/ /phag mo'i gzugs ni de nyid kyang / /zhal ni ga rda wa ru bya/ /sngar bshad gnas dang phyag mtshan dang / /zhal ni gzhan yang rtogs par bya/ /sngar

bshad mtshan ma'i rim pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni lag mdung thogs/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo thams cad kun/ /mkha' lding gdong ni 'jigs pa can/ /gsung gi 'khor lo rma bya'i gdong / /sku yi 'khor lo seng ge'i gdong / /

khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa dang / /khwa yi zhal gdong de bzhin te/ /zur la gshin rje sreg sogs kun/ /ma he ri dgas zhal gdong yin/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams kyang / /spyan gsum mig ni shin tu dmar/ /'di ni

rnal 'byor mchog dam pa/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed/ /rnal 'byor blo gros dngos grub dag /rnal 'byor mchog ni ster bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag dang / /ngag gi dngos grub rab tu ster/ /ma thos
pa yi chos ston pas/ /sems can rnams ni srid las grol/ /bla na med pa nyid bstan pas/ /mi snang la sogs dngos grub 'gyur/ /su yang rung bas 'jig rten gsum/ /de kun de ma thag tu mthong / /sngar bshad

dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i/ /gsang sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /mkha' 'gro ma mo de bzhin no/ /sngar bshad sngags kyi bdag po rnams/ /bzlas na dngos grub rab ster zhing / /rtag tu bde ba thams cad 'thob/ /rnal

'byor nye snying bzlas na ni/ /garda'i dngos grub mkha' la 'gro/ /brtul zhugs med pa'ang brtul zhugs 'thob/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur/ /dbul po'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /nad yod pa yang nad med 'gyur/ /

long ba yis kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur/ /bong bu'i sha dang rta yi dang / /khyi dang ba lang glang po mi/ /rnga mo lce spyang de bzhin te/ /brgyad po mnyam pa mchog yin no/ /rnal 'byor bdag

gis de brgyad bza'/ /dri chen chu dang sbyang rtsi mar/ /bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas nas/ /yang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /gzugs yongs bsgyur ba'i dngos grub cing / /rang gi gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /

rnal 'byor gang dang gar gnas par/ /bza' ba yang ni bzla bar bshad/ /'gro dang mi 'gro de bzhin te/ /btung zhing btung zhing dngos grub 'gyur/ /ma dang bu mo sring mo dang / /rang gi gnyen dang tsha mo dang / /blo ldan ji ltar 'dod

pa yis/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya chen po 'grub/ /garda'i mkha' 'gro bsgoms na ni/ /myur du 'gugs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /mchog 'di yang ni gsang ba ste/ /su la yang ni brjod mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las
ji ltar 'dod pa'i bong bu'i mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro lnga yi rnam bsgom pa/ /rigs las

bskyed pa'i cho ga yin/ /gdan dang phyag mtshan sa bon te/ /'di ni sa bon mchog gyur pa'o/ /nga nya Na na ma zhes pa/ /'di ni sa bon mchog grub pa/ /nga ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/ /nya ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro

yin/ /Na ni rin chen mkha' 'gro ste/ /na ni pad ma mkha' 'gro yin/ /mkha' 'gro lnga ni mchog yin te/ /zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang / /chags dang phrag dog de bzhin te/ /rigs ni lnga po 'di dag gis/ /'dod las

grol ba'i 'bras bu stsol/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / /pad ma ral gri lnga pa yin/ /sngo dang dkar ba nyid dang ni/ /ser dang dmar po ljang gu dang / /rdo rje'i phyag rgya byang chub mchog /rin chen phyag rgya'ang de bzhin te/ /

pad ma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa ste/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya lnga pa yin/ /glang po seng ge rta dang ni/ /rma bya mkha' lding de bzhin te/ /khyab 'jug tshangs pa nyi ma dang / /dbang phyug che dbang po yang de/ /rang rig yan lag dang bcas

pa/ /gnyis med bde bas yang dag gnas/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang du yang ni de bzhin 'dir/ /dpa' bo'i 'khor dang bcas par dgod/ /lnga po yang dag lnga sangs rgyas/ /lnga po bdag nyid lnga yin no/ /nyi

ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar du'o/ /lho dang nub dang de bzhin te/ /byang na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /yang na dbus su zla ba ste/ /shar du yang ni nyi ma'i gdan/ /de dag dpa' bor gyur pa ste/ /

'di lta ste/ rdo rje thod pa dang / rdo rje mkha' mnyam dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sra ba dang / bzhi po de dag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ blang po che'i gdan khri bya'o/ /rdo rje zla ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang /

rdo rje sgra dang / de dag ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ seng ge'i gdan khri'o/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje sprin dang / rdo rje Ta ha ra dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / de dag ni rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ rta'i gdan khri'o/ /

rdo rje me dpal dang / rdo rje 'joms pa dang / rdo rje sreg byed dang / rdo rje dril bral dang / de dag ni pad ma'i dkyil 'khor te/ rma bya'i gdan khri'o/ /rdo rje ba dan dang / rdo rje glu dang / rdo rje dpa' bo dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / de dag

ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ mkha' lding gi gdan khri'o/ /dpa' bo de dag kyang rang gi rigs dang / thod pa'i phreng ba can spyan gsum pa/ rang gi shes rab dang 'khyud pa/ rdo rje skyil mo dkrung gis

yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba/ stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs pa/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ thod pa dang kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa/ cang te'u yi sgra hU~M dang
bcas pa/ mgo'i phreng ba'i do shal gyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ ral pa dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i

shar dkar po/ byang ljang gu/ nub dmar po/ lho ser po/ las kyi mkha' 'gro'i shar ser po/ byang sngon po/ nub dkar po/ lho dmar po/ pad ma'i mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po/ byang ljang khu/ nub sngon po/ lho ser po/ rin

chen mkha' 'gro'i shar ljang gu/ byang ser po/ nub dkar po/ lho sngon po/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i shar sngon po/ byang ljang gu/ nub dmar po/ lho ser po/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri

dang / /pad ma rin chen phreng ba yi/ /chas ni yongs su bskor bar bya/ /grwa bzhir ma mo bzhi bsgom ste/ /ma mo rmongs byed ma dang ni/ /ma mo zhe sdang nyid yin te/ /chags pa yi ni ma mo dang / /phrag dog ma mo de bzhin te/ /

ma yi phyogs la sogs par dgod/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang / /skra grol ma la bzhin rnam bsgyur/ /spyan gsum pa la gcer bu ste/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa yin/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa/ /yi dgas

gdan la rnam par bzhugs/ /dbang chen me dang chu dang ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag tu gnas/ /rigs kyi gdan la bzhugs pa yin/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad ma dang / /ral gri thod pa kha T+wA~M ga /gri gug yang ni

phyag na 'chang / /ma ning las byung lha mo bsgom/ /thod pa yi ni phreng ba can/ /skyil mo dkrung ni phyed pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje bsrung ba dang / rdo rje 'gying ba dang / rdo rje rta gdong dang / rdo rje dred gdong dang / rdo rje bde

mchog dang / rdo rje dam tshig dang / rdo rje rta mchog ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po de dag ni/ /sgo rnams dang ni mtshams su ste/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar ser po/ /dmar dang sngo dang dud kha dkar/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags

sgrog dang / /dril bu thod pa kha T+wA~M ga /cang te'u yang ni de bzhin te/ /tho ba dbyug to mdung dang ni/ /dgra sta thod pa kha T+wA~M ga /mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /dbu skra dmar ser

gyen du brdzes/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /thod pa yi ni phreng ba 'chang / /mgo bo'i do shal rnam par brgyan/ /nyi ma pad ma'i steng du ni/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /

phyogs skyong brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs rnam bsgyur zhal/ /spyan gsum rang rigs cod pan can/ /rang gi rig dang gnyis med sbyor/ /snying rje yi ni nyams can te/ /phyi rol rdo rje yi dgas kyis/ /yongasu

bskor bar bsgom par bya/ /thog mar gsal byed ming dang hU~M/ /mtha' ru phaT dang sbyar bar bya/ /sngar bshad cho ga'i bsrung ba bya/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /lus ngag yid la bsgom par bya/ /mkha' 'gro

zhal drug phyag bcu gnyis/ /rang gi mtshan ma dril bu yis/ /gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan/ /mdung dang lcags kyu thod pa dang / /kha T+wA~M ga dang mgo bo dang / /cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang / /nA ra'i pags pa 'dzin pa

yin/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang gu/ /dud kha dang ni dkar ba dang / /dkar dang sngo dang ser dmar dang / /ljang dang thal ba'i mdog lta bu'o/ /ser dang sngo dang dkar ba dang / /dmar dang ljang gu pad ma'i mdog /dmar dang

dkar dang sngon po dang / /ser dang ljang dang nam mkha'i mdog /ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba dang / /sngo dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog /de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yi ni/ /zhal mdog gi ni khyad par yin/ /yang na zhal gcig

phyag gnyis bsgom/ /phreng ba'i gsang sngags ming dang bcas/ /mkhas pas zur bzhi mtshams nas so/ /mthar ni hu~M hU~M phaT dang sbyar/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra DA ka hU~M/ DA ki nI dzA la sa~M ba ra AH hU~M phaT swA hA/

oM ma hA su kha bud d+ha DA ka ni b+h+ru~M DA ki dzA la sa~M ba ra AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha rat+na DA ka hra~M DA ki nI dzA la sa~M bar AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha pad ma DA ka hrI DA ki nI dzA la sa~M ba ra AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha bi

shwa DA ka kha~M DA ki nI dzA la sa~M ba ra AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ de dag ni mkha' 'gro lnga'i snying po'i gsang sngags te/ 'di ni ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa yin no/ /oM badzra DA ka nga~M hU~M phaT/ oM bud d+ha DA ka nya~M hU~M phaT/ oM rad na DA ka Na~M hU~M phaT/ oM pad ma DA ka

na~M hU~M phaT/ oM bi shwa DA ka ma~M hU~M phaT/ ye shes dam tshig ro gcig pa/ /mkhas pas bsgom par byas nas su/ /dam tshig gis ni legs dbang bskur/ /sna tshogs mchod pa rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad

kyang / /go 'phang dran nas dbang yang bskur/ /sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog /de bzhin 'khyud dang tsum+pa na/ /b+ha ga ling ga'i sbyor ba dag /ye shes rnam smin dpa' ba'i mchog /shes rab thabs kyi

phyag rgya drug /rnam par blta zhing der par brtag /dga' ba dang po ye shes te/ /mchog tu dga' ba mnyam par sbyor/ /bde bar dga' bar grub pa che/ /lhan cig skyes dga' bla med yin/ /sbyor ba dang ni shin tu sbyor/ /

sbyor ba che dang ye shes sbyor/ /de dag cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /thig le'i gzhung gi sbyor shes na/ /phra ba'i sbyor bas blta bar bya/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang thob/ /cho ga nges
par bsgrubs nas ni/ /myur du rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub/ /'di ni nges pa kho na'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i ye shes kyi le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas

gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /ye shes zla ba rnam par bsgom/ /a yi yi ge las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /kha ba kun+da'i mdog

lta bu/ /dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i mnyam/ /sna tshogs pad ma zla dbus bzhugs/ /stong pa'i ye shes las byung ba/ /zla ba phyed pa

ral pa 'ching / /thod pa yi ni dbu brgyan can/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rang gi lus dang sbyor bar gnas/ /snying rje chags dang mngon gyur pa/ /dkar zhing

sngo la dmar ba'i zhal/ /rnam thar gsum gyi rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /lha mo'i mchu ni rnam 'tshir te/ /rdo rje mdung dang thod pa dang / /kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa 'dzin/ /yi ge a dang nyi dbus bzhugs/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /i las rdo rje zla ba ste/ /I las rdo rje sgyu 'phrul lo/ /e las chos kyi rdo rje ste/ /ai las sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul ma/ /lha mo bzhi po de dag ni/ /de yi zhal mdog 'dzin pa'o/ /skra

grol ba la mig po che/ /snying rje chags pas rnam par myos/ /rang gi thabs dang lhan cig bcas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs yi dgas steng du bsgom/ /gtso bo shes rab skyil mo dkrung / /thod pa'i phreng ba

'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan/ /mdung dang gri gug phyag na bsnams/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing / /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ji ltar dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor bzhin/ /de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan

'dzin/ /lha mo bzhi yi kha sbyar gsang / /snying po sbyor ba mchog yin no/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyis pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /bsang ba kun gyi mchog de nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po

mchog /gsang ba'i ye shes dam tshig ste/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin/ /u ni snying dkar bsgom pa ste/ /u ni mgo bor de bzhin no/ /o ni spyi gtsug dag tu ste/ /au ni mig tu dgod par bya/ /a~M ni go
char dgod pa ste/ /aHni mtshon du rnam par dgod/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par gnas/ /ye shes dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /bla med mchod dang dbang yang bskur/ /mnyam

pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyang de bzhin mnyam pa yin/ /dngos po kun ni ro gcig ste/ /gnyis su med pa'i mchog grub pa/ /dam tshig thun mtshams bzhin du ste/ /dus bzhi dag tu rnam par bsgom/ /kha sbyar

bzhi yi sbyor ba ni/ /thun bzhi la ni rnam par bsam/ /snying rjes kun la 'gro bya zhing / /cha med par ni rnam par bsgom/ /thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /shes rab cha med rjes su 'gro/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang

phyug sbyor/ /bdag nyid rdo rje bdag po yin/ /bgrang du med pa'i rus pa yin/ /ye shes bzlas pa yin par bshad/ /bzlas pa ye shes bsgom pa ste/ /sprul pa drug ni spro ba'o/ /de bas dam tshig bzlas pa ni/ /cho ga
bzhin du bzlas pa bya/ /oM AHa A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ a~M aHhU~M swA hA/ dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni/ /rtag tu gsang sngags rgyal po bzla/ /dag byed bsod nams chen po ste/ /dge zhing

nyes pa 'joms pa yin/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed cing / /dge ba kun gyi 'bras bu ste/ /gsang sngags kun gyi ston pa ste/ /rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po yi/ /dgyes pa'i

bde ba las byung ba/ /lha mo bzhi po dga' ba ste/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog tu bde/ /rigs kyi bde ba bcom ldan 'das/ /rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las lha mo bzhi'i
gsang ba kha sbyor gyi le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa/ /gdug pa thams cad za byed pa/ /ma rungs phyi dang nang 'joms pa/ /nam mkha'
stong pa lta bu las/ /yi ge k+Sha las mngon byung zhing / /mkha' 'gro'i dra ba bde mchog ni/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /g.yas brkyang pa yis
bzhugs pa la/ /ma rungs bdud kyi dgra gnon cing / /phyag rgya chen po mnyam ldan pas/ /thod pa dril bus yang dag khyud/ /thod pa'i dbus su yid 'ong ba'i/ /rdo rje mchog gis rnam par mtshan/ /ye shes

bdud rtsis yongs gang ba/ /lag pa g.yas par bzhags nas ni/ /sna tshogs pa yi sku lus la/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku yang brgyan/ /zhal gdong mche ba rnam gtsigs shing / /spyi gtsug thod pas rgyan du byas/ /sna tshogs

rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'chang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom pa yin/ /dogs pa rnam par spangs shing yongs su dag pa'i blos/ /rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma'i khyad par

med par byed/ /byams dang snying rje'i rgyan gyis lus la brgyan du byas/ /'dzem med bde ba'i rnal 'byor legs par bslabs pa'i bdag /shin du 'jigs pa'i dud 'gro'i dur khrod chen po na/ /ro langs srin po sna tshogs sgra rnams

sgrogs par byed/ /phed kyi sgra byed pa yi 'jigs pas khyad par byed/ /gzhan yang sgrub po rnal 'byor 'thun pa'i yul du bsgrub/ /yang na zhal ni bzhi pa dang / /'di la phyag brgyad rnam par bsgom/ /dkar dang sngo

dang dmar ser po/ /zhal dag sgyur zhing 'jigs par mdzad/ /mdung dang rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga /cang te'u mgo bo gri gug thogs/ /sna tshogs phyag la bskyod pa'i ljags/ /ha hA hi hI hU~M hU~M dang / /phaT ces bya ba'i sgra
sgrogs shing / /dpa' bo gcig bu 'jigs mdzad pas/ /gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo'i sprin ni mkhas pas spro/ /bsam gtan dga' ba bsgrub

pa'i phyir/ /khro bo yi ni sku ru bsgrub/ /dam tshig bzla' zhing bzlas pa bya/ /dam tshig kha sbyar byas nas bzla/ /mnyam par gnas shing bzlas nas su/ /chos rnams ma lus bsgom par bya/ /oM ak+Sha hU~M phaT/

srid gsum sdig pa zad byed cing / /mtshams med lnga yang zad par byed/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed cing / /srid pa dag kyang sbyong bar byed sbyor ba yi ni mchog dam pa/ /bklags tsam gyis ni nges par 'grub/ /gdug cing gnod byed sems

can dang / /ma rungs las la chags pa dang / /log par lta dang bcas pa las/ /'di dag nges par bza' bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sprul ba'i rgyan rnams spro/ /khams gsum dag ni sgrol bar byed/ /sngags pas sngags kyi mchog de ni/ /

ming dang bcas pas lhan cig bzla/ /oM phaT che ge mo b+ha k+Sha ya phaT/ k+ShaHhU~M phaT/ bdag nyid khro bo'i sems kyis ni/ /mA~M sa bza' zhing gcer bu dang / /skra grol ro la mnan pa dang / /zhags pa lcags kyu phyags gis

'dzin/ /gsang sngags cho ga bzhin du ni/ /khri phrag stong du bzla zhing bsgom/ /rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni/ /khams gsum po dag gsod par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor bcas pas/ /bza' bar yang ni rnam par

bsam/ /bdag nyid rdo rje khab thogs pa'i/ /khro bo snying du gzhug par bya/ /snying dang rgyu ma rkang dang rus/ /sha dang khrag rnams 'dral byed cing / /mtshams med lnga rnams byed pa dang / /gdug pa can rnams bza' bar bya/ /

mkha' 'gro lte bar bzhugs nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig sbyor/ /rdo rje blo ldan rab sbyor bas/ /zhag bdun gyis ni phebs par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan byas pa tsam gyis ni/ /gdug pa bdag gis zos par 'gyur/ /

nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed dang / /las 'di dag la 'jug par bya/ /gcer bu skra grol byed pa yis/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su kha bltas te/ /khyim bya'i stan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /me yi gsang sngags bzla bar bya/ /phaT hU~M ra~M ra~M ra~M/ mtshams

med pa 'di zhes bya ba/ /ra~M ra~M ra~M hU~M phaT/ ji bzhin bzlas pa byas tsam gyis/ /nyin zhag bcu bzhi dag gis ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum pa'ang / /'chi bar yang ni the tshom med/ /gal te sdig can slar log na/ /'di la zhi ba'i

las rnams bya/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa cher byas nas/ /'dis kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /oM swA hA/ a a ba~M a mu ka~M pA pa bi ra ho bA bIsh+ya ti ta s+ya/ si ba shAn ting ba ban ban du ba~M a~M aH oM swA hA/ 'o ma btung zhing gos dkar gyon/ /

zhi ba'i sems kyis stong nyid gnas/ /dkar po'i dri yis lus byug go/ /bya rog khyi dang byi la dang / /na ku la yi sha rnams bza'/ /thams cad rab tu gnas gyur te/ /'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las

khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bdag po'i kha sbyar gnon pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /srid pa'i nang na skye ba bdun/ /sna tshogs pa shu'i dam tshig ni/ /lha yi gzugs can yid 'phrogs pa/ /lha yi gzugs

can gzi brjid dpal/ /ba shu'i nang na rgyal po yin/ /skal bzang yid 'ong bde bar 'gro/ /skra yi myu gu de bzhin ring / /mig ni dkyur ring mig kyang dmar/ /pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i gzugs/ /de yi lus la rdul rab 'byung / /lus las

lha yi dri 'byung zhing / /kha yi dbugs ni kha sbur dri/ /ldan pas sbrang ma rtag tu 'khor/ /gcin dang phyi sa bra rtsi bro/ /tshig ni 'jam par gyur pa dang / /lag pa dang ni rkang pa 'jam/ /ut+pa la yi dri dang ldan/ /skra dkar gnyer ma las rnam grol/ /

lus kyang snum zhing mnyes pa dang / /snying dang thod pa lte ba ste/ /des na ro tsa na ru 'gyur/ /grib bdun ngang pa'i 'gros su 'gro/ /snying rje'i bsam pa can yin te/ /dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu dad/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims dag dang ldan/ /

'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas rtogs na/ /mi gsod me yis tshig mi 'gyur/ /srog chags sna tshogs gdug pa dag /gang yang rung bas za mi nus/ /de ni mtshan mo mi mthong ste/ /mi snang ba yi dbang phyug mchog /'di 'dra sngags

pas rtogs nas ni/ /bdag gis blangs te sbyin pa spyad/ /dri chen chu dang byang chub sems/ /mkhas pas blangs te ri lu bya/ /lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris te/ /blo dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyar nas/ /

nye ba'i snying po lan 'bum bzlas/ /de 'di lag du byin nas ni/ /sbyin pa 'di las bdag la byin/ /de 'di de ma thag tu yang / /mi bskyod pa yi bya ba rnyed/ /de ni dben par khyer nas su/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub par bya/ /gzhan yang las rnams rab

bshad bya/ /dngos grub bsgrub pa'i mchog dam pa/ /de yi spyi bo'i skra bcad nas/ /gzhan yang dud 'gro'i spu dang ni/ /de bsres the gur byas nas su/ /gang gi mgul du bcings byas pas/ /de 'dra ba yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /sna tshogs

gzugs kyang byed pa yin/ /de yi lpags pa blangs nas ni/ /de la he ru ka dpal bri/ /mngon sum khro bo'i dngos grub ni/ /he ru ka dpal byed pa yin/ /rkang lag lpags pa blangs nas ni/ /'byung po'i skra dang bcas bsres nas/ /

phye ma'i ri lur byas nas su/ /mngon par bsngags te cho ga bya/ /mkhas pas rgyal gyi nyi ma la/ /lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas/ /lag pa g.yon pas de blangs te/ /the bong sbas pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /khu tshur de ni

mgor bzhag na/ /de ma thag tu rkun ma rengs/ /rang gi lag gis dpung gnyis blangs/ /rang skra zhags pa blangs nas thogs/ /g.yas pa lcags kyu thogs nas ni/ /the gu lnga yis rnam par dkri/ /phyogs gar nor gyis

gang ba yi/ /de yi phyogs mthong blang bar bya/ /khyim du bkod cing steng 'dug nas/ /sngags bzlas nas ni mkha' la spyod/ /oM dzaHa p+baM ba hU~M ba hU~M a ba rA na du khe tsa ri dza ri hrIHswA hA/ nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos/ /yid la gang 'dod

ci yang rung / /de dag thams cad myur du 'gugs/ /khyim ni gang bar yongs su mthong / /mA~M sa dag ni zos nas su/ /lha yi lus su gyur ba yin/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje'i lus gyur te/ /des ni shi ba dbang du 'gyur/ /chu ba cho ga

bzhin blangs nas/ /skra dang bsres nas de bsgril te/ /the gu cho ga bzhin du ni/ /bsgral nas zhags pa dag tu bya/ /g.yas brkyang gnas shing khro gnas par/ /gang gi ming gi bzlas brjod kyis/ /zhags pa btab na de

ma thag /lha mo 'gugs shing de mdun gnas/ /de yi rus pa'i phye ma yis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /'di la dkyil 'khor dngos grub ni/ /ci 'dod pa ni de la gnas/ /gzhan yang rgyan du byed pa dang / /

rdo rje mtshan gyis mdzes par bya/ /chu ba dag gis mchod phyir thogs/ /de ru bdar ba'i tsan dan gyis/ /byugs pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ni/ /mkha' la spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /bsgrub pa til mar chen po yi/ /mig sman

nges par byas nas ni/ /grib ma yang ni mthong mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor zhag gis bskus na ni/ /mtshan mo'ang nyin par lta bur 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rkang dag zos nas ni/ /tshim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /ji srid gnas par mi

bkres shing / /yid gzhungs dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor sngon gyi skye ba dran/ /rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyu ma phye mar byas nas su/ /mkhas pas grib ma la yang bskam/ /gang gis mgo la gzhag pa na/ /

de ma thag tu dbang du 'gugs/ /sngags pas glo ba zos na ni/ /de ma thag tu nad med 'gyur/ /rkang pa blangs nas sa bsnun na/ /char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed/ /blo ldan gsang ba blangs nas bskam/ /tsan dan dmar po dang

bsres nas/ /de ni phye mar byas nas su/ /bud med gang la byin na ni/ /'dod pas gdungs pa'i bud med gang / /dbang du gyur te mngag gzhug byed/ /pus mo'i rus pa kI la ya/ /sor ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam zhig /

gang gi ming bcas sbas pa yis/ /de yi rigs rgyud med par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor dzi hwa zos na ni/ /ngag gi dngos grub dag tu 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor hr-i da zos na ni/ /sems ni thub pa nyid du 'gyur/ /so yi rgyal po bzhi po dag /

steng 'og dag ni blangs nas kyang / /bung ba yi ni gshog pa dang / /tshub ma'i 'dab ma rdul dang ni/ /rdul 'dis bsgrub pa byas na ni/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rmongs/ /rtsa rnams phye mar byas pa yi/ /bud med thams cad skams

par 'gyur/ /rang byung me tog ro tsa na/ /a lag ta dang gur kum gyis/ /thig le sngags pas sbyar na ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'ang dbang du 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor mig 'bras phye ma yis/ /pha rol sde ni 'byed par 'gyur/ /nu ma

zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /de ma thag tu 'o ma 'gugs/ /rnal 'byor mtshan ni zos tsam gyis/ /bud med sa bon mod la 'gugs/ /rnal 'byor so dang sen mo phyes/ /gang dang gang gis mgo la gtor/ /grub pa brgyad po

'grub pa yin/ /pha dang bu ni yin na yang / /rnam par sdang bar byas par 'gyur/ /mchu phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /kha ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin/ /sna phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbugs ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin/ /
rna ba'i sbyor bas 'on par 'gyur/ /mgo bo'i pags pas mngon btags te/ /kha'i drung du mngon bzlas na/ /lha rnams kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur/ /thod pa yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /raka ta 'gugs par byed pa yin/ /

thod pa kha ni sbub pa yis/ /gnod par byas pa kho na yin/ /in dra ba ru ro tsa na/ /de gnyis gcig tu bsres byas nas/ /gang la thig le gcig gyur na/ /dbang po'i gnas ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /ro tsa na dang myang spras

dag /lhan cig tu ni byugs pa yis/ /thub pa med pa'i stobs 'gyur te/ /pha rol dag ni gnon par 'gyur/ /pu tran dza li ro tsa na/ /lhan cig tu ni phyer byas nas/ /bud med gang la phyes gtor na/ /de ni 'dod pas myos

gyur nas/ /ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du gnas/ /ro tsa na dang pu tras gnyis/ /lhan cig tu ni bskus pa yis/ /'byung po kun dang 'byung mo rnams/ /ci bgyi zhes ni smra bzhin du/ /de yi drung du 'khod par 'gyur/ /ci 'dod

pa dag ster bar 'gyur/ /ro tsa na dang dzi ban te/ /lhan cig tu ni phyer byas te/ /shi ba'i mig dang mig sman sbyar/ /bskal par gnas kyi bar du ni/ /'tsho bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /chu srin lag ni ro tsa na/ /lhan cig tu ni phyer

byas nas/ /nA ga ma do lhan cig tu/ /ri lu dag tu byas nas kyang / /rdo rje gzi brjid dang bsres nas/ /mig gi sman ni byas gyur na/ /nor skyong gi ni glang po yang / /mngon sum du ni gnas nas kyang / /de la bdag gis

zhon na ni/ /glang chen 'khor ni mang po dang / /gzhan gyis mi thob par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol sda ni 'joms byed cing / /gzhan gyi yul la dbang byed pa'i/ /ci 'dod pa ni ster bar 'gyur/ /brash+pu daN+Di ro tsa ni/ /lhan cig tu ni sbyor ba

yis/ /rig byed rgol ba med par 'gyur/ /rma bya'i mkhris pa'i ro tsa na/ /ri bong khrag dang lhan cig tu/ /ri lu rtag tu bsgrub byas nas/ /rma bya'i mjug mas bcings na ni/ /bung ba bzhin du 'phur 'gyur te/ /lha rnams 'gugs pa'i dngos

grub cing / /rig pa 'dzin pa 'ongs par 'gyur/ /de yi lan ni 'ga' tsam gyis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur/ /lha yi gzhal med khang 'phrog cing / /lha yi bu mo'ang 'gugs par 'gyur/ /'dod na dbang du sdod byed cing / /mi 'dod

sems can don yang byed/ /mjug ma thur bltas byas na ni/ /gter rnams kyang ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /blangs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /sa 'og gter gyi sgo dag la/ /mjug ma skor ba

byas na ni/ /sgo dbye bas ni 'jug par bya/ /lha min bu mo lhan cig rol/ /lha yi bcud dang bcud kyis len/ /'phrog cing des ni zos gyur te/ /'dod pa'i lha yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /grub pa'i rdzas ni blangs pa yis/ /

sems can don rnams byed cing 'gro/ /de nas yan lag lnga pa yi/ /cho ga dag tu 'gyur ba ni/ /spu dang lpags pa sha dang ni/ /rus pa rkang pa blangs nas su/ /dri chen chu dang shu kra dang / /mtshal rnams dag ni lhan cig tu/ /ri lu byas nas

bsgrub par bya/ /lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas/ /kha yi nang du sbas na ni/ /nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ro tsa na dang lhan cig tu/ /khams gsum du ni rgyal chen 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i

bla ma las skye ba bdun pa'i phyugs chen bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rang gi chos kyi yid bsgom pa/ /rang gi chos kyi yi ger sbyor/ /bdag med chos ni yang dag

bsgom/ /rang chos yi ge mchog dga' ba/ /chos kyi sku lus rang byung yin/ /yi ge he las nges byung ba/ /he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom/ /yi ge hi las nges byung ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /hU~M gi ye shes las

byung ba/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad rnam par bsgom/ /hU~M gi yi ge las byung ba/ /mi bskyod pa ni rnam par bsgom/ /ba~M gyi ye shes las bskyed pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /oM b+hU~M a~M b+hU~M las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro rnam

par bsgom/ /a trA~M ra~M swa las byung ba/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /hri~M hri~M a las nges 'byung ba/ /pad ma'i mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /kha~M ho ha ha~M las byung ba/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnam par

bsgom/ /DA las mkha' 'gro ma nyid do/ /ya~M las rnal 'byor ma de bzhin/ /b+h+ru~M las lha mo sa la spyod/ /ba~M las mkha' la spyod pa yin/ /ma~M las ma mo nyid yin te/ /dpa' bo'i btsun mo snyan grags ma/ /he ni thugs

kyi gtso bo ste/ /ru las ngag ni byung ba yin/ /ka ni lus kyi rdo rje ste/ /yig gsum las byung he ru ka /ma~M las 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste/ /sa~M las kun tu bzang po yin/ /la~M las 'jig rten mgon po ste/ /k+ShiM las sa yi snying po'o/ /

ba~M las phyag na rdo rje ste/ /ma~M las byams pa nyid yin te/ /kha~M las nam mkha'i snying por grags/ /ga~M las nam mkha'i mdzod yin no/ /sa~M las sgrub pa kun sel ba/ /ga~M las spos kyi glang po yin/ /dz+nyAM las ye shes tog kyang yin/ /

a~M las blo gros mi zad pa/ /braM las spros pa sogs pa ste/ /sa~M las ngan song kun 'dren pa/ /sa~M las ngan song kun 'joms pa/ /dza~M las dra ba can gyi 'od/ /tsa~M las zla ba'i 'od yin te/ /ra~M las byung ba'i rin chen 'od/ /suM las nyi ma'i 'od yin

no/ /ba~M las rdo rje 'od kyang yin/ /ma las mthu chen thob pa ste/ /su ni sud d+ha yin no/ /ba~M las bzang skyong nyid yin te/ /sa~M las blo gros rgya mtsho'o/ /kun tu bzang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /'jig rten mgon po

sa snying po/ /phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang / /nam mkha'i snying po nam mkha' mdzod/ /sgrib pa rnam par sal ba dang / /spos kyi glang po nyid yin te/ /mi zad pa dang ye shes tog /spobs pa brtsigs pa mchog yin te/ /mya ngan

kun 'joms nyid yin no/ /ngan song kun 'dren nyid dang ni/ /dra ba zla ba rin chen dang / /nyi ma rdo rje 'od mchog ste/ /su d+ha na dang rin chen thob/ /rgya mtsho dang ni bzang skyong ngo / /de dag sngon nyid grub pa ste/ /phreng ba'i gsang sngags rnam par

sbyar/ /de dag dam tshig tu bshad de/ /dngos grub kyi ni grub pa stsol/ /rdo rje pho nya ma nyid dang / /skul byed dang ni rin chen sgron/ /rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te/ /ro langs rdo rje gzhon nu ma/ /ka~M po dzi dang de bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub

ma de bzhin/ /ye shes sgron dang rdor 'jigs ma/ /ye shes sgron dang rgyal byed ma/ /sgrol ma dang ni gos dkar mo/ /spyan dang mA ma kI mchog dang / /rgyal mtshan so sor 'brang ma dang / /rma bya dang ni ri khrod ma/ /lu gu brgyud

dang phyir zlog ma/ /lha mo gtsug tor rdor 'jigs ma/ /sngon grub pa yi lha mo ste/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol/ /gsal byed ming dang bcas par ni/ /thar ni hU~M phaT sbyar bar bya/ /tha mar swA hA mnyam par sbyar/ /sngags kyi

dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /gshin rje'i gshed dang rta mchog rgyal/ /bgegs ni gnon par mdzad pa yin/ /shes rab mthar byed bzhi po ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /'dod rgyal dbyug sngon stobs po che/ /brgyad par

mi g.yo grags pa ste/ /khro bo chen po sngon grub pa/ /gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon/ /dkar mo sogs dam tshig lha mo/ /khrag 'thung lha mo brgyad pa yin/ /sngar bshad mkha' 'gro ma rnams te/ /khro bo brgyad dang gnyis med

gnas/ /rtsa ba'i brgyad dang ldan pa'i sngags/ /ming dang yang dag sbyar bar bya/ /gsal byed oM ni kun tu yang / /mthar ni hU~M phaT swA hAr sbyar/ /gsal byed ming dang hU~M dang ni/ /mthar ni phaT dang swA hAr sbyar/ /gzugs dang sgra yi lha mo dang / /dri dang

ro yi lha mo ste/ /'dab ma bzhi la rnam par sbyar/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ma/ /reg pas reg pa'i rdo rjer grags/ /gnyis su med par yang dag gnas/ /dbus su khrag 'thung rgyal po ni/ /lha mo'i reg pas bde bar bzhugs/ /snying po

chos kyi dbyings su grags/ /shes rab pha rol phyin las byung / /ye shes sems dpa' gnyis med bzhugs/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbyings ma ste/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i ye shes ni/ /chos kyi dbyings de mi dmigs pa'o/ /de ni gsang ba de nyid

mchog /rdo rje can ni yang dag stsol/ /che ba'i mchog ni 'dus pa ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /sbyor ba rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs ba/ /bgrod dang bgrod min rnal 'byor ma/ /rig pa'i rgya mtsho mchog yin te/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro nyung zad

cig /sgyu 'phrul sdom pa'i rgyud yin no/ /rnal 'byor ma ni 'byung ba'i rgyud/ /gsang ba'i rgya mtsho rgyud yin te/ /nges brjod rgyud ni bla med pa/ /'dus pa mchog ni bshad pa yin/ /ji ltar bsam pa'i khyad par gyis/ /sems can

rjes su gzungs ba'i rgyur/ /'dus pa mchog gi dam pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ster/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga bshad pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag /ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni/ /bdag po nyid du bya ba yin/ /

ji ltar mig gi rjes 'thun par/ /nges brjod rgyud kyi rim pa dag /rdo rje sgrub pa po yis ni/ /nges brjod rgyud kyi las rnams bya/ /yid kyis dogs pa kun spangs te/ /gnyis su med pa'i sgom pa nyid/ /theg pa chen po'i dam pa

mchog /dngos grub che dang ldan par 'gro/ /de nas phyag mtshan mchog bshad bya/ /gzugs dang mdog gi cho ga'i rim/ /yi ge he las nges 'byung ba/ /bdag nyid he ru kar bsgom bya/ /sku lus dkar la drag shul che/ /

mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa ste/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal lnga pa/ /phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /ral pa zla phyed dbu la bcings/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya drug gis

sku lus brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i do shal gyis brgyan pa/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu steng zhal sngo ba'o/ /gzhad dang dpa' dang sgeg pa dang / /rngam dang zhi dang drag po ste/ /rdo rje dril

bu mnyam ldan pas/ /rdo rje reg pas gnyis med gnas/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa mchog kyang 'dzin/ /bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu stsol/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /rdo rje mdung ni phyag mchog ste/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis/ /bdud

bzhi po ni zhabs 'og gnon/ /reg pa'i rdo rje ljang ba dang / /dkar ba'i mdangs kyi gzugs can la/ /ljang dang ser dang dmar ba dang / /dkar ba'i g.yon pa'i zhal gdong ste/ /steng gi zhal gdong sngo la 'jigs/ /skra grol ba ni rnam par myos/ /

seng ge'i rnam grol phyag rgya can/ /byin pa gnyis ni legs par 'khril/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste/ /rdo rje thod par mnyam par ldan/ /dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan/ /mdung dang kha T+wA~M phyag na bsnams/ /

chags pa chen po me yi 'od/ /phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams/ /gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / /sna tshogs sems can 'dul bar mdzad/ /thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su yang / /

sna tshogs pad ma'i dkyil na bzhugs/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /zhabs kyis gnon par rnam par bsgom/ /'khor kun dang ni zhal gsum pa/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /drag cing zhi ba nyid yin te/ /
rigs gsum gyis ni phye ba'i gzugs/ /rigs gsum gyi ni phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /lha mos phye ba'i gzugs can ni/ /dam tshig gnyis su med par sbyor/ /thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi

zhabs kyis gnon/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /shes rab thabs ni rnam par bsgom/ /mtshams rnams su ni bum pa dag /thod pa zla ba yongs su gang / /zur rnams su ni sgo srungs ste/ /ji ltar mdog gi cha rnams so/ /g.yas brkyang

pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba zhabs 'og gnon/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /thugs rje khro bas rnam par myos/ /dkar po la sogs mdog sbyor ba/ /ji ltar g.yas pa'i zhal rim bzhin/ /phyag rgya rim pa

'ang de bzhin no/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par ni/ /'khor sogs mchog kyang dgod par bya/ /rdo rje pad ma'i dbus su ni/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil na/ /rang gi byin brlabs 'chang ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas

mu stegs can la sba/ /'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ /bla ma'i ngag la gnas pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma yi drin yin no/ /gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam dag dgod/ /shes rab thabs bdag 'gro ba
yin/ /sa bcu pa yi mchog kyang 'gugs/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /sbyor ba gsum gyi rnam dag don/ /'di ni dri med bsgom pa mchog /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag nyid
chos kyi yi ge las bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsgom pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba/ /bdag nyid cho ga'i bsgom pa'i rim/ /mA ma kI dang spyan dang ni/ /

lha mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ /'od zer can dang dzam+b+ha la/ /lha mo skul byed sa 'dzin ma/ /rang gi sa bon las byung ba/ /phyag bcu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /

sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas/ /rig byed bzhi yi zhal gdong ste/ /phyogs kyi gos can ro yi gdan/ /skra grol ba la 'jigs pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /khro bas blta zhing thugs rje'i nyams/ /shes rab pha rol

phyin lha mo/ /de nyid ye shes mchog las byung / /so so yang dag sbyor ba'i bdag /de nyid ye shes gdon mi za/ /khro bo sna tshogs gzugs can ni/ /dpa' bo rang nyid las byung ba/ /khro mchog mkha' 'gro 'byung ba yang / /gos

pa med par nyams pa yi/ /bdag po nyid du sbyar bar bya/ /bdag nyid bsgom pa nyid yin no/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya/ /phra ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje can/ /snying ga'i pad ma'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje mkha'

'gro thugs brtse can/ /'di nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems/ /'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas/ /'di nyid kyis mchod pa nyid kyis/ /mchod 'os thams cad mchod pa yin/ /gang zhig 'di

la rtag blta ba/ /de ni rgyal bas mchod par bzhed/ /nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yis/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod/ /de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis/ /yid 'dod rnams kyi lus la 'dod/ /mchod pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /myur du sangs

rgyas nyid thob par/ /gang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag /de ni pha rol gzhan du 'dod/ /dngos med bzhi la dgod pa yin/ /lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa yi / /mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab

bsgrub pa'o/ /sngags dang de nyid bstan pa yi/ /bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i/ /rgyud ni don dam ma yin te/ /don dam yang dag skyes pa na/ /ston pa med cing bstan pa'ang med/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yi/ /gnas

sogs 'di nyid la gnas te/ /de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid/ /skyo bya de nyid can gyis min/ /gal te de nyid med gyur na/ /de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya/ /'on te de nyid ldan gyur na/ /de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod/ /gnas

dang nye ba'i gnas mchog rnams/ /bstan pas dri ma med par 'gyur/ /yang na mi nus bag med pa'i/ /mi yi gnas ni bsgrags par bya/ /nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te/ /bsam gtan las gzhan bde

med phyir/ /de bas bsam gtan mchog gzhol bya/ /rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khod/ /de yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur/ /de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni/ /rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can/ /rnam dag ye shes spyan

gyis ni/ /thugs rje thugs gdungs ring po nas/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor can dag gzigs/ /de rnams dgyes pas dngos grub mchog /ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur/ /des ni rje btsun ye shes kyang / /rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya/ /sna

tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs spyad pa yi/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spongs la/ /de nyid brtul zhugs la dgar byas/ /gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas pa/ /rnam pa des byas brtul zhugs
can/ /bsam gtan zas mchog gzhol 'gyur bas/ /smyon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis/ /gcer bu'am yang gcer bu min/ /gang rung ji lta de ltar 'gyur/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs la/ /de nyid gcig pu rnam

par bsam/ /lkugs pa'i dngos por gyur pa yis/ /zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis nyer bsten na/ /rnal 'byor chen mo 'di gsal 'gyur/ /ye shes sgron ma'i mchog mthong na/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams
legs 'dus te/ /pad ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' bar/ /ngang pa'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhin na/ /mig 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten du/ /'gro kun don ni byed pa'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni/ /mngon 'gyur
'di la the tshom med/ /spyod pa 'di la nges par ni/ /ji skad bshad pa der 'gyur bar/ /sems ni dag par gyis shig ces/ /sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs/ /gang gis rmad byung snying
rjer ldan/ /gang gis gsung ba de nyid 'gyur/ /rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni snying gar dgod/ /snying gar rdo rje lcags kyur sbyor/ /thugs kyi rdo rjes nang sbyor te/ /
gzhan yang rdo rje dgod bya ba/ /chos kyi dbyings su rnam par brtag /rang gis nam mkhar sbyor nas su/ /gzi brjid gzugs ni 'dzin par bsgom/ /rang gi chos kyi yid dgod pa/ /rang drod rang
bzhin dri ma med/ /rang gi bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi chos kyi yi ge bsgom/ /ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa yi/ /gzhan nyid gzugs kyi bsgom pa la/ /yid kyi gti mug grub pa yi/ /dbang po gzhan
ma bsgom par bya/ /ji lta ji ltar mos pa yis/ /gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin bdag med chos rnams ni/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis/ /
stong nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /legs so bya ba rnams byin nas/ /rgyud skyes pa yi sbyor ba las/ /legs so legs so ye shes che/ /nges par brjod pa mchog gi mchog /legs so rdo rje tshul
drag po/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bka' drin rab/ /legs so gnyis med sbyor ba ni/ /mchog dang mchog ni grub pa la/ /legs so zhes bya nges par sbyor/ /'dod pa med pa'i bsgom pa ni/ /
legs so thams cad 'gro ba'i mgon/ /theg pa chen po bstan pa 'di/ /gnyis med ye shes mchog dang ni/ /man ngag thob pa'i dang po ste/ /legs so rdo rje bla ma kun/ /
de la bstan pa rnal 'byor ma/ /legs so 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la/ /dngos grub bla na med pa byin/ /rdzogs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rdo rje rnams nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla na med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba
gsang ba'i yang gsang ba bde mchog rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po the tshom med par de kho na bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla

ma las gsang ba las gsang ba'i bde mchog gi rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI pang+ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po dge slong

rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ phyis paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na shrI dang / lo ts+tsha ba khyung po chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis kyang zhus pa'o/ /phyis paN+Di ta a nan+ta ta dang / lo chung gis
chad lhag bsabs nas zhus dag byas nas legs par bcos te gtan la phab/ /'di las zab pa med do// //

@/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra DA kA nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha'

'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /lhag pa yi ni lha gcig nyid/ /'byung

gnas sgra tshul nges 'byung rnams/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas/ /'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs

so/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya/ /'di ni gnyis myed ye shes mchog /rnyed dang bde ba kun mos pas/ /ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' kun du rgyu grub pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /sna tshogs kun

du phyag rgya ni/ /sna tshogs kun gyis sdom pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar grub/ /de nyid med sems rnal 'byor pa/ /lha la dmigs par byed pa dag /kun du gzugs brnyan yid kyis ni/ /

lugs sogs rnal 'byor skye ba min/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor gang / /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rang nyid gtso/ /byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no/ /'gro ba'i rtsa lag rang bzhin gyis/ /sna

tshogs g.yogs te rnam bzhugs pas/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis mchod par bya/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo thams cad nyid yin te/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid

rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo thams cad nyid dang ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /

rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dpal ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i/ /'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu yin/ /brtan pa dang ni

g.yo ba yi/ /'gro ba dmigs su med pa ste/ /mthong ba dang ni rigs pa'i dngos/ /thams cad sgyu ma ji bzhin no/ /gang gis blun po 'ching 'gyur ba/ /'dir des mkhas rnams rnam par grol/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sa gsum

ma lus bza' bar bya/ /gzhan du gal te sbyor ba ni/ /ma tshang mar me lta bur 'da'/ /gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /'du shes pad ma gar dbang ste/ /'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems

dpa' ste/ /'di dag dngos kun rang bzhin ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar grags/ /yang dag chen po gcig pu'i lha/ /bde ba thams cad rab ster ba/ /sgyu ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /chags bral chags pa zhes byar bshad/ /sa khams

ltung byed ma yin te/ /de bzhin chu khams gsod ma'o/ /me khams 'gugs byed ma yin te/ /de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang ngo / /nam mkha'i khams ni sgyu ma che/ /rang nyid 'gro ma zhes byar bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha'

'gro ma ni 'bar ba'i mchog /'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /de ni rdo rje gtso mor gnas/ /mig gnyis gti mug rdo rjer bshad/ /nyan pa zhes bya rdo rje brjod/ /sna ni ser sna rdo rje ste/ /kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer gsungs/ /lus ni phrag
dog rdo rje ste/ /skye mched thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /gzugs 'di thams cad stong pa nyid/ /stong pa'i tshul gyi mig gis ni/ /dogs pa med par bsgom pa'i mchog /rnam
par mi rtog pa yis blta/ /nam mkha'i tshul gyi sems kyis ni/ /der ni thams cad nam mkha'i dngos/ /dogs pa med pa'i bsgom par ldan/ /rnam par mi rtog skye 'gyur zhes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin

gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba bde ba chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur ba'i bar/ /de srid sems can mtshungs med don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bar ni mdzad/ /de ltar sems
can dam pa rnams/ /sred pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par/ /mi skyo bar ni brtson 'grus kyis/ /rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad/ /nam mkha'i gnas kyi mthar thug par/ /smon lam rnam par spyod byed cing / /
sems can don brtson sems kyis ni/ /dpa' bo srid pa sbyong bar mdzad/ /rtag tu 'dod pas myos pa yi/ /lha yi bu 'di rnams dang ni/ /gzhan yang skye bo chags can phyir/ /'dod chags thams cad dag par

mdzad/ /bde chen shin du grub bya'i phyir/ /rtog pa rgyas par sbyin pa dang / /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /rtog pa thams cad dang por bshad/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /rtog pa dang po bde ba che/ /
der ni rdo rje sems chen gyi/ /lhag pa yi ni lha gcig bzhugs/ /'jig rten khams rnams mtha' yas kyi/ /sems can kun don 'byung bya'i phyir/ /glu gar rol mo sogs pa'i gar/ /srid pa kun gyi
gtso bor gyur/ /sems can thams cad 'byung ba yi/ /dga' ba yang dag bsdus ba dang / /de nas sems can skye 'gyur ba'i/ /'dod pa'i chags pa rnam spangs te/ /des 'dul bar ni mkhyen nas su/ /
yi ge las byung rnams spangs shing / /nam mkha' lta bur bdag med par/ /dag pa nyid du de nas son/ /de nas sems can sangs rgyas kyi/ /bla med don ni nus med pa'i/ /stong pa nyid la rtag bzhugs pas/ /

'gro kun stong par bcos nas ni/ /thams cad dmyal bar ltung mthong ste/ /slar yang bdag dang gzhan don la/ /mos pas gus pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas 'jig rten khams kun na/ /bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun bsdus te/ /myur ba

nyid du bdag la bskul/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsu ra ta s+t+wa~M/ /'dis ni bskul ba tsam gyis kyang / /dag pa'i bde ba kun ster ba/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed cing / /'gro kun bde ba skyed par gyur/ /nga ni 'dod pa'i

gzugs kyi mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs pa/ /nga nyid chos kyi sku yi mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyor 'phrog cing / /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku

chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso/ /

rin chen 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang / /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar 'grub/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i
sbyor ba yis/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad bri/ /de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya/ /zla ba'i mdog can badzum dang bcas/ /'od zer dmar po 'khrugs pa las/ /

sangs rgyas phreng bas mdzes pa ste/ /rgyan rnams gyis ni rnam par klubs/ /zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum dang / /ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan cing / /lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis

nye bar brgyan/ /rtsa zhal zhi zhing g.yas dkar min/ /de bzhin gzhan yang g.yon pa dmar/ /rgyab zhal ser po gser sregs 'dra/ /thod pa la bzhugs gar dang ldan/ /sum bcu gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad/ /rdo rje dang ni ral gri dang / /

dril bu thod pa bsnams pa nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los gang / /skyob pa sna tshogs bri bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde mchog zhes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /

bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /de bzhin nye du mo rnams ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pas/ /'dod pa'i sbyor bas chags par bya/ /ba glang sha dang rta sha sogs/ /dogs pa med par bza' bar bya/ /

'jig rten la rtag g.yon la spyod/ /brten pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/ /'gro kun g.yon las byung bas na/ /g.yon gyis bza' zhing g.yon mchod bya/ /pho nya ma gtogs gzhan rnams la/ /'dod pa rmongs pas bgrod mi bya/ /pho nya

mo rtag zhen thar par/ /'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med/ /sgrub pos mchog tu 'bad byas te/ /brtul zhugs min spangs brtul zhugs rdzogs/ /dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang / /tsa ru'i bza' ba lhan cig bya/ /rigs

lnga la ni kun spyod par/ /rigs gcig nyid du brtag par bya/ /sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga pur bcas/ /tsan dan dmar po sbyar byas la/ /rdo rje chu dang bsres pa ni/ /dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa'i/ /de dag bdud rtsi lngar

ni 'gyur/ /mthe bo srin lag sbyar ba yis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bza'/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na/ /dngos grub rtag par 'thob par 'gyur/ /'di dag dam tshig dam pa ste/ /mdzes ma'i gdong can
khyod la bshad/ /las rnams kun la thabs bcas shing / /dogs pa med par gang spyod dang / /rnam par mi rtog sgom pa ni/ /brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog /las rnams kun la kun tu ni/ /rnam par mi

rtog sgom byed cing / /dogs pa med par kun du spyod/ /de ni dka' thub rnams kyi mchog /the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /skra zla la sogs rjes dngos kyi/ /yul rnams ma lus sten byed pa'i/ /dka' thub shin du 'da' dka' ba'o/ /

gang yang las rnams thams cad la/ /shes rab dang ni sbyar byas te/ /de yang stong pa'i gnas su sbyar/ /de 'dir bdag chen dka' thub yin/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/ /shes rab dang ni mtshungs gzugs la/ /dogs med spyod pa'i kun

spyod pa/ /de ni bdag chen dka' thub yin/ /shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs par/ /gang tshe sems gzhan mi g.yo na/ /de tshe byang chub chen po ni/ /nges par ster ba nyid du bshad/ /rnam par mi rtog rjes 'jug la/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mngon par

brtson/ /de ni thams cad 'byung ba yi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin/ /gang tshe 'dus byas tshul rnams ni/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis su/ /me long lta bur rab shes pa/ /de ni shes rab bsten pa yin/ /glog dang chu bur ltar smin pa/ /

gang tshe 'dus byas tshul rnams ni/ /gang gis ji ltar mthong 'gyur ba/ /de ni shes rab bstan pa yin/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan dang / /rmi lam sgyu ma dri za'i grong / /mig 'phrul mtshungs par gang gis mthong / /de ni gtso bo yin par

brjod/ /de ni gang du'ang mngon zhen dang / /gang du'ang gnas pa yod ma yin/ /de ltar yang dag 'byung mod kyi/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i dngos dag ni/ /longs spyod khyad 'phags skye 'gyur ba/ /bde ba yongs su 'gyur bzhin pas/ /'bras bu

khyad 'phags 'thob 'gyur bar/ /ci yi phyir na 'dod myi bya/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po yod min te/ /'on kyang snang ba tsam mtshan nyid/ /bsgom pa khyad par can gang zhig /goms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa na/ /yid 'ong

bde ba'i 'bras bu ni/ /bla med gsal ba'i blo yi mthu/ /'bras bu don gnyer rgyu bsgrubs na/ /der ni lha mo su zhig 'gog /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /kun du 'gro ba mchod par bya/ /dka' thub sdom pa mi zad
pas/ /lus ni bskams shing sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs na/ /g.yengs pas dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur/ /lus dang sems ni brtan gyur na/ /bde ba thams cad brtan par 'gyur/ /sdug

bsngal gyis ni g.yo gyur pas/ /shin du 'gog par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /des na lus dang ngag sems rnams/ /brtan par byas na byang chub 'thob/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /dmyal bar nges par bsreg 'gyur zhes/ /

mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i

yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rim par phye ba dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la btsun mo rnams kyis slar yang mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das snying po gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dral ba'i lha la sogs pa'i gdug pa can rnams dang / skye bo gdug pa can gzhan dag kyang gdul ba dang / 'joms pa dang / zhum par byed pa dang / ltung ba dang / zhi bar byas te/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du

gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ba'i snying po sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms pa lha yis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ glur blangs te

'di skad ces gsungs so/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad nas/ /der ni sde tshan rnams kyi mthar/ /ta dang po yi d+ha b+ha'i mtha'/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pas spyir brgyan pa'i/ /sa yi mtha' ni rang gis blta/ /la sha'i dbus kyi

stan bzhugs pa'i/ /sa yi mtha' ni sbyar bar bya/ /mtha' gnyis kyis ni rnam par sbyang / /a stan gnas pa sa yi mtha'/ /slar yang sa mtha' mda' lnga bstan/ /zla ba'i dum bu thig les brgyan/ /la sa'i dbus

gnas sa bon ni/ /mda' bcu yis ni yongs su sbyangs/ /sha dang sa yi dbus gnas la/ /zhal gsum gyis ni brgyan pa dang / /rlung gi phyogs gnas sa bon la/ /ru tra yis ni rnam par brgyan/ /hU~M hU~M ha ni bzung nas su/ /

dbyangs kyi dgu pas yang dag dgang / /phaT ces bya ba dgod par bya/ /lhag ma ha yi rkang pa dgang / /lnga pa'i dbus gnas de nyid de/ /de la ha dzo zhes bya'o/ /ra stan la gnas sa yi mtha'/ /i zhes bya ba'i mda' dang sbyar/ /slar yang pa

zhes bya ba'i mtha'/ /mda' ni sar pas yongs su sbyangs/ /sa mtha' der ni ra yig zhon/ /e zhes bya ba rna ba'i rgyan/ /i dbyangs zla dus thig les brgyan/ /yi ge ra zhon sa yi mtha'/ /slar yang sa mthar sgra lngar ldan/ /zla dum

thig les cod pan brgyan/ /slar yang de nyid mgon po bzla/ /rin chen mtha' ma phaT kyis brgyan/ /rnam par snang mdzad sna tshogs kyis/ /tshig rnams kun la dgang bya zhes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can

gyis gsungs/ /dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /sna tshogs pad ma'i nyi dkyil la/ /der ni hU~M las byung ba yis/ /las kyi rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /hU~M gi de nyid rnam bsgom pa'o/ /'od zer

sna tshogs 'bar ba las/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs spro ba'o/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa'i/ /sku mdog dmar mo drag chen mo/ /dung gi dbyibs can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /spyan dmar khams skra gyen du brdzes/ /
