ni 'phyo ba'o/ /brgyad pa ni rmi lam mo/ /dgu pa ni sa'i dbang phyug go/ /bcu pa ni 'phel ba'o/ /bcu gcig pa ni gti mug go/ /bcu gnyis pa ni bzang po'o/ /dang po ni bzang po'o/ /gnyis pa ni khyu

mchog go/ /gsum pa ni rus sbal lo/ /bzhi pa ni chu srin no/ /lnga pa ni yugs sa mo'o/ /drug pa ni sme ba'o/ /bdun pa ni 'bugs pa'o/ /brgyad pa ni 'phyo ba'o/ /dgu pa ni rmi lam mo/ /bcu pa ni sa'i dbang
phyug go/ /bcu gcig pa ni 'phel ba'o/ /bcu gnyis pa ni gti mug go/ /dang po ni gti mug go/ /gnyis pa ni bzang po'o/ /gsum pa ni khyu mchog go/ /bzhi pa ni rus sbal lo/ /lnga pa ni chu srin no/ /
drug pa ni yugs sa mo'o/ /bdun pa ni sme ba'o/ /brgyad pa ni 'bugs pa'o/ /dgu pa ni 'phyo ba'o/ /bcu pa ni rmi lam mo/ /bcu gcig pa ni sa'i dbang phyug go/ /bcu gnyis pa ni 'phel ba'o/ /

'phel ba'i nyi ma la skyes pa'i byis pa ni/ nyi ma dgu pa'am/ zla ba dgu pa'am/ lo dgu na shi chad du ma gyur na/ phyug cing skal ba bzang ba dang / sems gdug cing rtsub la me drod chung zhing yul mtha'
'khob kyi gtso bor 'gyur la/ g.yem pa la dga' ba dang / thams cad du 'jam por smra zhing nor dang ldan zhing nad med pa dang / skyid pa la rtag par 'gyur te/ tshe lo brgyad bcu rtsa gcig 'tsho ste/

sa'i dbang phyug gi nyi ma la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /sa'i dbang phyug gi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni/ nyi ma brgyad pa'am/ zla ba brgyad dam/ lo brgyad pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na nor dang 'bru rtag par 'gyur zhing bden

par smra la mdza' bshes mang zhing chos shes pa dang / mkhas la tshangs par spyod cing sems can kun la phan pa byed la/ bzo shes pa dang / 'jam por smra zhing skal ba dang ldan te/ bstan bcos thams cad rgyas

par 'gyur ba la the tshom med de/ tshe lo brgyad bcu rtsa brgyad 'tsho ste/ rmi lam gyi nyi ma la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam gyi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ bcu'am/ min na zla ba brgyad

dam/ lo brgyad pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na/ des bla ma nyon mongs par byed pa dang / dpa' zhing brtul phod pas pha rol gnon pa dang / dgra thams cad 'joms shing skye bo dam pa dang mdza' ba dang / skyabs

med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen byed cing thams cad du tshig rtsub smra la sdig pa'i las la nan tan byed pa dang / dbul zhing 'phyar ba dang / nad med cing rtag tu bza' ba rnyed pa dang / mthon po la rten pas 'tsho

zhing rtag tu seng ge dang 'dra bar sems te/ tshe lo drug cu 'tsho zhing 'phyo ba'i nyi ma la dgra'i mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba la the tshom med do/ /'phyo ba'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni zla ba bzhi pa dang / drug pa

dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na/ de ni shes rab chung zhing blo dang me drod dman la/ sdang ba mang zhing bu tsha mi 'tsho la 'khor mang ba dang / yo byad 'phel zhing sdug bsngal mang ba dang /

gnyen 'dun thams cad dga' la/ ngan song la brtse ba dang nor dang phyugs mang la chung ma gsum len cing cung zad tsam gyis khro ba dang / nga rgyal che zhing dgra rnams 'jigs la khe spogs kyis 'tsho ste/
tshe lo brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'tsho zhing 'bugs pa'i nyi ma la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /'bugs pa'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma gnyis pa'am/ zla ba gnyis pa'am/ bzhi pa'am/ lo brgyad pa

'am/ bcu pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na/ de ni pha ma ltogs pa dang / nor chung zhing rmongs pa dang sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing ngang tshul ngan la nad bu can du 'gyur ba dang / tshangs par spyod cing dpa'

la sdug pa dang / ser sna dang ldan par 'gyur te/ tshe lo drug cu rtsa bzhir 'tsho la/ sme ba'i nyi ma la rang gi khyim du 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /sme ba'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma gnyis pa'am/
lnga pa'am/ zla ba gsum pa'am/ dgu pa'am/ lo dgu pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na des ni rang gi rigs bstod cing chos shes pa dang / bstan bcos phun sum tshogs shing bzo sna tshogs rig pa dang /

dpa' la nga rgyal che ba dang / g.yo sgyu can yin la phrag dog dang ldan zhing nor nyung ba dang / gzugs bzang zhing bya ba thams cad yang ba yin te/ tshe lo drug cu rtsa gsum du bde bar 'tsho la yugs sa mo'i nyi ma
la chur 'chi bar gdon mi za'o/ /yugs sa mo'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma gnyis pa'am/ bcu pa'am/ zla ba gnyis pa'am/ brgyad pa'am/ lo brgyad pa la gal te shi chad du

ma gyur na de ni sdig pa'i blo dang ldan zhing sems can kun la 'khyal tshig smra zhing nor nyung la 'phyar ba dang / thams cad du nad kyis thebs la rgyal po'i chad pas gcod cing bud med thams cad la skal

ba bzang por 'gyur la bzo dang ngor thabs thams cad kyi bzo la mkhas pa ste/ tshe lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga'am/ yang na sum bcu rtsa drug tu 'tsho la chu srin gyi nyi ma la 'chi bar the tshom med do/ /chu srin
gyi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma bcu pa'am/ zla ba gsum pa'am/ lnga pa'am/ lo dgu pa la ma shi na bsod nams dang / tshul khrims phun sum tshogs shing / zhi des dang / bslab
pa dang ldan zhing nor dang / gzugs dang / skal ba phun sum tshogs la dpal dang grags pa dang / bu dang / tsha bo 'phel la/ grong khyer gyi gtso bor 'gyur ba dang / 'khor dang / longs spyod phun sum

tshogs pa dang / bzo dang dus kyi mtha' la mkhas pa dang / dgra thams cad brlag par byed do/ /tshe lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga'am/ yang na drug cu rtsa bzhir 'tsho la rus sbal gyi nyi ma la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /

rus sbal gyi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma gnyis pa dang / dgu pa dang / zla ba brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang / lo dgu pa la ma shi na de ni rtag tu sems khral che ba dang / khro ba dang bcas shing cung zad

kyis mgu ba dang / mang du smra zhing gnyen rnams byams pa dang / rtag tu g.yem pa dang / phyugs la gtong phod che ba dang / bu dang chung ma gsod pa dang / sems chung zhing bsam pa ngan pa dang / zhing

las kyis 'tsho zhing mdze nad kyis thebs te/ tshe lo drug cu rtsa bzhi'am/ brgyad bcu tham par 'tsho la khyu mchog gi nyi ma la rang gi yul du 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /khyu mchog gi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa

ni nyi ma dgu pa'am/ zla ba gnyis dang / brgyad pa'am/ lo brgyad pa dang / dgu pa la gal te ma shi na dpa' zhing rtul phod pas pha rol gnon la sgeg cing phyug pa dang / chung ma mang du len la gnyen 'dun

thams cad dga' zhing pha'i tshe 'joms pa dang / khe spogs dang / g.yem pa la dga' zhing le lo dang / mu chor du smra ba dang / ngang tshul ngan pa dang / las gdug pa la dga' ste/ tshe lo drug bcu'am/ nyi shur

'tsho la bzang po'i nyi ma la mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /bzang po'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma lnga pa'am/ zla ba dgu pa'am/ lo bcu pa la ma shi na de ni dbul zhing chos spyod la bden par smra ba dang /

snyan par smra ba dang / chung ma gcig la dga' zhing rig pa'i bdag por 'gyur ba dang / bzo dang / dus thams cad shes shing rang gi gnyen 'dun byams pa dang / rigs kyi 'chad pas 'tsho ba ste/ tshe lo brgyar 'tsho la

gti mug gi nyi ma la chur 'chi bar 'gyur ba las gzhan du ma yin no/ /gti mug gi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma gnyis pa'am/ zla ba dgu pa'am/ lo dgu pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na mang du za zhing

sems chung la rtag tu g.yem pa la dga' ba dang / rgyun du khro zhing brkam chags che la/ nad bu can du 'gyur ba dang / yid gzhungs shing gnyen 'dun byams pa dang / rtag tu khro ba dang nga rgyal can du 'gyur ba dang / ngang tshul

ngan zhing sdig spyod la tshig rtsub dang khyal ba smra ba la dga' ba dang / mtshon cha rdeg pa la dga' ste/ tshe lo drug bcu rtsa bzhir 'tsho la 'phel ba'i nyi ma la yan lag gi zug rngu dang skrangs 'bur gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba la the tshom med do/ /

'phel ba'i nyi ma la nad kyis thebs na shin tu bag bya dgos te/ gal te zhag bcwa lnga la ma shi na de nas nyi ma lnga na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /sa'i dbang phyug la ni nyi ma gsum na ma shi na de nas nyi ma bdun na 'tsho bar

'gyur ro/ /rmi lam la yang nyi ma gsum na ma shi na de bzhin du nyi ma bdun na 'tsho'o/ /'phyo ba la ni nyi ma gsum 'am lnga na 'chi 'tsho cha phyed do/ /'bugs pa la ni nyi ma gsum 'am bzhi pa la ma shi na nyi ma bcu na 'tsho

bar 'gyur ro/ /sme ba la ni nyi ma gsum pa la 'chi ba'am brgyad pa la 'tsho ste/ yun ring du nad kyis gdung bar 'gyur ro/ /yugs sa mo la ni nyi ma lnga pa la 'chi ba'am dgu pa la ldang bar 'gyur la/ zhag bcu na

nad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /chu srin la ni nyi ma brgyad pa la 'chi ba'am/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'tsho 'chi 'tsho phyed par 'gyur ro/ /rus sbal la ni nyi ma brgyad pa la ma shi na de nas zhag bcu pa la nad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /

khyu mchog la ni nyi ma gsum pa'am/ lnga pa la ma shi na nad cung zad dang bcas par 'gyur zhing brgyad pa la ldang ngo / /bzang po la ni nyi ma brgyad pa dang bcu pa la ma shi na de nas grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gti mug la ni nyi ma gsum pa

'am bdun pa la ma shi na de nas grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi mche bas mngon zin na/ /'chi bdag dang ni mngon par 'grogs/ /dug bsdu ba yi sbyor ba yis/ /de rnams ji ltar 'grub 'gyur zhing / /tshe dang nad med spel ba'i phyir/ /

gzhan la cho ga ji ltar sbyar/ bka' stsal pa/ sems can kun kyi nad rnams ni/ /gzhom zhing bskyang bar bya ba dang / /shi ba rnams kyang 'tsho 'gyur na/ /gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /de rnams bsod

nams che 'gyur ba/ /chu yi sbyin bsreg cho ga ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni brjod bya ba/ /de nas nga yis bshad kyis nyon/ /sa yi cha ni yid 'ong ba/ /kha dog dkar po dri yis byug /me tog phreng dkar gyis brgyan
cing / /rgyal mtshan bla res 'bar byas pa/ /rtsa ba nag po ra ri med/ /bum pa chu yis bkang sogs pa/ /de dbus lha mo bsam pa ni/ /pad ma'i stan la yang dag bzhugs/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/

shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas klubs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /pad ma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo spro/ /gangs dang kun da zla 'dra ba'i/ /bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa yis/ /

dug gi mthu ni 'phrog par mdzad/ /lha mo'i sbyor ba 'di lta bus/ /bsams na dug ni 'joms par 'gyur/ /'o ma nag por gyur gyi bar/ /mun pas ring du zil mnan pa/ /slar yang bdug pas bdug par bya/ /dpyid zla

la sogs rims bzhin du/ /nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ /ji lta'i dus bzhin mtshan ma ni/ /rim gyis rim gyis sbyar bar bya/ /nyin mo yi ni chu tshod dag /mkhas pas bzhi dang bcu gnyis bsgyur/ /mtshan mo drug dang bcu

gsum bsgyur/ /chu tshod mkhas pas brtsam par bya/ /re'u mig dag ni gnyis pa la/ /dus la mkhas pas mtshan ma bya/ /nyin mo drug dang bcu gnyis bsgyur/ /chu tshod kyi ni mtshan ma bya/ /bzhi dang bcu gsum bsgyur

ba ni/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag /brgyad dang bcu gnyis bsgyur ba dag /nyin mo ru ni brtag par bya/ /gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag /chu tshod sum bcu tham pa ni/ /

dbus kyi bi shu gnyis gar sbyar/ /gnyis dang bcu ni gsum po dag /nyin mo'i chu tshod shes bya ste/ /brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis po dag /de yi mtshan mo'i mtshan mar bya/ /bzhi dang bcu gsum mtshan ma ni/ /

nyin mo yi ni chu tshod do/ /drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod mtshan ma bya/ /drug dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /nyin mo yi ni shes bya ste/ /bzhi dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /
mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni grags/ /de bzhin lhor ni 'gro ba yi/ /dus shes par ni bshad par bya/ /bzhi dang gsum bsgyur chu tshod ni/ /nyin mo yi ni bshad pa yin/ /drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /
mtshan mo yi ni mtshan mar bya/ /gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /de bzhin nyin mo'i chu tshod yin/ /brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /chu tshod mtshan gyir rab tu grags/ /bcu ni gsum du bsgyur
ba dag /bi shu'i nyin mo'i chu tshod de/ /de bzhin mtshan gyi chu tshod kyang / /bcu ni gsum du bsgyur bar bya/ /brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /nyin mo yi ni bsam par bya/ /gnyis dang bcu ni

gsum bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag /bzhi dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /nyin mo'i chu tshod rim pa yin/ /drug dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /de bzhin mtshan mo'i chu tshod do/ /sum brgya drug bcu'i
dbugs kyis ni/ /chu tshod kyi ni dus rnams 'da'/ /chu tshod drug cu'i grangs kyis ni/ /nyin mtshan phrugs gcig tu ni brjod/ /zla ba'i go rims ji bzhin du/ /rims pa de bzhin mtshan ma bya/ /
chu tshod dbugs ni rdzogs dang po/ /rim gyis 'phel zhing rim gyis 'bri/ /las dang las min bye brag bzhin/ /dbugs ni rim gyis gzung bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro gnyis dang dus tshigs dang / /bgrod pa
gnyis kyis mtshon par bya/ /gnyis po dag ni bcur bsgyur ba/ /de bzhin lo'i chu tshod do/ /de yi mtshan ma ldan pa yis/ /nyin mtshan gyis ni dbugs su brtsi/ /ngag gi dbang phyug kun bzung nas/ /
dbyangs kyi mtshan mar mngon par bzhag /ma ning gnyis ni spangs nas su/ /sa yi dbang phyug kun du bzhag /a yi rim pa la bab na/ /dpal dang mngon par mnyam 'grogs shing / /nor rnyed par
ni snang ba ste/ /skal ba bzang por gdon mi za/ /a yi re'u mig la bab na/ /rims dang nad kyis gzer ba dang / /'jigs shing skrag par snang 'gyur bas/ /A zhes bya bas nges par ston/ /yi ge

i la bab gyur na/ /rgyal po'i dpal ni ster 'gyur te/ /kun nas nor ni rnyed pa dang / /gang zhig bsams pa de 'grub 'gyur/ /yi ge I la bab gyur na/ /zla ba drug ni 'chi ba dang / /de bzhin dgras ni gzir

ba dang / /me yis 'jigs par shes par bya/ /yi ge u la bab gyur na/ /dpal ldan grogs mo rnyad pa dang / /nor dang 'bru ni 'phel ba dang / /dpal rnams kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /U la gal te bab gyur na/ /

de ni dgra yis 'tshe bar snang / /bran gza' dang ni gnyen tshan rnams/ /'jigs shing skrag par snang bar 'gyur/ /yi ge e la bab gyur na/ /'phral du skye bo skal can 'gyur/ /skyes pa bud med dag gi ni/ /
mchod pa'i gnas ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /ai mtshan ma la lhung na/ /dgra dang rgyal po'i 'jigs pa'i dang / /lus can rkun pos gzer 'gyur zhing / /nad dang rims kyis thebs par 'gyur/ /o'i mtshan ma la

bab na/ /gnas kyi dbang por 'gyur ba dang / /nor dang 'bru ni rnyed 'gyur zhing / /yid 'ongs rim pa de bzhin no/ /au yi mtshan ma la bab na/ /'thab mo dang ni dgras 'tshe zhing / /gnas las nyams dang brdeg

btsog dang / /byas pa chud ni zos par 'gyur/ /yi ge a~M la bab gyur na/ /bran bza' dag ni rnyed 'gyur zhing / /bu dang rig pa'ang rnyed 'gyur te/ /de bzhin grogs po rnyed par 'gyur/ /ji ltar sngon gyi a zhes
pa/ /de bzhin mtha' ma'ang gzung bar bya/ /drug 'gyur du ni bzhag nas su/ /snga ma de bzhin sum 'gyur bya/ /sum brgya drug cur bsres nas su/ /sa bzhi ru ni bcad nas su/ /yi ge lhag ma
gzung byas te/ /dge dang mi dge mtshon par bya/ /yang na ri mo kyag kyog bri/ /dbyangs kyi dang po la sogs bgrang / /yang na me tog gtor nas ni/ /de bzhin sa ni mtshon par bya/ /yang na sngo dro
ro hi tA'i/ /dus su rtsi ba po yis blta/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos rab rgyas pa'o/ /bcu gnyis kyi ni gnas dag tu/ /sems ni bskyed pa'i cho ga bshad/ /ro hi tA'i dus bdag nyid bsam/ /
sa dbang phyug la de bzhin khyim/ /rmi lam la ni spun gyi bsam/ /byA ku li la nye du ste/ /b+hi dri kA la bu yi bsam/ /sme ba la ni dgra yir bstan/ /raN+DA la ni sbyor ba bsam/ /ma ka ra
la gso dpyad don/ /rus sbal la ni chos kyi don/ /khyu mchog la ni drag po'i las/ /bzang po la ni nor shes bya/ /gti mug la ni kun tu 'khrug /'phel ba la ni reg byed na/ /don rnams 'grub par 'gyur
ba dang / /nor dang 'bru dang phrad pa dang / /grogs po sdug dang 'phrad par 'gyur/ /dus ni ring por mi sdod cing / /myur du 'phrad 'gyur gdon mi za/ /sa dbang phyug la reg tsam gyis/ /lam du 'gro
ba nyid dang ni/ /kha zas sems dang bu dang nor/ /lam gyi bsam pa ston par byed/ /rmi lam la ni nor rnyed cing / /mchod pa 'thob cing grogs dang 'phrad/ /gnyen bshes yid ni dga' ba dang / /

zhi zhing dgos pa'ang 'grub par ston/ /byA ku la la mya ngan dang / /khyed par can gyi don nyams shing / /gnyen 'dun dang ni 'bral bar 'gyur/ /b+hi dri skyes ni ster ba dang / /byams par smra ba rnyed 'gyur te/ /
bu ni skye ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /mi ki rA la rtsod pa dang / /ca cos kun tu nyon mongs shing / /chom po bkra ni mi shis dang / /gnyen 'dun nad kyis thebs par 'gyur/ /raN+TA la ni btung dang bza'/ /
gos dang rgyan la sogs rnyed cing / /stor ba slar yang rnyed pa dang / /bud med sdug dang phrad par 'gyur/ /ma ka ra la sems khral dang / /don gnyer 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /yid 'ong nor dang 'bral

'gyur zhing / /'dod pa rnams dang 'phrad mi 'gyur/ /rus sbal la ni skal bzang zhing / /zhi dang bsrung dang bkra shis 'gyur/ /stan dang nor dang btung ba rnyed/ /khyu mchog la ni las rnams la/ /rgyal po'i
chad pas nges par 'jigs/ /mya ngan dang ni gnas su 'gro/ /bye bral dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /bzang po la ni longs spyod dang / /don rnams thams cad nges
par 'grub/ /mchod pa'i gnas 'gyur grogs dang ni/ /bkra shis dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gti mug la ni don rnams kun/ /snying po med pa'i rtswa dang mtshungs/ /gnas ni bcings dang
lam gyi ni/ /'du shes dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /nyon cig lha mo skal ba chen mo/ /yan lag gi ni mtshan ma rnams ni/ /'phel ba'i nyi ma la mig g.yon pa 'gul na pha dang ma skrag par 'gyur ro/ /

sa'i dbang phyug la ni mdzes par snang ngo / /rmi lam la ni gos rnyed do/ /'phyo ba la ni nor rnyed do/ /'bug pa la ni ma dang pha la nyes don 'byung ngo / /sme ba la ni cir yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yugs sa mo

la ni gnyen 'dun 'ong ngo / /chu srin la ni bgo ba rnyed do/ /rus sbal la ni 'thab rtsod do/ /khyu mchog la ni byang phyogs nas mgron po 'ong ngo / /bzang po dang / gti mug la de bzhin du bgo ba'o/ /'phel

ba'i nyi ma la mig g.yas pa 'gul ba'i 'bras bu yang snga ma bzhin no/ /sa'i dbang phyug la ni ci'i mtshan mar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam la ni 'thab rtsod do/ /byA ku li la ni lam rings kyi gtam thos par 'gyur ro/ /

'bugs pa la ni nor nyams par 'gyur ro/ /sme ba la ni nor rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /yugs sa mo la ni ngu bar ston no/ /chu srin la ni cir yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rus sbal la ni bgo ba rnyed do/ /khyu mchog la ni stor ba

rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /bzang po la ni 'gron po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gti mug la ni pho nya dang phrad do/ /yang ro hi tA'i nyi ma la/ rna ba g.yas pa ngu na bud med dang 'phrad do/ /sa'i dbang phyug gis ni mdzes par
'gyur ro/ /rmi lam gyis ni mgu bar 'gyur ro/ /byA ku lis ni btung ba rnyed do/ /b+hi dri kas ni cung zad skrag par 'gyur ro/ /mi ki rAs kyang de bzhin no/ /raN Das ni mya ngan gyis 'dzin no/ /ma ka

ras ni mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /rus sbal ni 'gron po 'ong ngo / /br-i Sha b+has ni byams sdug tu 'gyur ro/ /bzang pos ni mnyes par 'gyur ro/ /gti mug gis ni cir yang mi 'gyur ro/ /ro hi tA'i nyi ma la rna ba g.yon pa ngu na/ bza' ba

dang btung ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /sa'i dbang phyug gis ni dge bar 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam gyis ni sngon ma mthong ba cung zad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byA ku li la bcing bar 'gyur ro/ /b+hi dri kA la 'thab rtsod 'byung ngo / /mi ki rA la

gzhan dag 'ong ngo / /raN+TA la stor brlag thos par 'gyur ro/ /ma ka ra la shi chad thos par 'gyur ro/ /kUrma la mya ngan gyis 'dzin to/ /b+h-i Sha b+ha la dge bar ston no/ /bzang pos ni gtam ngan thos par 'gyur ro/ /gti mug

gis ni cir yang mi 'gyur ro/ /ro hi tA'i nyi ma la rkan g.ya' na/ mi chen po 'ong ngo / /sa'i dbang phyug gis ni khyim dge bar 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam gyis ni su zhig 'ong bar ston no/ /byA ku lis ni bgo ba rnyed do/ /b+hi dri kAs ni sems

khral skye bo/ /mi ki rAs ni bde bar ston no/ /raN DAs ni skrag go/ /ma ka ras ni khyim 'phel lo/ /kUr mas ni su zhig 'chi bar ston to/ /khyu mchog gis ni 'dron po 'ong bar gyur to/ /bzang pos ni chom po 'ong bar ston to/ /gti mug

gis ni khyim mdzes par ston to/ /ro hi tA'i nyi ma la lus thams cad g.yen/ 'thab rtsod dang skyo sngogs 'byung ngo / /sa'i dbang phyug gis ni nor rnyed do/ /rmi lam gyis ni 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /byA ku lis ni ma dang pha la nyes don 'byung ngo / /

b+hi dri kAs ni las nye bar gnas par ston to/ /mi ki rAs ni pha ma skrag pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /raN DAs ni lho phyogs nas 'gron po 'ong bar ston to/ /ma ka ras ni skya seng 'ong bar ston to/ /kUr mas ni 'gron po blo bur du 'ong ngo / /

b+hi Sha b+has ni mya ngan skye'o/ /b+ha dras ni 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo / /gti mug gis ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran no/ /ro hi tA'i nyi ma la rkang pa'i sha 'gul na dge'o/ /sa'i dbang phyug kyang de bzhin no/ /rmi lam gyis ni gtam 'dri ba dag 'ong ngo / /

byA ku lis ni 'thab rtsod do/ /b+hi dri kAs ni bdag po mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /mi ki rAs kyang 'thab rtsod do/ /raN Das ni 'thab rtsod dang skyo sngogs su 'gyur ro/ /ma ka ras kyang de bzhin no/ /kUr mas ni de nyid du su zhig 'chi bar ston

br-i Sha b+has ni gos rnyed do/ /b+ha dras ni nad dang phrad par 'gyur ro/ /mo hi tAs ni mya ngan dang phrad par 'gyur ro/ /'phel ba nor rgyas bu yin te/ /gti mug de bzhin 'jog po yin/ /bzang po stobs kyis rgyu ba ste/ /khyu mchog pad mar

shes bya ste/ /rus sbal de bzhin pad ma che/ /chu srin du ni dung skyong gsungs/ /yugs sa mo ni mtha' yas bzhed/ /rig ldan sme bar shes par bya/ /'bugs pa mgo brgya pa zhes bya/ /'phyo ba yid kyis 'gro ba ste/ /
rmi lam gtsigs pa zhes bya yin/ /sa yi dbang phyug char 'bebs so/ /lha mo bcu gnyis 'di dag ni/ /lo gnas rten 'brel bcu gnyis dngos/ /de ltar sa rnams shes byas nas/ /dge dang mi dge brtag par bya/ /

de nas dus su bgrod pa ni/ /bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon/ /dga' ba skad cig nyid dang ni/ /'bras bu'i yan lag bye brag rnams/ /sum 'gyur du ni sgyur byas te/ /kun la rkang pa bzhi yis dgang / /mdud pa
bcad cing 'char ba yis/ /dus ni de ltar brjod pa yin/ /chad pa bgegs dang gza' rnams dang / /mdung dang dgra rnams ltung ba dang / /khyim sa yi ni dpyad dag la/ /lto 'phye ltor ni brko ba dang / /

'gro 'ong sbyor ba'i bye brag dang / /tshe dang nad med spel ba dang / /de bzhin sa bon gdab pa dang / /phyugs rnams ji ltar gdul ba dang / /bral dang 'du dang rgyal srid dang / /rnyed pa dag ni spang bya zhing / /

yid las byung dang g.yul 'gyed dang / /sdong bu'i phung po de bzhin te/ /byis pa gso ba'i sgrub pa dang / /mig sman khyab par de bzhin te/ /dus dang tshod la sogs pa nyid/ /nyin dang nyin gyis dbye bar bya/ /

bcud kyis len dang rtsi rnam gnyis/ /las ni yongs su smin par bya/ /sems 'phel mnyam par 'jug pa yis/ /srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin te/ /de ltar rtsi dang bcud len stsogs/ /blo ldan 'bad pas shes bya zhes/ /
dam tshig kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro
las/ /dbugs brtsi ba'i rim par phye ba zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub mchog gi rig pa la/ /sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya ba/ /gsang ba
chen po'i dbang phyug ste/ /sems can thams cad gdul mdzad gnyen/ /dbang phyug thams cad byed pa po/ /'di ni rig pa dam pa mchog /ming tsam mchog tu rnyed dka' ba/ /dang po chos kyi 'byung
gnas bsam/ /de nas yi ge dgod par bya/ /dbyangs yig dang po thig ler bcas/ /pad ma'i steng du yang dag gnas/ /rtag tu dbugs kyi ngo bo ste/ /'byung ba ru ni byed pa yin/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas
mdzes pa'i mdog /phyogs kun du ni rnam par 'phro/ /sna tshogs mdud pa'i 'char ba che/ /zla ba'i dbugs gnas bsgom par bya/ /kun tu 'gro ba 'thob 'gyur zhing / /'di ni rnyed dka'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /

de nyid spangs pas yi ge med/ /'gyur med rnyog pa med pa ste/ /dung dang zla 'dra dri med pa'i/ /byang chub sems zhes de bya'o/ /rang gi snying gi dbus gyur par/ /'dab brgyad pad mas shin tu brgyan/ /de yi dbus
gyur sa bon ni/ /gangs dang 'dra bar 'dzag pa ste/ /mchog tu zhi ba'i ha la ni/ /dbyangs yig drug pa dang sbyar nas/ /thig les steng du brgyan pa yi/ /yi ge dgod pas dgod par bya/ /rnal 'byor
pa yi dbugs rngub byed/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'o/ /rang gi mgrin dbus gnas par yang / /pad ma dmar po kun 'ong mdzes/ /der ni thig le zla ba yis/ /brgyan pa'i dbyangs yig bcu
gsum pa/ /pu lu ta zhes bya bar grags/ /mgo yi klad pa'i dbus gnas par/ /thig le'i gzugs can mi shigs pa/ /a ta sa yi me tog bzhin/ /'og tu bltas shing 'phyang ba ste/ /

nyin dang mtshan du bdud rtsi yi/ /tshul gyis 'bab pas yang dag gnas/ /dang po 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni/ /dbyangs yig gis ni khyad par sbyar/ /rang gi phyag rgyar mngon ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub

rab tu ster/ /de yi brtul zhugs ma bshad de/ /sbyin sreg las dang sngags rnams dang / /gzung ba dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /gcig nas gcig tu ldog par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dbyibs chos dag /
sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ste/ /dug med byas nas nan tan du/ /brten bya 'di ni bsten byas nas/ /srid pa'i longs spyod dag 'gyur zhing / /srid pas srid pa mchog gi bdag /ye shes rnam pa gsum
gyis ni/ /srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sbyor ba 'di/ /rtag tu rgyun du goms byas na/ /zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam 'gyur zhes/ /
rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs pa/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus gyur sa bon ni/ /sngo zhing cung zad dmar
ba'i 'od/ /'od zer sngon po'i phreng 'khrugs las/ /'dam skyes sngon po lta bu yi/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/ /mgo skyes kham pa gyen bsgreng zhing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnams par
klubs/ /rked pa stag gi lpags pas dkris/ /phyag na lcags kyu zhags pa dag /mda' dang gzhu ni mchog tu 'gengs/ /in dra nI la lta bu ste/ /dang po'i yi ge las byung sgom/ /gang gi rig pa rab
sbyor bas/ /kun nas de ma thag tu 'grub/ /dmar po ru ni bsgoms nas su/ /de nas cho ga bzhin du bya/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan par/ /srid pa gsum po bsgom par bya/ /'bad pas
bsgrub bya snang byas te/ /slar yang de nyid du ni gzhug /des ni sa gsum ma lus pa/ /bsgrub pa po yi dbang du 'gyur/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug drag po dang / /dbang po dang ni 'dod lha sogs/ /
yi ge phan tshun bskul ba yi/ /chung ma dang ni bcas te mgugs/ /bcom ldan de nyid shes bya ba/ /spyod pa'i gar gyis gtso bo yin/ /de nas dbus ma'i mtha' dang ldan/ /thig le sgra yis yang dag
mtshan/ /sku gsung thugs la legs gnas par/ /dngos po bsgom pas bsgom byas na/ /gong bu dgug pa'i dam pa yin/ /b+ha ga yi ni dbus gyur pa/ /ye ge rgya mtsho bsgom byas la/ /
yi ge mi 'gyur rdzogs pa las/ /sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa/ /rdo rje dang ni kha T+wA~M rnams/ /dpa' bo spyi gtsug zla phyed brgyan/ /gshor dang thod pa'ang bsdams pa ste/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar
bsgom par bya/ /rlung dang me ni yang dag ldan/ /chu dang dbang chen mnan pa ste/ /spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro/ /'bad de sgrub bya dmigs na ni/ /khu ba dgug pa'i dam pa yin/ /
ts-i yi ye shes las byung ba/ /sku mdog ser po kun tu 'bar/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /mgo skyes thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /sdigs mdzub rdo rje zhags pa dang / /ka pA la ni phyag g.yon na/ /
g.yas na rdo rje 'bar ba dang / /de bzhin du ni lcags kyu'i mchog /rta zhal tshul du byas nas ni/ /chang 'gugs pa'i dam pa yin/ /ra yi ye shes las byung ba/ /'od zer dmar po drag chen po/ /

dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /lce spyang gi ni gdong can te/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa dang / /rdo rje de bzhin ral gri bsnams/ /khrag gis
gang ba'i lus can sgom/ /'bed de bsgrub bya dmigs nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro/ /rdo rje phra mos phug nas su/ /'jib pa nyid du rab bsgoms na/ /khrag dgug pa yi dam pa zhes/ /
sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes grags pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/
sgyu ma kun tu rnam par 'phrul pa'i rim pa phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// // rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs ni/ /bshad par bya yis lha mo nyon/ /dang por ro ni bsgoms byas te/ /
mkhas pas chos dbyings rang bzhin bsam/ /rnal 'byor pa ni der gnas nas/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /rang snying zla ba'i dbus su ni/ /de nyid thams cad bkod nas su/ /de yi 'od zer
las byung ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs mchod nas ni/ /phyag byas nas ni 'di skad brjod/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /kun nas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi
ba ni/ /dus 'di nas bzung ji srid du/ /byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /yang dag byang chub nges mdzad pa/ /de bzhin bla med byang chub sems/ /dam pa
bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor skyed sdom pa/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te mchog tu gzung / /bslab pa yi ni
tshul khrims dang / /dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis so sor brtan por bzung / /rdo rje rigs mtho chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /
yang dag nyid du gzung bgyi zhing / /slob dpon dag kyang bdag gis gzung / /rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor gyi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi
stsal bar bgyi/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos yang dag gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po
la/ /mchod pa ci nus bgyi ba dang / /sdom pa thams cad ldan par bgyi/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa de ni skyed bgyi zhing / /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sdom pa ma lus gzung
bar bgyi/ /ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang / /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /'gro kun mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de nas oM swa b+hA ba shud d+ha sarba
d+harmaHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ de nas tshig 'di brjod nas chos thams cad bdag med par lta ste/ de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sku mdog sngon po 'jigs
chen po/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum gyis ni mdzes pa ste/ /yi dgas chen po gdan du byas/ /nyi ma la bzhugs gar dang ldan/ /phyag na thod pa

kha T+wA~M dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang gzhu dang mda'/ /cho ga'i bya ba de nyid kyis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya/ /shar ni dkar zhing 'od sngo ste/ /g.yon na kha T+wA~M dril bu dang / /gzhan na rdo rje thod pa'o/ /
byang phyogs dmar gang ser skya'i 'od/ /g.yon na kha T+wA~M zhags pa dang / /g.yas na rnge'u chung thod pa bsnams/ /nub phyogs dmar zhing ser skya'i 'od/ /gzhu dang mda' yi mchog dang ni/ /sna tshogs
pad ma thod pa dag /g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyag tu dgod/ /lho ni dkar zhing ser ba'i 'od/ /g.yon na dung dang rin chen te/ /g.yas na ba dan thod pa bsnams/ /glang chen lce spyang mi dang ni/ /
glang gi thod par rim bzhin bzhug /dang po ltung byed ma yin te/ /gnyis pa de bzhin gsod ma yin/ /gsum pa mgugs ma zhes bya ste/ /bzhi pa gar gyi dbang phyug ma/ /rig ma de dag gyen
skra 'bar/ /rgyan rnams thams cad rnam par klubs/ /gar dang ldan pas yang dag bzhugs/ /phyogs mtshams dag ni bzhi po ru/ /thod pa rnam pa bzhi po dgod/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis
rnam brgyan pa/ /spyi gtsug gsal bar yang dag ldan/ /dang po'i yi ge ldan pa ru/ /bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub 'bras rab ster/ /lha mo de ltar bsgoms na ni/ /sbyor ba'i
dngos grub rig pa che/ /yid ches yang dag 'jug par 'gyur/ /mi snang ba dang thams cad dang / /sgrub pos skad cig gis mthong 'gyur/ /lha mchog las skyes phrogs nas su/ /sangs rgyas kun
gyi bu mo spyod/ /gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /nyid kyi rdo rje gnas bzhugs pa/ /lag tu shing thog bzhag pa bzhin/ /rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye snyed zhing
dag na/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid rnams/ /thams cad rang gi sems nyid kyi/ /ri mo las byung mthong bar 'gyur/ /sngags kyi yi ge go zlog pas/ /rgyud dang sngags ni bsgom par bya/ /
gsang chen dam pa de dag ni/ /mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin/ /tho rangs rang gi snying gar ni/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de steng yi ge hU~M bsgoms la/ /byams pa'i sems ni bskyed nas su/ /

de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /kha khyer de bzhin rdo rjes mtshan/ /skud pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /dar gyi phreng bas mdzes par byas/ /dkyil 'khor grwa rnams thams cad dang / /

sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnam spras par/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /shes rab can gyis de'i nang du/ /'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam brgyan te/ /de yi dbus su pad ma ni/ /

dkar pos shin du mdzes par bya/ /slar yang de yi dbus gyur par/ /'od ldan pad ma dkar po bri/ /de nas sngags pas de'i nang du/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba kun 'khrugs bri/ /slar yang pad chen 'dab brgyad pa/ /

in tra nI la'i 'od 'bar bri/ /rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su/ /dkyil 'khor lngas ni rnam brgyan pa/ /ri rab lhun po'i steng du ni/ /sna tshogs pad ma yid 'ong bsam/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu
gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o/ /a ni snar rtser bsams nas su/ /
pa ni ling ga'i lte bar bsam/ /de nas mnyam par sbyar byas te/ /rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo kun/ /pad ma'i lte ba rnams su sbyar/ /a ba d+hU tI'i gnas de bzhin/ /smin ma'i bar du gzhag par bya/ /

dbyangs yig dang por yang dag ldan/ /bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar/ /de nas 'bar phreng rgya mtshor ni/ /kun nas sgo'i 'khor lo bsam/ /lte ba snying ga'i kha dang ni/ /dpral steng spyi gtsug 'khor lo ni/ /

dang po sngags tshogs byin gyis brlab/ /lte ba snying gar rnal 'byor ma/ /lce gnyis dpa' bos byin gyis brlab/ /dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med cho ga ji bzhin du/ /'gal me'i 'khor lo la gnas pa/ /
mkha' 'gro ma ni de bzhin 'khor/ /glog lta bur ni gsal ba'i 'od/ /yid shugs chen pos rig pa che/ /lha'i rnal 'byor dus su ni/ /phyogs bcu rnams su spro bar bya/ /shin tu phra ba'i rdul tshogs ni/ /

shin tu phra ba'i dngos por bsgom/ /'gyur ba med cing snang ba med/ /kun mkhyen 'bras bu ster ba'o/ /me tog la ni gnas bsams te/ /gang la byin te rgyas 'debs 'gyur/ /dung dang zla 'dra'i 'od mdzad pa/ /
ltung byed ma yi sbyor ba bsam/ /bsgrub bya kha ru bcug nas ni/ /ldad cing bzlas na ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nas nyi ma la gnas pa'i/ /mdung tshul nyi ma'i 'od can ni/ /bskal pa'i me ltar rab 'jigs
pa'i/ /gsod ma bsams te yid kyis su/ /bsgrub byar lhan cig gcig gyur nas/ /steng du bltas na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de nas rlung dang me'i ni/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas me stag gi/ /phung po 'phro
ba'i mgugs ma bsam/ /yid kyis bsgrub bya'i snying zhugs te/ /de yi snying ni rtsa nas dbyung / /'gugs ma'i sngags bzlas 'gugs par 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sems kyis ni/ /
rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ /rlung mdog bsgrub bya rlung nang bsam/ /slar yang bdag dang bsgrub bya ni/ /gcig tu gyur te gar mdzad ma'i/ /sngags zlos shing ni gar byas na/ /gar byed byed du 'jug

par 'gyur/ /mchod pa rdo rje rab sbyor gyis/ /de nas las rnams kun sgrub bya/ /snying ga nyid dang de bzhin kha/ /mgo dang spyi gtsug mtshon cha ste/ /lte ba snying ga rnams su ni/ /dbugs mi g.yo bas bsgom

par bya/ /dang po rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /gnyis pa pad ma gar dbang rgyal/ /gsum pa rnam par snang mdzad de/ /de bzhin bzhi pa rta mchog rgyal/ /lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma ste/ /drug pa he ru kar ni brjod/ /slar yang

lte ba snying ga dang / /de bzhin kha dang mgo dang ni/ /spyi gtsug mtshon cha nyid dag ste/ /rdo rje phag mo gshin rje ma/ /de bzhin rmongs ma bskyod ma ste/ /skrag ma dang ni gtum mo rnams/ /drug po 'di dag rig pa
che/ /pha rol phyin pa rnam pa drug /de nas dbang bskur bsgoms nas ni/ /phyi nas mchod pa brtsam par bya/ /bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas/ /dpal ldan he ru kar dran bya/ /dam tshig ye shes
gcig gyur bas/ /des ni rdo rje can du brjod/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni mchod chen dang / /de bzhin sngags kyi dgod pa ste/ /de nas dpa' bo mchod shes nas/ /las ni 'bed pa nyid kyis bya/ /sngags pas

rang dgar dbye bya ste/ /phyin ci log tu nges par sbyar/ /tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa'i/ /las kyi mdog tu rnam par sgom/ /de nyid dbye bas phye nas ni/ /rtsa ni lam du sbyar bar bya/ /sbyor ba yi ni don rnams la/ /

dga' ba chen pos 'dis sgrub bya/ /cho ga 'di yis bsgrubs na ni/ /lha dang lha min mir bcas 'grub/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /

bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ dpa' bo'i gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa dang / las kyi tshogs rnams 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// //

de nas sku gsung thugs kyi ni/ /'khor lor gnas pa'i bye brag dang / /gnas kyi rab tu dbye ba dang / /yul gyi dbye ba bshad par bya/ /go ni ma la ya yul te/ /spyi gtsug dzA la d+ha ra yin/ /u r+yan rna ba g.yas pa ste/ /

ar bu da ni rgyab phyogs yin/ /gnas kyi ming can rnam pa bzhi'o/ /go da ba ri rna g.yon te/ /ra mI shwa ri smin dbus gsungs/ /mig ni de bi ko Ti ste/ /dbung ba ma la ba zhes brjod/ /'di dag nye ba'i gnas yin te/ /

gnas kyi khyad par tshul gyis ni/ /mkha' spyod thugs kyi 'khor lor gnas/ /kA ma ru mchan khung de bzhin du/ /nu ma o Ter rab tu grags/ /de dag zhing ste lte ba ni/ /tri sha ku ni zhes bya yin/ /sna yi rtse mo ko

sa la/ /de dag nye ba'i zhing du brjod/ /kha ni ka ling ga yin te/ /mgrin pa lam pa ka ru brjod/ /tshan d+hA+o ha zhes bya bar grags/ /snying ka kin tsi zhes bya ste/ /chu so hi ma la zhes bya/ /nye ba'i rol sar brjod pa

yin/ /gnas kyi khyad par tshul gyi ni/ /sa spyod gsung gi 'khor lor gnas/ /mtshan ni yi dgas gnas pa ste/ /gri ha de ba bshang ba'i lam/ /de dag 'dun sar brjod pa ste/ /brla ni sau raSh+Ta zhes bya/ /byin pa gnyis ni gser gling ste/ /nyi ba'i 'dun sa

nyid yin no/ /sor mo rnams ni na ga ra/ /rkang pa'i bol ni sin d+hu ste/ /dur khrod ces ni bya bar brjod/ /mthe bo ma ru zhes bya ste/ /pus mo ku lu tA zhes brjod/ /nye ba'i dur khrod sa 'og ni/ /sku yi 'khor lor yang dag gnas/ /rang lus
skyes pa'i yul 'di dag /mkha' spyod ma yi gnas su brjod/ /phyi dang nang dang yang dag gnas/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yin/ /gnas rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /

rtsa rnams kun ni yang dag bshad/ /yul 'di rnams ni bu mos gang / /rtsa'i gzugs kyis gnas so zhes/ /dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan

rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /slar yang bsdus te bshad bya ba/ /de ni bdag gis bshad kyis nyon/ /pul+lI ra dang ma la yar thod pa'i dum bu can dang rab tu gtum ma ste/ so dang sen mo 'bab pa'o/ /dzA la~M d+ha rar keng rus chen po dang gtum

mig ma ste/ skra dang ba spu 'bab pa'o/ /o Ta ya ner keng rus dang 'od ldan ma ste/ lpags pa dang dri ma 'bab pa'o/ /ar bu der mche ba rnams par gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma ste/ sha 'bab pa ste/ gnas so/ /go da ba rer lha'i sgra dang dpa'

bo'i blo ma ste/ thams cad du ni rgyus pa 'bab pa'o/ /rA me shwa rir 'od dpag med pa dang mi thung ma ste/ rus pa'i phreng ba 'bab pa'o/ /de bi ko Tar rdo rje'i 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ rtag tu mchin pa 'bab pa'o/ /ma la bar rdo rje'i

lus dang ljon grib ma ste/ snying phrug 'bab pa ste nye ba'i gnas so/ /de ltar bstan pa 'di dag ni/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod de/ /snyoms par zhugs pas yang dag gnas/ /kA ma ru par ni myu gu can dang sa srung ma ste/ rtag tu mig

'bab pa'o/ /o Ter ni rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo ste/ mkhris pa 'bab par grags pa ste zhing ngo / /tri sha ku ner dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs ma ste/ glo ba 'bab pa'o/ /ko sa lar rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang chang 'thung ma ste/

rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'bab pa'o/ /nye ba'i zhing ngo / /ka ling kar ni shin tu bzang po dang sngo bsangs lha mo ste/ rtsib logs kyi snal ma 'bab pa'o/ /lam bA kar ni rdo rje bzang po dang shin tu bzang mo ste/ bong bu rnams ltar lto 'bab pa'o/ /

rol sa'o/ /kan rtsir ni 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rna ma ste/ bshang ba 'bab par grags so/ /hi ma la yar ni mig mi bzang dang khwa gdong ma ste/ mtshogs ma'i srubs 'bab pa'o/ /nye ba'i rol sa'o/ /gsung gi 'khor lo

sa spyod de/ /snyoms par zhugs pas yang dag gnas/ /pre ta pu rir ni stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste/ thams cad du bad kan 'bab pa'o/ /gri ha de ba tar ni rin chen rdo rje dang dung skyes ma ste/ rtag tu rnag 'bab pa'o/ /'dun sa'o/ /

sau raSh+Tar ni/ rta 'grin dang glang rna ma ste/ rtag tu khrag 'bab par grags so/ /su brna di pa ra nam mkha'i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste/ de bzhin du rdul 'bab pa'o/ /nye ba'i 'dun sa'o/ /nA ga rar ni lha'i dgra dang shin tu dpa'

mo ste/ tshil 'bab pa'o/ /sin+d+hu'i yul du ni pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang / stobs chen ma ste/ rtag tu mchi ma 'bab pa'o/ /dur khrod do/ /ma rur ni rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor lo sgyur ma ste/ mchil ma 'bab par grags so/ /

ku la tar ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo ste/ snabs gzhon nu 'bab pa'o/ /nye ba'i dur khrod do/ /sku yi 'khor lo sa 'og spyod/ /snyoms par zhugs pas zhugs yin zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i gnas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rim
par phye ba ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas las kyi rab mchog ni/ /sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa ste/ /gang yang grub par byed pa'i sngags/ /de yi dbye ba rim bzhin bshad/ /yi ge pho nya la sogs sngags/ /

mda' yi shugs kyis yongs su 'khor/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /sde tshan brgyad kyis shin du bskor/ /sngags rnams thams cad 'byung ba ste/ /gzhan yang ci yang rung ba ste/ /chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /lus can rnams

kyi snying dga' byed/ /sgra lnga dang ni yang dag ldan/ /ya ra la was rnam par klubs/ /longs spyod 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /ro rnams kyi ni rten rang bzhin/ /cha rnams bzhi po dag gis ni/ /kun nas yongs su bskor

ba'o/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che/ /byang chub sum bcu gnyis dang ldan/ /zla ba nyi ma zhes bya ba/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos gnyis su/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /'gro dang 'ong bar nges par brjod/ /

gnas gnyis la ni mnyam par zhon/ /'og dang steng du yang dag brtan/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos gnyis su/ /dbyangs yig bcu gnyis steng bltas bris/ /ka sogs 'og tu bltas pa ni/ /ngos gnyis dag tu spel ba

ste/ /dbus su des ni sbyar bar bya/ /da ltar bstan pa 'di dag ni/ /rtsa dang sgra yi rang bzhin no/ /gnyis med ye shes rdo rje ste/ /mkha' 'gro sgra yi rang bzhin no/ /nges 'byung sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /gang du skye ba zhes

byar grags/ /shin tu rnam dag ye shes che/ /lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin gang / /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste/ /mchog tu bde bar brjod pa yin/ /rang 'byung gis ni gzugs 'di nyid/ /spro dang sdud par byed pa'o/ /

yi ge pho nya la sogs sngags/ /der ni cha dang bral ba gang / /b+ha ga'i dbus su gzugs med pa/ /de ni rtag tu gnas pa yin/ /smin dbus pad ma'i zla ba ru/ /bcu drug skud pas bskor ba yin/ /shes rab thabs
kyi mnyam sbyor gyis/ /kha sbyor zhes byar brjod pa yin/ /lag gnyis kun du 'khyud pa yin/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings brjod/ /slar yang rnam par grol ba'i lam/ /'bab pa'i tshogs ni mchog tu dga'/ /

sbyor ba kha sbyar nyid dang ni/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud du bzhed/ /rdo rje pad ma dbye ba dang / /sgron chung sbrang rtsi byed par bshad/ /skor ba gang phyir bskyod pa ste/ /bde de'i thabs kyis kun rig pa'o/ /dga' dang bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /

zhags pa pad mor bcug pa yin/ /chags pa lcags kyu kho na ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug /mi 'khrug rdo rjes dkrug par bya/ /de ni gsal shing zhes byar brjod/ /de nas chags sogs nyon mongs kyi/ /

bag chags dum bu nyid du bya/ /shin tu rgya cher dmigs pa yis/ /kun rdzob de bzhin brdung ba dang / /dngos kun rdo rjes med par bya/ /rdo rje zhes bya de bzhin gshegs/ /ji ltar bstan kyang de dbus su/ /rtag stong 'byin dang sdud

pa po/ /de ni de nyid ces bya ste/ /rang 'byung gcig gis khyab pa'o/ /gang ming sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sgyu ma zhes byar grags pa ste/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid gang gnas pa'o/ /

'di ni kun mkhyen zhes bya ste/ /kun tu 'gro ba mi shigs pa'o/ /pad ma yi ni sna rtse ru/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu kun sgom bya/ /phyi rol yi ge spangs nas su/ /yid kyi bzlas dang ldan par bya/ /nges pa'i go 'phang rtag tu gnas/ /

bstan pa chos dbyings rang bzhin no/ /rtag tu phra ba rdul dang bral/ /ye shes sku ste dri ma med/ /gsal ba chos kyi rang bzhin shes/ /mya ngan 'das pa 'ba' zhig yul/ /phan tshun mdud pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /bye brag tu ni

phye nas su/ /sa bon phreng ba de nas sgom/ /hU~M gi skud pas brgyu bar bya/ /bsgrub bya 'gog par gyur na ni/ /gom pa gnyis kyang mi 'gro'o/ /'di yi shes rab lhan skyes te/ /de yi gzugs su gyur bas gnas/ /las kyi

rlung gis bskyod nas su/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nas 'bar/ /sgyu ma chen po zhes byar bshad/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /skra rtse brgyar gyur pa yi cha/ /skad cig glog gi 'od zer can/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dus

su ni/ /ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas/ /phyogs bcu rnams su spros nas ni/ /lha dang lha min kun bsdigs te/ /snying ka'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /bsregs te longs spyod 'khor lor song / /sna bug g.yas nas byung nas ni/ /slar yang

zhugs te smin mtshams kyi/ /mdzod spu'i khung nas byung nas su/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ /sna sgo g.yon du zhugs nas ni/ /spyi bo'i 'khor lo bsregs

nas su/ /sngon gyi lam nas slar byung ste/ /slar yang spyi gtsug tu ni zhugs/ /bsregs par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni song gyur nas/ /sngon bzhin du ni gnas par gyur/ /

dus min 'chi ba las rgyal nyid/ /yan lag kha T+wA~M ga dang sbyar/ /thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni/ /zhal du mchod yon nges sbyar zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de

bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las sku gsum dang sngags dang rgyud kyi 'byung ba dang / 'chi ba slu ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcwa lnga pa'o// //

de nas dngos grub kun gyi gnas/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ste/ /yid 'ong bcud ni kun gyi rten/ /sems can kun la bde ster ba/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis rgyas/ /bla re dam pa bres bas 'bar/ /'dab stong ldan

pa'i pad ma che/ /sbyor ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /der ni lha mos zhus gyur pa/ /'khor lo kun gyi nges pa dang / /dbyangs rnams kyi ni bye brag dang / /yi ge'i dbye ba mi 'tshal te/ /'khor lo'i grangs ni ji lta bu/ /

de rnams las ni ci zhig lags/ /sna tshogs glu yi sngags dang ni/ /'phrul 'khor dag ni mdor bsdus dang / /'khor lo'i dbang phyug dus dang ni/ /de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyi stan/ /'di dag la ni the tsom mchis/ /bde ba chen pos

bshad du gsol/ /bka' stsal pa/ /rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa gang / /de dag thams cad zhu 'dod pa/ /legs so legs so lha mo che/ /blo gros chen mo legs so legs/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyang / /the tsom skye na gzhan ci smos/ /

sgyu ma kun du rnam 'phrul ba/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis ni/ /sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ /mdor bsdus nas ni brjod bya ste/ /de ni bdag gis bshad kyis nyon/ /gnag dang dmar bar rtag gyur nas/ /

khyad par du ni gtor ma sbyin/ /tsa ru'i bza' ba lhan cig bya/ /sgrub pa po yis g.yon nas bskor/ /'di yis sgrub po kun la ni/ /ma mo dga' 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /sa rnams la ni rnam rol pa/ /brtson chen

'khor lo sgyur ma dang / /stobs chen ma dang rab dpa' mo/ /'khor lo'i go cha glang sna ma/ /khaN Da ro ha 'khor lo'i shugs/ /bya gdong ma dang rta rna mo/ /shin tu bzang mo sngo sangs mo/ /chang 'thung ma dang rlung shugs ma/ /de bzhin 'jigs byed chen mo

dang / /sa srungs ma dang ljon grib ma/ /lang ka'i bdag mo mi'u thung mo/ /dpa' bo'i blo ma sna chen mo/ /'od ldan ma dang gtum mig ma/ /rab gtum ma ste sgrub byed yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /'di dag sngon nyid grub pa yin/ /

rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni/ /mthar ni hU~M hU~M phaT dang sbyar/ /oM ni thams cad gsal byed do/ /grub gsol 'dod pa thams cad la/ /rnal 'byor dam mchog 'di mthong na/ /gzhan dag snying po med rtswar mtshungs/ /dpa' bo nyid

gyur grub pa ni/ /dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong bas yin/ /de nas de shes rtag bsgom pa/ /dngos grub de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /nyon cig lha mo shes rab can/ /rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrub

pa'i thabs/ /'khor lo chen po rmad gyur pa/ /gdengs ka'i dbang phyug ces bya ste/ /thos pa tsam gyis sregs byed na/ /ming dang ldan par bris pa yis/ /gdengs ka thams cad smos ci dgos/ /dbang ldan nas ni brtsams nas su/ /

klu rnams sa bon las byung ba/ /rin chen dang ldan gdengs gsum mtho/ /gzhan yang phyogs ni kun tu bsam/ /de nas 'gur 'di bzhes te/ /shar du k+Sha ma~M bar du bri/ /nub tu hi ste byang du ha~M/ /gshin rjer hU~M zhes bya ba bri/ /

ki li ki li yi dgas su/ /srin por tsi li ji snyed pa/ /rlung ni si li si li bri/ /me yi phyogs su di li nyid/ /dang por rab gtum ma nas ni/ /brtson chen ma yi mthar thug pa/ /sngags 'di dag ni byin gyis brlab/ /

'khor lo 'di ni skal chen ldan/ /dgra rnams kyi ni gnad gcod pa/ /hU~M phaT ces bya spel ba yi/ /bsgrub bya de yi dbus su bri/ /lan cig bzlas pa'i gu gul gyis/ /bdug pa nyid du sbyar byas la/ /klu rnams thams cad 'bebs

par 'gyur/ /lag pa g.yon pa la 'khor lo 'di dngos su'am yid kyis bris la sngags lan cig bzlas pas byabs na 'chi bas dus su zin pa slob bar byed do/ /ka ra bi ra'i mdab ma'i khu bas ka ra bi ra'i smyug gus bris te/ lan cig

bzlas pas reg na mngal gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ /dug dang lan tshwa dang skye tshes bris te/ khros na gsod par 'gyur ro/ /ro bsregs pa'i 'gal ba da du ra'i khu bas me bsad de 'byung po'i nyi ma la de nyid kyis 'khor lo bris la

lan cig bzlas pa des gang la bsnun pa ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /sang ko ta'i smyug gus sngags cho ga snga ma bzhin bri la/ thal ba la mngon par bsngags te/ gang la bsnun pa de sha zas bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi sol bas shing

leb bam brtsig ngos la 'byung po'i mtshan mo gang gi snying kar ming bris pa de gdon chen pos bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas la/ de'i snying kar 'phrul 'khor bcug ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du dri'i chu'i nang du bzhag nas/

a ti mug ta'i lcug ma la lan bdun bsngags te de la snun na/ zhag bdun gyi mthar rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo de nyid bye brag du dur khrod kyi ras la pho nya'i kha dog gis bye brag tu gyur pa bris la las kyi pho nya dang

lhan cig tu bsgrub par bya'o/ /ka ra bi ra'i lcug ma khru phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad dang ldan pa la gang la mngon par phyogs te sngags bris nas ro bsreg pa'i me 'bar ba la dor te/ ji srid ma tshig pa dang myur du blangs la rig pa'i rgyal po lan

bdun bzlas nas gang zhig dran te klad la bskor na/ de de'i mod la rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa'i ro'i kham por la bab bla dang yung ba'i khu bas gang gi ming bris pa de de'i mod la bcings par 'gyur ro/ /

dur khrod kyi ras sam/ zla mtshan gyi ras la shing a sho ka'i smyug gus klu rnams spangs pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris la/ de'i dbus su sngags pas cho ga bzhin yi ge e dang spel ba bris na/ mkha' 'gro ma'i khyad

par thams cad dang / lus sprul po thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /thod pa la skyes pa'i khrag gis gang gi ming bris la sngags pa khro ba dang bcas pas sngags bzlas na/ de'i khrag mgugs par byed la yid zhi

ba dang ldan pas zhi bas sngags bzlas na slar gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo de nyid zla bas brgyan cing gsal bar go ro tsa nas gro ga la skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par bris te/ bud med gang gis rtag tu bcangs na rig pa'i rgyal po

nyid de'i lhums su zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bud med dang zhi ba'i 'dus pas kun tu spyod pa'i mi'i mchog de'i lag thil na yod pa'i dpal gang gis kyang dbrog par mi nus la/ rnam pa de lta bu'i cho ga dang ldan pas ni dngos grub

thams cad kyi 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la ni brtul zhugs dang spyod pa dang basmyung ba dang / cho ga med par yang cho ga zhib mo'i sbyor ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis las thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin

byed do/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsam pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /'od zer tshogs ni gsal ba'i mdangs/ /'khor lo'i phreng ba rnam par klubs/ /de dbus 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang / /pad ma'i

phreng bas shin tu mdzes/ /slar yang 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /rdo rje phreng ba rnam par 'phro/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor lta bu yin/ /nam mkha' thams cad g.yog byed pa/ /rang gi lus las spro bar bya/ /

dkar dang dmar dang sngon po ste/ /kha dog mchog gi bye brag bya/ /bya ba'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug de bzhin bri/ /dbus su bsgrub par bya ba'i ming / /ji ltar 'dod bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng

ba ni/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs bri/ /'di ni bsrung ba chen po ste/ /thams cad bsrung ba bla na med/ /rim dang nad dang dug dang ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis 'tshe ba dang / /gdon dang bdud dang log 'dren dang / /gang yang lus

srul la sogs pa/ /grib ma yang ni mi 'gom na/ /de yi lus lta smos ci dgos/ /zla gzugs lta bu'i yi ge lta/ /phyogs bcur rnam par 'byer bar byed/ /dkar po yis ni zhi 'gyur te/ /nag pos skad cig dag gis gsod/ /

dmar po yis ni dbang byed de/ /de nyid kyis ni nges par 'gugs/ /ser pos nges par 'ching 'gyur te/ /dmag gi dpung ni 'ching bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ /las thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i

bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'o/ /bka' yi 'khor lo'i khyad par ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /sems can kun gyi don byed pa'o/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor lta bu yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lta bus bsam/ /bcu drug 'dab mas rnam par brgyan/ /de dbus pad chen 'dab brgyad pa/ /rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi mchog /'od zer dkar pos shin tu mdzes/ /sgrub por

'khor lo'i phyi rol bri/ /pad ma'i lte bar swA hA bri/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'o/ /ma mo'i khyim ni nyams dga' bar/ /tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas ni/ /'bol zhing shin tu 'jam pa yi/ /stan la skye
gnas phyag rgya bcing / /sngags pas bsgrub bya mngon phyogs te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /yan lag rus pas brgyan bsam zhing / /gcer bur gyur pas rang gis bri/ /yi dgas gos sam ro yi ni/ /
bum pa skam po dag la yang / /yi dgas sen rtsi khrag dang ni/ /de bzhin tsan dan dmar pos bri/ /'khor lo de yi steng gnas te/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin thun gsum du/ /blo ldan mthe'u chung bskyod nas ni/ /
bram ze gsod pa'ang nyin bdun 'grub/ /tsan dan dmar po'i rdul las ni/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas la/ /tsha ba gsum gyis lus byugs nas/ /spra tshil gyis kyang byug par bya/ /zangs ma'i khab

kyis skye gnas dbug /seng ldeng mdag me du med la/ /blo dang ldan pas nyin bdun bsro/ /sgrub pa po yis brgya bzlas na/ /rgyal po blon bcas mdun na 'don/ /btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas ni/ /myur du 'gugs

par byed pa yin/ /gro ga yi ni 'dab ma la/ /ro yi sen rtsi ro tsa nas/ /m-i yi bdag po 'khor bcas pa/ /ming dang sbel te bri bar bya/ /mngon par phyogs te bzlas bzhin du/ /seng ldeng dang ni dur khrod mer/ /

ji srid spra tshil ma zhu bar/ /me yi steng du gdung bar bya/ /bsgrub bya mngon par gdungs tsam gyis/ /lha dang lha min 'ong 'gyur na/ /sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos/ /yi dgas sen rtsi skyes pa yi/ /khrag dang 'gi

wang bcas pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i ming spel gro gar bri/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes sa/ /tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni/ /dur khrod zas lhag thal ba rnams/ /sgrub pa po yis cig bsdus nas/ /seng ldeng

me ni du med la/ /rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ /mnyes nas sbyin sreg byas pa yis/ /thal ba de ni bzung nas su/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas te/ /snying kar 'phrul 'khor bcug nas ni/ /zlos bzhin du ni mer

gdungs na/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral 'gyur la/ /rmongs shing rab tu myos nas ni/ /rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/ /cho ga'i bya ba 'di yis ni/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzhed/ /lha mo sngags chen 'di dag ni/ /mkha' 'gro
ma yi snying 'joms yin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /yid 'ong zhi ba bskyed pa mo/ /bka' yi 'khor lo bshad par bya/ /mkha' dbyings dbus gyur bsam pa ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /

rdo rje rtse gsum kha bzhi pa/ /des ni de nas bri bar bya/ /de dbus pad ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /shin tu mdzes pa bris nas su/ /bai ro tsa na'i rig pa che/ /sems can kun skyed sdud pa mo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /

bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /nad thams cad med par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i sbyor ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pas/ /ye shes mngon par shes pa yi/ /'khor lo zhes bya bka' stsal pa/ /

ge sar lte bar ldan pa yi/ /pad ma 'dab ma drug par bri/ /zla ba bzang pos nye bar brgyan/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /de yi phyi rol 'khor lo ste/ /ston ka'i zla ltar dri med pa/ /yi ge mchog ni rnam
pa bdun/ /lha mo chen mo phan pa gcig / bdud thams cad kyi las 'joms par byed pa 'khor lo'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /tsan dan dkar po ro tsa nas/ /gro ga la ni bris nas su/ /'khor lo lag pa
g.yon par bcang / /'khor lo 'di ni lha mo che/ /las kyi 'od kyis brgyan pa yin/ /de nas bsgrub bya nyi dbus su/ /bsams te stong du bzlas nas ni/ /yi ge shel gyi rnam pa ltar/ /bsams te nad kyis

gdungs la bstan/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni/ /nad rnams kun las rnam grol bar/ /'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med/ /lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo 'di/ /zla ba'i dbus su rnam bkod na/ /ston ka yi ni zla 'drar

'gyur/ /'khor lo 'di ni lha mo che/ /las kyi 'od kyis rab brgyan na/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /dur khrod ras sam thod pa 'am/ /arka yi ni 'dab ma la/ /sngar bstan pa

yi sol ba dang / /skyes pa'i khrag gi snag tsha yis/ /sgrub pos ming rus smyug gus bri/ /nyi ma'i dbus gyur khro sems kyis/ /gzugs brnyan byas la bsgrub bya yi/ /dbus su de ni bcug nas su/ /ske tshe yis ni

byugs nas ni/ /yang dang yang du bsro bar bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yis/ /bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /'d-i yi nad rnams thams cad ni/ /'phel dang de bzhin sbyor byed pa'o/ /rims la yi dgas snying kar

bri/ /'ga' ri yi dgas klad pa ste/ /rjed byed rlung dang sprin la bri/ /gzer bar bya ba mdung la ste/ /dug dang mdze nad lto 'phye la/ /gza' la gza' yi mtshan mar bri/ /mdor bsdus nas ni 'khor lor dgod/ /shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra

ba'i/ /yi ge bdud rtsi rgyun 'bab pas/ /ston ka'i zla zer lta bur ni/ /bsam gtan bsams pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'ang nges par slong bar 'gyur/ /sbrul chen brgya yis zin nas ni/ /'chi ba'ang myur du slong bar byed/ /

dug gis rgyal bar gyur pa dag /bstan pa tsam gyis slong bar 'gyur/ /rims dang gdon dang rjed byed dang / /lag pa mthong bas brlag par byed/ /grib ma yang ni mi 'gom na/ /de yi lus lta smos ci dgos/ /zangs ma yi ni

'dab ma 'am/ /lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo 'di/ /bab bla dang ni yung bas bri/ /de nas chu yi nang bzhag la/ /ji ltar 'byung bzhin 'bed de mchod/ /mtshams kyi dus su mnyam bzhag pas/ /de bzhin du ni sngags bzlas bya/ /

chu yi nang nas bton nas su/ /'o mas bkrus la rgya mtshor gzhug /g.yul du khu tshur bcangs nas ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan te/ /yid la rtag tu zlos byed na/ /ji srid khu tshur ma dkrol bar/ /myur du thams cad rengs

'gyur te/ /dgra bo gal te lag na ni/ /mtshon cha phyar te thogs pa yang / /ji srid khu tshur ma dkrol bar/ /mtshon cha gtong bar mi nus so/ /yi ge bdun dang rnal 'byor ma/ /drug gi yi ge 'di dag ni/ /'khor lo drug la gnas par ni/ /
lag pa'i dbus su bkod nas su/ /cho ga rim pas bcang bar bya/ /kha nas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos/ /de yi gzugs gyur bzung nas ni/ /de ni 'gugs 'gyur the tsom med/ /tsan dan dmar po'i rdul dang ni/ /

lan tshwa ske tshe de bzhin te/ /bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes rdul dang ni/ /gcig tu byas nas brtag par bya/ /lan brgyar bzlas te rab bsgoms na/ /sa bdag skye bo'i nor dang ni/ /bcas te dbang du gyur pa 'am/ /de ni 'gugs 'gyur the

tshom med/ /sbyor ba 'di ni grub pa ste/ /gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra/ /rdul de nyid ni bzung nas su/ /lcags phye dang ni sre bar bya/ /dur khrod ras la gtums nas su/ /lan bdun du ni bzlas par bya/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor

sor brgyad tsam/ /brkos te dgra yi ming nas ni/ /bzung nas sa yis dgab par bya/ /gang gi ming bzung de bcings 'gyur/ /phye ma de nyid bzung nas su/ /'o ma yis ni 'bad de bkru/ /slar yang grol 'gyur the tshom med/ /

phye ma de nyid bzung nas su/ /smyo byed lnga dang ldan par bya/ /ro yi gos la bsgrub bya'o/ /ming bris nas ni btum par bya/ /lan brgya bzlas te dur khrod du/ /sbas te skyes bu 'phral du ni/ /smyo 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /
phyung nas ba yi 'o ma yis/ /'bad de slar yang bkus na ni/ /'grol 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom mad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan de bzhin
gshegs/ /rdo rje dpa' bo'i 'khor lo gsungs/ /zla ba'i dbus 'gyur rdo rje ni/ /rtse gsum de bzhin kha drug pa/ /slar yang zla bar pad ma ni/ /mdab drug legs par gnas pa bri/ /de yi dbus gyur

sa bon ni/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa'o/ /sngags pas lte bar bri bar bya/ /bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel bar bya/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams ni/ /thams cad sna tshogs bla na med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi go cha che/ /

mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad/ /dbus su snga ma'i gsang sngags bri/ /pad ma'i mdab mar de bzhin gzhan/ /ri bo drug ni yongs spangs pa/ /rdo rje yi ni lte bar bri/ /gur kum sen rtsi rang khrag dang / /ro tsa na yis gro

ga la/ /cho ga bzhin du bris nas ni/ /dus gsum du ni bzlas byas la/ /mchod chen byas nas gzung bar bya/ /lan bdun du ni mngon zlas te/ /gos kyi mtha' mar bcing bar bya/ /lam du 'gra na rkun po dang / /

stag sogs 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du ni bsrung 'gyur ba/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /lte ba der ni thig le yis/ /bskor ba'i thig le dag kyang bya/ /a ri tsa ta ka bcud dang / /yung ba dag gis khyad par du/ /

a sho ka'i smyug gu yi/ /dpa' bo yi ni ras mar bri/ /bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba yis/ /sngags 'di stong du de nas zla/ /bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes sa dang ni/ /glang po che yi rkang rjes rdul/ /dur khrod thal bar bcas pa las/ /

sgrub pas gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /bcing bas bcings te de yi ni/ /snying ka ru ni gzhug par bya/ /me tog ser pos mchod nas ni/ /gsang ba'i gnas su sbas gyur na/ /dgra rnams thams cad 'ching 'gyur zhing / /

brlag par byed pa mi bzad par/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po'i sngags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /nam mkha'i dbyings gyur sa bon

ni/ /kun tu 'od zer rab 'phro ba/ /ston ka'i zla ltar dri med pa'i/ /'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis bya/ /rtsibs de rnams la sa bon gyi/ /yi ge mchog tu phan pa dgod/ /de yi lte bar dgod bya ba/ /rig pa chen po'i yi ge che/ /

bsrung ba rdo rje'i chog rig pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun go cha bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yi/ /dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming bri bya/ /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ru/ /spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro/ /gur kum dang ni ro tsa nas/ /

gro ga 'am ni ras dkar la/ /snying stobs can gyis bri bar bya/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yin/ /thams cad du ni bsrung ba dang / /bsgrub pa po yis sngar bstan bzhin/ /gdug pa rnams ni tshar gcod byed/ /dngos grub

thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /las mchog de nas bshad par bya/ /gang zhig bsgrub ba tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten gsum po dbang byed pa'o/ /skye gnyis rdo rje'i rigs dang ni/ /gzugs bzang bu mo gzhan yang rung / /

ka ra bi ra'i me tog dmar/ /rgyal gyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /go ro tsa nas bsgrubs nas su/ /me tog der ni chur gnas la/ /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /lan brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /chu bo chen por zhugs
nas su/ /lte ba man chad chur bcug ste/ /lag pa thal sbyar dbus bzung nas/ /rig pa stong du bzlas par bya/ /snyim pa chu yis bkang ba dang / /bcas pas sgrub pos btung bar bya/ /de nas de ni 'grub
'gyur te/ /sgrub pos ngag ni grub pa yis/ /rgyal po chung mar bcas pa dag /yid kyis mgugs 'gyur gdon mi za/ /ka ra bi ra'i me tog ni/ /dmar po yang dag bzung nas ni/ /rig pa lan
bdun bzlas byas la/ /skye gnas dbus su gzhug bya ste/ /me tog de ni kha sbyar nas/ /gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor pas/ /brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas par bya/ /

sgrub po rtse gcig yid kyis ni/ /me tog de ni blangs nas su/ /me tog gis ni gang bsnun pa/ /de yi mod la dbang du 'gyur/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba yi/ /yan lag tshigs kun gzhan dbang ste/ /mngon
'gyur sems ni ldog pa ru/ /skad cig gis ni dbang byed 'gyur/ /'di ni mngon sum grub pa yi/ /don yod dbang du byed pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams

mgugs pa'i cho ga 'khor lo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'o/ /gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis su/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang brlag 'gyur zhing / /dngos grub myur du ster 'gyur ba/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /zla ba'i dbus gyur

rdo rje ste/ /de bzhin gzhan yang pad ma'o/ /kun nas rnam par 'phro ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sa bon dgod/ /dbus su rdo rje phag mo ni/ /shin tu drag cing gsal ba'i gzugs/ /yi ge'i dgod pas dgod par bya/ /

rim pa de ltar brjod pa la/ /zhi la zhi ba'i yid kyis su/ /ro tsa na yis gro gar bri/ /ma mo'i gnas dang dur khrod du/ /gos chen de bzhin khro dang bcas/ /chags pa la ni dmar po'i gos/ /rgyas la gos ser de bzhin te/ /

de dang der ni bsgom byas nas/ /ci rigs par ni sprul par bya/ /bu mo gzhon nu'i ro yis ni/ /gos ni 'bad de blangs nas su/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /de nyid las byung sol ba yis/ /sna tshogs rdo rje kha bzhi

la/ /sngags dang spel bar bris nas ni/ /lan bdun du ni bzlas nas su/ /gang gi khyim du sbas gyur pa/ /de ni gshin rje'i grong khyer du/ /nyi ma bdun gyis 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi rkang pa'i rkang sbubs dang / /

bum pa la sogs dag kyang rung / /rus pa'i phur bu'i sbu gur ni/ /'phrul 'khor 'di ni bcug bya ste/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /'chi 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za/ /las rnams kun la sgrub pa pos/ /cho ga dang ni

ldan par bya/ /rang gis bzung ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyas mi 'grub/ /las 'di mchog tu shes bya ste/ /sngags gzhan rgyas pas ci zhig bya/ /de dag thams cad spangs nas su/ /'di nyid 'bed de
gzung bar bya/ /gang dang gang gi bsam gtan gyis/ /sgrub pos bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /sbyor ba de dang de dag gis/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar nor bu dag pa ni/ /rdzas gang la brten
de gzugs 'dzin/ /de bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro yang / /yang dag bsam gtan mchog 'dzin 'gyur/ /bsam pa gang dang gang gis ni/ /mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor/ /de dang de yi dngos 'gyur te/ /
sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin/ /de nyid bsdus dang 'dus pa ste/ /gzhan yang sngon dang tha ma yi/ /de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga can/ /bya ba'i rgyud rnams thams cad du/ /ji srid me yis 'jig
gi bar/ /de der 'gro ba nyon mongs 'gyur/ /thams cad du ni sbas pa ste/ /brtson 'grus pha rol 'joms pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che/ /
myur du dngos grub skye 'gyur ba/ /'phral du yang dag yid ches byed/ /sgrub pos phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /nyon mi mongs par 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig mi ldan mi dag la/ /klog gam gal
te byin gyur na/ /ngan pa'i bdag nyid bcom nas ni/ /ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar 'gyur/ /g.yon gyi rgyud ni dmigs nas su/ /skye bo g.yon gyi spyod pa bya/ /thams cad g.yon pas byas
na ni/ /myur du dngos grub 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ dpa' bo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad

bya ba/ /snying po thams cad bsdus pa ste/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /sgrub po'i bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i mchog /ga bur dang ni gur kum dang / /gan+d+ha gan+d+ha pa tra ste/ /shing tsha dang ni sug smel bcas/ /

ku sum dang ni de bzhin chu/ /pi si ta dang kun du ru/ /de bzhin ri yi zhag dang ni/ /ri skyes dang ni spu gu'i zhag /dr-i yi mar khu so dang ni/ /de bzhin lag skyes kyi ni rdul/ /gangs kyi chu dang snying po dang / /

rgya mtsho las skyes de dag ni/ /lus can rnams la phan byed pa/ /gang gang la ni gangs chu bzhin/ /de ltar bcwa brgyad rdzas rnams ni/ /bcud kyis len mchog phan byed yin/ /de nas brtag pa'i las dang ni/ /yon tan yan

lag cho ga bshad/ /tsam pa ka dang ba ku la/ /nA ga ge sar ku mu ta/ /ud pal she pha li ka dang / /sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang pri yang ku/ /ku su ma ni nyid dag go/ shri ba la dang po so 'cha'/ /ka pi ta dang la ku tsha/ /

sku ba dang ni brta ki/ /a ru ra dang ba ru ra/ /ba la ta ka skyu ru ra/ /e la rtsi dang pu na ka / e raN Da dang ma ri rtsi/ /de bzhin du ni pi pi ling / /bca' ba dang ni shu dag dang / /yung ba dang ni ru rta dang / /

bca' lga dang ni sgog skya dang / /rlan can gyi ni do ba dang / /na ga pa la dkar po dang / /de bzhin rgan po gzhon nur byed/ /glang chen dgra dang ri mdzes dang / /'dzag dang byis pa stug po dang / /ral pa dmar po smyo

byed dang / /mtshan mo'i shing dang myur 'gro dang / /ka dam pa dang gser shing ste/ /de bzhin du ni shi ri sha / ka ran dza dang shri khru dang / /nim pa dang ni pi la si/ /de bzhin ga du ma dza ri/ /
pa la sha dang tsan dan gnyis/ /de bzhin a gar nag po dang / /gur kum gur shing bye ka ra/ /sbrang rtsi mo k+Sha pus ka ra/ /me tog 'bras bu rtsa ba dang / /shun pa shing dang ro nyid do/ /
khu byug zangs kyi gtsug pud can/ /bya rog dang ni gar ra dang / /rma bya ti bya phug ron dang / /drang srong bu stobs 'phel bar byed/ /ra dang ri 'ong ri dgas dang / /sa li ga dang phag
dang ni/ /khyad par du ni byi ba rnams/ /nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /me tog 'bras bu shun pa'i chang / /de bzhin du ni 'bru yi chang / /gzhan yang chang gi bye brag
dag / mdor bsdus nas ni btung ba'i mchog /'di dag skyes pa bud med kyi/ /stobs rnams skyed pa'i sman yin te/ /nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /bza' dang btung dang gzhib
pa dang / /ldag pa dang ni mur ba dang / /sna sman mgo bor bsku ba dang / /bkru ba dang ni dril phyes dang / /bza' dang btung sogs de dag ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba mchog /
de ltar drug bcu rtsa bzhi yi/ /rdzas dang bcwa brgyad dag tu sbyar/ /sbom po phra mo'i sbyor ba rnams/ /skyes pa dang ni bud med kyang / /chung ngu la sogs dbye ba ste/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan
sogs/ /re re zhing yang gsum gsum 'dod/ /nag po dkar po sngo bsangs te/ /'dzag dang de bzhin 'pho ba la'o/ /dgra dang mdza' bshes bar ma ste/ /khams kyi sde tshan bsdus pa
yin/ /dpa' bo gcig dang skye gnyis rtsa/ /'bras bu chen po ska ba gsum/ /lhang tsher dang ni dngul chu bzhi/ /bdud rtsi yi ni snying po lnga/ /dus drug de bzhin drug bcu ste/ /bdun po yal ga mdab
sogs bcas/ /skam sa dang ni rlan can yul/ /mar dang mar nag bkru sman ni/ /rno dang dngul chu'i zas su sbyin/ /rang skyur dang ni yung ba dag /cha mnyam dngul chu'i 'bras bu ste/ /nyi ma'i 'od
zer bsros nas ni/ /sbrang rtsi yi ni thigs pa blugs/ /thal sman lan tshwas bu gar sgrub/ /ro ni bska ba rnams dang yang / /lhang tsher dkar po'i skyo ma sbyin/ /dngul chu drug char bya ba mchog /

skyed byed don ni rga ba 'joms/ /cha ni tshad ldan 'ching byed de/ /'bras bus bya ba byed par 'gyur/ /sngon du gser shog blugs pa yis/ /rang skyon 'joms pa'i cho ga yin/ /de nas chu dang lan tshwa dang / /

thal ba'am rdul ni blugs par bya/ /dron mo blugs na skra dkar skye/ /glang chen mgo yi bcud blangs la/ /seng ge'i tshad du bco bar bya/ /de nas slar ni phyung nas su/ /ar ka'i shing gi khu ba blugs/ /

tshos pa'i 'od kyis snying mig 'joms/ /tsan tra dang ni ra sa na/ /sgo skya dang ni ker sa dang / /a tra pa ti'i rus pa dang / /de bzhin du ni me tog bzung / /bya gri dang ni kun du ru/ /sa ri ba dang sen mo dang / /

nor bu zla 'od na ge sar/ /thigs pa'i rgyun dang ka tam pa/ /tsam pa ka ri so ba dang / /shi shu bil ba ud pa la/ /rang skyur dang ni bcas pa ru/ /'dzag dang dngul chu kha tshos bya/ /phyung na sbrul gyi
gzugs ltar 'gyur/ /khrag dang smyo byed mtshan shing blugs/ /skra dkar gyi ni nyes pa 'joms/ /rgas dang mdze nad sel bar byed/ /rnon po thal sman bcas pa yis/ /bkrus shing bkus nas gzhang
'brum 'joms/ /lto skyes ma rnyings rdzas kyi las/ /bcud dang bcud len mar zhag sngags/ /shi ri sha yi rtswas kyang gzag /mgor gnas la skyes ldan par bya/ /mdog dmar dngul chu rmongs pa gso/ /

gsos te 'khrus na 'bras bu'i lam/ /tshad las 'das na dug du 'gyur/ /de nas lpags pa shun pa dang / /me tog dang ni 'bras bu sogs/ /kha dang ska dang mngar ba dang / /tshwa dang skyur po la sogs pas/ /
khyad par du ni btso bya ba/ /kha med rdzar ni btso bar bya/ /kha dang bcas par bsreg pa ste/ /tshar gcad pa dang gnon pa yin/ /kha med pa dang thod pa'i dbyibs/ /'od ma dang ni bya rog

mchu/ /de dag btso ba'i zhi kha rdza/ /yib dang khros dang 'thor ba dang / /bzhi pa chu ru 'bros pa'o/ /shin tu tshos par gyur na ni/ /'dar dang rmongs dang du ba dang / /khrol khrol sgra ni sgrogs pa yin/ /

btsir dang mnye dang dkrug pa dang / /de bzhin du ni brdung ba'o/ /sbrang rtsir btso dang bu ram btso/ /glang chen btso dang seng ge btso/ /rnon por byas te btso bar bya/ /mnyes pas dri ma'i rdul 'thor 'gyur/ /
blo gros 'khrul pa med pa yis/ /rim gyis rim gyis mnye bar bya/ /cha yi tshad byas gso ba ni/ /sbyangs na 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /de nas cha gzhan bcas pa la/ /gi ri kar ni'i phye ma ni/ /
lugs las zlog pa'i lam btsugs la/ /tshad ldan cho ga bzhin du btso/ /du ru ka dang ba li ka /tsag kra mar de'i sa bon dang / /ba la ta ka shi kru'i 'bras/ /pa ri tsa ta ku su ma/ ud pal ma li

ka sa bon/ /bar dar rus pa ka si dang / /si ri sa sku sa bon dang / /sbrang rtsi bo son ba la sha /zhi ga rdze'u ni tshos pa dang / /de dag skyo ma skyed phyir blugs/ /de dag gi ni rtogs byas la/ /yid la
sems pa'i 'phrul 'khor gyis/ /bu mo'i bcud ni drangs te blugs/ /'di yis rab tu bsgrub bar bya/ /gzhan du nam yang ma yin no/ /bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang ni/ /mang po'i bar du brtag par bya/ /

lhang tsher dngul chu shing chen ni/ /de tshe 'bras bu smin par 'gyur/ /bya ba kun gyi lam gyis ni/ /byed pa po dang za bor 'gyur/ /lha yis rgya mtsho bsrubs pa bzhin/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i cha yi bar/ /
stobs ldan bzung ba gnas su 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni tshad dang ldan/ /dngul chu rma bya'i mgrin 'dra dang / /sbrul gyi gzugs dang sbal pa'i gzugs/ /chu 'dzin dbyibs dang rnam pa bzhi/ /

sa la'i dri dang dri zhim dang / /de bzhin chang dang chang min dri/ /cha gnyis dang ni cha gsum dang / /bud med mdog nyams snang 'gyur zhing / /bong tshod ran dang ring ba dang / /yan lag rtsub 'dod mgrin pa ring / /

mig ni zangs ltar dmar ba ste/ /stobs ldan sngo bsangs nu ma med/ /rkang pa'i khyed par sngar bshad dang / /sbrang rtsi lta bu'i dri dang ldan/ /sgrub po dbang po'i yon tan byed/ /de rnams thabs kyis sbyangs

yin te/ /rtsub dang mnyan dang yan lag mkhrang / /stobs ldan zhes ni bya ba yin/ /de dang 'khyud las 'byung ba ni/ /rdzas ni yongs su sbyor byed de/ /rnon po dang ni lhang tsher la/ /thun mong du ni brten
nas su/ /zha nye blugs pas 'joms par 'gyur/ /ro ni kha dang bska bar 'gyur/ /de nas rang skyur nang du ni/ /gci bas btsos na nyes pa 'byang / /de nas gci ba'i lan tshwa dang / /phag gi zhag

dang tshil dang khrag /bcas par mnyes na'ang nyes pa 'byang / /slar yang tsu ta dzi ti na/ /tshwa dang dmar po nyid dang ni/ /smyo byed cha mnyam dngul chu rig /de dang mnyam pa'i sbrang rtsi chu/ /mnyes na
nyes pa zad par 'gyur/ /de nas ma he'i rmig par ni/ /char pa'i chu dang bcas pa la/ /zangs kyi phye ma 'khar phye dang / /mig sman phye ma blugs shing btso/ /tshos nas sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug /
de yis bcings par 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas khrag ni cha bdun gyis/ /sbyangs na snum zhing stobs ldan la/ /slar yang cha mnyam khrag dang ni/ /mnyes pas snum zhing rtsub par 'gyur/ /ra gan tsu ta'i

shing dang ni/ /zangs dang yung ba la sogs drug /byin pas nyes pa tshar gcod 'gyur/ /de nas tsan tra'i shing dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang sen mo dang / /thal sman 'bus zos shing phye dang / /ma hA ha ta
mo k+Sha dang / /pus ka ra dang bar ta ki/ /sku ba sin du pa ri phye/ /bcas par mi yi rkang du gzhug /cung zad bzhag ste phyung nas su/ /rdo yi gtun du mnye bar bya/ /'od ma'i nang du blugs

nas ni/ /btso rdza rgod ma'i kha 'dra dang / /ka ran da yi mchu yi dbyibs/ /bong bu'i gdong dang rnga mo'i gdong / /kha chen 'di dag bcing ba dang / /tshar bcad pa la bsngags pa yin/ /gang yang 'phrul
'khor kha che ba/ /rdza rnga yi ni dbyibs 'dra dang / /'o ma'i dbyibs 'dra la sogs dang / /mtshon cha ral gri'i shubs 'dra ba/ /kang ka yi ni mgrin pa 'dra/ /nyes pa tshar gcod pa la bsngags/ /gzhan
yang dngul chu bcings pa la/ /bshad pa de dag rjes su gzung / /bzhi cha lus pa btso chen te/ /phyed lus stobs chen btso ba yin/ /dngul chur brten pa'i dri ma ni/ /de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya/ /

sbyang ba dang ni rtogs pa dang / /rmongs pa de bzhin gsod pa'o/ /de nas lhang tsher rdul phye dang / /bcas par rtsi yi nang du blugs/ /ban du zhes bya'i phye ma ni/ /skyo mar bcas pa'i nang du btung / /lhang tsher

dngul chu rnon po yi/ /cho ga yis ni so sor bcing / /de nas cung zhig ngal bso bya/ /gzhag pa me yi gnas sam ni/ /chu yi shing la brten par bya/ /lci ba'am 'bras kyi phung po'ang rung / /rngo ba yi ni
nang dag dang / /ba lang ma he sogs pa'i lhas/ /bye ma yi ni phung por sba/ /de nas ngal bso phyung nas ni/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri ro sogs/ /tshad dang mtshan ma ji bzhin brtag /la la'i 'bras bu
la la'i rtsa/ /kha cig me tog mdab ma dang / /shun pa dang ni rus pa'ang rung / /rnal 'byor pa yis longs spyod ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs lta bar bya/ /bcos pa'am bcos min yo byed ni/ /rnyed na rdo rje

'dzin 'drar 'gyur/ /de yang stobs can bcud bral ni/ /sngon bzhin nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ /dngul chu lhang tsher kha dog ni/ /sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te/ /khrag dang mkhres pa skyad byed yin/ /dmar

pos khrag kyang skyed par byed/ /dkar pos zug zer skyed 'gyur zhing / /srog ni 'joms par byed pa yin/ /ljang ser dag ni ma smin dang / /ser skya lam ni 'gag 'gyur zhing / /nyis 'gyur cha ni shin tu 'ching / /

nyes pa dag ni brgyar ldan pas/ /blo dang ldan pas dpyad de bza'/ /sngo dang nag po bcud chen yin/ /de ltar bcud len rnam dpyad na/ /chu skyes chen po'i yon tan ldan/ /dngul chu'i 'ol se gcig dang ni/ /rgya mtsho
las byung nyis 'gyur ldan/ /bzhi 'gyur gyi ni me tog bcas/ /sna sman ldag pa'i mchog yin te/ /khrag dang dngul chu bcu 'gyur du/ /rim gyis spel te bza' bar bya/ /de phan chad ni 'bras bu med/ /

dngul chu bso bas rmongs pa dang / /khyad par du ni bsad kyang rung / /sngar bstan pa yi me tog dang / /byang chub sems dang bcas te bza'/ /thams cad du ni snga dro bza'/ /cho ga'i rim pa 'di yin no/ /

lhang tsher chu dang dngul chu ni/ /dgongs mo'i dus su ldag par bya/ /zla ba la ni zla ba'i lam/ /nyi ma la ni nyi ma ste/ /de dang de nas sbyin par bya/ /de ltar yul dang dus dang ni/ /rdzas rnams rgya cher bstan pa dag /
yid gzhungs la sogs 'phel byed yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi
rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ bcud kyis len gyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya/ /yang dag bsdus
pa cho ga ni/ /bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon/ /bde mchog bla ma'i gnas la sogs/ /mkha' 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab/ /ye shes ldan pa'i rang skye gnas/ /yul dang yul du mngon par

skye/ /de ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin/ /rnal 'byor ma drug sgrub po la/ /brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin/ /ku lu tA dang ma ru yi/ /yul du gnas pa ma mo ste/ /sin+d+hu dang ni
nA ga rar/ /rigs kyi gtso mo rnams yin no/ /lam ba ka dang sau raSh+Tar/ /gang gnas rigs kyi lha mo yin/ /kha ba'i ri dang kan tsi na/ /gang yod byis bcas mo zhes bya/ /pan tsa li yi yul dag dang / /

gri ha de ba tA dag na/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bu mo gnas/ /ka ling ka dang ko sa ler/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin ma sha chen za/ /pre ta pu ri zhes bya dang / /tri sha ku nor sbom dbang phyug /khaN+Da ro ha zhes bya gnas/ /

pul+lI ra dang dzA la~M d+har/ /tsan Da la yi bud med gnas/ /o tre dang ni kam ru yi/ /yul du bu mo chen mo ste/ /de bi ko Ti zhes bya dang / /ra mi sha ri'i bu mo'ang 'dod/ /go da ba ar bu der/ /mkha' 'gro ma
yi dbang phyug mchog /gser gling ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /au D+Di yang ni de bzhin no/ /yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo gang / /dpa' bo gnyis med khyab pa ste/ /kun kyang 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma/ /
yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug ma yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos slar yang mchod cing phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par dang / /zhing skyong 'jigs pa chen po yi/ /
ming dang zhing gi ming dang ni/ /gnas rnams kyi ni khyad par dang / /gang du sgrub pa pos thos na/ /the tshom med par 'grub 'gyur ba/ /de dag thams cad mdor bsdus te/ /gtso bos bdag la bshad
du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /nga yis gang la'ang ma bshad pa'i/ /gsang chen shin tu snyed dka' ba/ /gang yin khyod ni zhu 'dod pa/ /legs so legs so

lha mo che/ /sgyu ma chen por rang 'gro ba/ /bshad kyis rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /a ta ha se'i yul gnas pa/ /zhi ba'i gdong zhes grags pa ste/ /rgyal po lha mo'i skyes gnas 'byung / /rdo rje yi ni mtshon cha bsnams/ /
yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /ka dam pa yi shing la brten/ /dril bu chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /ko la gir ni dpal chen mo/ /gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba/ /gtsigs pa'i

gzugs can lha mo ste/ /rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jigs su rung / /grong khyer der gnas drag shul can/ /ri'i rtse mor brten te gnas/ /me yi gdong pa zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra pA la mdzes pa'i gdong / /da ran ra ni
