bde byed ma/ /sme brtsegs chen po'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo ga ya'i mtshon cha bsnams/ /chos kyi dbang phyug gsol ba mo/ /zhing der gnas par grags pa de/ /ta la'i shing la brten te gnas/ /

gyen du 'bar skra zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che/ /de bi ko T+Tar rna mo chen/ /stobs po che'i skye gnas 'byung / /lha mo lag na mdung can te/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyis mchog /gnas der

lha mo drag chen mo/ /ba Ta'i shing la brten te gnas/ /k+She tra pA la lus chen po/ /mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu zhes bya/ /bi ra dzar ni phyi mo ste/ /ba dan gyi ni phyag brgya bsnams/ /zhi ba'i gzugs can lha mo che/ /
'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab stsol ba/ /zhing der gnas pa med 'bar ma/ /A mra'i shing la brten te gnas/ /ha har dgod pa sgra chen po/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /e ru dar ni me lce'i kha/ /
thod pa dge ba'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo rdo rje shag ti bsnams/ /zhing der shin tu myos bas gnas/ /grong khyer der gnas lha mo de/ /gser shing la ni brten te gnas/ /dril bu sgra zhes bya ba

yi/ /k+She tra pA la dpa' bo che/ /pre ta pu rir dmar ser te/ /'jigs pa chen mo'i spyan dang ldan/ /lha mo gtun shing mtshon cha bsnams/ /gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba'o/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha

mo der/ /dzA ti'i shing la brten te gnas/ /byin chen zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /shin tu gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung / /e la pu rir bong zhon ma/ /rab tu gtum pa'i skye gnas byung / /phyag na zhags pas
'jigs chen mo/ /zhing der myos pas yang dag gnas/ /phyogs der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo/ /glang chen rna ba zhes bya ba'i/ /zhing skyes mchog chen las skyes pa'o/ /

kha che'i yul du ba lang rna/ /gtum pa'i skye gnas las byung ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs nas ni/ /dgra rnams 'joms la mchog tu brtson/ /gnas der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /ri yi rtse la brten te gnas/ /
sbu gu'i byin pa can zhes bya/ /k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po/ /ma ru'i yul du rim pa mo/ /'jigs gdong dpa' bo'i skye gnas 'byung / /lcags kyu zhags thogs lha mo de/ /zhing der shin tu myos pas
gnas/ /yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /dbye chen la ni brten te gnas/ /gtsigs pa zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /rmongs par byed pa gzhan yangs pa'o/ /nA ga rar ni thong gshol ma/ /sme brtsegs
yan lag skye gnas byung / /ro langs can ni 'od chen ma/ /dpa' bo kun la dngos grub stsol/ /gnas der gnas pa'i bzang mo de/ /spa yi shing gi ldum rar gnas/ /spu yi byin pa zhes bya ba'i/ /

k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che/ /pun da bar ta'i yul du ni/ /tsa muN+Di zhes bya ba ste/ /stobs po che yi skye gnas byung / /kha T+wA~M ga yis lag pa brgyan/ /lha mo spyod dang grol bar byed/ /sdig pa ma
lus zad byed pa/ /bum pa zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /zhing de na ni yang dag gnas/ /dza lan d+har ni bzhin dngas ma/ /chags pa'i rigs kyi skye gnas 'byung / /rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs nas ni/ /
bde ba'i mchog ni kun la ster/ /grong khyer mchog der gnas lha mo/ /khang pa brtseg mar brten na gnas/ /ral pa gsum zhes bya ba yi/ /zhing skyong shin tu gtsigs po che/ /pre tA pu rir glog gi
gdong / /gtsigs pa'i skye gnas yang dag byung / /lha mo dbyig pa shaka ti thogs/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /drag pa'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed/ /

dril bu'i sgra zhes bya ba yi/ /k+She tra pA la dmad pa min/ /'ug pa'i gdong can 'jigs su rung / /so ba der ni me lce'i gdong / /zangs gri yis ni lag pa brgyan/ /sha chen gyi ni stan la gnas/ /bde ba'i dbang phyug

rab ster ba/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha chen mo/ /shal ma ri yi shing la gnas/ /bya ba kun mdzes zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po/ /tsa rid ta yi yul du ni/ /ka ran dza gnas zhes bya ba/ /shag ti

gtsigs pa'i skye gnas byung / /shag ti yi ni phyag rgya thog /dril bu chen po zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /sbrul dang ldan pa'i gyin skra can/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad/ /u D+yen du ni

lha chen mo/ /gsang ba zhes bya'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs/ /shin du drag cing gsal ba'i gzugs/ /sgra chen zhes bya drag po'i gzugs/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /gnas mchog der gnas
lha mo de/ /a sho ka yi shing brten gnas/ /dzA lan+d+ha rar gtum mo ni/ /zhi ba'i yi ni skye gnas byung / /lag na zangs gri phyar te thogs/ /dbang phyug thams cad ster ba mo/ /gnas der gnas pa
drag chen mo/ /gser shing la ni brten te gnas/ /skyed pa zhes bya'i dpa' bo che/ /bdud rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /k+She re ker ni skye bo'i ma/ /drag cing sngo la stobs chen ma/ /ral gri lag

thogs lha mo che/ /dngos grub thams cad ster ba mo/ /lha mo chen mo gyen skra 'bar/ /sa la'i shing la brten te gnas/ /lhun po chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas/ /ma ya pu rir 'dod ma ste/ /

'jigs pa'i gdong gi skye gnas byung / /rdo rje shag ti dge ba thogs/ /bsgrub po rnams la stobs ster ba/ /gzugs sngon 'jigs pa chen mo ste/ /'byung po'i shing la brten te gnas/ /der gnas 'jigs pa zhes bya

ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /pu ta nar ni a mra ke/ dgra rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /thong gshol dang ni ga ya thogs/ /sems can thams cad dbang byed ma/ /da ru'i shing la brten te gnas/ /

sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /brtul zhugs chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas/ /rgyal po'i khab tu dza na sa/ /khrag chen gyi ni skye gnas byung / /rdo rje lcags kyur yang dag ldan/ /

pha rol g.yul las rgyal bar mdzad/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /dzi la'i sgra 'byin 'jigs par byed/ /rna chen zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /rtag tu de dang nye bar gnas/ /bod yul du ni lhan skyes te/ /rang byung gi ni skye

gnas byung / /chu srin rgyal mtshan lag na thogs/ /zhi zhing gsal ba'i gzugs can te/ /yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /brag gi khyim la brten te gnas/ /longs spyod zhes bya'i dpa' bo che/ /k+She tra pA la thub dka'

ba'o/ /ma la ber ni dbang bskur ma/ /tho ba yi ni phyag rgya thogs/ /sgrub pa po la rtag tu brtse/ /grags dang dpal dang bkra shis ster/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /mngar ba'i shing la brten te gnas/ /skyes

bu'i dbang phyug zhes bya ba'i/ /zhing skyong sna tshogs dbang phyug yod/ /zhing 'di rnams kyi bu mo dang / /dpa' bo rnams ni dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu mtshan mo 'phyan pa dang / /rtag tu mtshan mo 'du bar byed/ /

mkha' la spyod pa rnyed dka' ba'i/ /dngos grub yangs pa ster 'gyur te/ /sgrub pa po yi las rnams ni/ /thams cad 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas dngos grub kun ster ba'i/ /mchod pa'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /

me tog bdug pa de bzhin du/ /mar me dri yi khyad par dang / /gtor ma'i snod kyis nye bar mchod/ /sha rlon dang ni nya la sogs/ /bza' ba'i rdzas ni thams cad dang / /de bzhin bdud rtsi lnga yi mchog /g.yon gyi char

ni snod yin te/ /g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya/ /oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang / /ri bo dang ni ri sul phug /grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni/ /khyad par du ni khang stong dang / /sems can snod dang thang dang ni/ /

khyad par du ni chu la gnas/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ /lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang / /nag po gtsigs pa 'jigs byed dang / /rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byad ma dang drag mo dang / /

'jigs byed ma dang u ma dang / /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang / /mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag tu

sdang dang 'phyang ba mo/ /'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma/ /'jib byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/ /mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen mo/ /thod phreng phreng dang kha T+wA~M ma/ /sbrul chen ral

gri dgra sta can/ /rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma/ /de nyid chen mo'i mkha' 'gro lnga/ /las kun rjes su sgrub byed pa/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku chen te/ /rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo/ /rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yis/ /thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cig /oM kak+ka d+h+ya na ba ba ban d+ha na kha kha khA da na sar+b+ba duSh+TAn ha na ha na g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya a mu ka s+ya shan

ting ku ru hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT dza swA hA/ bdud rtsi yis ni kha bkang ste/ /lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yis ni/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub par bsgom/ /oM bkA bkA sarba yo

ge shwa ri hU~M hU~M hU~M dza swA hA/ la sogs sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /gtor ma'i las ni sbyar bya ste/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug /gsad dang sdang dang bcing ba la/ /sgrub pos gtor ma'i de nyid kyis/ /las rnams

thams cad bsgrub bya zhing / /ye shes lcags kyu'i bye brag gis/ /rang 'dod lha ni tshim par bya/ /zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin grong / /grong khyer ri yi rtse mo ru/ /'byung po thams cad tshogs gyur par/ /
'dus na sgrub po la mchog ster/ /gnas la sogs par rtag gnas shing / /sgrub pa po ni gus ldan la/ /lha mo rnams kyis mchog ster ba/ /sgrub pa po la the tshom med/ /gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i/ /

ro yi bsgrub pa bshad par bya/ /rgan po ma yin rma med cing / /mdze dang shu ba la sogs spangs/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /'byung po'i nyi ma la bsgrub bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang / /
lha yi chu yis bkru bar bya/ /mar khu chen pos byug pa dang / /bdug pa chen pos de bdug bya/ /maN+Dal gru bzhi byas nas ni/ /de dbus 'bad pas gru gsum bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson/ /

zhes bya la sogs sngon bzhin brjod/ /ha hA ha hA hU~M hU~M he he/ /zhes bya'i dmod pa rnam pa brgyad/ /sgrub pa po yis chog bzhin bya/ /me la gnas pa'i sa bon ni/ /rlung gi sa bon gyis phye ba/ /spyi gtsug tu ni sbyar byas la/ /sa yi

steng du mchod par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dbugs gnas par/ /'bad pa yis ni myur du blta/ /sgrub pos bdag nyid bsam bya ba/ /skye gnas dbus su rim bzhin blta/ /'bar phreng gi ni rgya mtsho ste/ /pho nya 'od dang

bcas blta zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'

'gro las/ 'du ba'i gnas nges pa dang / bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dge ba dang / /lha rnams thams cad bsgrub pa dang / /

de bzhin pho nya'i khyad par dang / /'byung po gdon gyi rig pa che/ /gang gzhan lus sprul la sogs pa/ /de bzhin sngags kyi phreng ba rnams/ /de ni khyod la bshad kyis nyon/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo khyud
dang ni ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bri bar bya/ /dngos grub kun gyi yon tan gnas/ /'dod yon lnga yis rab brgyan pa/ /mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /ro la g.yogs pa'i ras sam ni/ /

mtshon gyis brgyab pa'i ras dag dang / /bu btsas pa'i ras dang ni/ /ba glang ko ba la sogs la/ /dam tshig can gyi 'dri mkhan gyis/ /sgrub po mchog gis 'dri ru gzhug /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /

'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /de nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas/ /mngon sum du ni mdun gnas 'gyur/ /tshangs pa mo dang zhi ba mo/ /gzhon nu mo dang phag mo dang / /dbang mo dang ni tsa mun Di/ /
tshogs kyi dbang mo sreg byed ma/ /rim pa gnyis pa yi'o/ /dbang po gshin rje chu lha dang / /lus ngan dang ni yi dgas gtso/ /sreg byed bden bar rlung gi lha/ /rim pa gsum pa yi'o/ /nyi ma dang ni

zla ba dang / /mig dmar dang ni gza' lag dang / /phur bu dang ni pa ba sangs/ /spen pa dang ni rA hu la/ /rim pa bzhi pa'i 'o/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug de bzhin du/ /ru tra skem byed sgo bzhir ro/ /sa dang chu dang me dang
rlung / /'byung po chen po'i khams rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang mar me ma/ /'jib byed 'phrog byed bcas pa'i gtso/ /'byung po las kyang 'byung ba'i gzugs/ /sgrub pos cho ga bzhin du bsgrub/ /dkyil

'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dbus su kun nas zlum por ni/ /ri mo mdzes pas bskor bar bya/ /pad ma 'dab brgyad bris nas ni/ /ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul gyi/ /dbus su khro

bo chen po bri/ /zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /khro dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal/ /sku mdog sngon po drag chen po/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /yi dgas la zhon nyi mar bzhugs/ /

sum bcu gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad/ /gar dang ldan zhing stag lpags mnabs/ /spyan gsum shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs/ /rdo rje 'bar ba ba dan gsum/ /khrag gang ba yi gshor dang bcas/ /mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin te/ /

g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gis 'phyar/ /shar du mkha' 'gro ma bri ste/ /lho yi phyogs su 'phrog byed ma/ /'jib byed lha mo nub tu bri/ /byang du lha mo 'bar ma'o/ /lha mo phag mo zhes bya ba/ /phyag bzhi yi ge hrIHlas

byung / /sku mdog sngon mo drag chen mo/ /phag gi gdong can 'jigs par byed/ /mda' dang de bzhin gzhu dang ni/ /rgyal mtshan thod pa thogs pa'o/ /zhi ba mo ni pheM las byung / /mdog dmar gzi brjid chen mo te/ /thod pa dang

ni lcags kyu dang / /kha T+wA~M Dam ru de bzhin no/ /gzhon nu ma ni hi las byung / /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi pa/ /mdung rtse gsum dang ba dan gsum/ /mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin no/ /tsa mun Di ni ho las byung / /mdog sngo lag pa bzhi

pa ste/ /kha T+wA~M dang ni thod pa dang / /gshol dang de bzhin Da ma ru/ /ba~M las byung ba'i tshangs pa mo/ /mdog dkar lag pa bzhi pa ste/ /pad ma dang ni thod pa dang / /de bzhin gzhan na mda' gzhu'o/ /tshogs kyi dbang mo ga~M

las byung / /sngo bsangs mdog ste lag bzhi ma/ /mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa dang / /bgrang phreng g.yon gyi lag tu thogs/ /khyab 'jug ma ni bim las byung / /mdog sngo lag pa bzhi pa ste/ /chang dang chu yi thod pa dang / /

zhags pa kha T+wA~M de bzhin gzhan/ /dbang mo iM las byung ba ste/ /mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /rdo rje shag ti thod pa dang / /sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa nyid/ /thams cad gyen skra 'bar ba dang / /sna tshogs kyis ni brgyan

pa ste/ /ro yi stan bzhugs spyan gsum dang / /stag gi lpags pas rked dkres pa'o/ /shar sgor tshangs pa bri bya ste/ /mdog dkar lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /ril ba spyi blugs pad ma thogs/ /

byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ste/ /mdog sngon lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /dung dang de bzhin 'khor lo dang / /thod pa dang ni dbyug pa mchog /lho ru ru tra bri bya ste/ /du ba'i mdog can lag pa bzhi/ /rtse gsum mdung dang thod pa dang / /zhags pa

dang ni bgrang phreng thogs/ /nub tu skem byad bri bya ste/ /mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /shag ti dang ni dbyug pa dang / /dpa' bo'i thod pa bgrang phreng thogs/ /dbang ldan khyu mchog stan la zhon/ /kha dog dkar po lag bzhi ba/ /thod pa

dang ni rtse gsum thog /gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /dbang po glang chen zhon pa ste/ /mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /me ni lug gi stan la zhon/ /kha dog dmar po

lag bzhi pa/ /me thab nyid dang thod pa dang / /gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /gshin rje ma he stan la zhon/ /kha dog sngon po lag bzhi pa/ /dbyug pa dang ni thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o/ /

bden bral mi ro'i stan bzhugs pa/ /kha dog ljang khu lag bzhi pa/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o/ /chu lha chu srin stan la bzhugs/ /kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa/ /zhags pa dang

ni thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis skrag sta thal sbyar ba'o/ /rlung ni sha ba'i stan la bzhugs/ /du ba'i mdog can lag bzhi pa/ /ba dan dang ni thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o/ /lus ngan gter gyi

stan la gnas/ /kha dog ser po lag bzhi pa/ /rin chen dang ni tho ba thogs/ /gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o/ /gza' dang skar ma thams cad kyang / /rang rang dam tshig las byung zhing / /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs

chen po/ /rang rang stan la gnas par bsam/ /ma mo rnams kyang kun gyi ma/ /'byung po'i rig pa gzhan de bzhin/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub pa yi/ /pho nya'i bsgrub thabs de nas bshad/ /so sor stobs kyis tshar gcad pa/ /

nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma/ /longs spyod la dga'i sgrub pa pos/ /pho nya'i las ni brtsam par bya/ /zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom byas te/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yis/ /thams cad bran bzhin byed

par 'gyur/ /du khrod dang ni shing gcig tu/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni lho phyogs su/ /drug drug tu ni byas nas su/ /de nas mchod pa brtsam par bya/ /gnas la sogs

pa nyi shu bzhi/ /rim pa bzhin du yongs su bskor/ /dri dang me tog de bzhin du/ /mar me dang ni dri yi chu/ /dri yi chu yis bkang ba yi/ /bum pa'ang gos kyis mdzes par bya/ /nyin mtshan phrugs gcig gnas gyur cing / /
de nas mtshan gcig gnas par bya/ /gnas sogs yang dag phyag byas nas/ /de nas bzod pa gsol bar bya/ /dpa' bo yi ni ston mo yis/ /dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya/ /de ltar byas pa'i sngags pa yis/ /

phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /dmyal bar nges par sreg 'gyur te/ /bgegs kyis nye bar gtses nas ni/ /nges par dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i 'dri mkhan gyis/ /

'byung po'i nyi ma la rnyed pa'i/ /bu btsas la sogs ras la ni/ /tshon rtsi khrag dang bsres nas su/ /steng du skyes pa'i nang bzhag nas/ /sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /yi dgas sen rtsi mar chen dang / /sha chen gyis

ni bdug par bya/ /de la dri yis bsgos nas su/ /de bzhin yi dgas me tog mchod/ /lha mo chen mo mchod pa 'dis/ /me 'bar ma ni mchog tu mnyes/ /shing gcig gi ni drung du ni/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bum bzlas bya/ /

rgyal la sogs pa'i dus su ni/ /slob dpon gyis ni 'dri ru gzhug /sor ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /gzugs bzang bzhon nu phun sum tshogs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pas ste/ /gos ni ser po bgos par bri/ /

lag gnyis gyen du thal mo sbyar/ /me 'bar ba ni kun tu 'od/ /sgrub po'i mdun du bkram nas ni/ /'bad de cho ga bzhin mchod bya/ /me tog dmar dang dri la sogs/ /sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya/ /sha dang nya sha btsong la

sogs/ /nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /rdzas lnga dag gi dngos po yis/ /mchod nas 'bum du bzlas na ni/ /dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste/ /gnyis pa la ni nya dri bro/ /gsum par shing ni g.yo 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun du

gnas/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bstan nas ni/ /sngags ni de la brjod par bya/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /spyi bor bzhag ste brjod bya ba/ /oM di be shwa ri hU~M/ phuHphuHphuH/ dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /
bdud rtsi lnga yi bkang ba yi/ /dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya/ /'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon pas gzung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med pa/ /byin gyis rlobs la nga sgrubs

shing / /de nas shin tu mdzes ma yis/ /bza' dang btung sogs ston mo dang / /gser zho gnyis ni ster 'gyur te/ /zad pa nyid du longs spyod bya/ /'dod la dga' ba'i 'bar byed ma/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na/ /
drag mo yi ni sa bon gyis/ /gzer te 'bum du bzlas par bya/ /sa bon gyis ni gzer tsam gyis/ /mar me ma yi spyi bo 'gems/ /rtag tu sems can don brtson pas/ /'bar ma chung mar bsgrub par bya/ /

nyon cig lha mo shes rab che/ /gzhan yang mkha' 'gro bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /thang ka khru gnyis byas nas su/ /lhag par gnas te mchod gtor nas/ /de nas ri mo bri ru gzhug /dkar zhing dmar la shin du mdzes/ /

zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /lag na bsdigs mdzub lcags kyu thogs/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par mdzes/ /me 'bar 'od zer shin tu gsal/ /ha har rgod cing mig yon ma/ /

sa la khrag gis byugs nas su/ /gnas der bri sku dgram par bya/ /me tog dmar po la sogs dang / /dri dang bdug pa'i khyad par gyis/ /nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma dgod/ /sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs/ /bdud rtsi
lnga yis dgang bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sgom zhing zlos/ /'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ /khar bcug nas ni bgad par bya/ /oM DA ki nI hU~M phu~MHphuH/ bsgrub

pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /dang po sa ni g.yo 'gyur te/ /gnyis pa la ni mdun du dgod/ /gsum pa mdun du snang 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni bka' nod do/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi/ /dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni/ /g.yog mo

ru ni bsgrubs pa yis/ /ci 'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya/ /dgra rnams bsad cing dmad pa dang / /yan lag gzer ba gang 'dod pa'i/ /las la sogs pa thams cad ni/ /g.yog mo'i las kyis sgrub par 'gyur/ /gal te 'bum gyis

gdon za na/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis/ /sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas pas gzer bar byas te bzla/ /ra dag gi ni lpags pa la/ /'bad de thang ka brkyang bar bya/ /'jib byed ma ni 'dri ru gzhug /kha dog dmar po

shin tu mdzes/ /lus la rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /mdzes pa'i gos ni gyon par bri/ /g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste/ /

lci ba yis ni byugs byas la/ /me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ /me tog bdug pa mar me sogs/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin/ /khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong / /bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang la sbyin/ /

'bed de bsam gtan gnas pas bzla/ /oM a kaR+Sha ya phuHphaT/ lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas su/ /zhags pa'i tshul gyis gar bskyod bya/ /snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas/ /'jib byed

ma ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po khyi ni ngu ba'i sgra/ /gnyis pa la ni gsal bar bgod/ /gsum pa la ni mtshon thogs nas/ /sdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed/ /bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni/ /bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra/ /

bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi/ /dam tshig dag ni byin nas su/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /dbul po bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so/ /de nas nyi ma re re zhing / /gser srang phyed phyed ster bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na/ /

ro langs snying pos gzen te bzla/ /sa bon 'di yis gzer tsam gyis/ /'jib byed ma'i mgo 'gems so/ /chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su/ /kam po dzi ni bsgrub par bya/ /ba glang la sogs ko ba ni/ /brgyang ste 'phrog byed
ma 'drir gzhug /lus ni sbrul gyis brgyan pa ste/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/ /gos dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes/ /ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs/ /

ha har rgod cing rnam par gtsigs/ /khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni/ /dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug /sha dang nya dang tsong la sogs/ /nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /sngon bzhin lha yi

gtor ma sbyin/ /rnal 'byor pa ni sgom zhing zlos/ /'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bab/ /gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/ /bdud rtsi lnga

yi khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin/ /oM kriM kru~M phu~M phuHphaT/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su/ /de yi sngags ni brjod par bya/ /snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /mdun na thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /ci zhig bgyi zhes

brjod par 'gyur/ /ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /brtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la/ /slar yang 'dir ni 'ong ba dang / /rgyal po'i bu mo'am gzhan yang rung / /nga 'dod pa ni khrid de shog /gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs/ /bza' dang bgo

dang btung ba dang / /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong / /lha yi bu mo'am mi mo'ang rung / /ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid par byed/ /bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na/ /las gzhan gyis ni bsgub par bya/ /

bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su/ /de ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /mnan te lnga brgyar bzlas na ni/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te des kyang ma grub na/ /dpa' bo'i dbus

su bkug nas ni/ /dum bu dum bur gtub par bya/ /kri zhes bya dang gsod pa dang / /hU~M gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis/ /thams cad du ni bza' bar bsam/ /des ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma'ang / /

gal te ma grub 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na/ /ba la ta ka nag po'i shing / /me sbar ba yi dbus su ni/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni/ /nyi ma phyed na hU~M zhes pa/ /brjod cing sbyin bsreg

byas nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur bas/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas shang kar bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma/ /dur khrod dang ni shing gcig dang / /chu 'gram lam gyi

bzhi mdor bsgrub/ /dam tshig can gyi 'dri mkhan gyis/ /tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /sor ni bcu bzhi'i tshad dag tu/ /dpa' bo yi ni ras la bri/ /gru gsum dkyil 'khor dge ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po'i

tshul du bya/ /sku mdog sngon po glang la zhon/ /lus la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs/ /pho mtshan gyen 'greng zhi ba'i gzugs/ /ral pa'i cod pan mdung dang ldan/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /

kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa nyid/ /de bzhin gzhan na gshor dang ldan/ /bshang gcir ldan pas mchod bya ste/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin/ /sngags 'di yis ni bkug nas su/ /'bum du bzlas pas bsgrub par bya/ /oM ka pA la mA la

la~M kri ti shi ra hU~M hU~M/ A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya ru drA ya swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM a ru dra hU~M hU~M swA hA/ 'bum du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na/ /de nas de ni bsreg par bya/ /grub nas

bya ba thams cad ni/ /byed par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /nor lha yi ni bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /ri bo dang ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram/ /'bab chu 'dus pa'i mdo dag tu/ /sngar bstan pa yi cho ga yis/ /dkyil

'khor mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /sor ni bcu gnyis tshad dag tu/ /khyad par tu ni bsgrub par bya/ /kha dog nag po shin du mdzes/ /zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/ /'khor lo dang ni dbyig pa bsnams/ /thod pa pad ma de bzhin no/ /

rin chen gyi ni cod pan dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par glubs/ /bshang gci dang ni khu ba khrag /mchod pa nyid du sbyin bya zhing / /mi yi sha yis bdug byas na/ /dngos grub nye bar byed par 'gyur/ /oM a

badzra nA ra ya Na hU~M hU~M AHswA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM ma ma tsakra sA da ya sar+b+ba a su ra da ma na hU~M hU~M swA hA/ stong phrag brgyar ni bzlas pa yis/ /lha ma yin ni kun gyi sgor/ /'jug pa'i nus dang ldan 'gyur

zhing / /sgyu ma thams cad ston byed de/ /dgra rnams thams cad 'dul nus shing / /rgyal srid dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rim pa 'di nyid kyis/ /de nas tshangs pa'ang bsgrub bya ste/ /chu yi 'gram ni dben pa

dang / /khyad par pad mo'i tshul du bsgrub/ /kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa/ /gdong bzhi yis ni mdzes par byas/ /zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang / /mchod phyir thogs kyis rnam par brgyan/ /pad ma dang ni

bgrang phreng dang / /dbyug pa dang ni thod pa bsnams/ /sgrub pa po yi gtso bo yis/ /bris sku dag ni dmigs nas su/ /yid 'ong sna tshogs dri zhim ni/ /gur kum tsan dan la sogs pa/ /dri chus yang yang bsgo bya zhing / /rtag tu

bsgom dang ldan pa yis/ /mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim de dag /b+ha ga'i dbus su sbyin par bya/ /oM brah+ma A gats+tsha hU~M AHswA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM b+hu bsta twa bi dur+b+ba re Nu/ /b+hargo de ba sa d+hi ma hi/

d+hi yo yo na pra tso da ya ta/ 'bum du bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang / /nor skyed pa dang mngon spyod sogs/ /las rnams thams cad nus 'gyur te/ /bzlas dang
sbyin bsreg kun gyis 'grub/ /khyod la yang dag bshad pa yin/ /nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /ma mo'i khyim ni nyams dga' bar/ / sgom pa dge ba byas nas ni/ /

blo ldan mchod pa sngon 'gro bas/ /'bed de bris sku dmigs par bya/ /kha dog dmar po cher 'bar ba/ /skyil dkrung bcing ba'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs dag dang ldan/ /

'od zer dmar po 'bar zhing 'khrug /mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par bri/ /dgra sta dang ni gtun shing dang / /mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin te/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang lcags kyu dang / /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /de bzhin rdo rje ral

gri ste/ /gzhan yang sha chen thod pa bsnams/ /mu sun di dang ba dan gsum/ /shak+ti dang ni bcu gnyis so/ /oM a mo g+ha sid+d+ha sar+b+ba arbu me pra sA d+ha ya hU~M hU~M dzaHdzaHswA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM AHhU~M swA hA/
bzlas pa'i sngags so/ /stong phrag brgyas ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /de nas las ni brtsam bar bya/ /lan cig bzlas nas thig le dag /sngags pas byas na skal bzang 'gyur/ /rgyal po sgor yang mchod 'thob ste/ /

dgra rnams thams cad zad byed 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams ma lus bskrad pa dang / /'dod pa kun gyis 'bras ster bar/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis/ /ma mo rnams kyi bsgrub thabs mchog /

sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis/ /gza' rnams kyang ni bsgrub par 'dod/ /oM sar+b+ba ti thi nAk+Sha tra gra ha mang+ga le b+h+yaHswA hA/ gza' thams cad kyi sngags so/ /oM zhes bya ba dang po ste/ /swA hA'i mtha' can byin brlab ces/ /mkha' 'gro

kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las 'byung po dang gdon thams cad kyi
bsgrub thabs 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ye shes de nyid khyad par dang / /

lus kyi mtshan ma ji ltar lags/ /rtsa rnams gang la rten gyur dang / /de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal te/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sgyu ma

kun du rnam 'phrul ba/ /rtsa chen po ni sum bcu gnyis/ /de dag gzhan las shin tu gtso/ /bcu dang gnyis ni de bzhin du/ /dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa
yin/ /dus ni myur dang ring ba dag /yan lag mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pas gnas/ /dbugs ni rnam par dgod gyur na/ /lus can drug dang gnyis kyis

'chi/ /snga dro ro hi ta'i dus su/ /de yi mtshan ma mtshon par bya/ /sna dang mig gi gnas dang ni/ /'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsa/ /lce dang so yi mtshams dang ni/ /de bzhin mgrin pa'i phyi rol dang / /snying ka'i dra ba lte ba dang / /

brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan/ /chu so dang ni mtshan dag dang / /mgo dang spyi gtsug gi ni phyogs/ /dbugs ni chad cing chad gyur pa'i/ /lus kyi mtshan ma myur ba ru/ /'chi ba'i dus ni ston par byed/ /nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis ni/ /

'khor los dus kyi bdag nyid brtsi/ /sgo gcig nas ni nyin drug tu/ /gang tshe dbugs ni rgyu gyur pa/ /yon tan gsum gyi lo dag ni/ /zhag ni sum brgya drug bcu ru/ /bgos pa yi ni tshad dang ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni

bstan par bya/ /lo gnyis dang ni zla ba dag /dus kyi grangs su bstan pa dang / /nyin zhag dag ni bcwa brgyad du/ /de yi tshad ni yang dag brjod/ /nyi ma dag ni bdun dang mtha'/ /gal te rlung ni rgyu gyur na/ /lo gnyis dang

ni de bzhin du/ /zla ba drug tu 'tsho 'gyur zhing / /nyi ma brgyad du rlung brgyu na/ /de bzhin lo gnyis zla ba ni/ /rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni/ /nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ /'tsho 'gyur dus kyi grangs yin no/ /gal te nyin dgu rgyu gyur na/ /

lo gnyis zla ba bzhi dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs su ni/ /lus can rnams kyi sbyor ba yin/ /gal te nyin bcur rgyu gyur na/ /lo gnyis las ni mi 'tsho'o/ /gal te nyin zhag bcu gcig tu/ /sgo gcig nas ni rgyu ba dag /

lo gcig zla ba dgu dang ni/ /nyin zhag bcu brgyad dag las ni/ /mi 'tsho mdzes ma khyod la bshad/ /nyin zhag bcu gnyis rgyu na ni/ /lo gcig dang ni zla ba ni/ /dbyangs kyi grangs dang nyin zhag ni/ /dus kyi grangs las mi

'tsho'o/ /gal te nyi ma bcu gsum du/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rgyu ba ni/ /lo gcig dang ni zla ba dag /rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni/ /nyi ma dgu las mi 'tsho zhes/ /mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad/ /gal te

bdun phrag gnyis su ni/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu de/ /lo gcig zla ba gnyis dang ni/ /nyi ma bcu yi phyed dag las/ /'tsho bar mi 'gyur de yi ni/ /tshe tshad nges par bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig nyi ma lnga gsum du/ /

g.yas kyi sgo nas rlung rgyu na/ /lo gcig na ni gdon mi za/ /gang zhig brgyad phrag gnyis su ni/ /g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba dang / /de yi tshe tshad nges pa dag /zla ba bcu dang nyi ma ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag las ni/ /

mi 'tsho bar ni ngas bshad do/ /gal te nyan zhag bcu bdun du/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu na/ /de nas de yi tshe tshad ni/ /zla ba dgu dang nyin zhag ni/ /bcwa brgyad dag las mi 'tsho bar/ /gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin/ /

nyin zhag bcwa brgyad rgyu na ni/ /zla ba dag ni brgyad dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs su ni/ /de yi dus ni bshad pa yin/ /gal te nyin zhag bcu dgu ru/ /dri yi bzhon pa rgyu ba dag /ji srid 'tsho ba bshad par bya/ /

zla ba dag ni bdun dang ni/ /nyin zhag dus kyi grangs las ni/ /'tsho bar mi 'gyur gdon mi za/ /gal te nyin zhag nyi shur ni/ /rgyu ba zla ba drug na ni/ /de yi srog ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gal te nyin zhag nyi shu gcig /nyi ma'i

lam nas rlung rgyu ba/ /zla ba lnga dang nyi ma ni/ /nyi ma'i grangs las mi 'tsho'o/ /nyin zhag nyi shu gnyis rgyu na/ /zla ba rig byed grangs dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi las/ /mi 'tsho bar ni yang dag brjod/ /gal te

nyin zhag nyi shu gsum/ /sgo gcig nas ni rlung rgyu na/ /zla ba bzhi dang nyi ma ni/ /dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho brjod/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir rgyu ba dang / /zla ba gsum dang nyi ma ni/ /bcu gcig dag las mi 'tsho'o/ /nyin zhag nyi

shu lnga rgyu na/ /zla ba gsum las mi 'tsho'o/ /de las gong ma sngar bstan pa'i/ /grangs las mdor bsdus shes par bya/ /bcu dang gnyis kyi rtsis las ni/ /bar bar gyi ni bstan pa yin/ /cha dang cha yis rim bzhin du/ /

bar bar nyi ma gsal bar byas/ /blo dman rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir/ /dus de dag ni bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni dus/ /shin tu phra ba nges bshad pa/ /khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus las ni/ /de dag blta

zhing yid ches bya/ /sgo ni steng du ltas 'bab pa/ /sna yi bar sha chad gyur na/ /nyin zhag bdun gyis the tshom med/ /cha shas dgu ni yang dag gnas/ /de bzhin sgo ni steng bltas las/ /mig gi chu ni chad gyur na/ /nyi ma lnga na 'chi

bar 'gyur/ /cha shas bcu ni shes bya ba/ /steng du ltas te 'gro ba las/ /rna ba g.yon dang 'gram pa yi/ /ngos kyi mtshan ma dag las ni/ /nyin zhag gcig las mi 'tsho'o/ /cha shas bcu gcig gnas pa yi/ /

gsal bar steng du 'gro ba las/ /rna ba g.yas par rten pa yis/ /nyin zhag bcwo brgyad dag na 'chad/ /cha shas bcu gnyis de bzhin gnas/ /lce yi skud pa nag mthong na/ /lus can dus kyi nyin zhag 'chi/ /cha shas bcu

gsum sten pa yi/ /de bzhin steng du 'bar ba yi/ /steng 'og so ni 'thams gyur na/ /'byung ba dag ni ma lus 'dren/ /srog ni dus grangs nyi mas 'gro/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi rten pa ni/ /mgrin pa'i blo na gnas pa'i rtsa/ /steng du

bltas pa zhes grags kyis/ /nyin zhag lnga las mi 'tsho'o/ /cha shas bcwa lnga gnas pa yi/ /steng du bltas pa'i mchog de la/ /brang gi dra ba zhom gyur na/ /zla phyed na ni gdon mi za/ /cha shas bcwa drug rdzogs pa'i bdag /

lte ba'i dbus gyur steng bltas pa/ /sen mo'i khrag ni med gyur na/ /nyin zhag bcu na yang dag nyal/ /slar yang cha shas bcu bdun ni/ /gnas pa'i brla yi mtshan ma las/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi na/ /'chi 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za/ /

cha shas bco brgyad gnas pa yi/ /byin pa la ni gnas pa'i rtsa/ /de bzhin steng du bltas pa yis/ /nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs kyis 'chi/ /bcu dgu yi ni cha shas gnas/ /chu so de bzhin steng bltas pas/ /de dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag

gis/ /'chi 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /cha shas nyi shu gnas pa yi/ /pho mtshan la ni gnas pa'i rtsa/ /steng du bltas ba mchog dbang phyug /mtshan mas nyin zhag dus kyi ni/ /grangs kyis 'chi 'gyur the tshom med/ /re'u mig bcu

gnyis rtsis pa la/ /bar bar nyi ma bstan pa dag /lo yi rim gyis de sbyangs te/ /bdun bcu rtsa gnyis rim pa dang / /sum bcu rtsa drug bcwa brgyad kyis/ /zla ba la sogs go rims bzhin/ /rim gyis rim gyis dbri bar bya/ /

lhag mar gang zhig gyur pa ni/ /bsdus te 'tsho ba'i dus su ni/ /lha mo chen mo shes bya zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje

can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dbugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu pa'o// // sgo dgu po yi mtshan nyid dang / /rtsa ni gang bar

gnas pa yi/ /yon tan skyon sogs ji ltar blta/ /de rnams bye brag mi 'tshal te/ /ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid/ /bshad kyis lha mo
mnyan par gyis/ /sngon du bdag nyid sbyang byas la/ /phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya/ /gzugs med gnas pa mdog sngo ba'i/ /pad chen zla ba lta bu 'dzag /slar yang gzugs su gnas pa ste/ /rnam pa kun

gyis brgyan pa'o/ /cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /kha ni thur du bltas te 'phyang / /go 'phang gnas pa'i gnas nas ni/ /kun da zla 'dra rtag tu dag /rnam shes ye shes bdud rtsi ni/ /lha mo chen mo 'bab pa'i mchog /

rten du gyur pa'i pad ma gang / /zla ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan/ /de ni cha dang cha yis gzugs/ /gong bu gnas pa zhes byar brjod/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gnas kyi mtha' ni dag par bya/ /dag nas srid pa 'pho bya yi/ /

gzhan du na ni don med 'gyur/ /dgang ba yis ni lus bkang na/ /dug dang rims kyi tsha ba 'phrog /bum pa can gyis sgo bcings na/ /sgo yi sbu gu dag par 'gyur/ /'thor bas sna tshogs rdul du bya/ /rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur/ /

rnam shes dgrog pa'i cho ga dang / /gzhan du 'gro ba'ang bshad par bya/ /de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyang bar bya/ /gnas gnyis dag ni bsams nas su/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /

rlung gi dbus su me yis ni/ /yang dang yang du dbye bar bya/ /A li kA lir ldan pa yi/ /sa bon der ni sbyar bar bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du/ /'byung dang 'jug pas bzlos par bya/ /'byung ba ye shes sa bon gyis/ /

bsnun dang ldan par bsam par bya/ /'jug pa snying gi rnam shes la/ /me tog lta bur bsnun par bya/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'byung bzlas te/ /bdag nyid las ni phyi rol bya/ /'jug pa 'byung bar mtshon bya ste/ /de kho na nyid

mnyam par bsgom/ /mnyam bzhag dngos po bsgoms na ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de nas phyi rol lus la ni/ /bsgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul/ /nyi ma'i lam nas ngang phyung ste/ /lha mo cha shas ldan par bya/ /

bsgrub bya'i snying kar zhugs nas ni/ /rlung dang me yis 'bar ba dag /de yi rnam shes bzung nas ni/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor du ni 'jug /bsgrub bya'i rnam shes bsdus nas su/ /'og gi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya/ /ji srid zad

par byas bar du/ /de srid lkugs te gnas par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab gyur na/ /'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang / /rims la sogs pas ma phog par/ /gong du 'pho ba mchog yin no/ /de nas gzhan lus la

'jug pa/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bcings nas su/ /rtag tu srog dang rtsol ba bya/ /khyod kyi gnas su sbyar nas ni/ /rang gi lus ni yongs btang ste/ /

rim gyis sbyor bas phye nas su/ /cho ga 'di ltar byas pa yis/ /sngags pa gzhan gyi lus la 'jug /sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis/ /rang gi lus la sbyar bar 'dod/ /'gro dang 'ong ba'i bye brag gis/ /mnyam par bzhag ste

gang byed pa/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug thams cad dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang sbyor bas mchod/ /gang gi ring nas thos gyur pa/ /de ni yang dag bshad kyis nyon/ /de bzhin mkhas pas gzhan sems kyi/ /bsam pa rjes su

shes par bya/ /bsgom dang bzlas pa'i khyad par gyi/ /sbyor ba'i dam pa skye bar 'gyur/ /gang gi lam nas bsams na ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /'khor lo gang zhig sngar bstan par/ /zhugs te nyan pa
gnyis su ni/ /'jig rten gsum dang 'dres nas ni/ /me stag bzhin du rnam par 'khor/ /rlung gis bskyed pa'i me yis ni/ /shes rab ldan pas zhugs bsams na/ /zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni/ /ring na

gnas pa thos par 'gyur/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /ye shes mig gis mthong 'gyur ba/ /shin tu ring na gnas pa yang / /bsgrub pos skad cig gsal bar mthong / /bstan dang ma bstan gang ci'ang rung / /

de kun nga yis yang dag bshad/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /dge ba'i sgo nas 'gro ba dang / /gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis/ /thar pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba/ /mchog dang tha ma'i bye brag rnams/ /mdor bsdus

nas ni bshad par bya/ /lte ba las ni 'dod khams lha/ /thig le gzugs can mtho ris te/ /steng nas 'gro bas steng gi ni/ /myur du 'gro bar byed par 'gyur/ /sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste/ /rna ba dag ni grub pa'i lha/ /
gal te mig las ye shes 'gro/ /mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gyur/ /srid pa'i sgo las yi dgas te/ /de bzhin chu las dud 'gro'o/ /chu min gyis ni dmyal bar ltung / /thar pa'i lam las gzhan du 'gro/ /

sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis/ /sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi/ /sgo yi bu gar bsgom par bya/ /de la 'og gi sgo ru ni/ /chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam/ /chu dang chu min sgo la ni/ /

me yi sa bon 'bar ba ste/ /de la shin du mnyam gzhag pas/ /dbugs ni bum pa can du bsgom/ /lus ni rlung gi mdog tu ste/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba can/ /rlung gi sa bon

rtsa bar te/ /thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya/ /'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sgra dang sgra yis 'phul bar byed/ /dus la bab na 'pho bya ste/ /dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur/ /
lha rnams bsad pa tsam gyis ni/ /dmyal bar nges par bsreg par 'gyur/ /de bas 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ni/ /mkhas pas 'bad de shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sngar bstan pa'i/ /sngo chen bde ba phun sum

tshogs/ /bsgrub po rnams kyis smin pa la/ /steng gi rtsa ba bza' bar bya/ /chu dang skya reng ldan pa dag /g.yon pa'i bdud rtsir sbyar byas la/ /zos na zhi dang rgyas pa ste/ /dug dang rims kyi tsha ba 'phrog /cho ga'i

sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rnyings dang smin pa 'joms par byed/ /lha mo slar yang bzlog pa yis/ /nam mkhar 'gro ba brjod par bya/ /rlung dang me yi bye brag gis/ /rkang pa'i 'khor lo sbyar byas te/ /yid kyis rab tu zhir sbyar

nas/ /nam mkha' la ni 'gro 'gyur zhing / /mkha' 'gro kun gyis bskor nas su/ /lha yi lus kyis kun du rtse/ /ji srid zla nyid yod kyi bar/ /de srid nam mkhar gnas par 'gyur/ /slar yang lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /

kha dog dkar po'i pad ma bsam/ /bsgrub bya'i dbus su sbyar ba ni/ /rtag tu ngag gi dngos grub byed/ /rang gi lus dbus bsgom bya ba/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa ltar/ /rang gi kha nas byung nas su/ /bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim

par bya/ /nyi ma bdun gyis dngos grub tu/ /'gyur te gzhan du yang ma yin/ /rlung gi lam nas bsgrub bya yi/ /lus la thim par gyur ba dang / /de'i sems ni bzung nas su/ /bdag la gzhug ste me la ni/ /bsams te rlung dang

me sbyar bas/ /de yi lus ni 'khrug par 'gyur/ /tshigs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyis/ /mod la 'pho bar shes bya ste/ /nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang / /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa yang / /lam 'di yis ni

dag 'gyur te/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / /srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro/ /ji ltar 'dam las skyes pa yi/ /pad ma dri med yid 'ong ba/ /de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni/ /ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang

mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las gong du 'pho ba'i bsam gtan dang / seng ge rnam

par rol pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa/ /g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de/ /sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa/ /

mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /g+ho g+hu/ thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa/ /'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /gu g+hu/ mthe bo 'tshir bar byed pa ni/ /'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /mu g+hu/ lag pa rna bar rdebs pa ni/ /

blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no/ /lu g+hu/ sna rtser skyor mo rdebs pa ni/ /thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin/ da~MSh+T+ya/ sha ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa/ /rnal 'byed byed pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /gan d+ho de/ gang zhig smin ma'i dbus reg pa/ /

nga'i snying sdug grogs po'o/ /a li ni da ha/ so yis lce ni 'tsher byed pa/ /'dus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o/ /bak+shi yo/ lag pa rtsa la 'ju byed pa/ /khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o/ /dwi ra ti/ lag pa snying kar nyid byed na/ /

da ni nga'i yid 'ong ba'o/ /ru tsa ba ta ba ta/ sna rtser khu tshur 'chang ba ni/ /med do zhes ni ston pa'o/ /shu n+ya ta/ lag pa brkyang ste ltor rdebs na/ /phun sum ldan par yod zhes pa'o/ /kri ka sa ha/ lte ba ru ni nyed byed na/ /kha zas za bar

'dod pa'o/ /tsan Da li ka /mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na/ /zhe gnag gtum la drag pa'o/ /nI la dan ta ba ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na/ /'dir 'dod pa ni da lta ston/ /a na~M ga yu ta/ lce ni 'dril bar byed pa dag /da lta 'chi

zhes bya ba'o/ /dur ga ti/ kun du lta bar byed pa ni/ /tshes grangs shes par 'dod pa'o/ /ta ra ga na/ tshes gcig nas ni brtsams nas su/ /mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya/ /nyi tshod yi ge la sogs pa/ /sngar bstan ba

bzhin du mdun du reg /gi ri/ steng du lta bar byed pa ni/ /nyin phyed dga' bas rol ba'o/ /sa ma tsha ya/ 'dzum dang bcas par lta byed cing / /lag pas lag pa bzung nas su/ /rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa/ /nor zas byin zhes

bya ba'o/ /dzir na pa ta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na/ /da ltar 'grogs la 'dod zhes pa'o/ /sa la bab ta/ mthe 'o yis ni srin lag la/ /reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba'o/ /so ma/ mthe bo khro bo bza' la sogs/ sur+ya/

mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rnal 'byor ma

rnams kyi ngag gi phyag rgya'i brda yis rol pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // lha mos slar yang gar mdzad de/ /glu 'di yis ni mnyes par byas/ /e ba~M si ta a ru na ni b+ha/ dza ni te me d+h+ya ma ga ma A ga ma d+ha ma

pA si ni sA sA sA/ ni ga ma sA sA sA/ ri ga mo b+hu pa ti/ sa ri ri sa ri rI sA sA sA/ ma d+h+ya ma a d+ha ma sA sA sA/ shru ta ni sa sA sA sA/ sa ni sa ri ta g+ha ma g+ha ma/ a d+ha ma d+ha ma sA sA sA/ ba ba ma ya ba ba d+ha na mo zhes bya'o/ /

shar du me'o/ /gshin rjer ni bre'o/ /nub du ni mi'o/ /byang du ni ku'o/ /me mtshams su ni d+ha si'o/ /bden bral du ni ma ka'o/ /rlung mtshams su ni tu ku'o/ /dbang ldan du ni bi mo'o/ /a ni sgur po'o/ /i ni zla ba la skyes pa'o/ /u ni lha'i bla

ma'i'o/ /e ni pa ba sangs kyi'o/ /o ni nyi ma'i bu'i'o/ /a~M ni gza'i bdag po ri 'ong can no/ /a ni nyi ma'o/ /gza' rnams kyi ni cho ga las/ /zla ba nyi ma'i brjod par bya/ /zla ba karka Ta la dbang / /nyi ma gdong lnga pa la ste/ /gza' rnams

lhag ma ji snyed pa/ /ra si gnyis gnyis la ni spyod/ /sgang gshong 'khor lo khyod kyis bshad/ /skar ma dus dang nyi ma yi/ /bye brag dag ni mi 'tshal te/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bka' stsal pa/ lug dang ro hi ta sogs

pa/ /gang gi 'chi ba bshad kyis nyon/ /mdor bsdus nas ni brjod par bya/ /zla ba dang ni tshes grangs dang / /skar ma yi ni dus dang ldan/ /gdon dang nad ni de bzhin te/ /sgang gshor ra si tshad ma ni/ /gang zhig las ni skyes pa'i

brjod/ /ba tra yi ni nyi ma la/ /dgun zla ra ba'i zla ba yi/ /gza' ni mig dmar dag dang ni/ /rgyu skar smin drug ldan gyur pa/ /de ni de yi 'chi dus yin/ /sus kyang bskyab par mi nus so/ /khyu mchog gi ni nyi ma la/ /lus kyi

mtshan ma la sogs dang / /smyo zhing 'gul ba'i nad kyis ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya/ /de bzhin dgun zla 'bring po yi/ /gza' lag dang ni snar mar ldan/ /nyi ma bzhi pa de la ni/ /dgongs mo 'chi 'gyur the

tshom med/ /dgun zla tha chungs lha mo che/ /skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang / /gza' ni gza' lag bcas pa la/ /'khrig pa'i mi ni gang yin pa/ /nyi ma drug la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad la/ /skar ma mgo dang

ldan pa dang / /gza' ni pa ba sangs 'dzom zhing / /nyi ma snga dro'i dus la ni/ /karka Ta ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dpyid zla 'bring po'i gnyis lnga la/ /skar ma mchu dang ldan pa dang / /gza' ni spen par ldan pa la/ /seng ge'i mi ni 'chi

bar 'gyur/ /dpyid zla tha chungs bcu gnyis la/ /skar ma nag par ldan pa dang / /gza' ni nyi ma dag la ni/ /skran dang gzer ba'i nad kyis ni/ /bu mo'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dbyar zla ra ba'i bcu bzhi la/ /skar ma lha

mtshams ldan pa dang / /gza' ni mig dmar dag la ni/ /srang gi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dbyar zla 'bring po'i bcu gcig la/ /nag pa dang ni mig dmar la/ /sdig pa'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dbyar zla tha chungs tshes

dgu la/ /skar ma dro zhun ldan pa dang / /gzhu'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de dag nges par ldan gyur na/ /'chi 'gyur bden par nga yis bshad/ /ston zla ra ba'i bdun pa la/ /skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa dang / /gza' ni zla

bar bcas pa la/ /chu srin mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /ston zla 'bring po'i bcu gsum la/ /skar ma tha skar ldan pa dang / /gza' ni zla bar bcas pa la/ /bum pa'i mi ni zad par 'gro/ /ston zla tha chungs sgyu ma che/ /nyi ma

dag ni brgyad pa la/ /skar ma nam grur ldan pa dang / /gza' ni spen par bcas pa la/ /nya'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sngon du skye dus shes bya ste/ /phyi nas dus ni rtsi bar bya/ /gzhan du dus ni smra ba dag /thams cad don med nyid

du 'gyur/ /skye dus shin tu mnyam bzhag ste/ /zhi dang drag po dpyad par bya/ /tshe dang 'chi dus la sogs pa/ /de nas de ltar lung bstan zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /

rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las gza' dang nyi ma'i nges par 'chi ba tshar gcad pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa
gsum pa'o// // ltas kyi mtshan nyid dge ba ni/ /rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /A li kA li mnyam byas la/ /sde tshan du ni bsdeb par bya/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed dang po sogs/ /bltas te ming ni gzung
bar bya/ /cha shas ldan la snying stobs can/ /de yi rigs ni shes par bya/ /mtha' yas la sogs klu rnams dang / /nyi ma la sogs de bzhin gza'/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs ma mo rnams/ /de yi rigs su rab tu

grags/ /lha rnams thams cad nyid dang ni/ /sngags rnams thams cad de las skyes/ /skye bo thams cad skyed byed ma/ /des na ma zhes bya bar brjod/ /a yig dang ni de bzhin a/ /ka tsa Ta dang yang dag ldan/ /ta pa dang

ni ya sha ste/ /sde dgu yi ni yi ge'o/ /i dang slar yang lha mo I/ /de bzhin gzhan yang kha tsha Tha/ /tha pha dang ni ra Sha nyid/ /sde tshan gnyis pa yin par brjod/ /u dang lha mo de bzhin U/ /ga dza Da dang yang dag ldan/ /

da ba dang ni la sa ste/ /de dag sde tshan gsum pa yin/ /yi ge e dang de bzhin ai/ /de bzhin slar yang g+ha dz+ha D+ha/ /d+ha b+ha wa ha slar de bzhin/ /'di dag sde tshan bzhi pa yin/ /o yig dang ni au yig dang / /a~M zhes bya dang

tsheg drag bcas/ /slar yang nga nya Na na ma/ /'di dgu sde tshan lnga pa yin/ /kun tu bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang / /lhag ma lnga dang bcas par bya/ /de dag skye bo thams cad kyi/ /skye dang 'jig par yang dag gnas/ /yi ge bcu gnyis

sgyu 'phrul che/ /'tsho dang dus kyi rang bzhin brjod/ /de dag ra si zhes bya ba/ /skar ma kun dang yang dag ldan/ /zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis/ /de bzhin 'og dang steng du lta/ /brtan pa nyid dang g.yo ba nyid/ /gnyis po

gnyis su brjod pa yin/ /rkyang pa dang ni sbyar ba ste/ /ring dang thung dang pham dang rgyal/ /de las steng gi rgyal ba ste/ /'og ni 'chi bar shes par bya/ /nyi ma'i rgyu bar 'gro ba yi/ /gza' dang ra si skar ma rnams/ /nyi ma la ni gnas

te 'char/ /ra si gza' dang gsum par 'dod/ /dbugs rgyu ba dang yang dag ldan/ /thams cad ra sir shes par bya/ /karka Ta dang glang po'i dgra/ /de bzhin gzhon nu ma dang sras/ /cha shas drug dang yang dag ldan/ /gza' yis

bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa dang ni chu skyes dang / /khyu mchog dang ni bum par bcas/ /cha shas lnga yi tshad dang ldan/ /gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur/ /nya dang lug dang de bzhin du/ /gzhu dang zung du sprod pa dag /

cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /snga ma bzhin du 'char bar 'gyur/ /slar yang ltas dang bcas pa yi/ /gza' rnams 'char bar bshad par bya/ /'bras bu'i mig dang ldan par bya/ /ltas chen 'byung ba mnyan par
gyis/ /nag mo dang / gtsigs ma dang / 'jigs su rung ma dang / rga las 'das ma dang / log 'dren ma dang / gtum mo dang / drag mo'i gzugs can ma dang / dka' zlog lha mo dang / rgyal ma dang / rnam

par rgyal ma dang / mi thub ma dang / gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / nag mo bzang mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / nag mo sbom mo dang / dbang mo dang / zla ba mo dang / drag mo dang / sdang ma dang / 'phyang ba ma dang / sum

bcu'i dbang mo dang / 'phrog byed ma dang / 'bar ma dang / 'jib byed ma dang / lha mo 'di rnams ming dang ni/ /ltas chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi/ /ming ni mtshungs pas 'bras bu ster/ /nyis 'gyur du ni byas nas su/ /dbang po'i cha dang

yang dag ldan/ /ltas ni lhag ma bzung nas su/ /ltas ni shes pa nyid du bya/ /nag mo dang ni 'jigs rung dang / /drag mo'i gzugs dang dka' zlog nyid/ /nag sbom ma dang rgyal ma dang / /drag mo sum bcu'i dbang mo dang / /

'phrog byed ma dang 'jib byed ma/ /bcu po 'di dag rtsub por grags/ /bag ma len dang bkra shis dang / /grong dang tshong 'dus gzugs pa dang / /lam du dpag dang thab mo dang / /chen po'i sar ni dbyung ba sogs/ /

ltas de las ni 'bras med pas/ /dge ba'i las rnams mi bya ste/ /rigs de rnams la sgyu ma che/ /bzang po'i las ni spang bar bya/ /dge bas kyang ni gsod 'gyur na/ /drag po'i las kyis smos ci dgos/ /lus la gnas

pa'i dbugs dang ni/ /phyi rol gza' dang ra si ste/ /phyi dang nang du bcas pa yi/ /rgyu ba shes na 'grub par 'gyur/ /gza' gang yin pa dbyangs shes bya/ /dbyangs gang yin pa de nyid kyang / /ra si nyid du shes par bya/ /dbyangs dang ra si de bzhin du/ /

skar ma'ang dbyangs kyi gzugs su blta/ /phan tshun sbyor ba ma gtogs par/ /'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /g.yo ba 'char la g.yo ba'i las/ /brtan pa la ni mi g.yor 'gyur/ /'dren ma yis ni 'dren ma ste/ /phyi dang nang du bcas

pas gsal/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las gza' rnams

kyi rgyu ba dang sde tshan gyi ltas kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // da ni gza' dang skar ma ru/ /bcas pa'i rgyu ba bshad kyis nyon/ /nyi ma rgyu ba'i nyin mo ni/ /thun phyed lnga dang bdun pa la/ /bya ba ci yang mi

'grub bo/ /zla ba yi ni bzhi dang drug /mig dmar gyi ni gsum dang lnga/ /gza' lag gnyis dang bzhi pa la/ /gdon mi za bar 'joms par 'gyur/ /bla mas dang po gsum pa la/ /'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /ngan spong gi ni gnyis pa dang / /

bdun pa la ni shes par bya/ /dal ba yi ni dang po dang / /drug pa la ni 'chi bar byed/ /rigs de dag la 'char ba yi/ /dus ni yongs su chad par bstan/ /de dag thun mong mtshan nyid de/ /rnal 'byor pa yi gzhan bshad nyon/ /lnga nas nyi shu

lnga'i bar 'di dag ni brjod bya ste/ /de las bcu gsum gsum gyi bar du re re spel bar bya/ /dgun zla tha chungs nyi ma la mtshungs gsum mig zla ba drug /gsum zung zla ste zla lhag tshes phyogs mda' yon tan/ /thig le de dag gi ni 'tsho ba yang

dag bshad pa yin/ /lnga las bcu'i bar dang de bzhin bcu nas ni/ /bcu lnga'i bar te de nas nyi shu'i bar dang ni/ /de nas nyi shu lnga yi bar du sbyang bar bya/ /de nas bsgrub pos shes bya ba/ /gnas skabs 'gyur ba bshad par bya/ /

zla ba gang la gnas pa yi/ /dang po skar ma bsgrang bar bya/ /nyi ma yi ni chu tshod dag /ji snyed 'das pa de snyed ni/ /zla ba'i gnas skabs rgyu ba'i phyir/ /de ni drug bcur bsgyur bar bya/ /slar yang nyi tshod zla ba bsnan/ /drug bcu ru ni

bsgyur byas la/ /mda' dang sreg byed ro yi ni/ /dbang por bcas pas de bzhin gcad/ /bcu gnyis dag gi nang nas ni/ /lhag ma'i cha shas gzung bar bya/ /lhag ma'i cha shas de yi ni/ /skyid sdug gnas skabs myong bar

'gyur/ /nyin dang mtshan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /lhag ma'i chu tshod tu ni brjod/ /dang po'i zla bar rab gnas pa/ /de yi bya ba nyams par 'gyur/ /gnyis pa bkra shis shis pa ste/ /gsum pa 'chi ste gsod par 'gyur/ /bzhi pa dgod

te tshim par 'gyur/ /lnga pa nor te rnyed par 'gyur/ /drug pa rims te lus 'jig 'gyur/ /bdun pa la ni dga' ba ste/ /tshim pa nyid ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /brgyad pa 'jig rten brlag par 'gyur/ /zla ba dgu par gnas pa

yis/ /lus ni dgra dang bcas par 'gyur/ /bcu pa dga' mgur rtse 'gyur zhing / /sna tshogs pas ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bcu gcig sna tshogs 'jigs pas gdung / /bcu gnyis pa ni longs spyod de/ /bde ba chen pos rgyal

bar 'gyur/ /lug la sogs pa bstan pa yis/ /zla ba rim pa bzhin du rgyu/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis

gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las thams cad rgyu ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

sgang gshong 'khor lo khyod bshad pa/ /de rnams dbye ba ci 'dra dang / /dus kyi grangs ni ji bzhin gsungs/ /rgyu ba yi ni khyad par dag /'di la bdag ni the tshom skyes/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa/ /

nyon cig lha mo rgyu ma che/ /dus kyi bgrang ba lus med cing / /thams cad tu ni thams cad gnas/ /dngos po kun la khyab pa ste/ /lus la gnas kyang lus mi skye/ /dus nyid dus ni med pa dang / /'jig rten nyid ni 'jig rten min/ /

bden pa dang ni brdzun pa min/ /lha khyod kyis ni sngar bshad pa'i/ /bsam gyis mi khyab dus mtshan nyid/ /gang zhing khyod kyis bshad pa ste/ /don dam shin du rnyed dka' ba/ /lus las 'das shing dri med pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yis

ji ltar rtogs/ /skye bo kun la sman slad tu/ /dbugs kyi nges pa bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nad med rlung dang bral ba dang / /khams ni snyoms par gnas pa dang / /ran par za zhing tshul bzhin
rgyu/ /de yi mig btsums gzung bar bya/ /mig btsums mig ni btsums pa ste/ /mig btsums drug la cha shas ni/ /gcig ces bya bar brjod pa yin/ /yud tsam drug ni skad cig ste/ /skad cig drug ni thang cig
yin/ /thang cig drug ni chung zad yin/ /dus kyi go rims bya ba 'dis/ /sum bcu tham par bsgyur ba la/ /yi ge lci ba'i dus zhes brjod/ /yi ge lci ba bcu la ni/ /srog gcig ces bya'i dus su bshad/ /

de ni bcu gsum bsgyur ba las/ /de yang gnyis su bsgyur ba ni/ /srang gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /srang ni drug bcu tham pa la/ /chu tshod gcig tu bzhed pa yin/ /de brgyad thun gcig zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin

la ni nyin gcig go/ /nyin mtshan dus ni mnyam pa la/ /mtshan mo'ang de dang mnyam par bshad/ /chu srin nas ni sbal pa'i bar/ /nyi ma 'phel bar brjod pa ste/ /lha mo srang ni gsum gsum gyis/ /nyin re zhing ni spel bar bya/ /

chu srin las ni 'das nas su/ /mtshan mo srang ni gsum gsum 'bri/ /tshad ma de dag bstan pa'i phyir/ /zangs ma srang ni bcu gnyis la/ /snod ni spangs su sor brgyad dang / /rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis pa/ /legs pa

nyid du brdung bar bya/ /gser ni 'ol se sum bcu las/ /sor drug pa yi tshad tsam du/ /thur ma legs par brdungs nas ni/ /thur ma de yis bu ga ni/ /zangs ma'i snod la mkhas pas dbug /chu ni rnyog ma med pa las/ /

srang ni drug bcu'i tshad du bya/ /srang 'dis chu tshod tshad yin te/ /skye bo rnams la phan phyir bshad/ /chu tshod de ni yud tsam ste/ /thun phyed dang ni thun gcig dang / /nyin dang mtshan mo'i tshad kyis ni/ /rim bzhin zla phyed zla bar

spel/ /zla ba gnyis ni dus yin te/ /de gsum nyi ma 'gro ldog brjod/ /nyi ma 'gro ldog gnyis la ni/ /lo gcig nyid du brjod pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /

rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las dus 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas skar ma'i rigs gang yin/ /

mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /tha skar dang ni mgo dang rgyal/ /de bzhin du ni nab so dang / /me bzhi lha mtshams de bzhin du/ /nam gru sa ri gro zhun bcas/ /lha yi tshogs zhes brjod pa yin/ /snar ma dre dang chu stod dang / /

khrums stod dang ni bra nye dang / /lag dang mgo dang chu smad dang / /khrums smad mi yi tshogs yin no/ /smin drug dang ni chu dang ni/ /mon gru dang ni mon gre dang / /skag dang nag pa snron dang ni/ /sa ga dang ni snrums rnams ni/ /srin po yi ni rigs

yin par/ /bzhin mdzes ma ni khyod la bshad/ /smin drug rgyal ni ra yin te/ /mgo dang snar ma klu yin no/ /lag dang snrums ni khyi yin te/ /lha mtshams nab so phag gi rigs/ /mchu dang gre ni byi ba'o/ /skag ni byi lar bshad

pa ste/ /nag pa sa ga stag yin no/ /dbo dang khrums stod gnyis po ni/ /khyu mchog zhes ni bshad pa ste/ /stobs 'dod pas ni shes par bya/ /me bzhi dang ni sa ri gnyis/ /ma her shes bya stobs kyi mchog /tha skar dang ni

khrums smad gnyis/ /rta yi rigs zhes bya bar grags/ /chu stod dang ni gro zhun gnyis/ /spre'u yi rigs su brjod pa yin/ /bra nye dang ni nam gru gnyis/ /glang po'i rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'o/ /mon gru dang ni mon gre dag /

mi yi rigs su yang dag gsungs/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa ru/ /lha mo ngas ni bden par bshad/ /chu smad dang ni byi bzhin dag /ne'u le'i rigs su grags pa yin/ /mang po nyid kyis ci zhig bya/ /mdor bsdus nas ni

bshad kyis nyon/ /rang gi skye ba'i skar ma ni/ /bya ba kun la dpyad mi dgos/ /skar ma mi yi srog yin te/ /gzhan du ngas ni ma bshad do/ /skar ma'i cha ni bzlog pa dag /bzung na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lug dang srang

dang karka Ta/ /chu srin dag ni g.yo bar brjod/ /sdig pa bum pa seng ge dang / /khyu mchog dag ni brtan pa ste/ /nya dang gnyis sbyor gzhu dang ni/ /bu mo rnams ni 'dren ma'o/ /lha yi bla ma nyi ma dang / /mig dmar skyes pa'i gzugs

yin te/ /pa ba sangs dang sgra gcan dang / /zla ba mo'i gzugs yin no/ /gza' lag dang ni spen pa gnyis/ /ma ning nyid du bstan pa ste/ /nam mkha'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i gza'/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor pa'i/ /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las skar ma rnams kyi stobs la dbang ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye

ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // tshes dang skar ma gza' 'char ba/ /rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /ro hi ta yi tshe la ni/ /smin drug dang ni mig dmar la/ /'dron po lam du 'jug par bzang / /tshes de rnyed pa 'thob 'gyur

ba'o/ /ma ka ra yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang mig dmar ldan pa la/ /gzer dang 'joms sogs 'byung bas na/ /tshes de yongs su spang bar bya/ /swap+na yi ni nyi ma la/ /lag dang spen par ldan pa'i tshe/ /nag po nyid du shes

bya bas/ /tshes de'ang yongs su spang bar bya/ /ro hi ta yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang gza' lag ldan pa la/ /bkra shis dang ni bzang por byed/ /raN+Da yi ni nyi ma la/ /lag dang gza' lag bcas pa dag /kun tu 'joms

par bshad pas na/ /mchog gi sbyor bas de yang spang / /sa yi dbang phyug tshes la ni/ /bra nye dang ni gza' lag ldan/ /de yang nag po'i dus shes bya/ /b+ha dra yi ni tshes dag la/ /gre dang lha yi bla mar ldan/ /tshes de rnyed pa

byed pas na/ /sbyor pa po yis bsten par bya/ /mi ki ra yi tshes la ni/ /mon gru lha yi bla ma dag /gal te na ni 'dzom gyur na/ /'bru dang nor rnams zad byed par/ /gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin/ /tshes ni bcu gsum

dag la ni/ /skag dang lha yi bla ma dag /gal te 'dzoms na nag po bas/ /nyes pa kun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur/ /bri sha ba yi tshes la ni/ /stobs ldan gyi ni blon po dang / /gal te khrums stod 'dzom na ni/ /tshes de rgyas pa ster 'gyur

zhing / /dge ba'i grogs rnams thams cad byed/ /brId+d+hi ka yi nyi ma ni/ /chu stod dang ni pa ba sangs/ /gal te 'dzom na nad kyis ni/ /gdungs shing 'joms par the tshom med/ /'byung po yi ni nyi ma la/ /bra nye dang ni pa ba sangs/ /'dzom na gshin

rje'i mche ba ste/ /tshes de yongs su spang bar bya/ /kur+m+ma yi ni nyi ma la/ /smin drug dang ni spen pa ru/ /gal te 'dzom par gyur na ni/ /rnyed dang grags pa la sogs dang / /bsod nams kun gyi 'bras bu 'thob/ /bya ku li yi nyi ma ni/ /skag dang

spen par ji zhig ltar/ /'dzom na gdung bar byed pas na/ /nyi ma de la'ang 'gro ba spang / /zla ba nya yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang spen par ldan gyur na/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pas na/ /tshes de shin du spang bar bya/ /me yi

mtshams su mi kir bri/ /gshin rje yi ni raN+Da ste/ /srin po yi ni kur+m+ma bri/ /chu yi phyogs su khyu mchog ste/ /'jigs byed du ni bya ku li/ /gter gyi phyogs su swa ba na/ /mig gsum phyogs su bzang po bri/ /shar gyi

phyogs su'ang khyu mchog go/ /zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis/ /de rnams su ni rgyu bar bshad/ /ba tra nas ni ran dar ste/ /bya ku li dang bre sha ba/ /ba/ /'di dag nyi ma'i rgyu bar ni/ /rigs mchog ma ni khyod la bshad/ /khyu mchog

dang ni mi ki ra/ /swa pa na dang kur ma ni/ /zla ba'i rgyu bar bshad pa ste/ /rim pa de ltar brjod pa yin/ /nya la me mtshams gnas pa ste/ /stong la rlung gi phyogs su gnas/ /de ltar de dag dbus su ni/ /gnas pa de dag gdung

bar 'gyur/ /zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i/ /ri mo mnyam du lta bas na/ /des na shes rab can gyis spang / /zhi dang sdig par lta bas na/ /lta ba'i 'chad pa 'byung ba ste/ /myur du gsod par byed pa yin/ /sgra gcan gyi ni

rgyu ba yi/ /dus ni mdo ru bsdus pa yin/ /yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis/ /blo ldan 'bad de shes par bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /

bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las tshes grangs dang skar ma'i nges pa rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam grol ba/ /

lus can kun gyi rnam shes te/ /lus las 'das shing dri ma med/ /lhun po dang ni ti se dang / /de bzhin du ni 'bigs byed sogs/ /shar gyi lus 'phags ba glang spyod/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ni/ /'dzam bu'i

gling dang bcas pa dang / /lan tsha can dang 'o ma yi/ /rgya mtsho la sogs chu tshogs dang / /'og dang steng du gang gyur pa/ /khams gsum ma lus zad par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang / /skye mched khams
rnams zad par bya/ /'byung po la sogs phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten khams kun zad bsams te/ /dngos dang dngos med 'dres par ni/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams/ /

mnyam nyid stong pa nyid du blta/ /thams cad nam mkhar thim nas ni/ /ba glang rmig par grong khyer bsgom/ /rnal 'byor can gyi cho ga bzhin/ /sems ni me mar lta bur bsgom/ /de dbus yid kyis bltas nas ni/ /der ni
mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /me mar lta bus zhi bar 'gyur/ /dmar pos brgyan na rgyas pa ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang na/ /chags pa la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtha' mar du ba'am gnag mthong na/ /

mngon spyod tu ni grags pa yin/ /rlung gi mdog ltar rab 'khrugs na/ /de ma thag tu bskrad par 'gyur/ /'od zer dkar po long long pos/ /blo ldan sngags kyi dngos grub ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub shes bya/ /

bkra shis kyis ni lam ston yin/ /cho ga 'dis ni gzhan gsal dang / /gzhan gyi gzugs sogs dbu ma rnams/ /de 'og rnal 'byor bskyed par bya/ /ye shes la sogs sems kyis ni/ /gang zhig stong nyid shes byas na/ /

sems ni myur du thar bar 'gyur/ /ye shes kyis ni shes bya brtag /shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya/ /pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing / /bram ze gtsang ma gnyis bzung nas/ /rgyal po yul 'khor bcas bcom na/ /mi de

dag par 'gyur zhes bya/ /ye shes rang bzhin kun dang sbyor/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje

mkha' 'gro las ye shes 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// // ye shes khyad par gang gis ni/ /ye shes thun mor byin brlabs pa/ /bye brag can ni ji lta bu/ /lha las rol mo nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lci bar gyur pa sum bcu pos/ /dge dang sdig pa'i 'bras 'byung ba/ /nga rgyal gyis ni byin brlabs pa/ /sems kyis byas pa'i las tshogs kyis/ /bsgom par gyur pa'i rang rig pa'i/ /

sems ni 'gro ba de ru 'gro/ /srid pa'i zhags pas rtag 'jigs pas/ /de yi 'gro ba mi mthong ngo / /'du shes rnam pa lnga dang ni/ /lta ba lnga yis pha rol 'gro/ /lha yi ye shes gsal bar blta/ /lha min ye shes khro ba'o/ /

yi dgas ye shes zhan pa ste/ /dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs pas non/ /byol song ye shes blun pa ste/ /brtan pa rnams ni sems med pa'o/ /rgyu ba'i ye shes rnam pa lnga/ /glen pas bsgribs dang lkugs pa dang / /

byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /sems can yongs su ma smin dang / /bla ma'i lam ni sun 'byin pa/ /de dag kun gyis mi shes te/ /gsang chen sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/ /ye shes de nyid bye brag dag /bde ba

chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ye shes de nyid bye brag dag /nyon cig yang dag sgyu ma che/ /las rnams kyi ni bye brag gis/ /ye shes bye brag sprul pa yin/ /dman dang rab dman dman pa

can/ /gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po/ /klu dang byol song gsang ba la/ /lto 'phye dang ni mi 'am ci/ /mi dang yi dgas mkha' 'gro ma/ /dmyal ba la sogs gang gyur dang / /gsol ba'i gzugs su mngon brjod dang / /

phra mo sgo nga las byung ba/ /chu dang me dang rlung dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni sa yi khams/ /brtan pa la sogs thams cad dang / /rtsa dang mdab ma phra ba dang / /sa dang rdo dang brag la sogs/ /thams cad ye shes byin brlabs

pas/ /thams cad snang ste gzhan du na/ /ye shes med par skye mi 'gyur/ /skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul bas/ /de nas rnal 'byor bstan bcos la/ /'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya/ /gar gyi

gnas dang mtshungs pa yi/ /phyi rol bstan bcos su 'byin pa/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs na/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu 'thob/ /snying po las kyang snying po mchog /rnal 'byor bstan bcos mtshon par bya/ /

mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par

'phrul pa 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste sum bcu pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid de/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams su/ /rdo rje'i blos ni shes par bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang mngon spyod kyi/ /rdo rje dag ni

thams cad kyang / /gser la sogs pa legs par brdung / /rdo rje kun gyis shin tu brgyan/ /cha gsum du ni bzung nas su/ /cha brgyad ska rags legs par brgyan/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ni/ /dbus ma nyid dang

sangs rgyas dgu/ /rtse mo dgu ni lha nyid de/ /lha dgu yis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /chu srin las ni byung ba yi/ /rtse mo pad ma zla bar gnas/ /rtse dgu zhes ni bya ba ste/ /rdo rje ye shes 'gro ba sgrol/ /cha gsum gyi ni tshad dag la/ /

dbu ma cung zad ring yang rung / /'di ni thun mong tshad yin no/ /rtse mo kun gyi dbus ma zlum/ /phyogs sogs rtse mo 'dus bas gnas/ /dbus ni zur brgyad dag tu bya/ /dbus kyi cha yi tshad ldan pa/ /gnas pa lte ba zhes bya'o/ /rin chen

ma ra ka ta ltar/ /de yang cung zad zur brgyad bya/ /steng dang 'og dang dbus dag ni/ /so sor cha ni gsum gsum 'dod/ /steng gi pad ma zla ba ni/ /drug cha kun nas zlum por bya/ /de dag la ni seng ge'i sna/ /nas phyed tsam du

mtho bar bya/ /mche ba yi ni mthar gnas pa/ /de ni drug cha zhes byar grags/ /cha ni nyi shu rtsa bdun la/ /so so ru ni dgu dgur 'dod/ /cha gsum bla ma'i mtha' ma ni/ /steng gi cha gnyis spangs nas ni/ /dbus kyi mtha' yang

de bzhin no/ /mdab ma la ni gang gnas pa'i/ /chu srin cha gcig nyid yin te/ /de yi phyed du ska rags 'dod/ /rdo rje kun la blo ldan pas/ /mchu dang zheng ni mnyam por bya/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig rdo rje'i

mtshan nyid de/ /gser la sogs pa las brdungs pa/ /cha la sogs pa sngon du ni/ /ji ltar bstan bzhin ldan par bya/ /pad ma zla ba la gnas pa'i/ /chu srin gyi ni mche ba'i gzugs/ /'og gi chu srin las byung ba/ /

chu zheng ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /rtse mo ye shes rang bzhin 'byung / /kun gyi dbus su rnam snang ste/ /shar phyogs su ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /lho ru rin chen bstan pa ste/ /'od dpag med pa nub du dgod/ /byang du don yod grub pa

ste/ /rtse bzhi la sogs lha yin no/ /pad ma byang chub yan lag brgyad/ /sa la ji bzhin dgod par bya/ /phyag na pad ma byams pa dang / /mkha' snying kun du bzang po dang / /gnod sbyin bdag dang 'jam pa'i dpal/ /

sa snying sgrib sil de bzhin te/ /lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid/ /mdab ma brgyad la ji bzhin brtag /dbus su ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /bcu gsum gnas su thim par bya/ /gzhan yang mdab brgyad lha mo brgyad/ /

ji bzhin gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /rdo rje lcags sgrog dril bu nyid/ /lha mo dag ni bzhi po 'di/ /phyogs kyi pad mar yang dag gnas/ /mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang / /slar yang de

bzhin lha mo bzhi/ /skul byed rin chen sgron ma dang / /de bzhin rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / /de bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /pad ma'i mdab ma kun la dgod/ /rtse mo dag ni rnam lnga la/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni lnga nyid de/ /shar du

rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /byang du drag mo zhes bya ba/ /ro langs ma ni nub du gnas/ /lho ru de bzhin tsaN+Da lI/ /dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ste/ /dam tshig rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /gdug la rdo rje rtse gsum ste/ /rtse mo dag ni gdengs por

bya/ /de bzhin rtse mo gcig pa ni/ /klu rnams skrag par byed pa'o/ /khro bo'i rdo rje gdengs po ste/ /lhag ma rnams ni 'dul byed pa'o/ /zhi la zhi ba'i lha nyid de/ /rigs kyi rim pa'i cho gas dbye/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /

bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do/ /cha lnga'i tshad dang ldan pa ni/ /spyi gtsug rdo rje zhes byar grags/ /rna cha cha drug tshad tu bya/ /mgul do cha ni bzhi pa ste/ /

snying kar cha lnga pa ni gzung / /gsang ba dang ni lag par yang / /cha drug pa ni gzung bya ste/ /ji ltar mdzes par brtag par bya/ /rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes 'phel/ /cho ga'i bya ba 'di nyid kyis/ /

rnal 'byor rig par rtag tu bsgom/ /de nas dril bu'i mtshan nyid kyi/ /chu zheng la sogs bshad par bya/ /rin chen sna tshogs 'bar ba dang / /rdo rje'i ska rags phreng gnyis bya/ /shel sgong dri ma med pa ltar/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas

brgyan/ /cha gsum mtshan nyid ldan pa la/ /rdo rje la sogs mtshan mas brgyan/ /dbus kyi khog pa zab pa dang / /thams cad dga' byed bcud kyi gnas/ /de nas pad ma rin chen dang / /ud pal ku mu da yis brgyan/ /

phyogs dang phyogs mtshams cha brgyad tu/ /lha mo la sogs brgyad tu grags/ /de yi steng du lha mo ni/ /sa bon brgyad las bsam par bya/ /shar phyogs su ni sgrol ma ste/ /de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo'o/ /nub du bdag

ma'i ming can te/ /lho ru sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya/ /mdog mdzes sbrang rtsi yid 'ong ma/ /de bzhin rin chen 'khyil ma'o/ /nam mkha'i phyogs kyi dbus su ni/ /gzugs rdzogs bskor bas yang dag gnas/ /pad ma rgyas pa

lta bu'i dbyibs/ /gzugs med srid pa'i phyogs su ni/ /ye shes bdud rtsi bum pa 'dra/ /shes rab bdud rtsi'i gnas yin te/ /de yi dbus kyi stan la ni/ /steng du pad ma rdo rje ni/ /rtse mo dgu par bsam par bya/ /

dbus kyi dbyug pa ye shes te/ /thams cad spro zhing sdud pa mo/ /oM ltar mchog ni stsol bar 'grub/ /bya ba thams cad rab bsgrub ma'o/ /ye shes rdo rje'i dril bu ni/ /rtse mo dgu pa de bzhin no/ /sor mo bcu gnyis tshad

du ni/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba ska rags byas/ /pad ma mchog gi mdab ma dang / /dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid thams cad ldan/ /lha mo yi ni mtshan mas mdzes/ /shar gyi phyogs su pad ma ni/ /kha dog dkar

pos mdzes par bya/ /gshin rjer pad ma sngo dmar te/ /nub kyi phyogs su pad ma dmar/ /byang du ud pa la ni bri/ /bdud rtsi gnas kyi dbus na ni/ /lha mo yi ni zhal gcig bri/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma'o/ /gzugs

mdzes bskor bas yang dag gnas/ /steng gi pad dang rdo rje ni/ /snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya/ /dbus kyi ye shes dbyig pa ni/ /zur brgyad pas ni mdzes par bya/ /dril bu 'di ni lha mo che/ /tshe dang nad med phun sum tshogs/ /

de nas dpa' bo'i dril bu ste/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba'i ska rags ldan/ /de bzhin du ni shes rab dang / /bdud rtsi yi ni bum par ldan/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dra ba dra phyed dpyang bar bya/ /sor dgu ru ni yangs pa

ste/ /kha ni sor lnga'i tshad du bya/ /de las cung zad lhag bya min/ /rtse lnga pa 'am rtse dgu pa/ /skal ba bzang po thams cad dang / /dbang phyug dang ni sngags rnams kyi/ /'bras bu thams cad rab ster zhing / /mkha' 'gro'i stobs dang
rdzu 'phrul ster/ /de bzhin phun tshogs thams cad dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub mchog ni gsal bar ster/ /da ni de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /dril bu'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /

khar ba las byung sgra snyan byed/ /khong stong dang ni bum par ldan/ /rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang / /ral gri la sogs mtshan ma can/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/ /chu srin las ni byung ba yi/ /ye shes lnga yi rnam dag pas/ /rtse mo lnga

dang bcas pa ste/ /ska rags gnyis gnyis dbus su ni/ /'khor lo'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan/ /de bzhin ska rags gnyis dbus su/ /pad ma la ni pad phreng gnyis/ /rin chen la ni rin po che/ /de bzhin ska rags ldan par
bya/ /don yod grub pa zhes bya la/ /ska rags gnyis dbus ral gris brgyan/ /kun la shes rab gdong ldan pas/ /dpa' bo kun gyis rgyal bar 'gyur/ /kun la'ang 'khar ba'am yang na ni/ /lcags gsum

las byung dril bu ste/ /cha gsum dang ni ldan par bya/ /rdo rje'i rigs la ba glang gdong / /ska rags rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor/ /bum pa'i steng du gnas pa yi/ /kha khyer cung zad gru bzhir bya/ /ba glang gdong ni myur

ba ru/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar byed/ /nad med stobs ni rtag ster zhing / /sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /sngar bstan rjes su 'brangs nas ni/ /rdo rjes mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/ /rin chen

dbang sogs thod pa dang / /rang rang mtshan ma shes par bya/ /sor brgyad dam ni bcu drug gam/ /nyi shu las ni lhag mi bya/ /ji ltar nus shing rjes mthun par/ /bsgrub pa'i dbang pos de dag bya/ /kha yang cho ga'i rim pa

yis/ /sor mo lnga las gzhan pa spang / /lha mo 'di ni dril bu yi/ /bsgrub thabs rgya cher bstan pa ste/ /thun mong gi ni rgyud kun las/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rdo rje dang dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang tshad kyi cho ga'i rim

par phye ba ste sum bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid ni/ /rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /dul zhing cha lugs mdzes pa dang / /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /

rnal 'byor bzo'i cha la mkhas/ /thams cad tu ni 'jam par smra/ /sems can kun la bu bzhin lta/ /rtag tu gtong la dga' ba dang / /bsam gtan sbyor la mngon par brtson/ /snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /
bden par smra zhing 'tshe mi byed/ /rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems bskyed pas/ /sems can kun gyi mgon skyob ste/ /sems can bsam pa'i bye brag mkhas/ /mgon med rnams la gnyen ltar brtse/ /mdza' sdug gis

ni legs pas lta/ /sngags kyi tshul la shin tu goms/ /dam tshig spyod la rab tu gus/ /phyag rgya brda'i sbyor ba rig /rnal 'byor ma rnams dam tshig la/ /brda yis sbyor ba ston pa dang / /gnyis med sbyor ba mi phyed gnas/ /

sngags kyi 'khor lo spyod la gus/ /dbang bskur don gyi yon tan 'byung / /gnas sogs mthong ba'i ngang tshul can/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes/ /'di ni slob dpon zhes byar brjod/ /gsol pa/ de lta bu'i slob dpon la ji ltar blta

bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /yan lag byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /ba spu rnams ni dgra bcom nyid/ /spyi gtsug rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas te/ /'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan/ /'od zer

gnod sbyin gsang la sogs/ /de ltar yon tan rang bzhin lus/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu blta/ /ji lta'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par/ /ye shes can gyis mtshan shes nas/ /de lta'i bla ma 'bad de bsten/ /gang yang khro dang sgyu

can dang / /ngag ni shin tu rtsub pa dang / /yon tan dag gis chog shes pa/ /de ni bla mar bsten mi bya/ /gzhan yang slob ma'i spyod pa dang / /las kyi de nyid bshad kyis nyon/ /khro dang bcas shing rtog ger gus/ /na so dag ni

yol ba dang / /gang yang dge slong dngos gnas dang / /zhen dang chags pas bcings pa la/ /rin thang med pa'i rin chen ni/ /de la bshad par mi bya'o/ /gang yang nga rgyal med pa dang / /sgyu med bdag tu mi 'dzin cing / /de bzhin chos la mngon par dad/ /

de la man ngag sbyin par bya/ /gzhan du na ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /slob dpon gyi ni gsang ba dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang lha yi sbyor/ /lha yi dam tshig spyod pa dang / /gtor ma la sogs gsang sbyor ba/ /dmod pa dag tu gang byed pa/ /skrag pa kun dang bcas bzhin du/ /

mnar med par ni myur bar ltung / /slob dpon gyi ni mal stan dang / /lham dang gdugs dang na bza' sogs/ /nye ba'i longs spyod thams cad dang / /grib ma bgom bar mi bya zhing / /co bri bar ni mi bya'o/ /gal te byas na dus kun du/ /de ni kun tu gzer

'gyur zhing / /don nyams dpal las ring du 'gyur/ /bdud dang sdang bas gzir 'gyur te/ /mchod rten bshig dang sdig mtshungs pas/ /de bas grib ma 'gom mi bya/ /slob dpon dmod byed gang yin pa/ /rmi lam du 'ang dngos grub med/ /slob dpon

gyi ni yon tan gzung / /skyon rnams nam yang gzung mi bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor la sogs/ /de yi lam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /maN+Dal chog sogs rim pa yis/ /sngon du bslab pa sbyin bar bya/ /dngos po rang bzhin med par ni/ /

mthong bar byang chub rim pa ste/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams ni/ /ngo bo med la dngos mthong bas/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ste/ /de ltar rnam pa

bcur phye ba/ /dkar po yis ni dkar 'gyur la/ /nag pos de bzhin 'bras gnag 'byin/ /des na de dag spang bya ste/ /sems can rnams la tshig rtsub dang / /tshig 'khyal smra ba spang bar bya/ /snying rje yi ni sems

kyis su/ /'tshe dang gnod pa spang bar bya/ /bdag ni shi bar gyur kyang sla'i/ /srog chags gsod pa de ltar min/ /rab tu 'bar mer mtshungs pas na/ /gzhan gyi nor la reg mi bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis brdzun bsrung
