rnal 'byor gnyis med pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi cher mchod nas/ /rnal 'byor chen po de yis ni/ /bcud len sman gyi sbyor ba brtsam/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i grogs po ni/ /sngags kyi bsnyen par gus pa dang / /skyo dub med cing dgos pa

med/ /dam tshig spyod la gus pa ste/ /dpa' zhing brtan la g.yo sgyu med/ /'jam zhing bla ma'i bsnyen bkur brtson/ /de dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya/ /sgrub pos gzhan du byis na ni/ /dngos grub 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur/ /

sngar bshad rig pa sbyang byas te/ /dang po dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /gcer bu'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa yis/ /gnyis pas ming sogs dbang ni bskur/ /dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan/ /stong dang stong min sogs spangs pa'i/ /

ro ni mi mchog gis rtogs bya/ /sgo dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas/ /sbom po zhes ni bya ba ste/ /rdzas ni 'ju bar byed pa yin/ /bcud ni dngul gyi lhag ma yin/ /len pa snying stobs zhes byar bshad/ /snying stobs rdzas zhes bya ba ste/ /dngul

ni zhu ba zhes byar brjod/ /de ltar rdzas dang zhu ba ni/ /bsdus pa len pa zhes bya'o/ /mun pa phra mo zhes bya ste/ /phra mo nam mkha'i khams mtshan nyid/ /phung po la sogs khyad par dang / /khams rnams thams cad 'tshod pa yin/ /

sna tshogs gzugs rnams 'byin pa ni/ /nga yi ye shes kyis bskul yin/ /de dag lha mo skal chen mo/ /rdzas dang khams ni bsdus pa ste/ /brtson 'grus dman zhing tha shal dang / /bsod nams dman pas mthong mi 'gyur/ /

brtson 'grus bcud kun gnas yin pas/ /de bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /bcud ni bcing dang gso ba dag /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin/ /yongs su smin pa'i mchog gis ni/ /mnyam med bcud la brten pa yi/ /

rnam bcing la sogs nyes pa brgya/ /blo dang ldan pas dpyad de dgag /bcud ni nag po sngon po ste/ /bcud ni yongs su grub pa yin/ /dngul chu lhang tsher cho ga yis/ /ji srid bcud chen grub kyi bar/ /de srid du ni 'bad de dpyad/ /

'khrul 'khor gang zhig kha che ba/ /de ni ka ran rgod ma'i kha/ /'khrul 'khor gang zhig rdza rnga 'dra/ /de nyid bong bu rnga mo'i kha/ /rgod ma'i kha ni 'od ma yi/ /sbu gu yis ni brgyan bar bya/ /ka ran da yi 'khrul 'khor ni/ /ral

gri shugs kyis brgyan par bya/ /'khrul 'khor bong bu'i kha zhes pa/ /kang ka'i mgrin pa'i sbu gur sbyar/ /rnga mo'i kha yi 'khrul 'khor ni/ /bya rog mchu dang sbyang bar bya/ /tshar gcad pa ni sbal ba ste/ /'od ma can gyis

sbrang rtsir btso/ /bya rog mchu can bung bar btso/ /rdo leb 'bar zhing 'od dang bcas/ /kang ka'i mchu can glang chen btso/ /ral gri shubs can 'khrul 'khor gyis/ /seng ge ru ni btso ba yin/ /bcud chen yib dang khros

pa dang / /'thor zhing shin du tshos pa yis/ /chu yi nang du 'bros par 'gyur/ /de nas glang chen mgo bcud dang / /mu zi la sogs byin nas ni/ /bsregs pas tshar gcad mnan pa dang / /'og tu sa la bo nas su/ /'dar

zhing rmongs la du bar 'thul/ /khrol khrol gyi ni sgra 'byin no/ /de nas a sa gan da dang / /ba la tsakra mar da dang / /ba la ta ka shi khru ste/ /pa ri tsha da ku mu ta/ /ud pal ma li ka sa bon/ /rgya shug rus pa yi sa bon/ /sku ba'i

sa bon ma tu dang / /po son pa la shu ba'i shun/ /phyi ma skyo mar byas pa yi/ /nang du de nas brdung bar bya/ /cha ni nges dang bcas pas 'ching / /rdzas ni drug cha sbyin par bya/ /de nas rdo yi gtun du mnye/ /dang po re zhig sbyang bar bya/ /

de nas gci ba'i lan tshwa dang / /phag gi zhag dang khrag tu bcas/ /dkrugs pas nyes pa gzhom par bya/ /'khrul 'khor gzhug pa bshad par bya/ /tsan tra thal sman la sogs dang / /bcas pa rkang gi nang du gzhug /

dang po brgya rtsa brgyad par bya/ /phyi nas lto skyes bcas pa'i bcud/ /'od ma'i nang du bcug nas su/ /sngar bshad gnas su gzhag par bya/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni so pan dza la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'o/ /ka tu

ma dzardza la sogs pa'i ni me tog dang 'dab ma dang rus pa la sogs pa gzung ngo / /bcud btso ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga'o/ /lhang tsher phyogs kyi cha dang ni/ /bcud ni dbang po'i cha dang bcas/ /cha ni nges pas 'ching 'gyur te/ /cha

bcus rim gyis spel bar bya/ /dri zhim zla ba re re sbyin/ /gser gyis mdog ni bzang por 'gyur/ /dngul gyis so ni bzang por 'gyur/ /mu tig mig ni dag par 'gyur/ /mu men skra dang spu la phan/ /rdo rjes thog ni zlog

'gyur te/ /lcags kyis chu dang mtshon rnams zlog /sna tshogs dbang phyug sems dang ni/ /lhang tsher gyis ni brgya byin dang / /me dang gshin rje chu lha dang / /lus ngan la sogs bgegs kun zlog /nA ga bar ni mar sar dang / /

rgya mtsho lan tshwar bcas pa yi/ /dngul chu'i sbyor ba mchog 'di yis/ /rgas pa dang ni mdze nad 'joms/ /ba lang lce yi sman dang ni/ /dngul chur bcas pa byugs pa yis/ /gzhang 'brum nad ni sel bar byed/ /ka ri ke sas

gso ba ste/ /gi ri kar ni ka dang ni/ /ral pa dmar pos bzhu zhing gsad/ /'dzag dang a sha gad da dang / /nA ga ba la ba li ka /cha mnyam gyis ni rmongs par bya/ /d+ha du ra yi khu ba yis/ /rang gi yon tan ma lus byed/ /

de nas snying po kun bsdus pa'i/ /mar khu'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /mar khu rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/ /snod dang sems can las byung ba'o/ /dang po snod kyi bshad bya ste/ /'bras bu chen po gsum gyi chus/ /snum ster rnams
la yang yang bsgo/ /de ni legs par bskam byas la/ /rdul la sogs pa'i skyon bral ba'i/ /sa yi char ni sngags pas bskyed/ /legs par smin cing snum pa dang / /skya bo la sogs skyon spangs gnag /legs par

brdung zhing bsros nas su/ /skyu ru ra khu char chus sbang / /sra ba de yi bdug pas bsgo/ /du med me yis ran par bdug /de nas 'khrul 'khor dag gis bcing / /dpyid dang sos ka ston dus gsum/ /nyi ma'i 'od la

sman mar btso/ /dgun stod dgun smad dbyar dang gsum/ /mar khu me yis ran par btso/ /gan da pa tra twa tsa dang / /sug smel nA ga pus par bcas/ /ral pa dang ni sa li la/ /de dag phye mar byas pa ni/ /til las

byung ba'i nang blugs te/ /chu ni mar khu'i bzhi 'gyur bya/ /a ga ru ni srang phyed dang / /sman gyi bzhi 'gyur byas nas su/ /de nas me ni ran pas bskol/ /slar yang ral pa gla sgang dang / /tsan dan shing tsha ba trar

bcas/ /sngar bshad phye ma mnyam por bya/ /de bzhin snga ma bzhin du btso/ /slar yang sih+la dkar min lha/ /ru rta dza la ba thar bcas/ /thams cad bsres pa srang gcig btang / /mar khu srang ni brgyad dang bcas/ /

'od ma'i nang du blugs nas ni/ /nyi ma bdun du nyi mar btso/ /yid 'ong skal bzang stobs rab ster/ /'dod pa'i don ni phun sum tshogs/ /gal te tshangs pa'i mar khur bcas/ /rnal 'byor can la mchog ster 'gyur/ /

gzhan yang sba la sug smel dang / /ba ta b+h+ring ga rA dza dang / /sen mo ru rta pi sha tsa/ /so sor cha bzhi cha drug bdun/ /cha ni bcu gnyis dag dang bcas/ /'di rnams sman gyi skyo ma ni/ /sngar bshad pa yi tshad dang bcas/ /sngar bshad

'od ma'i cho gas btso/ /gang tshe rkang gi mar khur bcas/ /nad rnams thams cad 'phrog par 'gyur/ /de nas sha chen mar khu dang / /lhan cig bsres te sbrang rtsi yi/ /snod tu blugs te nyi mar bsro/ /nyi ma bdun ni tshun

chad kyis/ /ri dgas lte ba dang mtshungs 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni dam pa ste/ /bsrung ba kun gyis bla na med/ /ti tra tsa yi 'bras bu dang / /tsan dan sih+la shing tshar bcas/ /sngar bshad pa yi mar khu de/ /rkang gi mar dang

bsres nas ni/ /sngar bzhin sbrang rtsi'i snod gzhag sogs/ /de ni ga bur mtshungs 'gyur te/ /skye bo thams cad rmongs par byed/ /de nas ri skyes mar khur bcas/ /'bras gsum gla sgang shu dag dang / /pu ti ta dkar

ku gsum/ /se bal yi ngar pa dang / /gur kum dang ni lhan cig bcas/ /sbrang rtsi'i snod du blugs nas su/ /nyin bdun nyi ma'i drod la btso/ /skal bzang stobs 'phel mdangs dang ldan/ /rtag tu 'o ma btung bya zhing / /

bsam gtan bzlas la 'bad par bya/ /tshangs par spyod la rtag gnas nas/ /khu ba dag ni dgag par bya/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni bcas pa ru/ /sgrub pos phra mo zla drug bza'/ /de yi bshang ba kun blangs la/ /phra mo lhan cig phye

mar bya/ /rdza ma sar par bzhag nas su/ /tsha gsum tso ra'i phye ma ni/ /nyis 'gyur du na byis pa dang / /'byin byed phye ma bcu char bsre/ /bu ram gyis ni ri lu bya/ /sgrub po shin du mnyam bzhag pas/ /nyi ma re re zho

gnyis gnyis/ /zos na nad rnams thams cad ni/ /'jig 'gyur khyad par gzhang 'brum 'joms/ /mes po yi ni cha bzhi dang / /sgog skya dang ni bcu drug bsre/ /'o ma dang ni lhan cig btung / /nyi ma bdun ni tshun chad kyis/ /

gzer nad glang sna 'joms par 'gyur/ /sings po dang ni lhan cig tu/ /snga ma bzhin du 'thungs na ni/ /nad rnams thams cad sel bar byed/ /zla drug sbyor ba goms pa yis/ /skra dkar dang ni gnyer ma 'phrog /'bras ni dmar

po'i phye ma dang / /ba la'i rtsa ba 'dab mar bcas/ /sgog skya zho gnyis lhan cig tu/ /btags te ri lu byas nas ni/ /mar ram mar nag nang du btso/ /zos nas gcin dang 'tsham par btung / /des ni rus pa chag pa dag /'byor

zhing stobs dang nyam 'phel 'gyur/ /b+h+ring ga rA dza tshangs pa ni/ /rlon pa gci ba dang bcas bza'/ /de yis dug ni 'phrog par byed/ /yung ba'i khu ba zho gnyis dang / /de dang mnyam pa'i gci bar bcas/ /mthungs na rgyu

ba'i dug dang ni/ /shu ba dang ni nad kun 'joms/ /yung ba'i khu ba ba lang gcin/ /de bzhin 'byung po'i gtso bo ste/ /rig byed grangs dang mnyam pa'i srang / /de la zho ni gnyis gnyis btung / /dpyid kyi dus su cung zad

bskyed/ /sbyor ba'i gtso bo 'di yis ni/ /dug dang rims rnams sel bar byed/ /gla sgang skyu ru ra dang ni/ /dri rnon dang ni zhag chen dang / /sbrang rtsi cha mnyam phye ma ni/ /khab len lcags kyi snod du gzhag /sbyor ba'i
rim pa 'di yis ni/ /srang ni sum brgya'i bar du bya/ /'ba' sa~M ta zhes bya ba ste/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/ /lo gcig bar du sbyor ba yis/ /yid 'ong yid ni gzhungs par 'gyur/ /nad rnams kun

las rnam par grol/ /gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar sel/ /dus kyi rlung dang nyi tshan sogs/ /bsten kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /sbyor ba gzhan la brten pa ni/ /'bras bu med cing log par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bsam
gtan bzlas byas nas/ /lo ni sum brgya'i bar du 'tsho/ /pi pi ling dang gur kum ni/ /cha ni mnyam por byas nas su/ /so ka'i dus su bza' bar bya/ /de rjes gci ba dro 'thungs na/ /kha zas yi gar 'ong

zhing 'ju/ /nir ku~M di yi khu ba dang / /gci bar bcas pa sna sman sbyin/ /bad kan las gyur nad rnams 'phrog /de nyid pad ma'i dri ma dang / /bcas par byugs na glang shu sel/ /ma ra ka da'i rtsa ba dang / /so dang sen mo'i rdul

du bsre/ /rma ni dang po mar gyis bkru/ /de rjes sman des byugs na ni/ /rma ni 'drub par byed pa'i mchog /so phag rdul dang sug smel phye/ /gi ri kaR+Na'i khu ba ru/ /mnyes te mig la byugs na ni/ /rab rib dag ni

'joms pa'i mchog /'bras bu gsum gyi khu bas sbyang / /ma ha ha ta ka yi 'dab/ /'o ma dang ni lig bu mig /'byung po'i chu dang bcas pa ru/ /mig tu blugs nas lo d+ha yis/ /bdugs na dri ma med par 'gyur/ /yung

ba gnyis kyi cha mnyam phye/ /ba yi dar ba bre dor bcas/ /bre gang lus kyi bar du bskol/ /zhag bdun du ni de 'thungs na/ /de yis lus ni rgyas 'gyur te/ /bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba 'di/ /dpa' bo rang nyid bshad pa yin/ /

yung ba dang ni so phag dang / /de bzhin btsag dang smyo byed khu/ /rlung med gnas su gnas nas ni/ /lus la dril phyis byas na ni/ /rtag tu stobs ni 'phel byed cing / /dngul chu bcing ba dag la phan/ /ru rta mur

ba shug ti ka /shing tsha cha mnyam phye dang ni/ /mang si tsha ni nyis 'gyur bcas/ /dril phyis byas na 'dod pa 'grub/ /brag zhun dang ni so phag dang / /nir gun di dang e la tsha/ /cha ni mnyam por byas pa yi/ /

yung ba dag ni bzhi 'gyur bcas/ /gser shing khu ba cha phyed kyis/ /dril phyis byas na dug 'phrog cing / /gci bar bcas pa'i dril phyis kyis/ /khyi rngo dang ni mdze nad 'joms/ /khye'u dang bu mo gzhon nu'i
sha /mar dang bcas pa ci rigs par/ /rgyun du zos na tshe ring 'gyur/ /mdzes ma las byung me tog ni/ /zos na rim gyis rga ba 'joms/ /rtag tu ga bur tsan dan dag /bsten na nad rnams sel ba'i mchog /

de bzhin bzhi mnyam gci bar bcas/ /sna sman byin na'ang nad kun sel/ /sha sha ka dang yung ba dang / /kha ba yi ni snying po dag /pad ma can gyi pad ma ni/ /smyung po yi ni khu ba dang / /sems kyi dbang phyug lag
mthil du/ /mnyes te rim gyis bsten na ni/ /nad rnams kun las grol 'gyur zhing / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed par/ /gdon mi za bar ngas bshad de/ /dpyid kyi dus su bskul bar bya/ /mkhrang ma

zhes bya chen po'i chen/ /de yi gci ba'i lan tshwa dang / /de yi khrag dang khu bar bcas/ /dngul chu dang ni sbrang rtsir bsre/ /sbyor ba chen po 'di dag ni/ /mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad/ /rtag tu nad med stobs ldan

'gyur/ /bad kan can gyi mi rnams la/ /tsha ba'i rdzas dang lhan cig sbyin/ /thung ngu'i pad ma las byung ba/ /dang po mkhas pas gzung bar bya/ /lce dang dkar por bcas pa las/ /sbyor ba pos ni ri lu bya/ /zla ba drug

tu bsten pa yis/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par 'ching / /ji srid lus ni gnas kyi bar/ /dug kyang 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mkhrang ma las byung me tog gzung / /de bzhin khwa gdong bdud rtsir bcas/ /sha chen
dag ni nyis 'gyur bya/ /rang las byung ba'i sems dang bcas/ /de ni zos shing bsten pa yis/ /tshe dang nad med phun sum tshogs/ /rim 'di rtag tu bsten byas na/ /lo ni sum brgyar 'tsho 'gyur zhing / /
skra dkar dang ni gnyer ma sel/ /bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med 'gyur/ /bshang ba'i phye ma zho gnyis dang / /a pa marga'i thal ba dag /mi yi gcin dang ma he'i gcin/ /bcas par mkhas
pas blud na ni/ /stobs rnams bde bar skye 'gyur bar/ /ngas bshad pa la the tshom med/ /rdo rje bla ma mchod nas ni/ /de 'og las ni brtsam par bya/ /yung ba she ka rar bcas pas/ /khrag dang

mkhris pa'ang sel bar byed/ /mi mo'i 'o ma srang brgya dang / /rdo rje'i 'o ma srang brgyar bcas/ /skyu ru ru'i khu ba'ang de tsam ste/ /ba yi 'o ma kham phor gang / /yung ba sbrang rtsi tsan dan dmar/ /srang gcig dang ni pa

the dag /sngar bshad mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni gzung bar bya/ /sngon bzhin ran par btso byas la/ /khyim gyi me tog dkar por bcas/ /dpyid kyi dus su bskul bar bya/ /sbom po la sogs lnga
yi ni/ /las kyi cho ga bshad par bya/ /nu ma med pa rtsub mo dang / /mdzer pa can te gsum pa yi/ /gci ba'i lan tshwa bzung nas su/ /mthe bo yi ni khrag dang bcas/ /'gugs par byed pa'i dam pa yin/ /

rdzas la rta dang ma he'i khrag /khro bo yi ni khrag dang bcas/ /de bzhin du ni tha chungs kyi/ /khrag dang bcas pas gsad pa'ang 'grub/ /thung ngu yi ni lan tshwa dang / /de nyid kyi ni khu bar bcas/ /ring po'i khrag dang

bcas pa yis/ /rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /de nyid srin lag 'byung po'i bdag /don yod dbang du sdud pa yin/ /dri yi chu ni rgyal mtshan gyi/ /khrag dang lhan cig bcas nas su/ /lag mthil du ni mnyes
la bza'/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /pad ma las byung ma rnyed na/ /ro yi lag pa las byung gzung / /rnal 'byor don gnyer dbul po yis/ /lag pa'i mchod pas yid 'dod bya/ /rgyud rnams kun
du gang sbas pa/ /de dag thams cad khyod la bshad/ /dbang bskur lag tu bkod nas ni/ /mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol/ /mdzes ma kun du ru'i sa bon/ /phag gi mche bas mnyes nas su/ /

thig ler byas na rgyu mi rgyu'i/ /'gro ba dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /gi ri kaR+Nan dkar po dang / /pri yang ku ru bcas te blag /nyams stobs dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /bu mo gzhon nu'i mig rnag dang / /ldong ros bcas

pa bsten na ni/ /sna tshogs dug rnams 'joms par byed/ /bu mo sngo bsangs mig rnag dang / /klad pa yi ni zhag tu bcas/ /de ni bsten pa tsam gyis su/ /skra dkar 'joms par the tshom med/ /lce dang khrag ni cha

mnyams la/ /bu ram 'ol ske bzhi char bcas/ /gzhan yang khu ba mar dang ni/ /dngul chu sngar ni bshad bzhin bzung / /mu zi bzang por bcas pa ni/ /bsten na sbyor ba'i dam pa ste/ /zla drug tsam du nges par ni/ /

rga dang na las grol 'gyur zhing / /lo ni sum brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /rkang gi zhag dang mu zi ni/ /zho ni phyed phyed sbyar byas la/ /lo gcig bar du bsten na ni/ /lha yi gzugs 'gyur the tshom med/ /
nam mkha'i me ni mnyes byed pa/ /su si ra'i tshad dang mnyam/ /'di ni sbyor ba chen po ste/ /tshe dang nad med 'phel byed yin/ /rtsi bsad dang ni bkra shis bcas/ /lhag pa'i lha yi sems par ldan/ /

bslad dang gzhib dang sna sman gyis/ /rdo rje'i lus 'gyur the tshom med/ /ce myang tsha dang gser shing dang / /smyo byed dag la bzhi char bcas/ /tsag kra marda sen mo'i rdul/ /so ma ra dza yung ba dag /
thams cad gcig tu sbyor ba yi/ /rdzas ni srang gcig bzung nas su/ /sngar bshad cho ga bzhin du ni/ /mar khu dag ni btso bar bya/ /mi rgyal ta la sa h+ya de/ /'bras bu yi ni chu dang bcas/ /bzhi dang
lnga dang drug bdun cha/ /de dag ji snyed mar de snyed/ /lcags kyi dri ma spri yang ku/ /so dang sen mo yung bar bcas/ /de dag slar yang mar khur btso/ /gsal zhing nad med 'phel bar byed/ /mgo bsku

ba yi cho ga'o/ /pri yang ku dang tsan dra dang / /kan te la ba na'i me tog /sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang ku mu ta/ /ud pal chu yi do bar bcas/ /skyer bar bcas pa'i skyo ma ni/ /srang gcig tshad du bzung bar bya/ /'dod pa'i me ni 'bar byed de/ /skal

bzang stobs ni 'phel bar byed/ /tsam pa dang ni gur kum dang / /ba bla'i khu bar bcas pa bsku/ /bsku byug gi cho ga'o/ /'byin byed gcig dang mar khu gnyis/ /dbang po gsum dang ldan par bya/ /ska ba zhes bya skyu ru ra/ /

kri ri ma la e la dzi/ /tsam pa ka dang tsan dan dang / /nA ga ge sar ru rta dang / /pad ma rag ta pri dar bcas/ /sbrang rtsi me tog pri yang ku/ /ba na ma la phur mo dang / /a pra da di pus par bcas/ /chu yi do ba dpa' bo gcig /

sha ta pus pa dza la gsum/ /rgya spos dag ni mchog yin te/ /mar khu btso ba'i cho gas ni/ /sna sman btung dang bsku byug bya/ /sna sman srang bcu sbyin bya ste/ /btung ba srang ni rnam pa brgya/ /nyi shu lhag pa mgor bsku yin/ /

dril phyis srang ni sum brgyar bya/ /sman bskol cho ga bshad bya ste/ /sman ni ji snyed yod pa yin/ /chu ni bcu drug 'gyur du btso/ /sman dang mnyam pa'i chu lus pa/ /bskol ba'i cho ga'i mchog tu bshad/ /ki da dang ni ma tshan di/ /sa la

dzang dang gu gul dang / /kun du ru dang a ka ru/ /mar du bcas pa bdug spos kyi/ /sbyor ba'i mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /sum bcu gsum pa'ang mchod par byed/ /brag zhun ga bur ru rta dang / /tsan dan sen mo pi pi ling / /
gla sgang bcas pa sngar bshad pa'i/ /rdzas dang lhan cig bsres nas ni/ /bye ma kha ra mar dang bcas/ /bu ram dag ni spang bar bya/ /kham phor thod pa'i dbyibs 'dra ba/ /ta la'i 'bras bu'i nang du
gzhug /bdug spos kyi 'khrul 'khor gnyis kyi cho ga'o/ /biSh+Nu kran da kha da si/ /ral pa dmar po pri yang gsum/ /shing tshwa sen mo

ru rta dang / /gla sgang rgya spos 'dag gu ni/ /bud med khrus kyi 'dag chal mchog /da ni bud med mngal gang nas/ /rnag dang thal ba nya dri 'byung / /de rnams sbyang bar bya ba bshad/ /dang po dri zhim chu yis
bkru/ /de nas lo da bskol bas bkru/ /de nas khri steng bzhag nas su/ /kham phor bdug spos kha sbyar te/ /bug pa dag ni dbug par bya/ /de ru sbu gu bcug nas ni/ /skye gnas nang du bdug par bya/ /

n+ya gro d+ha yi shing bu ni/ /mthe'u chung tshad tsam blangs nas su/ /ba yi gcin gyi nang du ni/ /zhag gcig bar du sbang bar bya/ /de yis so ni brud nas su/ /de 'og ru rta a ru ra/ /cha mnyam dri yis so la bsgo/ /

kha yi dri ma sel ba'i mchog /gla sgang ru rta e la dang / /sug smel 'u su shing mngar rnams/ /zos na rnag dang sgog dri dang / /chang gi dri ni 'phrog pa'i mchog /pa la ba ni rnam gnyis kyis/ /sbang ba

dang ni bsgo byas na/ /me tog dang ni skyur po sogs/ /sbyang zhing dri yis bsgo ba'i mchog /ral pa dmar po ba la dang / /sug smel rgya spos 'u su bcas/ /sen mo dang ni gla sgang la/ /skyu ru ra ni sum

'gyur blugs/ /'di ni khrus kyi sbyar ba'i mchog /shing tsha gla sgang rgya spos dang / /pa tra ke par ti yi ni/ /gla sgong ru rta sen mor bcas/ /skyu ru ra ni cha gsum bya/ /de dag bkru ba'i 'dag chal
mchog /rgyal po la sogs phyi rol sbyor/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i rim pa ni/ /bdag las skyes pa lnga dang bsre/ /rgyal po la sogs bcu drug bya/ /a i o a ste dang po'o/ /l-i u e r-i gnyis
pa'o/ /I a~M a o ni gsum pa'o/ /U l-I r-I e ni bzhi pa'o/ /lha yi gzugs su byed pa yi/ /sman ni de dag bstan pa yin/ /dbyangs tshad cho ga shes pa yis/ /de dag thams cad shes par
bya/ /a ni sa yi bdag po ste/ /i ni sa ha de ba yin/ /o ni rma bya'i cod pan te/ /A ni ngan par sbyor ma yin/ /l-i ni kri ta a dzA li/ /u ni ral pa dmar po yin/ /e ni rtag tu du ba ste/ /r-i ni

gi ri kar+Ni ka /I ni tsag kra ang ka yin/ /a~M ni sha si she kha ra/ /a zhes bya ba nyi ma'i shing / /o zhes bya ba la dzu ba/ /U ni smyo byed ces bya ste/ /lI ni mgo yi lcug ma yin/ /r-I ni ma he'i rwa yin te/ /

e zhes bya ba rdo rje can/ /ka ni gu gul lo/ /kha ni rdo rje can no/ /ga ni smyo byed do/ /g+ha ni ra ma'o/ /nga dang tsa ni sa ra pod ka dang a ta pa ri'o/ /tsha dang dza ni si dang tsam pa ka'o/ /dz+ha ni kun du ra'o/ /

nya dang Ta ni ang ko la dang son tsi ka'o/ /Tha ni ldong ros so/ /Da ni a ka ru'o/ /D+ha ni lug ru'o/ /Na ni dUr ba dkar po'o/ /ta dang tha ni nya dang gan ti ka'o/ /da dang d+ha ni gur kum dang ro tsa na'o/ /na ni pa~M sh+thi'o/ /pa dang pha ni sha
kha ra dang li shi'o/ /ba ni pri yang ku'o/ /b+ha ni nA ga ge sar ro/ /ma ni sen mo'o/ /ya ra la wa bzhi po ni/ /rlung la sogs pa'i sbyor ba mchog /pring ka an dza li dang ni/ /ral pa dmar po
sa ha de/ /dpral bar thig le byas pa yi/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas rmongs byed/ /su ta pa ti ma yu ra/ /ti ka dza la gzhan mi thub/ /de dag b+ha gar byugs na ni/ /lan cig tsam gyis bka' nyan
'gyur/ /badzri me sha a ka dang / /a dan dza le thal sman mchog /ral pa ka tam smyo byed dang / /kan ta'i ri lus dbang du byed/ /na ni na ra an dza li/ /la dza lar ni bcas pa yis/ /chu la

shAkya'i dbang po bzhin/ /rgyal po kri ta an dza li/ /na ri dang ni de stir bcas/ /me ni bcing ba'i dam pa yin/ /be snu he ma badzri dang / /hI dur bcas pa khar bcug na/ /de yi mod la ngal sos 'gyur/ /

rgyal po blon po la ta dang / /pa na rdo rje mkhrang ba'i mchog /pa na sa ha shi kha dang / /me shar bcas pas dug 'joms byed/ /par+ya su pa me she dang / /sni ha b+ha gar blugs na ni/ /mngal na gnas pa skye bar 'gyur/ /

ma he'i ra dang la ta dang / /na ri a ba nar bcas pa/ /lag pas byugs na rgyan rgyal 'gyur/ /pre ta tsan di na ra dang / /sa ha de ba khar bcug na/ /mtshan mo dag ni 'jigs med rgyu/ /skag dang rgyal rtsa

khris pa dang / /pan du blon po de bzhin te/ /pu ta ar thi cha bsnyams pa/ /'dod dang ldan zhing mngal 'dzin 'gyur/ /sha ta sring ga hasta dang / /tsan dan gyi ni phye ma dag /sems can thams cad dbang du
byed/ /bud med kun la bde ba ster/ /ni ta ke ke pe ya dang / /skyes bus b+ha ga byugs na ni/ /dbang du sdud par byed pa'i mchog /rtsa mkhris ral pa dmar po dang / /da la dang ni pa 'dur bcas/ /ri lu
kha ru bcug na ni/ /'khrig dus khu ba 'dzin pa'i mchog /ma yu ra dang a shu dang / /ar ka me shi phye mas ni/ /dgra bo brlag par byed pa yin/ /rmongs byed kan ta gzhan mi thub/ /sa yi bdag por yang
dag ldan/ /smig ma yi ni sa bon bcas/ /bya ba kun byed dge ba yin/ /ga ri du hi kra ma dang / /bu dan tsa ri rdo rje can/ /rang khrag bcas pa'i skyo ma yis/ /sta re 'bar ba'ang gangs su byed/ /a a/
i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ a~M AH/ a la sogs pas lus byugs na/ /lha rnams kyis kyang mchod 'gyur na/ /sa stengs skye bo smos ci dgos/ /yang a i o AH
rnams ni/ /yid 'ong bdug pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /l-I U r-I au rnams ni/ /dril phyis sbyor ba'i dam pa yin/ /A a~M e I rnams ni/ /mig sman la sogs cho ga'o/ /u l-i r-i e rnams ni/ /khrus kyi bya ba'i
cho ga'i mchog /ka sogs bdud rtsi lnga ldan pa/ /dbang du bya ba'i cho ga mchog /tsa la sogs dang bdud rtsi lngas/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs sogs/ /skyes pa bud med dbang du byed/ /Ta la sogs

dang bdud rtsi lngas/ /dmangs rigs dag ni dbang du byed/ /ta la sogs dang til chen gyis/ /dpral bar thig ler byas na ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas rmongs byed/ /pa la sogs dang bdud rtsi lngas/ /tsan dan bcas pas dbang

du byed/ /sha Sha sa ha rnams kyis ni/ /rlung dang me dang dbang chen chu/ /ya la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /cho ga ji bzhin rig pa yis/ /bskrad pa la sogs byed par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor

ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba dang / sdom pa'i
cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs la/ /gsang chen du ni legs bzhugs pa'i/ /der ni lha mos 'di skad gsungs/ /

lha khyod kyis ni sngar bshad pa'i/ /mtshon cha lnga yi cho ga dang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin pad ma'i nags tshal dang / /gnas bzhi khyod kyis gsungs pa yi/ /dgos pa dag ni ji lta bu/ /bsdus
pa'i ming ni ji ltar lags/ /de bzhin gzhan yang bri ba ci/ /khyod kyis ba dan gsum bshad pa'i/ /mchod pa yi ni khyad par ci/ /de dag bdag ni the tshom gyur/ thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/ /

sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'i/ /rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa gang / /de dag thams cad zhu 'dod pa/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo legs so legs/ /nang gi sbyor ba'i sdom pa ni/ /rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /ltong
rgyud sbyor ba la sogs tshogs/ /me tog dag ni bsdus pa 'dra/ /rna drung bar du 'gengs pa dag /lcags kyu zhags pa sogs pa'ang sbyar/ /mda' ni myur ba mgyogs pa ste/ /'phen pa mda' yi shugs yin no/ /

g.yas dang g.yon ni gnyi ga yis/ /'gengs pa mchog ma'i bar du yin/ /'dzin pa cung zad gnas pa ste/ /mi 'da' bar ni 'phang bar bya/ /mda' yi cho ga brjod mi lang / /da ni phyag rgya brjod par bya/ /sa ni phyag rgyas gdab
par bya/ /mnyam pa rkang gnyis gzhibs pa ste/ /yangs pa rgya cher bskyed pa yin/ /zlum po dkyil 'khor lta bur bya/ /g.yon pa cung zad bskums pa ni/ /g.yas pa brkyang zhes bya ba ste/ /g.yon brkyang
g.yon pa bsrang nas ni/ /g.yas pa cung zad bskums pa'o/ /mda' gzhu rig byed cho ga yis/ /mtshon cha thams cad 'phang bar bya/ /'di ni dbyibs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /da ni lus kyi mtshan nyid rnams/ /

phyag rgya rab tu bshad par bya/ /grims pa ni mi lhod pa ste snying stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /sran 'dzugs pa ni brtan zhing brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o/ /mnyen pa zhes bya ba ni mdzes shing snyan par smra ba'o/ /yan lag brtan

zhes bya ba ni phyag rgyas rma srol cher 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can no/ /rgya cher 'gengs shing rnam par dag zhes bya ba la 'gengs pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ tshad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus 'dzum pa dang bcas shing 'thun par 'jug

pa'o/ /lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can/ /zhes bya ba ni rab tu rdzogs pa'i ngang tshul can no/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang / /bsam gtan sbyor bas dbug par bya/ /khro bo'i gzugs su bsgoms nas su/ /
lha yi dbang por gzhur byas nas/ /klu dbang ba su da yi rgyud/ /glog ni mda' ru bsam bya ste/ /me lce 'bar ba mde 'ur bya/ /sgro ni rlung zhes bya ba ste/ /rnam pa lngar ni 'bugs pa yin/ /lag pa

g.yas pa zhes bya ba ni sna sgo g.yas pa ste/ de nas spro bar bya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa ni sna sgo g.yon pa ste bsdu ba'o/ /chang bas 'ben ni bsgribs nas su zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba'i don to/ /'gyed pa zhes

bya ba ni dgug pa'o/ /de la chang ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa dang rlung ngo / /mig gdangs pa ni bzhin 'dzum ba dang bcas pa'o/ /lta ba chang ba la gtad ces bya ba ni shi ba rnams kyang 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog go/ /
mda' gzhus rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /'bugs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /smin ma'i dkyus ni gzhu yin te/ /bzlog ste lta ba mda' yin no/ /'bugs pa rang gi sems kyis ni/ /gzhan sems don la gtad
pa yin/ /rol pa 'gros ni dal ba ste/ /'o ma 'dzin pa mkhrang ba ni/ /bo no u na ta zhes bya/ /bu mo 'di ni yid 'phrog ma/ /thams cad dngos po gsum yin te/ /yan lag mi gsal 'od ldan gang / /de ni
yang dag gsal zhing 'bar/ /snying gis thams cad 'dzin pa gang / /de ni yan lag bsgrub par brjod/ /snying ni pad ma zhes bshad de/ /pad ma de ni kun gyis mchod/ /thams cad 'dzin pa mgo bo yin/ /

glad pa nas ni kun du rgyu/ /gang gi stobs ni gang yin pa/ /de ni de tshe sbyar bar bya/ /gnas ni rnam pa du mar bshad/ /sha dang pus kar bung ba sogs/ /'dir yang rim pa de nyid kyis/ /sems ni dgugs pa sngon
'gro ba'i/ /bdag gi gdan la sogs pa yino/ /rang nyid kyis ni rtogs par sla/ /brda yis bshad pa brjod par bya/ /gru bzhi la sogs zhes bya la/ /gru bzhi pa ni zur bzhi ste/ /la yig dbang chen dkyil
'khor ro/ /'dab ma can ni gru gsum ste/ /me yi dkyil 'khor ra~M las byung / /de bzhin kun nas zlum po ni/ /ba dang ya zhes bya bar bshad/ /bsgrub par bya la dkyil 'khor dag /yi ge dang bcas bsams te
bsgrubs/ /g.yas phyogs nas ni bskor ba ni/ /bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun bsams pa'o/ /rim gyis gnon cing 'gro bya ste/ /bsgrub po shin du mnyam bzhag pas/ /rdo rje chags par bdag bsgoms na/ /rgyal srid

thams cad longs spyod 'gyur/ /slar yang e ni gzhur byas te/ /ba zhes bya ba mda' yin no/ /mda' gzhu'i rig byed sbyor ba yis/ /sngar bshad ji bzhin gnas par bya/ /bsgrub par bya ba 'od dmar 'gyur/ /mdun du
bltas pa bsam par bya/ /gsang ba'i gnas kyi nges pa ni/ /sha yi 'bugs par ngas bshad de/ /lte ba'i dbugs ni pus ka ra/ /snying ka bung ba zhes bya ste/ /ge sar 'bugs pa dpral ba yin/ /mig sogs

g.yo ba zhes bya ste/ /dbang po'i tshogs ni g.yul 'gyed pa/ /mi yi bdag po gsad par bya/ /de dag kun gyi man ngag ni/ /bla ma'i kha las nges par bya/ /'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen mi 'phen dang / /zhes bya ba la

'khrul 'khor ni ta la'i 'dab ma dang / gro ga dang ras la sogs pa la ral gri dang / pad ma dang / 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sngags dang bcas par bris pa ste/ de ni 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen pa'o/ /mi 'phen pa

zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ka'i yig 'bru las sna sgo'i lam nas byung ste dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'o/ /lag pas 'phen pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi lhar dmigs te dam tshig dbang du bya

ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed pa'o/ /'phangs nas slar ni gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgyar bcug ste bslang nas thal bar byas la slar yang gzung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ges rang nyid bkug nas bslang
ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas nam mkha'i ngos thams cad yongs su khyab pa'i du ba lta bu'i ye shes der bkug cing gsos te dam bca'o/ /de nas dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ rnam par snang mdzad
la sogs pa ci rigs par bsams nas rkang pa dang rkang par/ lag pa dang lag par/ kha dang khar/ lus dang lus su/ ngag dang ngag tu/ lta ba dang lta bar 'thab cing 'ching bar bsgom par bya ba 'di ni lag
pas 'gyad pa ste rnam pa lnga'o/ /A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ a~M i~M/ u~M e~M/ oM a~M A/ ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha rnams te/ /rab tu sbyor ba rgyas par ni/ /bsgrub pa bsgrub po rnams la
bshad/ /pad ma gar dbang bsgyur nas su/ /bu mo'i gnas la 'dug par bsam/ /e zhes bya dang ba~M zhes pa/ /la zhes bya ba gsum pa ste/ /bsgrub pos 'dir ni yi ge bsam/ /me mar gyi ni rtse ltar

bya/ /rtse mo lta bu zhes bya ba la/ shi kha ni mgo ste klad pa'i gong bu'o/ /rtse mo ni me'i rtse mo ste/ des mar sar bum par btsos pa ltar thams cad du bzhu bar bya'o/ /sngags kyi mar me 'di yis ni/ /skad
cig gis ni 'dar bar 'gyur/ /bu mo chags pas gdungs nas su/ /ji srid 'tsho bar dbang du 'gyur/ /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /lugs ma 'am ni bris pa la/ /de yi ming ni bris nas su/ /blo ldan

snying kar bcug ste bsgom/ /nyi ma bdun ni tshun chod kyis/ /mar me yi ni cho ga yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /gang gi dbang po rdzas yin te/ /shin du mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub/ /dbang po

mig la sogs pa yin/ /rigs pa'i sbyor ba lam yin te/ /gang dang gang gi rang bzhin te/ /de dang de yi dngos po yis/ /bde ba nyid du bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba sems zhes bya ba ste/ /de nyid du ni bdag bde
sogs/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /bde ba yis ni 'grub par bshad/ /shin du bde ba'i bsgrub thabs ni/ /thos dang bsam gtan sogs spangs pa'i/ /dman pa dag ni gang gis kyang / /

bsgrub par nus pa ma yin te/ /skye bo thabs dang bral bas na/ /tshul ngan dman pa dka' bas bsgrub/ /bdag nyid bsgrub pa dang bral bas/ /skal med ngal ba don med cing / /de la dngos grub zhes mi brjod/ /

a sa ma zhes bya ba ni dpe dang zla med pa'o/ /a d+hi ta zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sbyor ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun du rang nyid 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su mtshon

cing 'jug pa'o/ /pra ta ha~M zhes bya ba ni nyi ma re re zhing ngo / /yang na zla re ste zla ba nya la'o/ /yang na lo re zhing ste gal te ma 'byor pa'am/ skal ba med pa dang / 'das pa'i dbang gis kyang rung ste/ de dag gis ni lo re zhing

bya'o/ /de bzhin zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ltar bya ba'o/ /yang na de bzhin te/ slob dpon gzhan med na ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba la de la byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi

sdom pa ste/ de rnyed nas bdag dang lhan cig tu gar bya ba'o/ /sangs rgyas sdom pa ni sangs rgyas dang 'brel pa ste/ de su zhig ce na/ gzugs la sogs pa dang / lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa'i bu mo'o/ /gar zhes

bya ba ni bdag nyid rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas spyad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to/ /des ni 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te/ phyag rgya la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams ji ste rgyun du ma 'byor na des bde ba slar yang rjes su

gzung ba'i phyir/ rim pa 'dis mchod pa bya zhing dam tshig bsrung zhing bskyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gzhan yang brdas bshad pa'i don bstan par bya ste/ pra ta ha~M zhes bya ba ni rab tu mang po'o/ /de ci zhig zhe na/

khams bcwa brgyad kyi mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /zla re zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang / dmar po'o/ /lo re zhes bya ba ni lo bcu gcig ma nas brtsams te/ nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i bar du'o/ /gal te de dag kyang ma

'byor na ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba bdag nyid gcig pus bde ba'i sbyor bas dam tshig bskyang bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to/ /phyag rgyas dngos grub 'jug par 'gyur zhes bya ba la 'jug pa ni nyams su len

pa'o/ /sgrub pa po yi lag g.yon gyis/ /pad ma'i snod ni bzung nas su/ /zhes bya ba la pad ma'i snod ni dum bu gcig pa'i thod pa ste/ de la ka zhes bya ba ni lus so/ /pA la zhes bya ba ni skyong ba ste/ dum bu gcig pa zhes

bya ba ni ma nyams shing shin du mdzes pa'o/ /de la pad ma zhes bya ba ni pad ma can nam/ rigs gzhan gyi bu mo yang rung ste/ snod ni de'i chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi pad ma yin la de nyid mnyam pa ste/ rma med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /

lag pa zhes bya ba ni brtan pa zhes bya bar 'jug pa'o/ /g.yon pa zhes bya ba ni zur mig g.yon du lta ba'o/ /ba dan gsum zhes bya ba ni bu mo'i bcud 'dzag pa ste de bza' ba'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa zhes bya ba la lag pa

ni lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i bar yin la/ bshes gnyen dang ldan pa'i phyir g.yas pa'o/ /de nyid ni g.yon pa ste/ de las byung ba de longs spyad par bya ba'o/ /de la longs spyad pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bla mas nyams su

bstar ba de ltar spyad pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa pos de ltar nges par shes par byas la de nas dus bcing bar bya'i/ gzhan du na ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /ltung ba zhes bya ba ni dam tshig las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i

don to/ /sngags ni bla mas bstan pa ste/ /phyag rgya de la bstan pa yin/ /de nyid rtag tu sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /'di dag thams cad mi rtog pa/ /mi rtog pa yang ma yin te/ /rtog
pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /mi rtog pa ni brtags pa yin/ /dus drug du ni bstan pa dag /rtag tu rnam par mi rtog gnas/ /rdo rje sems sogs rgyal ba ru/ /de yi rang bzhin yongs shes bya/ /sos ka dang

ni dbyar dang ston/ /dgun stod dgun smad de bzhin dpyid/ /de dag ma 'dres shes byas la/ /'dis ni las rnams thams cad bya/ /sos ka'i dus ni rta mchog ste/ /de bzhin dbyar ni he ru ka /rdo rje nyi ma ston
yin te/ /pad mas rol pa dgun stod yin/ /dgun smad rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /dpyid ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /sos ka mar mes mchod bya ste/ /de bzhin dbyar ni chu yis mchod/ /ston ni mar khus
mchod bya ste/ /dgun stod de bzhin me tog dbul/ /dgun smad ga bur bza' bya ste/ /khyad par du ni bzhi mnyam gyis/ /dpyid kyi dus su mchod par bya/ /dus kyi mchod dang mnyam med de/ /sbyor ba kun gyi
dam pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo mnyes/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /mchod na mchod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /rang bzhin de dag rdzogs par ni/ /gang zhig
gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sgrub po rnams kyi las rnams ni/ /thams cad byed 'gyur gdon mi za/ /de dag rang bzhin grub pa ste/ /dus zhes bya bar brjod pa yin/ /dus la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rgyal

ba thams cad yang dag bzhugs/ /dus kun sems la gnas mod kyi/ /de ltar na yang rnam par 'khrul/ /mi shigs pa zhes bya ba ni yi ge hU~M ste/ de yang bdag nyid kyi lus la gnas pa'i hU~M ngo / /de nyid ni yi ge

mchog ces bya ste/ yi ge mchog de'i phyag rgya ni rtsa gsum nas bde ba chen po'i sgor sna'i sgo gnyis nas rlung ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa yin la/ de nyid ni A li kA li ste/ g.yas dang g.yon du'o/ /des 'di skad bstan

par 'gyur te/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yin la/ de'i steng du ni chu'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas ni me'o/ /de nas ni sa'o/ /de'i steng du ni pad ma'o/ /de'i steng du

gnas pa'i sa bon ni mi shigs pa dang yi ge'i mchog ces brjod do/ /dbang po kun las byung ba yin/ /dam tshig thod pa zhes byar brjod/ /mdzes pa phreng ba zhes bshad de/ /de kho na nyid u rgyan yin/ /gtsug gi

nor bu dbang bskur te/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya rjes gnang yin/ /he ru ka yi dbang bskur ba'o/ /thod pa lus zhes bya ba ste/ /rked pa phreng ba'i ming can yin/ /dbu rgyan b+ha ga zhes byar brjod/ /sangs rgyas khu ba zhes brjod do/ /gtsug gi

nor bu bde bar bshad/ /rdo rje pad ma'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /slar yang bshad par bya ba ste/ /thod pa dbang gnyis dam tshig ste/ /phreng ba sngags kyi bdag por brjod/ /bcu drug thig gis btab pa'o/ /stong pa dbu rgyan zhes byar bshad/ /

a la sogs pa'i ma mo rnams/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra ru brjod/ /de rnams dbus kyi bde ba gang / /de ni gtsug gi nor bur brjod/ /rigs rnams kun gyis thams cad du/ /rtag tu dbang bskur de lta bu/ /dpal zhes bya ba

dga' ba ste/ /bde ba sangs rgyas su ni brjod/ /pad ma pad ma nyid yin la/ /nags ni skya reng zhes byar grags/ /rtsa ba byang chub sems yin no/ /yang na pad ma lte ba'i 'khor lo ste/ /nags ni a sogs ma mo yin/ /rtsa ba thar ba

ster byed pa'i/ /brda yis sangs rgyas phyag rgya yin/ /yang na lte ba mtsho skyes zhes bya ste/ /nags zhes bya ba ngag yin la/ /rtsa ba lus kyi bla dgas yin/ /sangs rgyas sems kyi brda yin no/ /gcig pu nges pa'i rnal 'byor

yin/ /dben pa rtog pa spangs pa ste/ /sbas pa gsal bar ma byas pa'o/ /nags ni sngar bshad khams rnams te/ /lhan cig mchog tu 'jug pas na/ /bsdus pa zhes ni bya bar brjod/ /lha zhes bya bar rang ming brjod/ /

gza' dang skar ma la sogs lha/ /a kra zhes bya'i sgra brjod pa/ /de ni rnal 'byor shes pa min/ /a kra gtso bo zhes brjod cing / /a kra dam pa zhes bya la/ /a kra dang po zhes bshad cing / /a kra spyi bor gnas pa

pa'o/ /rang gi ming dang ldan pa yis/ /sdig pa dag ni sel bar byed/ /yang na sa ni a sogs te/ /de rnams a kra ha zhes bya/ /mgor gnas 'og tu bltas nas ni/ /yi ge tha snyad char du 'bebs/ /tha snyad ces bya

ba ni dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams te de rnams kyis 'tsho bar gyur pa'o/ /dbyangs zhes bya ba la swa ni rang nyid kyis so/ /ra ni mdzes pa ste des na swa ra'o/ /ha ni skal bzangs yi ge ste/ /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang / /
rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa yi/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams su/ /bdag gi lus ni bsam par bya/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing / /bsod nams kun dang ldan pa ru/ /

dngos po gsum ni yang dag gnas/ /bris pas bsod nams gang mthong ba/ /bsams pas kyang ni de bzhin mthong / /slob ma bdag nyid chen po la/ /'di yis dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /dbang bskur dam pa bsgom byar

'dod/ /gang dang gang gi lha yi mchog /de dang de ni slob dpon 'gro/ /gang dang gang la lhag mos pa/ /de dang de yis dbang bskur bya/ /dbang ni rnam pa bzhi dag tu/ /yang dang yang du so sor bshad/ /gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa
rnams/ /de dag kun gyis brjod pa yin/ /rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs bya'i phyir/ /bcos ma yi ni bsgom pa dang / /bcos ma yi ni bzlas pa bya/ /rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs gyur na/ /bcos ma'i sbyor ba phyi

rol nas/ /rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs gyur pas/ /bcos ma dag ni mi bya'o/ /dper na gzings la 'jus nas ni/ /chu yi pha rol 'gro bar byed/ /pha rol phyin nas 'dor ba ltar/ /bcos ma dag kyang de bzhin no/ /
dkyil 'khor la sogs las gang ni/ /bcos ma'i sems kyis gang byed pa/ /phyi rol las rnams gsal byed pas/ /dang po'i las can rnams la bsngags/ /dngos grub de kun 'dir gnas pas/ /rgyal
ba'i dngos nyid rig la min/ /gang yang sgra shes bstan bcos rnams/ /drang srong rnams kyis byas pa ltar/ /rang gi sems ni 'jug byed pa'i/ /skyes bu'i bcos ma'i bya ba rnams/ /rgyud kyi rjes

su 'brangs nas ni/ /'bad pas sdug bsngal slong bar byed/ /de phyir dkyil 'khor la sogs pa/ /bya ba'i cho ga la 'bad pa/ /thar pa dang bral phyi rol te/ /skyes bu nyon mongs 'ba' zhig byed/ /mi rtog bas ni 'tshang

mi rgya/ /rtog dang bcas pas kyang de bzhin/ /shin du rnam dag yongs shes na/ /yid 'dod rnams kyi de nyid 'gyur/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni/ /dam pa nyid du yod min cing / /rang bzhin gsal ba nyid kyi phyir/ /

stong pa nyid kyang ma yin no/ /rang bzhin dbye ba thams cad kyi/ /rnam pa dag ni rnam gnas pa/ /rgya mtsho la ni rin chen bzhin/ /thog mtha' med pa'i tshul can yin/ /'jig rten rtag tu tha snyad spyod/ /'jig
rten las 'das de dang 'gal/ /yod dang med ces bya ba ni/ /rang bzhin nyid du shes pa min/ /'di yi tshul gyis rab rtogs pa/ /rdzogs dang bral bas grol ba min/ /rnal ma'i lam la brten na ni/ /thams cad

byas kyang rnam par grol/ /skyon dang yon tan 'phel byed pa'i/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal dngos/ /lhan cig skyes par yang dag gnas/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang / rang bzhin nges

par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste lnga bcu pa'o// //rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi paN Di ta chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ dpe gnyis la gtugs nas gtan la phab pa'o/ /
